Ziɣ d kunwi id iruḥen……
Ait Slimane Hamid
Yiwen wass bu ufekrun akk d tmeṭṭut-is bdan qqazen di lqaεa ufan sin ifranken, ttemcawaren acu ara d-aγen, msefhamen γef ddewwara, si mi itt-id-yewwi bu ufekrun, inna-yas i tmeṭṭut-is:-A taεzizt mi tebbwa ddewwara-agi ma tebγiḍ ečč-itt akk, maca eğğ-iyi kan takerciwt acku nekkini ala tinna iḥemmleγ.<div class="td-a-rec td-a-rec-id-content_inline tdi_12_58c td_block_template_1"><ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-2542367963502539" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout="in-article" data-ad-slot="2779553303" style="display:block; -align:center;"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});</script></div>Mi tebbwa, tameṭṭut tečča takerciwt-nni meṛṛa, ah i texdem!Bu ufekrun: A tameṭṭut awi-d takerciwt-nni.Tameṭṭut:-Tečča-tt tugi.Bu ufekrun:-A tugi teččiḍ takerciwt?Tugi:-A mmi berraγ.Tameṭṭut:-Ala d tiflewt.Tiflewt:-A mmi berraγ.Argaz:-Acimi a tameṭṭut, tuγaleḍ d taseqqaḍt ? Yuγal iwwet-itt s ubeqqa.Tameṭṭut terwel tugi ad tuγal s axxam. Iqqim bu ufekrun ittru, ibγa a tt-id-iger i lεemeṛ-is.Tεedda-d tsekkurt tenna-yas:-Acimi tettruḍ a bu ufekrun?Bu ufekrun:-Fkiγ-as abeqqa terwel-iyi γer bu xemsa.Tasekkurt:-Ur ttaggwad a k-tt-id-rreγ.Truḥ tsekkurt tesṭebṭub γer uqeṛmud n tmeṭṭut.Tameṭṭut:-Telbiba wa telbiba, anwa wagi γef uxxam n baba ur yugwad, ur ikukra, a Ṛebbi gzem-as aḍar s umenqaṛ neγ s umencaṛ.Tasekkurt:-D nnana-m tasekkurt ccbaḥa n tmurt.Tameṭṭut:-Lukan d nanna tasekkurt d ccbaḥa n tmurt, ur kem-ikkat ara useggad am igzem tamzurt. Tasekkurt tuγal-d tettru tenneḥcam.Bu ufekrun mazal ittru, iεedda-d uzger is-teqsa-t:-Acu akka yuγen Bu ufekrun si mkul cedda ?Bu ufekrun:-Fkiγ-as abeqqa terwel γer bu xemsa.Azger:-Ur ttagwad a k-tt-id-rreγ.Iruḥ uzger isqerqub γef uxxam n tmeṭṭut. Tameṭṭut:-Telbiba wa telbiba, anwa wagi γef uxxam n baba ur yugwad ur ikukra a Ṛebbi gezm-as aḍar s umenqaṛ neγ s umencaṛ?Azger:-D ddada-m azger ikerzen lḥemra.Tameṭṭut:-Lukan d azger ikerzen lḥemra ur tkerzeḍ ara si ṣṣbeḥ ar tmeddit a k-id-awin d tuna. Yuγal uzger ittru inneḥcam.Iqqim bu ufekrun di mkul cedda mazal-it ittru, iεedda-d isγi isteqsa-t, kif kif.Tameṭṭut:-Telbiba wa telbiba, anwa wagi γef uxxam n baba ur yuggad, ur ikukra, a Ṛebbi gezm-as aḍar s umenqaṛ neγ s umencaṛ?Isγi:-D ddada-m isγi id-ikkan si Mekka.Tameṭṭut:-Lukan d isγi d-ikkan si Mekka ur tettnaḍid ara deg ugudu wis ma a ttafeḍ tawekka. Yuγal-d isγi ittru inneḥcam.Iqqim bu ufekrun ittru armi id-iεedda uzrem, inna-yas:-Acu akka i k-yuγen a bu ufekrun si mkul cedda yal ass di imeṭṭi ?Bu ufekrun:-Fkiγ-as abeqqa terwel γer bu xemsa.Azrem:-Ur ttagwad a k-tt-id-rreγ.Bu ufekrun:-Annaγ ay azrem ur ccukeγ ara aṭas ig ruḥen ur d-qḍin.Azrem:-Rğu ad d-twaliḍ.Iruḥ uzrem ikcem γer tmeṭṭut inna-yas:-Ulac telbiba, ulac axxam n baba-m, lḥu γiwel neγ a kem-qseγ seg timiḍt-im.Dγa tameṭṭut twala mačči d urar tega-yas udem i uzrem n bu tsiqest, tuγal-d γer bu ufekrun.Yahia Yanes
Yiwen wass bu ufekrun akk d tmeṭṭut-is bdan qqazen di lqaεa ufan sin ifranken, ttemcawaren acu ara d-aγen, msefhamen γef ddewwara, si mi itt-id-yewwi bu ufekrun, inna-yas i tmeṭṭut-is:-A taεzizt mi tebbwa ddewwara-agi ma tebγiḍ ečč-itt akk, maca eğğ-iyi kan takerciwt acku nekkini ala tinna iḥemmleγ.
Mi tebbwa, tameṭṭut tečča takerciwt-nni meṛṛa, ah i texdem!
Bu ufekrun: A tameṭṭut awi-d takerciwt-nni.
Tameṭṭut:-Tečča-tt tugi.
Bu ufekrun:-A tugi teččiḍ takerciwt?
Tugi:-A mmi berraγ.
Tameṭṭut:-Ala d tiflewt.
Tiflewt:-A mmi berraγ.
Argaz:-Acimi a tameṭṭut, tuγaleḍ d taseqqaḍt ? Yuγal iwwet-itt s ubeqqa.
Tameṭṭut terwel tugi ad tuγal s axxam. Iqqim bu ufekrun ittru, ibγa a tt-id-iger i lεemeṛ-is.
Tεedda-d tsekkurt tenna-yas:-Acimi tettruḍ a bu ufekrun?
Bu ufekrun:-Fkiγ-as abeqqa terwel-iyi γer bu xemsa.
Tasekkurt:-Ur ttaggwad a k-tt-id-rreγ.
Truḥ tsekkurt tesṭebṭub γer uqeṛmud n tmeṭṭut.
Tameṭṭut:-Telbiba wa telbiba, anwa wagi γef uxxam n baba ur yugwad, ur ikukra, a Ṛebbi gzem-as aḍar s umenqaṛ neγ s umencaṛ.
Tasekkurt:-D nnana-m tasekkurt ccbaḥa n tmurt.
Tameṭṭut:-Lukan d nanna tasekkurt d ccbaḥa n tmurt, ur kem-ikkat ara useggad am igzem tamzurt. Tasekkurt tuγal-d tettru tenneḥcam.
Bu ufekrun mazal ittru, iεedda-d uzger is-teqsa-t:-Acu akka yuγen Bu ufekrun si mkul cedda ?
Bu ufekrun:-Fkiγ-as abeqqa terwel γer bu xemsa.
Azger:-Ur ttagwad a k-tt-id-rreγ.
Iruḥ uzger isqerqub γef uxxam n tmeṭṭut. Tameṭṭut:-Telbiba wa telbiba, anwa wagi γef uxxam n baba ur yugwad ur ikukra a Ṛebbi gezm-as aḍar s umenqaṛ neγ s umencaṛ?
Azger:-D ddada-m azger ikerzen lḥemra.
Tameṭṭut:-Lukan d azger ikerzen lḥemra ur tkerzeḍ ara si ṣṣbeḥ ar tmeddit a k-id-awin d tuna. Yuγal uzger ittru inneḥcam.
Iqqim bu ufekrun di mkul cedda mazal-it ittru, iεedda-d isγi isteqsa-t, kif kif.
Tameṭṭut:-Telbiba wa telbiba, anwa wagi γef uxxam n baba ur yuggad, ur ikukra, a Ṛebbi gezm-as aḍar s umenqaṛ neγ s umencaṛ?
Isγi:-D ddada-m isγi id-ikkan si Mekka.
Tameṭṭut:-Lukan d isγi d-ikkan si Mekka ur tettnaḍid ara deg ugudu wis ma a ttafeḍ tawekka. Yuγal-d isγi ittru inneḥcam.
Iqqim bu ufekrun ittru armi id-iεedda uzrem, inna-yas:-Acu akka i k-yuγen a bu ufekrun si mkul cedda yal ass di imeṭṭi ?
Bu ufekrun:-Fkiγ-as abeqqa terwel γer bu xemsa.
Azrem:-Ur ttagwad a k-tt-id-rreγ.
Bu ufekrun:-Annaγ ay azrem ur ccukeγ ara aṭas ig ruḥen ur d-qḍin.
Azrem:-Rğu ad d-twaliḍ.
Iruḥ uzrem ikcem γer tmeṭṭut inna-yas:-Ulac telbiba, ulac axxam n baba-m, lḥu γiwel neγ a kem-qseγ seg timiḍt-im.
Dγa tameṭṭut twala mačči d urar tega-yas udem i uzrem n bu tsiqest, tuγal-d γer bu ufekrun.
Yahia Yanes
…Yeffeɣ-d Ḥmimi seg wexxam n Dey Hussein, iruḥ ad iwali à quoi ressemblent les corsaires-nni tejmeɛ la régence d’Alger, les “émeutiers-nni” yesserfan timura n yirumyen en congrès di Aix-la-Chapelle.  Yerra kra n tbaqlawatin ɣer ljib-is yesrafeg ɣer useggas 661, uqebl l’assassinat n xalifa Ali. Iɣil meskin din ara yefhem les histoires n ssuna d cciɛa yerwin inselmen ar ass-a. En gros, il a compris belli les chiites bɣan le califat d ttrika. Lmeɛna n wawal, le calife ad yili si sulala n Nnbi.Wiyaḍ, les sunnites nnan  ala : lxalif ad yili d lemxiyer deg yinselmen. Lḥasun, tigi akk d tisebiwin. Tout ce qui les intéresse d adabu. L’intérêt-agi d aqdim, d aqdim même ɣef le plus vieux métier du monde. Nɣan sidna Ali akken nɣan wiyiḍ, u mazal ad neqqen. Ḥmimi yesrafeg ɣer Damas. Yenna-yas : “yezmer lḥal ad bedleɣ rray n les Omeyyades de sorte  ur d-ttaran ara ɣer l’Afrique du nord”. Iruḥ ihi Ḥmimi ad iẓer Mu’awiya, lxalif amezwaru n leḥkum n les Omeyyades. Yaf-t-n yecɣel netta d lewzirat-is. Akken yebidi lbiru, yenṭeq Ḥmimi : « salamu ɛlayka ya amir el moumnin ! ». Imuqel Mu’awiyya akka d wakka. Ur as-d-iban ara win t-id-iluɛan, dɣa yenna-yas tigi sûrement d tikerkas n cciɛa. « anwa keč? Anida-k? », yettuɣu Ali.Yeddem-d Ḥmimi tabrat, yeɣra : <div class="td-a-rec td-a-rec-id-content_inline tdi_12_5ae td_block_template_1"><ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-2542367963502539" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout="in-article" data-ad-slot="2779553303" style="display:block; -align:center;"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});</script></div>– min Ḥmimi Ibn Briruc Ibn Kasi Ucalal, diligi du comité citoyen de l’Afrique du nord ila Mu’awiya, amir el Moumnin… –   Nṭeq ! mada turid ? D’abord, ayna anta ?–   Deg useggas n 710, kunwi s les Omeyades ad cegɛem Oqba Ibn Nafaɛ d luluf n yiserkasen ɣer l’Afrique du nord bac… -D acu yuɣen iserkasen-nneɣ ? Nṭeq ya taɣut ! -Taɣut !? Tiens, d kunwi ziɣ i t-d-yesnulfan…  Ya amir el moumnin, ur d-ruḥeɣ ara bac ad naɣeɣ yid-k. D’ailleurs impossible ad tenaɣeḍ avec l’homme invisible. Nniɣ-as, ya amir el mumnin, ad ak d-mmeslayeɣ ɣef le facteur. Et bien le facteur-agi d yiwen wergaz yessawaḍ tibratin si tmurt ar tayeḍ. Et comme kunwi d tabrat ara d-awim i les brobros en 710, acimi dɣa ne pas la remettre i le facteur. Nukni ad tt-nɣer, puis ad awen-d-ner la réponse avec le même facteur. Fiḥel ma tedirunjim l’armée-nnwen…–   Ah ! Ah ! Ah !   T.Ould amarTugna n Djamal Amriou
…Yeffeɣ-d Ḥmimi seg wexxam n Dey Hussein, iruḥ ad iwali à quoi ressemblent les corsaires-nni tejmeɛ la régence d’Alger, les “émeutiers-nni” yesserfan timura n yirumyen en congrès di Aix-la-Chapelle.  Yerra kra n tbaqlawatin ɣer ljib-is yesrafeg ɣer useggas 661, uqebl l’assassinat n xalifa Ali. Iɣil meskin din ara yefhem les histoires n ssuna d cciɛa yerwin inselmen ar ass-a. En gros, il a compris belli les chiites bɣan le califat d ttrika. Lmeɛna n wawal, le calife ad yili si sulala n Nnbi.Wiyaḍ, les sunnites nnan  ala : lxalif ad yili d lemxiyer deg yinselmen. Lḥasun, tigi akk d tisebiwin. Tout ce qui les intéresse d adabu. L’intérêt-agi d aqdim, d aqdim même ɣef le plus vieux métier du monde. Nɣan sidna Ali akken nɣan wiyiḍ, u mazal ad neqqen. Ḥmimi yesrafeg ɣer Damas. Yenna-yas : “yezmer lḥal ad bedleɣ rray n les Omeyyades de sorte  ur d-ttaran ara ɣer l’Afrique du nord”. Iruḥ ihi Ḥmimi ad iẓer Mu’awiya, lxalif amezwaru n leḥkum n les Omeyyades. Yaf-t-n yecɣel netta d lewzirat-is. Akken yebidi lbiru, yenṭeq Ḥmimi : « salamu ɛlayka ya amir el moumnin ! ». Imuqel Mu’awiyya akka d wakka. Ur as-d-iban ara win t-id-iluɛan, dɣa yenna-yas tigi sûrement d tikerkas n cciɛa. « anwa keč? Anida-k? », yettuɣu Ali.Yeddem-d Ḥmimi tabrat, yeɣra : 
– min Ḥmimi Ibn Briruc Ibn Kasi Ucalal, diligi du comité citoyen de l’Afrique du nord ila Mu’awiya, amir el Moumnin… 
–   Nṭeq ! mada turid ? D’abord, ayna anta ?
–   Deg useggas n 710, kunwi s les Omeyades ad cegɛem Oqba Ibn Nafaɛ d luluf n yiserkasen ɣer l’Afrique du nord bac… 
-D acu yuɣen iserkasen-nneɣ ? Nṭeq ya taɣut ! -Taɣut !? Tiens, d kunwi ziɣ i t-d-yesnulfan…  Ya amir el moumnin, ur d-ruḥeɣ ara bac ad naɣeɣ yid-k. D’ailleurs impossible ad tenaɣeḍ avec l’homme invisible. Nniɣ-as, ya amir el mumnin, ad ak d-mmeslayeɣ ɣef 
–   Ah ! Ah ! Ah !  
 T.Ould amar
Tugna n Djamal Amriou
Assen n leṛbaɛ  deg yiḍ, di Facebook di twitter  yir asali icereg  iɣerban n wid yesexdamen  ismilen-agi : Hadjou Aghiles yettwenɣa !   Urif,  lefqaɛ d sin iḥulfan i d-yettuɣalen deg usenqed n yir  lexbar –agi yezzan tiswin n Leqbayel.  Ger wayen neɣra  di facebook  tifyirin-agi : «  anda nniḍen zellun ikraren, nekni  d imdanen i nefka d asfel i timhujrit n yiḍan iɛbelan ad  nɣan tamnaḍt-nneɣ wakli ». Anda nniḍen  nemlal d ttutra agi : «  anda-ten iɛerḍiyen, at leɛnaya  ara yeggen tilist i wayen ila iḍerun n txazabiyin di tmurt n Leqbayel ? ». Tayeḍ tura : « Di talwit a Ɣilas… nemmekta-d rreḥba-nni n 2001, akka yak i ruḥen d ileqqaqen… ».  Taqcicit nniḍen tsuɣ s ljehd n urrif yezzan ul-is : «  ar melmi akka a Leqbayel  a nḥader i tigi yerna  asen-t nezzi aɛrur ? ». Wiyad bedlen  teswirat n uɣrab-nsen s tin n Ghiles Hadjou.  Tamurt n leqbayel i tikelt nniḍen tettweḥaz z deg ixef-is.  Lehna tejla si ger leḥwar-is.  Imɣaren( wukud nesqardec taluft)  ttmektayen-d isaggasen n 70/80 . Qarren di tudrin—nneɣ( di tallit-nni)  nella di laman u ḍman yerna  ulac anect-a n yiserdasen akked isurtiyen. Xas akken ulac-iten  y  werǧin nedder tixattarin yecban tigi. Tidet ! Meɛna  ur ilaq  ara a nettu belli deg lawan-nni tudrin  n Leqbayel sudsen  tudert-nsen-t ɣef lqaleb id-aɣ d ǧǧen lejdud. Lqaleb-nni yebna ɣef tawacult, adrum, taddart, lɛerc . Di tallit-nni tudrin- nneɣ sbedadent tajmaɛt mebla ttesriḥ n dewla, ttnejmaɛen melimi isen-t yehwa ɣef taluft idasen-t yehwan, wama ass-a tejmaɛt tuɣal d « Kumiti n lbilaj », ilaq-as  tesriḥ sɣur lḥukuma  akken ad yeqdec, yernu leqdic-is yezzi aɛrur ɣef uɣanib n teqbaylit. Iɛgalen yettilin deg-s( deg les comites de villages)  tuget n  lawan tuɣalen d affus  yekaten bab-is !   « Akken ad tezzi talwit ɣer tmurt n Leqbayel, ilaq ad uɣalent tiregwa ɣer imukan-nsent , ilaq  a nuɣal ɣer laṣel id-aɣ id ǧǧen imawlan. Tadart ur ilaq ara ad tecbu temdin, ilaq iderma ad mǧazin,  tudrin ad mɛawanent, leɛrac ad dduklen.  Daxal n udusen –agi ur ilaq ara  tasertit ad tegger iman-is, ur ilaq ara ad s neqqar wihin n ukabar –agi  neɣ n ukabar ina…taddart am Rebbi d netta-t i-yezwar lḥal uqbel yal taluft » iɣ-id yenna yiwen umɣar mi id-at nesteqsa ɣef lhem-agi i-iḥuzan tamurt n Leqbayel i tiklet  nniḍen. « Amek ara d yedhu lxaṭer akked d lɛid ,  mi ara nẓer acu i la iḍerrun ?  Ala  aɣ neqqen deg irebbi n lexyal !  Anwa tura ara itteklen mmi-s neɣ yell-is mi ara si teḥḍer twefɣa ?  Wigi yebɣan ad rran tamurt n Leqbayel d abandu ur nettwezdeɣ, ktalen-tt akken ilaq. Anwi-ten  neɣ d acu-ten wi cqa !  Ayen ilaq at nẓer d akken rehba nwan ad tt-ẓerɛen deg ulawen-nneɣ ud d tilli ara. Yiwen ur yezmir ad ihud timeti-nneɣ » iɣ yenna yiwen  ilemẓi urif ɣef udem-is lefqaɛ deg-ul-is.   Akka , taluft tasawel i tayeḍ, lhem yekfan wayeḍ ad yernu ,  terzeg trenu ɣef terzeg.  Ma d imawlan n tisertit lhem-nsen d amizwer akked umcerreg ɣef kra n tkersiwin deg tiɣiwanin, amer ad sen teldi tawwurt ɣef ugni n «  les affaires » . Tidet nettat werǧin tega leɣrur, iɣermaniyen n tmurt Leqbayel ɛayen deg usbalbal n wawal, ɛayen deg yinekrufen yebɣan ad nehren tamurt xas ur as zmiren, ɛayen deg lemyur  ɣef yuzel wawal ; axam-is ur d-as yezmir ɣef lǧemaɛ yeṭṭef amezir » ! <div class="td-a-rec td-a-rec-id-content_inline tdi_12_215 td_block_template_1"><ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-2542367963502539" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout="in-article" data-ad-slot="2779553303" style="display:block; -align:center;"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});</script></div>Ait Slimane Hamid

Di tallit-nni tudrin- nneɣ sbedadent tajmaɛt mebla ttesriḥ n dewla, ttnejmaɛen melimi isen-t yehwa ɣef taluft idasen-t yehwan, wama ass-a tejmaɛt tuɣal d « Kumiti n lbilaj », ilaq-as  tesriḥ sɣur lḥukuma  akken ad yeqdec, yernu leqdic-is yezzi aɛrur ɣef uɣanib n teqbaylit. Iɛgalen yettilin deg-s( deg les comites de villages)  tuget n  lawan tuɣalen d affus  yekaten bab-is !   « Akken ad tezzi talwit ɣer tmurt n Leqbayel, ilaq ad uɣalent tiregwa ɣer imukan-nsent , ilaq  a nuɣal ɣer laṣel id-aɣ id ǧǧen imawlan. Tadart ur ilaq ara ad tecbu temdin, ilaq iderma ad mǧazin,  tudrin ad mɛawanent, leɛrac ad dduklen.  Daxal n udusen –agi ur ilaq ara  tasertit ad tegger iman-is, ur ilaq ara ad s neqqar wihin n ukabar –agi  neɣ n ukabar ina…taddart am Rebbi d netta-t i-yezwar lḥal uqbel yal taluft » iɣ-id yenna yiwen umɣar mi id-at nesteqsa ɣef lhem-agi i-iḥuzan tamurt n Leqbayel i tiklet  nniḍen. « Amek ara d yedhu lxaṭer akked d lɛid ,  mi ara nẓer acu i la iḍerrun ?  Ala  aɣ neqqen deg irebbi n lexyal !  Anwa tura ara itteklen mmi-s neɣ yell-is mi ara si teḥḍer twefɣa ?  Wigi yebɣan ad rran tamurt n Leqbayel d abandu ur nettwezdeɣ, ktalen-tt akken ilaq. Anwi-ten  neɣ d acu-ten wi cqa !  Ayen ilaq at nẓer d akken rehba nwan ad tt-ẓerɛen deg ulawen-nneɣ ud d tilli ara. Yiwen ur yezmir ad ihud timeti-nneɣ » iɣ yenna yiwen  ilemẓi urif ɣef udem-is lefqaɛ deg-ul-is.   Akka , taluft tasawel i tayeḍ, lhem yekfan wayeḍ ad yernu ,  terzeg trenu ɣef terzeg.  Ma d imawlan n tisertit lhem-nsen d amizwer akked umcerreg ɣef kra n tkersiwin deg tiɣiwanin, amer ad sen teldi tawwurt ɣef ugni n «  les affaires » . Tidet nettat werǧin tega leɣrur, iɣermaniyen n tmurt Leqbayel ɛayen deg usbalbal n wawal, ɛayen deg yinekrufen yebɣan ad nehren tamurt xas ur as zmiren, ɛayen deg lemyur  ɣef yuzel wawal ; axam-is ur d-as yezmir ɣef lǧemaɛ yeṭṭef amezir » ! 
Ait Slimane Hamid
Aṭas n yikabaren i yesseqdacen tamaziγt mi d-yeḥder layan n tefranin, meεna akken kan ara ṭṭfen imekwan nsen di tγiwant neγ deg usqamu aγerfan tettun lεehd ay fkan. Ihi, dγa, daya i yexdem yiwen n yimḍebber deg tefranin-agi iεeddan (di tugna-agi yura : irgazen, tilawin). Deg uγerbaz anida ḍrant tefranin-agi, uran akk iwilihen s tlata n tutlayin (tamaziγt, tafrensist akked taεrabt). Kra n win yewwḍen γer din yeγra-d tamaziγt-nni mebla ma yeḥtam. Amur ameqqran deg-sen ferḥen nezzeh s cγel-agi u nnan-as :’’ lemmer i tt-nettaf di yal amekkan tili akka ara tuγal d tunṣibt di tmetti.’’   Ma d yiwen uselmad n tmaziγt yenna-aγ-d :’’nekni ula deg wass n tezrawt, ur nettmeslay ara tamaziγt. Dγa, ddurt-agi iεeddan, d imaswaḍen n teεrabt i aγ-d-yemmeslayen γef yizerfan d iṣudaf n yixeddamen s… taεrabt. Aya nezmer ad t-neqbel imi ur ssinen ara,ahat, tamaziγt, meεna ula d amaswaḍ nneγ iḍewwer-itt s taεrabt. Cwi kan llan sin-nni-nniḍen n yimaswaḍen, rran-d tiqit : mmeslayen-aγ-d, nutni, s tmaziγt yerna γef wayen iceγben s tidet iselmaden.’’  Akken yebγu tili teswaεt, tamaziγt tettaẓ γer sdat. Imdanen s umata ttnadin ad tt-issinen imi d tamsalt i ten-icuγben imi i tt-qqaren warraw nsen.Hocine.M
Aṭas n yikabaren i yesseqdacen tamaziγt mi d-yeḥder layan n tefranin, meεna akken kan ara ṭṭfen imekwan nsen di tγiwant neγ deg usqamu aγerfan tettun lεehd ay fkan. Uγalen ula d lheddra ur tt-heddren ara deg umahil nsen neγ εad di temliliyin nsen. 
 Cwi kan llan wid yumnen d akken tamaziγt d bab-is i izemren ad tt-yerr d tunṣibt : yessefk ad tt-yesseqdac di yal aḥric n tmetti mebla ma yerğa kra n yiṣadaf imi ha-tt-an d tameslayt taγelnawt. Ihi, dγa, daya i yexdem yiwen n yimḍebber deg tefranin-agi iεeddan (di tugna-agi yura : irgazen, tilawin). Deg uγerbaz anida ḍrant tefranin-agi, uran akk iwilihen s tlata n tutlayin (tamaziγt, tafrensist akked taεrabt). Kra n win yewwḍen γer din yeγra-d tamaziγt-nni mebla ma yeḥtam. Amur ameqqran deg-sen ferḥen nezzeh s cγel-agi u nnan-as :’’ lemmer i tt-nettaf di yal amekkan tili akka ara tuγal d tunṣibt di tmetti.’’ 
  Ma d yiwen uselmad n tmaziγt yenna-aγ-d :’’nekni ula deg wass n tezrawt, ur nettmeslay ara tamaziγt. Dγa, ddurt-agi iεeddan, d imaswaḍen n teεrabt i aγ-d-yemmeslayen γef yizerfan d iṣudaf n yixeddamen s… taεrabt. Aya nezmer ad t-neqbel imi ur ssinen ara,ahat, tamaziγt, meεna ula d amaswaḍ nneγ iḍewwer-itt s taεrabt. Cwi kan llan sin-nni-nniḍen n yimaswaḍen, rran-d tiqit : mmeslayen-aγ-d, nutni, s tmaziγt yerna γef wayen iceγben s tidet iselmaden.’’
  Akken yebγu tili teswaεt, tamaziγt tettaẓ γer sdat. Imdanen s umata ttnadin ad tt-issinen imi d tamsalt i ten-icuγben imi i tt-qqaren warraw nsen.
Hocine.M

Yal mi ara d-tawweḍ taggara n useggas ad tebdu yemma ad iyi-d-testeqsay ɣef yennayer,melmi ara yebdu useggas amaynut?
Testeqsay-yi-d daɣen ɣef tafada imaziɣen,melmi i d Meɣres, melmi i d iquranen ,ma d amerdil ideg nella? Lhasun ur tɣefel ara yakk ɣef wanecta ala agguren d tsemhuyin i d cɣel-is.
 Acu kan,ur zriɣ ara ma yella ula d tiyemmatin -agi n temdint steqsayent ɣef wanecta?Ula d imesdurar-agi iruhen ar temdint ur zriɣ ara ma yella tceɣbiten tfada-ayagi-nneɣ,ma yella tɛassan akka tawwurt useggas?
Ma yella suturen akken ad yili Yennayer s wudem unsib,d ass ideg ur xeddemen ara ixeddamen di kuz(04)tɣemmar n tmurt nLezzayer.
Akken daɣen ad yili Yennayer d ass ideg ara nebdu lehsab-nneɣ,ad nesseddu yes azemz-nneɣ ama deg uɣerbaz deg tedbelt,deg yal ihricen yellan.
Yiwen wass ahat ad as-inniɣ i yemma,ass-a d amenzu n Yennayer 29….,akka i turiɣ deg uɣerbaz,akka id-yura ɣef yiwen isemli adebli id-yettucegaen di Lzzayer tamaneɣt.Ass-agi ad yers imensi-yagi uyazid.
Tawwurt useggas
 Iḍ-agi d iḍ
yal aɛeggal s uyazid 
wissen deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt
  isereh yiles ad tinid
  hedder alamma teayid
  wissen deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt
 Yal aseggas ad d-teziḍ
  akken telliḍ i telliɣ
  deg lezzayer tamaneɣt
  Anda teqneḍ i tebriḍ
  yiwen wawal i tesaiḍ
  ayen a Lezzayer tamanneɣt
  Ar melmi ara d-takiḍ
  ar melmi ara t-id semmiḍ a Lezzayer tamanneɣt.
Nacira A
Tasertit ( di tmura n medden)   tesbur inumak yezdin ɣer tisudest n timeti akked timẓukta ( structure) n tudert n umdan s umata. Tasertit  tebna ɣef snat n tḥajurin  : taḥajurt   tamezwarut d tin umu ara nessiwel  « tasertiyent  » . Taḥajurt-agi  terra   lwelha ɣer tissudest( organisation) n timeti, ɣer tifranin, ɣer udem n udabu( régime). Ma d taḥjurt tis   snat  teqqen ɣer  wudem n tsertit s timad-is  tin id yeẓḍen anamek n lebni n tudert n yal ass n yiɣerfan s wudem n usekud,tasnakta( idéologie)  timuɣliwin n iɣunab n useddu n timeti, askasi, tira… Snat leɣrazi agi n tisertit  i-yettraren aseqdec n tasertit ( nebɣa neɣ ur nebɣi) d amseduy n tudert-nneɣ.  Ulamek  ara yidir waɣref  neɣ ad yilli leḥkem, neɣ ad tbedd taɣeṛma  ma din  ulac  tasertit s ssin wudem-awen-agi ines.  Ger allalen tesexdem tisertit akked ad tenunet llan-t tifranin. Mačča tifranin ur ɛadilent ara mi ara d ḍrunt di tmurt  yellan d tagdudant ( démocratie) neɣ d tansnaraft ( dictature).  Amawal yesfehmed d akken  tifranin  d yiwen  n tawil s wacu yezmer uɣref ad yerfed leqrar n yiman-is s yiman-is.  S wawal nniḍen nezmer ad nnini  agdud ( s wudem n tifranin) iṣaḥ-it-id ad yextir  irgazen deg yeṣɛa tafles( confiance)  akken ad sewqen ɣef  timsal yeɛnan  timeti deg yettidir . Ma yella d tugdut d isem-is id awal-is !  Anamek ines  iban d  leḥkem  agdudan !  Di tmurt-nneɣ  tasertit  tewwi azal meqran deg meslayen n  aggagen( intellectuels) n  ineɣmasen(  journalistes) n  imyura, n inaẓuren si 1962 ɣer tura. Macca  awal yellan( yuzlen)  ɣef tisertit   neɣ  inawi aserti ( discours politique) ur d glin ara s iguma yettraǧǧu uɣref.  Awal yettwanen neɣ yuran yella kan akken ad yeččar ilem n tagnit,  acku  tamurt-nneɣ tezdew deg isaggasen imezwura id iḍefren  timunent ɣef yiwen  n ukabar awḥid yellan d imfugel n tisertiyin i d -hegga udabu mebla cwer n ugdud.  Agraw aɣelnaw  xas yella , yella kan  akken ad yewet ccqar i yimuqranen n teswiɛt. Deg akka ad nnef belli isertiyen  ( wid yeqbel ukabar awḥid)  qablen taɣawsa d nned-is mebla leḥya mebla akukuru. Ddew leḥkem n Bumedyen wten affus i tanemla tudmawit  ( socialisme specifique), ddew  leḥkam n Cadli wten cqqar i tisertit talibiralit, anect-a yettkemil ɣer ṛṛiḍa ddew leḥkem n Buteflika. Deg ugraw aɣelnaw asergel ( opposition) d leḥram d asṭaf. Xas akken deffir 1988  tellid tawwurt i wasget n ikabaren( pluralisme politique) , nuffa d akken tuget n  yikabaren-agi llan kan d allal ger ifasen n udabu akken ad yefk  lewhi i leǧnas id -aɣ d yezzin d akken tugdut treṣa ixef-is d tmurt-a. Netta   di tillawt  anda-t nfaɛ i d-wwin ikabaren agi  i tmurt neɣ i waɣref?  Limer a nawwi tamurt n Leqbayel d amedya , agud lɛewel akken ad yilli  umbadel di tisertit n tmurt  ɣef  ukabar n tirni n iɣalen inemlayen(FFS) n Hocine Ait Ahmed  akked agraw i  yidles d tugdut ( RCD)  n Said Sadi. Zrin wussan nuffa ziɣ   ssin ikabaren-agi llan kan i wakken ad myiggen tiqejirt n wuccan bayger-asen…llan kan i wakken ad ḍefren tisertit n lmeɛanda n tnuḍin ɣer ticebaḍin !  Bexlaf  beṭṭu akked  d uɛnaed d tismin ur nemɛin  di ssin yidsen kerfen tamnaḍt n tmurt n Leqbayel ( berra n tmurt n Leqbayel ssin ikabren-agi ur ṣɛin ara ljehd ur fkin-ara iẓuran di timeti) . Tuget n yimaɣnasen yumnen  s wahil ɣef raṣṣen iman-nsen  ssin ikabaren-agi,  yumanen s wazal n tikta , s tugdut akked d tanfalit fɣen s yikabaren-agi,wwin abrid nniḍen neɣ tuɣal-asen tisertit d qlilu d amqenin ! Di zedwa n ukalex  qqimen wid yazazel fad n leḥkem akked d tmaɛ ad ggen cci d ttawil i nitni d derya-nsen.  Ass-a ikabaren-agi uɣalen d lexyal n yiman-nsen, kecmen deg urar n tikerkas , qeblen leɛb s tiddas i d ihegga udabu( win akken sneɛmalen ttqazamen deg-s) .  Agdud ur yeɣfil ara ɣef anect-a netta yettɣunzun isaragen akked timliliyin i dtthaggin ssin ikabaren-agis demma .  Ayen iḍerun( ussan-a)  di Franṣa deg  ukabar  UMP, ikecmen deg yiwen ucerrig   wergîn yeddir yakka uqbel, yesneɛet-d belli ticki fad  n ukersi, leɣrur  yettaga  « wahaq nnek » d nitni i d-ahil n yimdebren n ukabar  ala iɣisan is wacu id igellu wayen-nni !Ahat d leɛbada n « nekk », asufugel n « Nekk » d nitni   i-yerran aɣebar ɣef tamuɣli n RCD akked FFS .  Ahat d ayen –nni  id yewwin iɣissan ɣer lebni tiɣremt n tugdut di tmurt. Lameɛni tiderɣelt ( mi ara tḥaz bab-is)  ɣeẓẓif yixef –is .  Wid iɛabden( yettggalen ) s  Ait Ahmed akked Sadi Sadi rennun i leɣleḍ azal, swayen akal n lbur s iraggen n wulac. Imi akka  anda-tt ihi lwehma ma yella    lɣella ziɣ  lqifar ?<div class="td-a-rec td-a-rec-id-content_inline tdi_12_afe td_block_template_1"><ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-2542367963502539" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout="in-article" data-ad-slot="2779553303" style="display:block; -align:center;"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});</script></div>Ait Slimane Hamid

Netta   di tillawt  anda-t nfaɛ i d-wwin ikabaren agi  i tmurt neɣ i waɣref?  Limer a nawwi tamurt n Leqbayel d amedya , agud lɛewel akken ad yilli  umbadel di tisertit n tmurt  ɣef  ukabar n tirni n iɣalen inemlayen(FFS) n Hocine Ait Ahmed  akked agraw i  yidles d tugdut ( RCD)  n Said Sadi. Zrin wussan nuffa ziɣ   ssin ikabaren-agi llan kan i wakken ad myiggen tiqejirt n wuccan bayger-asen…llan kan i wakken ad ḍefren tisertit n lmeɛanda n tnuḍin ɣer ticebaḍin !  Bexlaf  beṭṭu akked  d uɛnaed d tismin ur nemɛin  di ssin yidsen kerfen tamnaḍt n tmurt n Leqbayel ( berra n tmurt n Leqbayel ssin ikabren-agi ur ṣɛin ara ljehd ur fkin-ara iẓuran di timeti) . Tuget n yimaɣnasen yumnen  s wahil ɣef raṣṣen iman-nsen  ssin ikabaren-agi,  yumanen s wazal n tikta , s tugdut akked d tanfalit fɣen s yikabaren-agi,wwin abrid nniḍen neɣ tuɣal-asen tisertit d qlilu d amqenin ! Di zedwa n ukalex  qqimen wid yazazel fad n leḥkem akked d tmaɛ ad ggen cci d ttawil i nitni d derya-nsen.  Ass-a ikabaren-agi uɣalen d lexyal n yiman-nsen, kecmen deg urar n tikerkas , qeblen leɛb s tiddas i d ihegga udabu( win akken sneɛmalen ttqazamen deg-s) .  Agdud ur yeɣfil ara ɣef anect-a netta yettɣunzun isaragen akked timliliyin i dtthaggin ssin ikabaren-agis demma .  Ayen iḍerun( ussan-a)  di Franṣa deg  ukabar  UMP, ikecmen deg yiwen ucerrig   wergîn yeddir yakka uqbel, yesneɛet-d belli ticki fad  n ukersi, leɣrur  yettaga  « wahaq nnek » d nitni i d-ahil n yimdebren n ukabar  ala iɣisan is wacu id igellu wayen-nni !Ahat d leɛbada n « nekk », asufugel n « Nekk » d nitni   i-yerran aɣebar ɣef tamuɣli n RCD akked FFS .  Ahat d ayen –nni  id yewwin iɣissan ɣer lebni tiɣremt n tugdut di tmurt. Lameɛni tiderɣelt ( mi ara tḥaz bab-is)  ɣeẓẓif yixef –is .  Wid iɛabden( yettggalen ) s  Ait Ahmed akked Sadi Sadi rennun i leɣleḍ azal, swayen akal n lbur s iraggen n wulac. Imi akka  anda-tt ihi lwehma ma yella    lɣella ziɣ  lqifar ?
Ait Slimane Hamid 
«Lmektub d yiwet n tazmert i  d- yekkan nnig-nneɣ akken a tt-seddu,  nebɣa neɣ ur nebɣi,  timsal ara yettaččaren tudert n  yal yiwen seg-nneɣ ».  D wa i d-anamek id-as  yesfka usegzawal (dictionnaire) i  lmektub.  Yettkemil diɣ (usegzawal)  yeqqar : «   lmektub d asmed n tadyanin i neǧrent tiregwa n tudert n yal amdan neɣ n yal timeti. Amud-agi n tedyanin,   yefɣen lebɣi-n umdan neɣ n timeti,   aḥkim-is   d lqedra tuffirt  tin ɣef  ur yedli yiwen ». Lmektub,  di yal zzman, yecɣeb tidmi n yemdanen . Izemniyen,  imusnwawen, at wawal d tira  ksed amek ur d wwin deg unadi-nsen (ɣef  inumak n lmektub) akken ad sefrun acu i d- lmeɛna-ines.  Yal  yiwen  anta tamuɣli id- as yefka . Ɣer André Malraux (1901-1976) lmektub mačči d lmut. Lmektub dayen yakk i d -iḍerun neɣ i d- yettnulfun , yettḥatimen ɣef umdan ad yegzi tafirt n yiman-is( la conscience de soi) . Si Ljiha-s Emil Cioran (1911-1995)   yettwali d akken win ur numin ara s lmektub  werǧin yeddir. Jean Giraudoux (1882-1944)  netta yeqqar : « lmektub  d azrireg amɣiwel n wakud ». Si tama-s Romain Rolland (1866-1944) yenna : «  lmeḥtum( l’impératif)  d nekni i –yettnadin  fell-as ». Ihi am  akka nettwali, tawenza teṣṣaweḍ   (ɣer  yiswi-s) widen  umu yehwa, tdeggir(ɣer yiswi-s)  widen umu ur yehwa-ara. Lmeɛna n wawal d akken amdan yella d anekruf  zdat  n lmehṭum.  Tudert-is tella deg yirebbi n lmektub. Ayen i d -yeẓda lebɣi n  lmektub , nebɣa-t neɣ ur ten-nebɣi , leqrar-is d ttilin. Amdan ma yefka azuɣer i tira n twenza timsal ad nulfunt s shala, ma yella yegga nmara ur yezmir ad iqereɛ kra.  Ahat anziyen n teqbaylit   takken-d tugna  iwenɛan ɣef tadyant-agi  imi deg awal neqqar : « ayen yuran ad iɛeddi » neɣ «  tira n twenza ur tṣefeḍ » neɣ  «  akka id-aɣ yura ».<div class="td-a-rec td-a-rec-id-content_inline tdi_12_aea td_block_template_1"><ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-2542367963502539" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout="in-article" data-ad-slot="2779553303" style="display:block; -align:center;"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});</script></div>D aḥulfu- agi nesɛa mgal lmektub i -yeǧǧen tidmi –nneɣ teqqaz trennu akken  ad tegzi lɣerẓa n tira yellan ɣef tawenza. Ayen yeḍran d wayen i ḍ-iḍerun neɣ ara d yeḍrun ɣer tuget n  yegduden yeddez yebrez imi  si zzman i-yura.  Imi yura ilaq ad yenulfu, ilaq ad yilli, ilaq ad yeḍru. Lmektub   yella i lmeḥtum(fatalité)d aken .  Amdan yerbeḥ neɣ yexṣer, yulli neɣ yuder d  lmektub-is  id-as iraden  akken . Amdan  cbiha-s d- ifer  yeselɛeb waḍḍu n leqdra akken ad yeɣli neɣ ad yezg anda kan id-as yehwa i netta-t.  Deg tidmi n yemdanen  lmeḥtum d lebɣi n leqdra , u lqedra  leqlam-is werǧin yecceḍ. Telha  tamuɣli yefka umdan i lmektub  neɣ dirit wi cqa,  imi  ay akken yebɣu yilli, mi teẓay teɛkemt n tudert ɣef yixef   taɣzint-nneɣ tettqelib ɣef isufar n ṣṣber deg asbibi n dnub i  lmektub. Ɣef ubeḥnuq-is i nṣeffeḍ tucḍiwin-nneɣ,  asḥisef-nneɣ, ɣelluy-nneɣ deg abrid tenǧer ddunit . Di yal tikelt deg ara yeknu lebɣi-nneɣ i lebɣi n waɛdaz, neɣ ad yeḥnunef  zdat icqiriwen n tudert, neɣ ad yeḍhu  yekna zdat taẓayt  n  tidyanin i d- tettnawal  tudert,  yal mi ara -aɣ yeseḥfu  unadi ɣef isufar  yettagen lemqud  i  temɛict,  yal mi  ara-aɣ  yesefcal  unamar  n wussan , yal mi ara d yeḍḥu   negguma ad neqḍeɛ  abrid s tikli,  yal mi ara- ɣ- id rran leḥyuḍ n tillawt , nettṣebbir iman-nneɣ s wawalen agi i d -yugman di lbir n timurṣad dɣa neqqar-as : «  akka i-ijered ɣef unyir , d wa i d  lmektub,  akka  i qader di tawenza, akka id aɣ yura… ».  I wakken ad yesusem   uqlileḥ s wacu tecweḍ tasa , lmektub d tabarda yelhan. Deg  udem-agi yettuɣal lmektub d ajermuq s wacu nxenneq tiɣri n tafirt-nneɣ  id- aɣ yettqazamen s tuzmiwin qariḥen yal mi ara nemderkel ɣef ublaḍ n facal . Mi neḥulfa s temẓi n tazmert-nneɣ mgal ddunit, neseḍlam  tawenza, nettara-tt d netta-t i d -aserggel zdat lḥawj n tmeɛ n lebɣi uxmit  yefran deg ixfawen-nneɣ. Aya nettemlil yid-s deg yifyar-agi n Matoub Lounes :  Ur di yeseḍlamSeḍlam lmektub yeɛṣanUr yulli waxxamS tayri n temẓi iɣ -yeǧǧanTagara nezdeɣ d ṭlam Iruḥ yakk wayen nesaramDdunit tɛebba-amYura wayagi i d-yeḍranHamid Ait Slimane
«Lmektub d yiwet n tazmert i  d- yekkan nnig-nneɣ akken a tt-seddu,  nebɣa neɣ ur nebɣi,  timsal ara yettaččaren tudert n  yal yiwen seg-nneɣ ».  D wa i d-anamek id-as  yesfka usegzawal (dictionnaire) i  lmektub.  Yettkemil diɣ (usegzawal)  yeqqar : «   lmektub d asmed n tadyanin i neǧrent tiregwa n tudert n yal amdan neɣ n yal timeti. Amud-agi n tedyanin,   yefɣen lebɣi-n umdan neɣ n timeti,   aḥkim-is   d lqedra tuffirt  tin ɣef  ur yedli yiwen ». Lmektub,  di yal zzman, yecɣeb tidmi n yemdanen . Izemniyen,  imusnwawen, at wawal d tira  ksed amek ur d wwin deg unadi-nsen (ɣef  inumak n lmektub) akken ad sefrun acu i d- lmeɛna-ines.  Yal  yiwen  anta tamuɣli id- as yefka . Ɣer André Malraux (1901-1976) lmektub mačči d lmut. Lmektub dayen yakk i d -iḍerun neɣ i d- yettnulfun , yettḥatimen ɣef umdan ad yegzi tafirt n yiman-is( la conscience de soi) . Si Ljiha-s Emil Cioran (1911-1995)   yettwali d akken win ur numin ara s lmektub  werǧin yeddir. Jean Giraudoux (1882-1944)  netta yeqqar : « lmektub  d azrireg amɣiwel n wakud ». Si tama-s Romain Rolland (1866-1944) yenna : «  lmeḥtum( l’impératif)  d nekni i –yettnadin  fell-as ». Ihi am  akka nettwali, tawenza teṣṣaweḍ   (ɣer  yiswi-s) widen  umu yehwa, tdeggir(ɣer yiswi-s)  widen umu ur yehwa-ara. Lmeɛna n wawal d akken amdan yella d anekruf  zdat  n lmehṭum.  Tudert-is tella deg yirebbi n lmektub. Ayen i d -yeẓda lebɣi n  lmektub , nebɣa-t neɣ ur ten-nebɣi , leqrar-is d ttilin. Amdan ma yefka azuɣer i tira n twenza timsal ad nulfunt s shala, ma yella yegga nmara ur yezmir ad iqereɛ kra.  Ahat anziyen n teqbaylit   takken-d tugna  iwenɛan ɣef tadyant-agi  imi deg awal neqqar : « ayen yuran ad iɛeddi » neɣ «  tira n twenza ur tṣefeḍ » neɣ  «  akka id-aɣ yura ».
D aḥulfu- agi nesɛa mgal lmektub i -yeǧǧen tidmi –nneɣ teqqaz trennu akken  ad tegzi lɣerẓa n tira yellan ɣef tawenza. Ayen yeḍran d wayen i ḍ-iḍerun neɣ ara d yeḍrun ɣer tuget n  yegduden yeddez yebrez imi  si zzman i-yura.  Imi yura ilaq ad yenulfu, ilaq ad yilli, ilaq ad yeḍru. Lmektub   yella i lmeḥtum(fatalité)d aken .  Amdan yerbeḥ neɣ yexṣer, yulli neɣ yuder d  lmektub-is  id-as iraden  akken . Amdan  cbiha-s d- ifer  yeselɛeb waḍḍu n leqdra akken ad yeɣli neɣ ad yezg anda kan id-as yehwa i netta-t.  Deg tidmi n yemdanen  lmeḥtum d lebɣi n leqdra , u lqedra  leqlam-is werǧin yecceḍ. 
Telha  tamuɣli yefka umdan i lmektub  neɣ dirit wi cqa,  imi  ay akken yebɣu yilli, mi teẓay teɛkemt n tudert ɣef yixef   taɣzint-nneɣ tettqelib ɣef isufar n ṣṣber deg asbibi n dnub i  lmektub. Ɣef ubeḥnuq-is i nṣeffeḍ tucḍiwin-nneɣ,  asḥisef-nneɣ, ɣelluy-nneɣ deg abrid tenǧer ddunit . Di yal tikelt deg ara yeknu lebɣi-nneɣ i lebɣi n waɛdaz, neɣ ad yeḥnunef  zdat 
icqiriwen n tudert, neɣ ad yeḍhu  yekna zdat taẓayt  n  tidyanin i d- tettnawal  tudert,  yal mi ara -aɣ yeseḥfu  unadi ɣef isufar  yettagen lemqud  i  temɛict,  yal mi  ara-aɣ  yesefcal  unamar  n wussan , yal mi ara d yeḍḥu   negguma ad neqḍeɛ  abrid s tikli,  yal mi ara- ɣ- id rran leḥyuḍ n tillawt , nettṣebbir iman-nneɣ s wawalen agi i d -yugman di lbir n timurṣad dɣa neqqar-as : «  akka i-ijered ɣef unyir , d wa i d  lmektub,  akka  i qader di tawenza, akka id aɣ yura… ». 
 I wakken ad yesusem   uqlileḥ s wacu tecweḍ tasa , lmektub d tabarda yelhan. Deg  udem-agi yettuɣal lmektub d ajermuq s wacu nxenneq tiɣri n tafirt-nneɣ  id- aɣ yettqazamen s tuzmiwin qariḥen yal mi ara nemderkel ɣef ublaḍ n facal . Mi neḥulfa s temẓi n tazmert-nneɣ mgal ddunit, neseḍlam  tawenza, nettara-tt d netta-t i d -aserggel zdat lḥawj n tmeɛ n lebɣi uxmit  yefran deg ixfawen-nneɣ. Aya nettemlil yid-s deg yifyar-agi n Matoub Lounes :
  Ur di yeseḍlam
Seḍlam lmektub yeɛṣan
Ur yulli waxxam
S tayri n temẓi iɣ -yeǧǧan
Tagara nezdeɣ d ṭlam 
Iruḥ yakk wayen nesaram
Ddunit tɛebba-am
Yura wayagi i d-yeḍran

Timlilit d Amirouche amzun d izaylalen yeddurin imeyyaten n tugniwin deg yal asurif n ureqqas, yal tiririt ɣef usteqsi, tettɣawal tikli-s srid ɣer ccan ameqqran n umedyaz-a, imi zeddig am waman, qessiḥ am tebrek n wuḍan ideg yettɛawaz s yimru-s. Ma drus, Amirouche yelḥa-d yakan aṭas n yiseggasen deg tira n tmedyezt, neɣ ahat d tamedyezt-nni i d-yelḥan ɣef tira is yenǧer tikli-is. Deg Mayu n 2011 yeffeɣ-d uxeddim n Amirouche ɣer teẓrigin IZEM i d-yeglan s 10 yizwal gar-asen (iḍudan, anda yeggan yiḍes, sin n leqrun akka ɣer sdat…) d ayen i yessawḍen imeslayen-is akkin ɣer tmeẓẓuɣin n medden. Syin akkin ad ken-ǧǧeɣ d isteqsiyen-a iɣef d-yerra Amirouche s wul yektalen asirem.Anwa i d Amirouche amwanes ?Nekk d mmi-s n tmurt, ḥemmleɣ ccbaḥa n wawal d unamek-is yeggaren isurifen ɣer sdat, segmi mezziyeɣ ḥemmleɣ aṭas Ccix Lḥesnawi, imi d netta i d-yerran tikli-w ɣer useftutes n wawal s tefses n ccnawi-s, ahat ur wwiḍeɣ ara di leɛmer-iw 15 iseggasen asmi i yuriɣ asefru amezwaru ! Lḥasun ur d-faqeɣ ara, alarmi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw ttaruɣ tamedyezt.Limer ad k-sextireɣ gar 3 isental-a : Argaz akked tmeṭṭut, Iḍelli akked umezruy,Areqqas akked uẓekka(yettaḍsa)… Ɣas 3 isental-a d wid iɣef zgiɣ ssefruyeɣ, mebla ccek ad ddmeɣ Iḍelli akked umezruy, axaṭer ccan n umezruy d ameqqran deg tmetti, imi d netta i d-yeǧǧan ass-a, am wakken d amezruy n wass-a ara d-yeǧǧen azekka, syin akkin d netta i d-yessawḍen tameslayt-iw is ttmeslayeɣ akka tura.D acu-tt tẓuri ɣer Amirouche ?Mačči deg uɣerbaz i d-ttawin medden taẓuri, maca taẓuri s timad-is d aɣerbaz deg yiman, d lebḥer n tezdeg, d allal iseg zeggrent tiktiwin seg wa ɣer wa, d cwiṭ kan n yinaẓuren umi tettunefk tegnit ad d-banen, tikwal, deg tallit s lekmal-is, sin kan neɣ tlata i yettuɣlen seg yinaẓuren d itran gar wallen n medden. Anwa-ten yinaẓuren i iḥemmel Amirouche ?Ḥemmleɣ aṭas n yinaẓuren. Deg ccna-nneɣ yella Heddad Fateh, Si Moh, Les Abranis… Deg ssinima ḥemmleɣ Clint Eastwood… Deg tira yella Jean-Jacques Rousseau… deg taklut ḥemmleɣ aṭas Léonard de Vinci akked Isiakhen… Deg tmedyezt yella Ccix Mohand u mazal aṭas-nniḍen…I wacu ur nettemlil ara Amirouche deg tfaskiwin n tmedyezt ?Zik, kkiɣ yakan deg tfaskiwin, maca tikwal ur yi-ttaɛjabent ara, axaṭer yeqwa deg-sent wayen i itefren tidet n teqbaylit, tura akka yeqqim-d kan uxeddim s yiman-iw, am wayen yecban tibidyutin-nni (les slams) n tmedyezt xedmeɣ deg yiseggasen-a ineggura, d wayen xeddmeɣ d yinaẓuren, ama d icennayen neɣ d wid-nniḍen.Deg wanwa lawan i yettaru Amirouche tamedyezt ?Meḥsub tamedyezt-iw ttaruɣ-tt deg yiḍ, iḍ ideg sserɛen yigenwan, iḍ ḥemmleɣ-t, ɣas ma ttaggadeɣ-t, din kan i yettaf umedyaz iman-is, zemreɣ ad aruɣ berra i yiḍ, maca tikwal kan.Limmer ad ak-iniɣ tettaruḍ yiwen uɣanib (ssenf) n tmedyezt, d amaynut i teqbaylit ?D tidet, meḥsub aṭas n wid i yi-d-yennan akka s teɣzi d tehri, gar-asen Si Moh, acu kan nekk ur walaɣ ara seg tazwara, alarmi i t-id-nnan yimdanen-nniḍen, ẓriɣ kan belli deg wudem-is d talsawit. Meḥsub aya ilaq ad as-nsel ɣer yimusnawen n tira yesseftutusen tamedyezt, tura icuba-yi Rebbi d lawan ad kkren yimusnawen-nneɣ ad ssneqden acu i nettaru!Anta ssbiɣa i yesmenyif Amirouche ɣef tiyiḍ ?<span style="white-space: pre;"> D adal (arbiɛi)Anwa i iḥemmel Amirouche, akk deg talit n umdan ?<span style="white-space: pre;"> MasensenAcu ur iḥemmel ara Amirouche deg tmeṭṭut ?<span style="white-space: pre;"> LekdubAcu i iḥemmel Amirouche deg urgaz ?<span style="white-space: pre;"> TidetLimmer ad iɛiwed Amirouche talalit, d anwa i yebɣa ad d-ilal ?<span style="white-space: pre;"> (yettaḍsa)… D EinsteinD anwa i d awal i iḥemmel Amirouche aṭas ?<span style="white-space: pre;"> Lehna Ɣef wacu i yettidir Amirouche ?<span style="white-space: pre;"> Ttidireɣ ɣef tidetYella wayen i d-yettheyyi Amirouche akka tura ?Taswiɛt-a yella yiwen n DVD am win i iɛeddan yakan, ad d-yeffeɣ deg wussan i d-itteddun, aqel-in xeddmeɣ deg-s, syin akkin yella yiwen n udlis i d-tettheyyi Ouisa idir ɣef yisefra-w s snat tutlayin (tafransist akked teqbaylit). Mazal lxir ɣer sdat.Yesteqsa-t Salim Benkhelifa

Deg yiḍ i ṭṭlam di tejmaɛt
Ccaxeɣ ssbeɛdeɣ ruḥeɣ
Sin n leqrun akka ɣer sdat

Amirouche Amwanes d amedyaz, gar ufyir d gma-s yettleqqim tira n zzman, yal asekkil d tallit, tikwal yettsaɛaf tiswiɛin n yiman ɣer tidet n lmut, tikwal-nniḍen yettsaɛaf-itent ɣer usugen n tudert. Timlilit d Amirouche amzun d izaylalen yeddurin imeyyaten n tugniwin deg yal asurif n ureqqas, yal tiririt ɣef usteqsi, tettɣawal tikli-s srid ɣer ccan ameqqran n umedyaz-a, imi zeddig am waman, qessiḥ am tebrek n wuḍan ideg yettɛawaz s yimru-s. Ma drus, Amirouche yelḥa-d yakan aṭas n yiseggasen deg tira n tmedyezt, neɣ ahat d tamedyezt-nni i d-yelḥan ɣef tira is yenǧer tikli-is. Deg Mayu n 2011 yeffeɣ-d uxeddim n Amirouche ɣer teẓrigin IZEM i d-yeglan s 10 yizwal gar-asen (iḍudan, anda yeggan yiḍes, sin n leqrun akka ɣer sdat…) d ayen i yessawḍen imeslayen-is akkin ɣer tmeẓẓuɣin n medden. Syin akkin ad ken-ǧǧeɣ d isteqsiyen-a iɣef d-yerra Amirouche s wul yektalen asirem.
Anwa i d Amirouche amwanes ?
Nekk d mmi-s n tmurt, ḥemmleɣ ccbaḥa n wawal d unamek-is yeggaren isurifen ɣer sdat, segmi mezziyeɣ ḥemmleɣ aṭas Ccix Lḥesnawi, imi d netta i d-yerran tikli-w ɣer useftutes n wawal s tefses n ccnawi-s, ahat ur wwiḍeɣ ara di leɛmer-iw 15 iseggasen asmi i yuriɣ asefru amezwaru ! Lḥasun ur d-faqeɣ ara, alarmi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw ttaruɣ tamedyezt.
Limer ad k-sextireɣ gar 3 isental-a : Argaz akked tmeṭṭut, Iḍelli akked umezruy,Areqqas akked uẓekka
(yettaḍsa)… Ɣas 3 isental-a d wid iɣef zgiɣ ssefruyeɣ, mebla ccek ad ddmeɣ Iḍelli akked umezruy, axaṭer ccan n umezruy d ameqqran deg tmetti, imi d netta i d-yeǧǧan ass-a, am wakken d amezruy n wass-a ara d-yeǧǧen azekka, syin akkin d netta i d-yessawḍen tameslayt-iw is ttmeslayeɣ akka tura.
D acu-tt tẓuri ɣer Amirouche ?
Mačči deg uɣerbaz i d-ttawin medden taẓuri, maca taẓuri s timad-is d aɣerbaz deg yiman, d lebḥer n tezdeg, d allal iseg zeggrent tiktiwin seg wa ɣer wa, d cwiṭ kan n yinaẓuren umi tettunefk tegnit ad d-banen, tikwal, deg tallit s lekmal-is, sin kan neɣ tlata i yettuɣlen seg yinaẓuren d itran gar wallen n medden. 
Anwa-ten yinaẓuren i iḥemmel Amirouche ?
Ḥemmleɣ aṭas n yinaẓuren. Deg ccna-nneɣ yella Heddad Fateh, Si Moh, Les Abranis… Deg ssinima ḥemmleɣ Clint Eastwood… Deg tira yella Jean-Jacques Rousseau… deg taklut ḥemmleɣ aṭas Léonard de Vinci akked Isiakhen… Deg tmedyezt yella Ccix Mohand u mazal aṭas-nniḍen…
I wacu ur nettemlil ara Amirouche deg tfaskiwin n tmedyezt ?
Zik, kkiɣ yakan deg tfaskiwin, maca tikwal ur yi-ttaɛjabent ara, axaṭer yeqwa deg-sent wayen i itefren tidet n teqbaylit, tura akka yeqqim-d kan uxeddim s yiman-iw, am wayen yecban tibidyutin-nni (les slams) n tmedyezt xedmeɣ deg yiseggasen-a ineggura, d wayen xeddmeɣ d yinaẓuren, ama d icennayen neɣ d wid-nniḍen.
Deg wanwa lawan i yettaru Amirouche tamedyezt ?
Meḥsub tamedyezt-iw ttaruɣ-tt deg yiḍ, iḍ ideg sserɛen yigenwan, iḍ ḥemmleɣ-t, ɣas ma ttaggadeɣ-t, din kan i yettaf umedyaz iman-is, zemreɣ ad aruɣ berra i yiḍ, maca tikwal kan.
Limmer ad ak-iniɣ tettaruḍ yiwen uɣanib (ssenf) n tmedyezt, d amaynut i teqbaylit ?
D tidet, meḥsub aṭas n wid i yi-d-yennan akka s teɣzi d tehri, gar-asen Si Moh, acu kan nekk ur walaɣ ara seg tazwara, alarmi i t-id-nnan yimdanen-nniḍen, ẓriɣ kan belli deg wudem-is d talsawit. Meḥsub aya ilaq ad as-nsel ɣer yimusnawen n tira yesseftutusen tamedyezt, tura icuba-yi Rebbi d lawan ad kkren yimusnawen-nneɣ ad ssneqden acu i nettaru!
Anta ssbiɣa i yesmenyif Amirouche ɣef tiyiḍ ?

Yella wayen i d-yettheyyi Amirouche akka tura ?
Taswiɛt-a yella yiwen n DVD am win i iɛeddan yakan, ad d-yeffeɣ deg wussan i d-itteddun, aqel-in xeddmeɣ deg-s, syin akkin yella yiwen n udlis i d-tettheyyi Ouisa idir ɣef yisefra-w s snat tutlayin (tafransist akked teqbaylit). Mazal lxir ɣer sdat.
Yesteqsa-t Salim Benkhelifa

Ta d taceqquft yura Tawfik Elhakim. Mi  tt-ɣriɣ, nniɣ gar-i d yiman-iw “ad tt-geɣ d tazwara ma  yella ahat zemreɣ icɣel am wa, ahat zemreɣ ad d agmeɣ seg wiyaḍ ɣar tayla nneɣ d amaynut” , deg yimi d asentel yemgarraden ɣef wiyiḍ d imi llan-t tid ur nesseqdac ara yall ass, ihi s yes ad d niɣ taqbaylit ur telli ara kan d tantala n yisefra d timawit d awalen n yall ass, maca gar tuccar yella wayen id s qedceɣ deg yimeslayen  i d ufiɣ deg yimawalen i d uran wiyaḍ, acku llan kra n yimeslayen ur ten-ssineɣ ara s teqbaylit ugmeɣ-d seg yimawalan awalen-a atraren widen yurzen ar tegnawt d kra nniḍen tussna sumata  …..Akken yenna umedyaz “ɣas ma d aserwet ddemt aɣerbal ssifet”
Anekruf deg tnekraft yettruḥ yettuɣal yettmeslay d yimn-is
Anekruf Ih! ad mmeslayeɣ d yimani-iw, imi d aya kan i d iyi-d yeqqimen…qqimen-iyi-d kra n wussan…ahat kra n tsaɛtin…s yin tasusmi taɣzfant….ad rnuɣ tasusmi….akken bɣuɣ mmeslayeɣ ugiɣ ad rwuɣ awal…atan mmeslayeɣ aniwa ara d iyi-d yesmeḥsen? Ayen bɣuɣ iniɣ-t-id , am waken ur tuifḍ I d nniɣ, yassalqi deg-I wyen I d iyi rḥan….bɣan ad d ssusmeɣ.
Tamsalt tekkfa, awal-iw ur yesɛi azal ula ɣar yiwen…ula ar iɣerban-a  i d-iyi-d yezzin akka ttmuqulen-d deg-i ad as t-iniḍ qqaren-iyi-d, kra yelln ifukk…ruḥ ɣar tmexneqt melba ashetref, maca tidet, tidet n wayen yeḍran, tidet yeffren deffir n wayen yeḍran, deffir n yigeḍman, deffir n rrabulat, d ujuji, tta I d tidet I yesneɣ nekk….la tta bɣiɣ ad gluɣ yess ɣar tmexneqt s war asfuǧǧeɣ
Amehdi: d ayen teqqel-ak d tannumi, tezgiḍ tettmeslayeḍ d yiman-ik 
Anekruf: ad meslayeɣ ih! Ula d awal a d iyi- tekkesem?!
Amehdi: (ad yeffeɣ d as-d issegri awal) tura ad uɣaleɣ ɣur-k
Anekruf: ass-a, ulayɣer ad iyi-d-adrem učči, awit-iyi-d  ayen i d awen ihwan, (i  iman-is) ih!d acu ara teččeḍ? erra-t akellex….ur masriɣ i tgella-nnwen, ur masriɣ…!ih d acu i t riḍ (tebɣiḍ)? Aseḥmec n win ɣef iqeṭṭan s lmut. 
Ass-a yella umaynut…tagella yagi tzad …waqila iqerreb-d wass-iw, teḍra yid-i am ikerri-nni ara yemmezlen, xsen ad iyi-nɣen, tadist (aεebbuḍ) teččur, ixus-iyi  igerru, am win yeččan yerwa yeffeɣ s amaris (aḥewwes) neɣ win yellan ɣar yiri n yil (lenḥer)…..ala a mass Amehdi (gardien) ass-a mačči d llaẓ n tadist i lluẓeɣ,a d llaẓ n wawal mačči d tagella i yebɣiɣ, i yebɣiɣ d awal, ad mmeslayeɣ
Amehdi: (yezzi-d yewwi-d yid-s amejjay) atah mass ….amejjay n lḥebs ansuf yes-k a mass

Anekruf: lliɣ
Amejjay: Nnan iyi-d belli tesεeddaḍ-tt yakan fella-sen abrid iεeddan, imi k wwin ar sbiṭar, tɛreḍeḍ ad asent-trewleḍ!

wid akken yettɣillin d ashetref i shetrifeɣ. Steqsi  iman-ik! ma skadbeɣ-d fella-k d acu ara d jnuɣ? 
Kečč ur yelli kra deg ufus-ik, ur tufiḍ i ayen imi tzemreḍ. lammer mačči d tamusni-a yellan gar-aneɣ, lammer mačči d ḍrafa-k ernu ɣur-s, d wa i d ixeddim-ik, tilfi ur d iyi-d tt-mudduḍ ara ula d tamezzuɣt.
Amejjay: Ula d nekk abruy n cekk ur d iyi-d 
yekcim ara fell-ak, belli ad iyi txedεeḍ, maca…
Anekruf:  maca! ur tettwaqenεeḍ ara
Amejjay: d tidet
Anekruf: acku tumneḍ ayen akk i d ttwabdren 
di teɣdemt (mahkama)
Amejjay: ah! ad tnekreḍ! D kečč i d qarren s 
yiles-ik? Neɣ tettuḍ?
Anekruf: ih qarreɣ-d, maca…
Amejjay: wehmeɣ! d tin i d tabɣest naɣ qim, d 
ayen kan i d tirugza
Anekruf: d acu i tettɣil-im eεni ad t-geɣ? wwiɣ- tt-id ad xelseɣ 
Amejjay: yak lebɣi-k tewḍeṭ, ayen yeḍran yeḍra, ihi ɛiwed awal.
Anekruf: ad bedleɣ awal! akken kan i as-d 
tewwi, tazwara ur bɣiɣ ara ad begεeɣ wiyaḍ,
tagara iban-iyi-d belli; tawaɣit-iw d lferḥ n
wiyaḍ, ah! truḥ-iyi wammag, ad d Saliɣ akk  ayen yellan di teccuyt. Imi aziɣen lmut-iw, ɣur-sen dtameɣra
Amejjay: ulayɣer llum, ayen yeḍran yeḍra, 
yeqqim-ak-d kan, ad tefkeḍ talwit i yiman-ik.
Anekruf: ar tura tugiḍ ad iyi-t amneḍ
Amejjay: ma umneɣ naɣ qqimeɣ ur tufiḍ ara 
ssaliḍ qqaren: ma rfis tečča-t mifeggagen tewwiten  
Anekruf: ẓriɣ, belli ɣliɣ s anida ur d ttaliɣ, ẓriɣ belli azekka ad yas win ara ad iyi zzewren zdat-s ar lfinga ɣaf uεelum n lefjer ad iyi sneṭgen aqerru  ad nect-a akk walaɣ-t, maca tella yiwet n tidett  yessefk ad twalin medden
Ameajjay: ur tufiḍ  tidet i d yeqqim, ayen yellan akk yettwafeḍeh-d zdat n (tnefrayt) d kečč s timmd-ik i tt-id innan 
Anekruf: ula d kečč, ma tettɣiliḍ ttin-a i d tidet!
Amejjay: ɛni d nekk-i kan! i tnefrayt?
Anekruf: tanefrayt teṭṭal ar tidett-is kan, belli 
nekk d aqettal nnɣiɣ, inagan llan, yerna qarreɣ- d…. d aya kan i ɣer teṭṭal, nnɣiɣ ad d mmteɣ
Amejjay: iyya ad ak niɣ ad as nanef da 
Anekruf: I tidet-nni, ad gluɣ yes!
Amejjay: tidet! Tidet, tidet am ta uli i wacu-tt, 
ttxilek ma ur d iyi t-nniḍ i wacu akk amerret-a deg yiman-ik?!
Anekruf: d tidet, ur tufiḍ ara d ssaliɣ, maca i lmut-iw ara d yeglun s tmeɣra i wiyaḍ! ad iyi tewret aken i tewret argaz-nni ynes amezwaru 
Amejjay: aya d azref-is  
Anekruf: d tidet d azref-is…! D azref-is!!
Amejjay: nettat ur tufiḍ i d ibanen fella-s
Anekruf: ih! acku tessen akken i d iyi tcudd
tarkasin 
Amejjay: tura akken tebɣuḍ tiniḍṭ-id ur yečči ara, 
Ih! anida ara d t-iniḍ ur d tenniḍ ara, ma ttura ini-d naɣ qim, dayen iɛedda uɛeṭṭar
Anekruf:  iεedda fell-i uzaylal! Alamma i d 
tagara imi yebda unemzeɣ-nni (l’avocat) ameslay…din i d faqeɣ
Amejjay: twalaḍ akken i yessen ad yemmeslay?!
Anekruf: twalaḍ! yurar tt-id am wakken ḥnin fell-i alammi i yezzer taxnact-iw, ireṣṣa-iyi tigusa  ibeggen-d akken iwata, d akken d zzen-is i d-iyi ssufɣen i leɛqel-iw alami i yenɣiɣ argaz-is, yerna melba ma teẓra.
ad ak galleɣ s wayen i d ak yehwan, ula yiwen wass ur d tεedda gar wallen-iw, di ǧǧin (leεmer) i ttḥemmleɣ, naɣ i d tcubeḥ axxi d acbaḥ di lxaṭer-iw, d tidet ttaseɣ-d s argaz-is, maca am nekk am umejjay nniḍen, d nettat i d iyi-d-iḥkkun amek tettidir d yi-d-s, amek i as yessuli aman d asawen, d wamek i as tent isserwa, ɣef  wayen i d teqqar ad teɣilleḍ d ilat (lweḥc)  i tt-yuɣen! tenna-d: yerra-iyi tudert d taberkant,  kra i d rriɣ akk yekkes-iyi-t , yegla ula s slemsayes. kra din yeznez-it yetserrif af tmeεcuqin-is. tenna-k yettawi-iyi ula i  imeddukal-is awid kan d acu ara d yawi yes-i d yir rgaz alammi iten-yugi.  nekk umneɣ-tt, tessaweḍ-iyi alammi i ttwaliɣ, belli yewi-d ad temmet naɣ ad yemmet, tenna-iyi:  hattan tura gar ifassen-ik  akken twalaḍ.  Tazwara tt-ɣilleɣ d asqecme&amp;epsilon,; a ziɣen d tidet. ar tura ur walaɣ ara amek alammi i d iyi tejbeḍ ḥemmleɣ-tt,  uɣaleɣ-as d aεekkaz gar n yifassen-is, tessaweḍ-iyi ad awiɣ tamgerṭ…!
Akli Outamazirt
Xemsa n yiseggasen mebεed album ‘’La France des couleurs’’  n ucenny ameqqran Idir, ass n 4 deg fuṛar-agi i d-iteddun ad d-yeffeγ umaynut-is. Deg album-agi llant 12 n tezlatin ma nsedda-d acewwiq-nni. Tizlit tamezwarut yesseqdec deg uẓawan tizimmarin-nni n tama n Wat Yanni. Tizlit anda i d-yesmektay yiwen n urgaz i wumi qqaren Said U Lamara. Yeqqar-as :’’ A Saεid U laεmara a bu snat n tjellabin, deg yiwet llan yizurar ma d tayeḍ d timengucin, yefka yiwet i yilmeẓyen, yefreq tayeḍ i telmeẓyin, a Saεid U Laεmara.’’ Yal tikelt s wacu ččurent tjellabin-agi, netta iferreq deg-sent. Azwel n tis snat ‘’Adrar inu’’. Da, d ccuq n tmurt : ‘’ γas d iṭij yerγan, neγ d adfel yessan, γas d aẓru yeḥfan, ḥemmleγ-k ay adrar inu.’’ Di tayeḍ anda i as-yettmeslay i yelli-s, yeεreḍ ad yefsi tiyersi-nni tiεewwiqt n leεwayed i yettilin gar teqcict d uqcic, ama nettat d gma-s neγ gar win i tḥemmel d yimawlan-is. Yeqqar-as :’’a yelli εzizen am tassa, ur as-qqar yif-ikem gma-m. Win tebγiḍ ma yebγa-kem, mmel-as ul i yessaram. Γer yuγ-i sehlit lecγal, awi-d kan ad am-yekkes ṭṭlam.’’  Yelli-s, dγa, tecna-d s tṛumit deg yiwet n tezlit. Ma d tiyaḍ, yesmekta-d ussan di tmurt n leqbayel, ladγa di ccetwa akked tmucaha, yerra tajmilt i yemma-s i yemmuten ilendi. Am wakken i d-yessekcem tibuγaren deg yiwet n tezlit. Album yemxalaf γef win akken iεeddan imi dagi d Idir kan i yecnan, ma nekkes tibuγarin-nni akked d tizlit n yelli-s. Akken qqaren, ayen yelhan, yelha, Idir d Idir. Yella-d unadi ama deg uẓawan ama deg wawalen. D ayen ara yernun ccan, mebla ccek, i ccna aqbayli s umata. Ur rğin ara Imaziγen n Libya deg leḥkum nsen i wakken ad yexdem kra i tmaziγt imi tεedda yakan fell-asen. Qqaren yimezwura : ‘’win yeqqes uzrem yettagad aseγwen’’. Ihi fran-tt d rraw nsen : ayen fγan, ad t-rren yella. Dγa, akka i mmsefhamen akk Yimaziγen n Libya i wakken ad rren ass n yennayer d tameγra taγelnawt mebla ma rğan rray n udabu nsen.   Wwḍen Yimaziγen n Libiya γer wanect-a imi imḍebber n tmurt ur ṭṭifen ara deg wawal nsen : kra akk i asen-ṛeggmen ur d-yeḍri ara. Dγa deg useggas n 2011  d-yebda ucerrig gar tesqamuyin n temnaḍin-nni n Yimaziγen akked leḥkum-nni n ilaḍil n tmurt n Libya. Ugin yineggura-a ad stεerfen s yisutar n Yimaziγen n Libya. Imi am win iheddren i uεezzug, nnejmaεent temnaḍin-agi fran-tt ad slemden tamaziγt anda akk ttmeslayen tutlayt-a. Akka, dγa, i yekcem uselmed n tmaziγt s aγerbaz deg useggas n 2012. Ma d ass aneggaru n useggas 2012, nnejmaεent akk tesquma n tamiwin n Yimaziγen u mmsefhamen ad rren yennayer d ass n tmeγra taγelnawt di Libya. Am wakken i d-heggan yiwet n tmeγra n ccna ass n 13 deg yennayer 2013 di tmanaγt anda ara cnun kra n yicennayen imeqqranen, gar-asen Takfarinas.            <div class="td-a-rec td-a-rec-id-content_inline tdi_12_f13 td_block_template_1"><ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-2542367963502539" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout="in-article" data-ad-slot="2779553303" style="display:block; -align:center;"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});</script></div> Hocine.  Hocine. M 
Am yal aseggas, igduden imaziɣen ttebdaden i usfugel n umenzu n useggas Amaziɣ . Yal tamnaḍt d acu n wansay s wamek i d- yettili usfugel-agi. Annect-a yemgared si tama ɣer tayeḍ. Lɣerẓa n unamek n usfugel n yennayer teqqen ɣer tedyant n umezruy yeḍran 2963 n yiseggasen aya. Agdud amaziɣ yettaga azal i wass n 13 janvier( ɣer kra 12 di janvier) acku azemz-agi yerra lwelha ɣer taggara n ṭrad i d-yellan gar tiserdest n yimaziɣen d tin n yiferɛunen n Maṣer (950 n yiseggasen uqbel talalit n Sidna Ɛisa) anda agellid Cicnaq yekcem akal n taxlijt n Nil akken ad yessali tigelda tis XXII tmanaɣt-is tella d Boubastis. Ihi, Yennayer yeqqen ɣer tikkelt tamezwarut deg ugdud Amaziɣ yettwensex deg umezruy imi ula deg «la Bible» tettunebder tedyant—agi.<div class="td-a-rec td-a-rec-id-content_inline tdi_12_fe3 td_block_template_1"><ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-2542367963502539" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout="in-article" data-ad-slot="2779553303" style="display:block; -align:center;"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});</script></div>Maca, asteqsi-nneɣ, ur icud ara ɣer sseba yeǧǧan imaziɣen ad ssalin tafada-nsen 950 n yiseggasen uqbel talalit n Ɛisa. Annect-a iban unamek- ines, amezruy yewwi-d fell-as. Tuttra i nebɣa ad nger ɣer unnar n tidmi d tayeḍ : acimi asfugel n yennayer, sani i tejbed lɣerẓa –ines ?Igduden n ddunit meṛṛa bnan timadit-nsen ɣer wamud n yiferdisen : akal, tutlayt, ddin, amezruy. Maca akken ad ilal ugdud ,yernu ad yebnu aɣlan –ines izeggir i lsas n lebni n taɣerma ɣef wacu ara isenned wayen umi neqqar «tanfust timsuddest» ( le mythe fondateur).Ulac agdud neɣ talɣant ibedden yerna tquzem akud s txidas-is , ur ntekka ɣef «tanfust tameslalit» yellan d azamul yeṭṭfen ajgu n tilin ines. Tinfusin- agi zemrent ad ilint d tidyanin yeḍran akka( s tidet) deg umezruy neɣ d tid i d -tesnulfa tidmi n tmeti n yal agdud. Anamek n wawal iban : am wakken yal agdud yeḥwaj irebbiten, ddin, akal , tutlayt akken ad yili, yeḥwaj diɣ izamulen ara yesfugel akken «Nek» n tmeti yellan d aqnaḍri n yixef n ugdud ad yezgu deg umḍiq-is. Ulac aḍu ara t-yessenquqlen.Deg wakka, ad naf belli ( ma newwi-t d amedya) tamdint n Rome( iwumi qqaren tamdint ur n fennu, yettwabnan deg useggas n 735 uqbel Ɛisa) is- ilasen d Remus akked Romulus akniwen i d- trebba tuccent. Tamurt n Suisse tesbedd lɛezza-s ɣef yiwen waṣaḍ ( héros) Guillaume Tell yeddren di temnaḍt n Uri di lqarn wis XIV . Si tama nniḍen ,mi ara neddem tamurt n Franṣa ad naf dakken timadit-nsen tebna ɣef yiwet n tenfust i d- yeqqaren d akken nutni d les Gaulois ( awal yuzzel deg yilsawen n ugdud- agi, imi yezga yettuɣal-d ɣer-sen u qqaren lejdud-nneɣ les Gaulois) . Ɣer tama n tenfust-agi, rnan asfugel n yiwen wasaḍ i ḥesben d ameɣras amezwaru yeɣlin ɣef wakal n Fransa, wagi d Vercingétorix.Ihi am wakken i aɣ- id- yettban, yal agdud yeḥwaj izamulen ara yezdin taswin n uɣref ɣer yiwen n yiḍelli, ɣer yiwen n wass-a, ɣer yiwen n uzekka. Azday-agi yettili-d ( d leḥtum akken ccetla ad temyeɛqel, akken ad tger isufar s wacu ara tegmu wa ad tennerni) s usfugel n wasaḍen, n tedyanin n umezruy , d ṭrad yekcem ugdud-nni yerna irebbeḥ-it. Asfugel- agi anamek ines d asbucceɛ n yixef n tmeti ( amer ḥurent wussan akked tyita n umezruy) akken «nekk» n yiɣermaniyen yeččuren aɣref-nni ad yili d win yezdin d win yekkren. S usfugel n yizamulen-agi i teksent tfiriwin ɣef yixef akked «nekk» n yal aɣref di ddunit.Akken izamulen-agi ( neɣ tinfusin- agi) yesseftayen ljedra n tjaddit n yal aɣref, timura –agi, nnig n usfugel i asen- ttgen yigduden di lawan ( imuliyen n yal asaḍ neɣ tadyant) rennun-asen di ccan, deg wazal s ttawil n tira, amezgun , sinima, ccnawi…Deg wakka, ad naf dakken mačči d yiwen n udlis neɣ yiwen n usaru neɣ yiwet n tceqquft i yettwasudsen akken ad tuɣal tisemɣert n yizamulen-agi ( ɣef tebna timadit-nsen) d tin ur yettḥaz uɣebber n tatut. Lebni n timadit yessutur diɣen aktayen . Aleqqem n waktay yezga d lḥir ɣer tɣermiwin-agi akken tuccar n zzman d awezɣi ad nnalent lsas ɣef wacu sendent akken ad ilint yerna ad dumment.Si tama nniḍen, asfugel ur yeqqim ara d agujil icud kan ɣer tidet n umezruy, imi ɣer yigduden- agi ( yesbedden tiɣermiwin inumren lawan) ula d aṣaden i d- tesnulfa tsugent-nsen gan-as ccan. Anwa deg-neɣ ur nessin Robin des bois, Ivanhoé Lancelot, Buffalo Bil , Gérénémo, Sindibad, Spatracus , Ulyss, Achile…. ?Annect-a yakk, yessenɛet azal yekseb uzamul di lebni n tjaddit. Igduden yettun asaḍen-nsen( yellan s tidet neɣ wid i d -tesnulfa tenfust) ɣebbun , kečmen deg uzabuq n nger.Am yal agdud di ddunit, Leqbayel ( imaziɣen) ula d nitni sɛan izamulen-nsen, iten- yerran ttemyeɛqalen gar-asen( belli ttikin ɣer yiwet n ccetla), iten- yerran ggaren tamawt d akken yezdi-ten umezruy, yezdi-ten umha , yezdi-ten yimal. Cicnaq, Gaya, Massnsen, Yugurten, Syfax, Takafarinas, Dihya(Kahina),Kuseila, Faḍma N Sumer , Si Muḥend U Mḥend, Krim Belqasem, Ccix Muḥend u Lhusin, Lalla Xlija Tukrift, Mqidec bu lehmum, Lunja, Anẓar, aɛeqqa yasawalen ,Ḥmed Umeri….. d aṣaden yensex uktay akked umezruy ɣef tewriqin-nsen i lebda . D nitni i d lɛezz s wacu yezdi ssenjeq n nnekwa-nneɣ. Asfugel-nsen d netta ara yerren timadit-nneɣ ad tewwet s ugerz akken ad tezdi lqedd , ad nwali iṭij-nneɣ yuɣ di tignawt n tmura akked leǧnas.Yennayer umu nettara asfugel si leqdim n zzman , yekcem di lɣerẓa-agi : d yiwen n lsas yettekkin di tenfusin i d- yexleq ugdud-nneɣ akken am netta am wiyaḍ ad yaɣ amur –is di talsa.Ait Slimane Hamid
Am yal aseggas, igduden imaziɣen ttebdaden i usfugel n umenzu n useggas Amaziɣ . Yal tamnaḍt d acu n wansay s wamek i d- yettili usfugel-agi. Annect-a yemgared si tama ɣer tayeḍ. Lɣerẓa n unamek n usfugel n yennayer teqqen ɣer tedyant n umezruy yeḍran 2963 n yiseggasen aya. Agdud amaziɣ yettaga azal i wass n 13 janvier( ɣer kra 12 di janvier) acku azemz-agi yerra lwelha ɣer taggara n ṭrad i d-yellan gar tiserdest n yimaziɣen d tin n yiferɛunen n Maṣer (950 n yiseggasen uqbel talalit n Sidna Ɛisa) anda agellid Cicnaq yekcem akal n taxlijt n Nil akken ad yessali tigelda tis XXII tmanaɣt-is tella d Boubastis. Ihi, Yennayer yeqqen ɣer tikkelt tamezwarut deg ugdud Amaziɣ yettwensex deg umezruy imi ula deg «la Bible» tettunebder tedyant—agi.
Maca, asteqsi-nneɣ, ur icud ara ɣer sseba yeǧǧan imaziɣen ad ssalin tafada-nsen 950 n yiseggasen uqbel talalit n Ɛisa. Annect-a iban unamek- ines, amezruy yewwi-d fell-as. Tuttra i nebɣa ad nger ɣer unnar n tidmi d tayeḍ : acimi asfugel n yennayer, sani i tejbed lɣerẓa –ines ?
Igduden n ddunit meṛṛa bnan timadit-nsen ɣer wamud n yiferdisen : akal, tutlayt, ddin, amezruy. Maca akken ad ilal ugdud ,yernu ad yebnu aɣlan –ines izeggir i lsas n lebni n taɣerma ɣef wacu ara isenned wayen umi neqqar «tanfust timsuddest» ( le mythe fondateur).
Ulac agdud neɣ talɣant ibedden yerna tquzem akud s txidas-is , ur ntekka ɣef «tanfust tameslalit» yellan d azamul yeṭṭfen ajgu n tilin ines. Tinfusin- agi zemrent ad ilint d tidyanin yeḍran akka( s tidet) deg umezruy neɣ d tid i d -tesnulfa tidmi n tmeti n yal agdud. Anamek n wawal iban : am wakken yal agdud yeḥwaj irebbiten, ddin, akal , tutlayt akken ad yili, yeḥwaj diɣ izamulen ara yesfugel akken «Nek» n tmeti yellan d aqnaḍri n yixef n ugdud ad yezgu deg umḍiq-is. Ulac aḍu ara t-yessenquqlen.
Deg wakka, ad naf belli ( ma newwi-t d amedya) tamdint n Rome( iwumi qqaren tamdint ur n fennu, yettwabnan deg useggas n 735 uqbel Ɛisa) is- ilasen d Remus akked Romulus akniwen i d- trebba tuccent. Tamurt n Suisse tesbedd lɛezza-s ɣef yiwen waṣaḍ ( héros) Guillaume Tell yeddren di temnaḍt n Uri di lqarn wis XIV . Si tama nniḍen ,mi ara neddem tamurt n Franṣa ad naf dakken timadit-nsen tebna ɣef yiwet n tenfust i d- yeqqaren d akken nutni d les Gaulois ( awal yuzzel deg yilsawen n ugdud- agi, imi yezga yettuɣal-d ɣer-sen u qqaren lejdud-nneɣ les Gaulois) . Ɣer tama n tenfust-agi, rnan asfugel n yiwen wasaḍ i ḥesben d ameɣras amezwaru yeɣlin ɣef wakal n Fransa, wagi d Vercingétorix.
Ihi am wakken i aɣ- id- yettban, yal agdud yeḥwaj izamulen ara yezdin taswin n uɣref ɣer yiwen n yiḍelli, ɣer yiwen n wass-a, ɣer yiwen n uzekka. Azday-agi yettili-d ( d leḥtum akken ccetla ad temyeɛqel, akken ad tger isufar s wacu ara tegmu wa ad tennerni) s usfugel n wasaḍen, n tedyanin n umezruy , d ṭrad yekcem ugdud-nni yerna irebbeḥ-it. Asfugel- agi anamek ines d asbucceɛ n yixef n tmeti ( amer ḥurent wussan akked tyita n umezruy) akken «nekk» n yiɣermaniyen yeččuren aɣref-nni ad yili d win yezdin d win yekkren. S usfugel n yizamulen-agi i teksent tfiriwin ɣef yixef akked «nekk» n yal aɣref di ddunit.
Akken izamulen-agi ( neɣ tinfusin- agi) yesseftayen ljedra n tjaddit n yal aɣref, timura –agi, nnig n usfugel i asen- ttgen yigduden di lawan ( imuliyen n yal asaḍ neɣ tadyant) rennun-asen di ccan, deg wazal s ttawil n tira, amezgun , sinima, ccnawi…
Deg wakka, ad naf dakken mačči d yiwen n udlis neɣ yiwen n usaru neɣ yiwet n tceqquft i yettwasudsen akken ad tuɣal tisemɣert n yizamulen-agi ( ɣef tebna timadit-nsen) d tin ur yettḥaz uɣebber n tatut. Lebni n timadit yessutur diɣen aktayen . Aleqqem n waktay yezga d lḥir ɣer tɣermiwin-agi akken tuccar n zzman d awezɣi ad nnalent lsas ɣef wacu sendent akken ad ilint yerna ad dumment.
Si tama nniḍen, asfugel ur yeqqim ara d agujil icud kan ɣer tidet n umezruy, imi ɣer yigduden- agi ( yesbedden tiɣermiwin inumren lawan) ula d aṣaden i d- tesnulfa tsugent-nsen gan-as ccan. Anwa deg-neɣ ur nessin Robin des bois, Ivanhoé Lancelot, Buffalo Bil , Gérénémo, Sindibad, Spatracus , Ulyss, Achile…. ?
Annect-a yakk, yessenɛet azal yekseb uzamul di lebni n tjaddit. Igduden yettun asaḍen-nsen( yellan s tidet neɣ wid i d -tesnulfa tenfust) ɣebbun , kečmen deg uzabuq n nger.
Am yal agdud di ddunit, Leqbayel ( imaziɣen) ula d nitni sɛan izamulen-nsen, iten- yerran ttemyeɛqalen gar-asen( belli ttikin ɣer yiwet n ccetla), iten- yerran ggaren tamawt d akken yezdi-ten umezruy, yezdi-ten umha , yezdi-ten yimal. Cicnaq, Gaya, Massnsen, Yugurten, Syfax, Takafarinas, Dihya(Kahina),Kuseila, Faḍma N Sumer , Si Muḥend U Mḥend, Krim Belqasem, Ccix Muḥend u Lhusin, Lalla Xlija Tukrift, Mqidec bu lehmum, Lunja, Anẓar, aɛeqqa yasawalen ,Ḥmed Umeri….. d aṣaden yensex uktay akked umezruy ɣef tewriqin-nsen i lebda . D nitni i d lɛezz s wacu yezdi ssenjeq n nnekwa-nneɣ. Asfugel-nsen d netta ara yerren timadit-nneɣ ad tewwet s ugerz akken ad tezdi lqedd , ad nwali iṭij-nneɣ yuɣ di tignawt n tmura akked leǧnas.
Yennayer umu nettara asfugel si leqdim n zzman , yekcem di lɣerẓa-agi : d yiwen n lsas yettekkin di tenfusin i d- yexleq ugdud-nneɣ akken am netta am wiyaḍ ad yaɣ amur –is di talsa.
Ait Slimane Hamid

Zik illa yiwen ugellid, d bab n lḥikma ikseb tamusni, isεa yiwen mmi-s ittuṛebba s lεezz, armi ibweḍ d ilemẓi.
Yiwet n tikkelt inna-as: -A mmi tura aql-ik d argaz ilaq ad txedmeḍ.
Mmi-s: -A baba acu ara xedmeγ?
Baba-s: -A mmi ayen ara k-d-yawin asurdi.
Mmi-s: -A baba acu akka ara d-teqqareḍ?
Mmi-s n ugellid ad ixdem γer medden, aεni xussen-aγ yidrimen?
Baba-s: -Ala a mmi lxudma d tacrift ttif frank n tidi-k wala amelyun n wiyaḍ, tegra-d γer medden, ulac wi illan γer yiman-is, ula d nekk d agellid γer medden, lemmer ulac-iten ur ttiliγ ara d agellid.
Tenṭeq-d yemma-s: -Ay argaz ur qbileγ mmi a t-sxedmen medden, ma tebγiḍ ad ixdem, ad ixdem γur-k icbeḥ.
Baba-s: -Susem a tameṭṭut wagi d ccγel-iw, mi ijeṛṛeb lxudma γer medden imir ad ixdem γur-i, qqaren yimusnawen:  » tannumi d ṭṭbiεa tis snat « . Bγiγ mmi ad yaγ tannuni d lxudma.
Asmi iṭṭef ugellid di ṛṛay-is, iqbel uqcic ad ixdem, iruḥ tefka-as-d yemma-s asurdi, mi id-tewweḍ tmeddit, ikcem-d baba-s: -A mmi txedmed?
Mmi-s: -Xedmeγ a baba. »
Baba-s: -Acḥal id-tewwid?
Mmi-s: -Wwiγ-d asurdi.
Baba-s: -Zzi-d ziγ ad waliγ asurdi-agi.
Ifka-as uqcic, baba-s mi iṭṭef asurdi-nni inna-as: -Awah! Asurdi-agi a t-ḍeggreγ ar lebḥer si ṭṭaq-agi.
Iḍegger-it, aqcic ittmuqqul, azekka-nni kifkif, yiwet n tikkelt, ikker-d uqcic iruḥ γer uḥddad inna-as: -Bγiγ ad xedmeγ γur-k.
Aḥeddad ifhem tamsalt inna-as: -Iẓra baba-k?
Aqcic: -D netta i ibγan ad xedmeγ.
Aḥeddad: -Ṛwaḥ ad txedmeḍ.
Ibda uqcic axeddim s laεtab d tidi, almi d tameddit, iwwi-d asurdi n tidi-s, ikcem γer baba-s: -A baba aql-i xedmeγ atan frank.
Iṭṭef baba-s frank-nni, iruḥ ad illi ṭṭaq akken a t-id-ideger γer lebḥer aqcic ibda ittru iqqar-as: -Ttxil-k a baba ur ṭeggir ara laεtab-iw, si ṣṣbeḥ nekk ttqabaleγ times d wuzzal fell-as.
Yuγal baba-s ifhem belli s tidett mmi-s ixdem, inna-as: -A mmi acuγer frank n yiḍelli d win n seldiḍelli, ur tecliεeḍ ara mi ten-ḍeggreγ?
Aqcic isusem ifhem tamsalt akken ilaq.
Inna-as baba-s: -Tura a mmi teẓriḍ acu swan yiṣurdiyen, zemreγ a k-sxedmeγ γur-i, ttekleγ ur txelluḍ ara baba-k.
Tamacahutt s wazal-is, qqaren: « Ma fkiγ-ak kilu n sserdin seččeγ-ak yiwen wass, ma slemdeγ-ak amek ara tseggdeḍ, seččayeγ-k yal ass ».
 Yahia Yanes

Asfuggel n wass amezwaru n yennayer n  yimaziγen yettili-d am yal tikkelt deg tesdawit n Lmulud At Mεemmer, s-γur “agezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziγ”. Asfuggel-agi yella-d s wussan idelsanen seg 7 armi  d 10 deg waggur –agi .
Ahil yebda s wawal n yiεeggalen n le comité  n yinelmaden, syin tebda temsikent n yidlisen n yal taγult i yeddan  deg teγzi n wussan-agi. Rnu γur-s lbiε s ubuddu s-γur Muhand ARKAT  i ungal-is “abrid n tala”.
 Ahil ikemmel s usarag i d-yewwi Mass Abedennur Abdeslam s uzwel » tazγent tamaziγt 1949 « . Ass wis sin yella-d uskan n usaru « ur kkat a gma inetteḍ » i d-yesuffeγ. Ma d ass wis tlata, tella-d tceqquft n umezgun « yenna-yi jeddi » i d-turaren  tarbaεt « Macahu ». Ass aneggaru tella-d temsizwert n seksu gar tnelmadin n ugezdu, dγa d tid n useggas wis tlata i d-yufraren.
 Akka, ihi, s ufraq n warrazen I d-wwḍen wussan idelsanen γer taggara nsen .
Di taggara tanemmirt  tameqqrant i wid akk I d-iheggan leqdic-a aseggas ameggaz i yal amaziγ anda yella.
D.said lhadj
 
Ilmend n tmeγra n yennayer, aseggas amaynut n yimaziγen 2963,  aṭas n tmeγriwin i d-ittewhegan γef demma di deqs n temnaḍin n tmazγa.<div class="td-a-rec td-a-rec-id-content_inline tdi_12_caf td_block_template_1"><ins class="adsbygoogle" data-ad-client="ca-pub-2542367963502539" data-ad-format="fluid" data-ad-layout="in-article" data-ad-slot="2779553303" style="display:block; -align:center;"></ins> <script>(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});</script></div>Dγa tidukla tadelsant Alma n taddert n Yigersafen n tγiwant n At-yeğğar tsudes-d yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is s yiwen n wahil d amarkati, ideg llant temzikniyin yegaraden n tqendyar leqbayel, ṭṭebqat n wučči i tt-gen imaziγen-nneγ γef demma n yennayer, tiγawsiwin tiqburin, idlisen d ttsawaṛ d waṭas niḍen.Akken daγen i d-yella yiwen usarag s usentel » Yennayer », i d-wwin ssin imusnawen isdawiyen, wigi d mass Zindin Kacimi akk d mass Moqran Taguemount, syen tella-d lweεda meqran « imekli n yennayer ».Syen jarden deg ahil-nsen yiwet n tmeγra n zwağğ aqbur γef iεudiwen, anda imezdaγ n taddert-agi igersafen ad-ddun merra d iqeffafen akk d tarbaεt n yiḍebbalen γer wemḍiq iwmi qqaren Alma, anda ara d-sudsen tameγra γef demma n yennayer.Γer tagara ad yilli usenεet n waddal n yimenγi n waḥric n Karaté syen ad-ffken arazen d igardasen usebγes i warac id-yufraren di temzizla yemgaraden n wadal deg ussan-nni imuras yezrin.Islam Bessaci
Ilmend n tmeγra n yennayer, aseggas amaynut n yimaziγen 2963,  aṭas n tmeγriwin i d-ittewhegan γef demma di deqs n temnaḍin n tmazγa.
Dγa tidukla tadelsant Alma n taddert n Yigersafen n tγiwant n At-yeğğar tsudes-d yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is s yiwen n wahil d amarkati, ideg llant temzikniyin yegaraden n tqendyar leqbayel, ṭṭebqat n wučči i tt-gen imaziγen-nneγ γef demma n yennayer, tiγawsiwin tiqburin, idlisen d ttsawaṛ d waṭas niḍen.
Akken daγen i d-yella yiwen usarag s usentel » Yennayer », i d-wwin ssin imusnawen isdawiyen, wigi d mass Zindin Kacimi akk d mass Moqran Taguemount, syen tella-d lweεda meqran « imekli n yennayer ».
Syen jarden deg ahil-nsen yiwet n tmeγra n zwağğ aqbur γef iεudiwen, anda imezdaγ n taddert-agi igersafen ad-ddun merra d iqeffafen akk d tarbaεt n yiḍebbalen γer wemḍiq iwmi qqaren Alma, anda ara d-sudsen tameγra γef demma n yennayer.
Γer tagara ad yilli usenεet n waddal n yimenγi n waḥric n Karaté syen ad-ffken arazen d igardasen usebγes i warac id-yufraren di temzizla yemgaraden n wadal deg ussan-nni imuras yezrin.
Islam Bessaci
Anekruf: Mačči d kečc ara d yerren ttar, anef-as ayen texdem ad taf, am ass-a ad temlil d wayen d i txeddem, ass-n ad txelles lexlas n tuccent. Anekruf: Mačči d kečc ara d yerren ttar, anef-as ayen texdem ad taf, am ass-a ad temlil d wayen d i txeddem, ass-n ad txelles lexlas n tuccent. Tin yernan ɣur-s mačči d kečč i d juj (anefray)
Anekruf: Juj ur yettfiq ara i nbuc-is, ur yettaweḍ ara ad iwali tidet-is, ala nekk i tt-yesnen, ala nekk i as ifaqen, ala nekk i d yewwin s lexbar i tmenqas-is, ayen akk ara tt-id ibegnen  ata ɣur-i, wamma wiyaḍ ad turar ad teffeɣ, acku d stut m lebhut 
Amejjay: Wayi d axemmem ynek, d kečč i tt-yettwalin akka
Anekruf: ur d qqim ara deg xemmem, d ayen yellan
Amejjay: Tesliḍ-as i ubugatu ynes?
Anekruf: S liɣ-as akken iwata, d ayemi i d nniɣ akka
Amejjay: Lammer ik teḍlim ur cukkeɣ ara ad terzu ɣur-k, kečč akkiya s tmad-ik akka i d tenniḍ
Anekruf: ala k qqareɣ ulac win i as izemren, tus-ad akken kan ad tbeggen amakken acemma ur yelli, ad tesmsawi ayen i d yeqqimen, wa ad tesfeḍ ameslay deg yilesawen n wid ara as yinin “ihuh argaz-as ad yemmet, ur tezmir ara ad truḥ ad t-id wali?!”  ɣaf waya i d tusa wamma mačči d nekk i tt-iɣaḍen
Amejjay: Anef-as ad tessebgen, anef ad tt-id ẓren medden
Anekruf: Tessen amek i tettkellix, mačči d tikelt tamenzut i texdem akka, ula d argaz-is amezwaru mačči akka i as tga, alammi i tegla s uqerruy-is, tessen-asen i yimeṭṭawen …akka ar texdem ula i nekk imi ara mteɣ
Amejjay: Akken tebɣu tili, ttxilek ur ….eğğ-itt, erra-yak yiwet n twaɣit
Anekruf: Tawɣit tamezwarut ɣef wudem-is, anef meqqar taneggarut-a i wudem-iw
Amejjay: Ttxilek ur semsax ara ifassen-ik, ur telliḍ ara deg qettalen, kečč d amejjay, d ragaz ifehmen yeɣran, ih akken “qqaren ad yili yiwen yelha ad tafeḍ idhem-it wayeḍ, ɣas ma yella kra i txedmeḍ, txdmet ilmend n talsa
Anekruf: (yettadṣa) ih! Tesmektaḍ-iyi-d ɣaf wudem n talsa, ḥnineɣ aṭas, ula d ayen i d tenniḍ yettwakkes-iyi. Tettuḍ d acu id nnan fell-i? win yenɣan mačči d aceffar a d argaz-is, d amejjay, telha tikli-s, ur tfaqeḍ ara i tkellax-nni? i win yettwanɣan ur yuklal ara, dya i d-iyi- swehmen din-a id faqeɣ bell-i tekreh argaz-is, tameṭṭut ara kerhen argaz-is ad as-d yettban d ilat (lweḥc), d ayemmi i d iyi-d beggen bell-i tḥemmel-iyi, imir faqeɣ-d ur d-iyi-tḥemmel ara, uɣaleɣ d arelluc deg ufus-is d ufus n n umeεcuq-is, ih! uraren yess-i almmi i d-iyi-tessaweḍ semḥesseɣ i tasa-w wwiγ tamgerṭ.
Amejjay: Maca ttuγaḍin ik tɣaḍ! imi tumneḍ s waya, acuγer ara tuɣaleḍ d wayeḍ ttxilek qim kan akka ḥnineḍ.
Anekruf: D ayen tura 
Amejjay: D ayen! ur as txeddmeḍ kra?
Anekruf: Aha tura ruḥ eğğ-iyi  
Amejjay: Cabek-iyi
Anekruf: Ur tufiḍ deg wacu ara k cabkeɣ
Amejjay: Ad t-txedmeḍ?
Anekruf: wa d cɣel-iw
Amejjay: I nekk
Anekruf: D acu i k id yegren ?
Amejjay: Amek tebɣiḍ ad ssusmeɣ, Degmi iẓriɣ d acu ara yeḍrun tura ?!
Anekruf: sell ur k ẓriɣ ur ak d-nniɣ, ettu ayen imi tesliḍ, lammer ur k umineɣ ara, ur ak d qqareɣ ara acemma, twalaḍ! yeqqim-d kan tura ad iyi-teffɣeḍ sya ternuḍ xemsa ɣef yimi daya.
Amejjay: yid-wen!?
Anekruf: Ih yid-neɣ, nekk akk d nettat di sin
Amejjay: I yiman-iw anida ara terreɣ, neɣ ad ula d netta tneṭleɣ yid-wen 
Anekruf: Iman-ik! D acu i ak-d yeqqar yiman-ik? Ad truḥeḍ ad tessiwḍeḍ asali i akken ur d iḍerru ara wayen ara d yeḍrun ?
Amejjay: I waya ur d yewwi ara felli ad tgeɣ?
Anekruf: (yettxemmim) ahat …d azref-ik ad txemmeḍ kan ɣef yiman-ik ma d anezgum-iw ala nekk I yeyerza, mačči am nekk i yegren akken ad selkeɣ tameṭṭut di tballaɣt. aziɣen tḥemmleḍ iman-ik aṭas, azref ɣur-k d azref yekkaten ar tama-k,win ara k yesdarin, win ara k yerren d amzerfu ar yiman-ik, win ara k id begnen ar wiyaḍ, d tidet ad tεeğbeḍ i yiman-ik wa ad tεeğbeḍ i wiyaḍ, d ameggaz yiman-ik a mass! Iman-ik d azref-ik d yiman-ik….iman-ik! Maca sarameɣ ad tettuḍ iman-ik, d lwajeb-ik axxi tagnitt, wa ad terreḍ lmendad-ik ar wiyaḍ ad ak-d sutreɣ ad-iyi-teffɣeḍ sya d xemsa ɣef yimi ma yella wamek, tettuḍ ayen i ak d-nniɣ.ttxilek ddu-iyi di lebɣi, i nekk yellan d ameddakel-ik yettwarẓen, yettwasexnunsen, yettubehdlen …ur tufiḍ i as d yeqqimen azekka tafejrit ad tenγen 
Amejjay: Ad susmeɣ
Anekruf: Ih susem… susem kan daya
Amejjay: Nekk…
Taḍatt si berra
Anekruf: ad taya…
Amejjay: d acu ara xedmeɣ?
Anekruf: dureqq, teğğeḍ-iyi nekk yid-s
Amejjay: (s rxifan) ihi atan wanisa kkiɣ
Tawwurt telli iban-d unemhal netta d yiwen yewwi-d yid-s tiwriqin
Amejjay: (iger-d nnehta)  mačči d nettat
Anekruf: (s reffu) anida-tt ? anida-tt ?
Anemhal: newwi-ak-d asali yugaren ayen-nni s waṭas, d asali ara y beddlen tagnitt fella-k
Anekruf: Ad tbeddel fell-i?!
Anemhal: D ayen ara qerεen timenɣiwt-ik
Anekruf: Yak tenniḍ-iyi-d ulac taruẓi n creε!
Anemhal: Ta d tamsalt nniḍen, yella-d umaynut wammag axnaq-ik iban-d melmi, maca ur zmireɣ ara ad ak d ferheɣ melmi, u terna d ayen ara d yilin anect tebγu tekk-it i tura d ayen?!
Anekruf: Ula d nekk akka i d yezwar ɣar wul-iw 
Anemhal: Ma yella tqebleḍ ayen ayen ara k d sutreɣ, timenɣiwt-ik ur d ttili ara
Ameḥbus: D acu?
Anemhal: D yiwet akken n tkebbanit n tussna i aɣ-d issutren akken yiwet n tɣawsa dɣa atan mass i d yusan ɣef yisem-is ak id yessefḥem.
Imwekkel: (yuẓa ar umeḥbus yettmuqul-it) maca tamsalt-a d tuffirt
Anemhal: aya ekkes anezgum*
Imwekkel: akka meqqar ad nruḥ srid i temsalt, nebɣa ad n serreḥ i tnaεurt ar tegnawt maca yessefk ad yili win ara tawi, tettwaheyya i tiwin n wemdan akken ad t-id njerreb,tura ma yella tqebleḍ, ayen i ak ḥekkmen ad d yeɣli
Ameḥbus: Dayen ad yeɣli akk!!?
Imwekkel: D ayen ibanen
Anekruf:  Ima yella zziɣ-d ur mmuteɣ ara
Imwekkel: Ma yella tezziḍ-d ad tidireḍ d ilelli.
Anekruf: yella kra neṭmeε akken ad zziɣ?
Imwekkel: S tidet kan rqiq usirem
Anekruf: Acḥal akka? 
Imwekkel: Yiwen ɣef twinest (100)
Anekruf: ma yella ugiɣ xusseɣ, axir n win yessaramen wala win igezmen liyas, yiwen wala ulac, neɣ ala?
Anemhal: D ayen ibanen 
Anekruf:  Qebleɣ
Anemhal: Imi tqebleḍ, stenyi aɣ-d da
Anekruf:  S lebɣi d ameqran
Imwekkel: (irfed-d tiwriqin) ihi stenyi da
Anekruf:  Bɣiɣ ad ak id steqsiɣ ma ulac fell-as, icimi d nekk i d tefernem?
Imwekkel: D taseqqamutt i tt-igezmen d ṛṛay, belli win ara n seddu ad yili d yiwen ɣef iḥekkmen s lmut, wammag aṭas n wid i d sebblen iman-nnsen akken ad d ruḥen
Anekruf: D ayen teffra
Imwekkel: ur nezmir ara ad nweddef yiwen kan akka ma wer yelli deg-wi i d ak-d nniɣ.
Anekruf: Γas ma yella, d netta i ken-d sutren?
Imwekkel: ulac takebbanit naγ tama deg udabu ara yesseflen kra n yiwen ar tmenγiwt n yiman-is
Anekruf: Win i d yunzen akka am nekk ulac fella-s trtaḥem!
Imwekkel: D ayen yellan
Anekruf: Ula d nekk akka meqqar ad irtiḥeɣ, imi sertaḥeɣ taɣdemt, tura d nnuba n tseqqamtt n tussna akk d tamiwin yetḍebbiren
Imwekkel: Ula d nekkni nefreḥ imi d nufa yiwen umssnaw akka am kečč, acku mačči d cɣel n ukellex, mačči εeddi kan ad tafeḍ win ar d yeffken liqin s ttawil n usiwel (war tellqa) akk iy imaṭṭafen akk d tiliẓri.
Anekruf:  Atan ihi tufam-d win ɣef i tettnadim!
Imwekkel: Aya d zher n tussna
Anemhal: Ula d nekkni tekksem-aɣ-d deg yiwen uεewwiq anectilat, acku tufam aɣ-d nettxemmim aniwa i zemmren ad iqerreb ar gaz yunzen wa ad t yawi kken ad i ttwaεelleq
Amejjay: D tidet i d yenna
Anekruf: Tanemmirt
Anemhal: Stenyi ihi!
Imwekkel: (yeddemd tiwriqin nni yerna-dimru isers-iten ɣef ṭabla) stenyi da.
Anekruf: (yettestenyay) Menyif yiwen wala ulac!
