-Nekk ur umineɣ s tmedyazt, d awalen kan, wa sdeffir wa, xas seggmen yerna cebḥen.
Temmuql-d s afus-iw, twala-d aqrab, tenna-d :
-Keččini d aselmad. Iselmaden ur sɛin ara azal ameqran di tmetti n wass-a acku ur ttaɣen ara aṭas n yidrimen. Nekk ad aɣeɣ ajenyur, amejjay neɣ bugaṭu.
#NAME?
-Nekkini d idrimen i bɣiɣ. D wigi i yessefraḥen. Ma d isefra akked d ijeǧǧigen, d timucuha kan, ḥku-tent-id kan di tmedyazt-ik.
Dɣa truḥ teǧǧa-id abeḥri.
Boussad Ḥemar
Matoub : ‘’ma tγileḍ a Ğami ad kem-ayseγ…’’
Djamila : ’’muḥal ad t-ḥemmle&amp;gamma,; akken i ak-ḥemmleγ…’’<span style="white-space: pre;"> 
 ‘’Asmi ara d-yaweḍ lmijal, 
Ddaw wakal ad d-nemqabal,
 Mi ara neṭṭef abrid γer Rebbi…’’ 
Akka i as-d-yerra asmi ay tenwa lmut-is d asteεfu. Netta xas akken ur yemmut  mi yemmut, yenna-as-d :
’’ Tγileḍ fniγ dayen thenna&amp;gamma,; 
Di laxert steεfa&amp;gamma,;
Tγelṭeḍ di leḥsab-im…’’    
Tizlit (Tiγri-w) yecna deg useggas n 1993, d aciri γef wass-nni mi ara yemmet. Yeqqar-d amek i tt-yettrağu s ccuq melmi ara d-ternu γur-s i wakken ad mḥasaben dinna. Kra n lweqt mebεed tanṭel n Matub, truḥ Ğamila s aẓekka-s, tbedd din, la awal, la imeṭṭi, tettmektay-d tizlit-agi, ladγa anda i as-yeqqar :
’’Tγileḍ fniγ dayen thenna&amp;gamma,; 
Nekk mazal uḍne&amp;gamma,;
D aṭṭan-im i d iyi-yewwin.
Si ṭṭhur, γer ṭṭhur zgiγ εusse&amp;gamma,;
Ameğğed ad as-sle&amp;gamma,;
S amḍiq-iw mi ara kem-id-εebbin.’’
     Ahya a ddin uqabac a win iḥedren d acu ara as-yini neγ ahat d acu n tezlit ara as-d-iγenni mi ara mlilen. Meεna, iḥqa, wissen dγa ma ad mlilen, axater ‘’ulac anwa i d-yuγal, di lmut, i wakken ad aγ-d-yini…’’ Tadyant n Matub d Ğamila ulac-itt di tsekla n ddunit. Ula d Paulo Coello deg ungal-is ‘’Le Zahir’’ inuda-d akk amaḍal, kkes-d  anda ur inuda γef tmeεcuqt-is meεna werğin yewweḍ γer laxert. 
   Tadyant n Matub d Ğamila tebda s ciṭ n dreε. Mi tt-id-yexḍeb, tella yakan, tettwaxḍeb. Meεna yenna-asen i yimawlan n Ğamila :’’tettwaxḍeb neγ ala, d nekk ara tt-yaγen.’’ Syin yuγ-itt. Acu aḥettem-a, tella sebba-s. uqbel ad yissin Ğamila, yessen yiwet n teqcict d tağaret-is (F). iḥemmel-itt, tḥemmel-it. Asmi yella di Fransa, tceyyeε γur-s teqcit-a u tenna-as ma s neyya-k ay telliḍ yid-i, ruḥ-d ad tt-nefru, neγ nekk yid-k berka, win i d-yusan ad zewğeγ. Ihi, Matub yefka-d tabrat i yiwen n’’umeddakel-is’’ anda i as-yenna ur ttεeṭṭileγ ara ad n-aseγ ad kem-id-xeḍbeγ. Winna, yeγra tabrat icerreg-itt. Iruḥ γer teqcict yenna-as d akken ur d-yettas ara u yenna-yi-d ur kem-yettaγ ara. Taqcict terkem seg urfan, winna yufa abrid γur-s. Zzin dayen kan, dγa yuγ-itt.
    Ma d tamsalt n Ğamila, tebda s laεḍil : ass-nni n lexḍubegga-s, mi ttheggayent snat n twaculin, tawacult n Lwennas d tin n Ğamila, i lferḥ, Matub yesla s tmettant n Slimane Azem. Dγa, din din yeddem taqrabt-is, iruḥ γer Fransa. Lexḍubegga teqqim armi i d-yuγal. Am wakken neẓra Lwennas d win yettqadaren aṭas Slimane Azem. Yiwet n tikkelt yewwi-as akal n tmazirt n Slimane Azem i as-d-yeḍleb. 
   Amecwar-is d Ğamila yecna-t di tezlatin-is. Tudert-nsen ur telli d tuffirt. Di 7 n yiseggasen i sεaddan ‘’qlilit tmeqqwa n lehna…’’Akken armi d aseggas n 1988 mi t-yewwet uğadermi s ṛṣas, tkemmel tluγ liḥala gar-asen. Lwennas, yeẓra ur yezmir ara ad yesεu dderya. Seg wakken i tt-iḥemmel, yeḍleb-as ad t-teğğ ‘’Rwel skud teğğuğgeḍ, urez n lğedra yerka.’’ (Tarewla 1989). Γef tezlit-agi, dγa, i d-yella umqelleε gar-asen : nettat ur tebγi ara ad tt-id-yessufeγ. Tenna-as ma teffeγ-d d acu i d-yeggran gar-aneγ ? Netta, yettwassen d aqerru n umcum, γer deffir ulac ! 
   Xas d aqerru n umcum meεna d aḥeqqi, yesṭeεrif s tucḍiwin-is. Ayen akk i as-yexdem i Ğamila, yecna-t-id, yessenṭeq-tt-id di tezlatin. Gar-asent,(Ayen iraden 1989) 
‘’Sebεa n lesnin i nesεedda,
Qqlilit tmeqqwa n lehna,
Ussan irkel d aγilif.
Deg uzal ur ak-ẓerreγ ara,
Deg yiḍ ur d-tkeccmeḍ ara,
 Ay akken i ak-hedreγ kif kif.’’
    Xas akken terwa-tent, meεna tḥemmel-it. Am wakken yemmut, tefka-as izen ad as-t-yawi i baba-s, tenna-as :
‘’Ma teẓriḍ baba,
 ini-as Ğamila,
leεteb-is yesfeḍ γer lqa (ε),
teffem-iyi s wid yemmuten.’’    
    Syin, Ğamila tezweğ akked…umeddakel-nniḍen n Lwennas. Truḥ d urgaz-is γer Kanada. Din, tesεa dderya. Ma d Lwennas yeqqim  ugar n 3 n yiseggasen d uzgen netta d waṭṭan-is. D yiwen n umeddakel-is i t-irefden.
   Iruḥ γer Kanada i wakken ad d-iẓer Ğamila. Yettγimi deg yiwet n lqahwa, yettrağu-tt din alamma tεedda-d i wakken ad tt-iwali. Mi d-yuγal, yuγ lḥal iruḥ γer Marikan. Nnan-as warraw n taddart-is : ‘’ansi akka i d-tekkiḍ a Lwennas ? Yerra-asen-d : si ddunit ay At laxert !’’
   Seg wasmi i t-teğğa Ğamila, Matub werğin yeḥbis ccna fell-as. Uzzu n tasa/tuzzma n temγart (1991). Si ddaw uẓekka/ Imsefraγ/A lmeḥna (1993).Tatut/Tannumi (1994). Tameddit n wass/Tuzzma/ Tiγri n tağğalt (1996). Qqurent tregwa/Ay iẓri-w yesriddimen (1997). Ula album-is aneggaru (1998), tella rriḥa n Ğamila. 
‘’Mi as-nniγ ad kem-kerhe&amp;gamma,;
Ad kem-ḍummeγ seg wul-iw.
Dγa din i ttenṭarraye&amp;gamma,; 
Ssekraseγ lecγal-iw…’’
    Tayri n Matub d Ğamila tuγal d amedya i medden. Mi yugi yiwen ad yettu tin iḥemmel, ad ak-d-yini ‘’Teḍra yid-i am Matub, ugiγ ad tt-ttuγ’’. 
Hocine.M 
Gar-aneɣ d kra n wussan, Tuddsa n wid ur nettwali n twilayt n Bgayet ad theggi iman-is akken ad tili i walmend n ugar n mraw d ameɛḍur, i ara yerzun ɣef Wammas n Usileɣ Asadar (Centre de Formation Professionnelle) n Bgayet. Tura s useggas-a, ad tili tuddsa-ya tessaweḍ ad tesuddes i useggas wis kraḍ asileɣ-a i wid mu nessawal « iderɣalen », yettusemma n wallen. Imdanen-a ihi, ad ssawḍen deg teɣzi n 12 n wayyuren ad d-awin agerdas ara asen-yefken azref ad qedcen deg walbaɛḍ n tkebbaniyin neɣ n tdeblin. Anect-a iban yella-d s tallelt n unemhal n Wammas n Usileɣ Asadar, maca daɣen s tin n Tmehla n Tigawt Tinmettit (DAS) n waɣir n Bgayet, skud sɣur-s ay d-yettas udrim ilaqen. Aselway n tuddsa-ya mass Ɛisani Ɛebdelḥakim yenna-aɣ-d dakken umuɣ (liste) n yinelmaden i ara yeɣren aseggas-a yeččur, maca yefka-d ttiɛad i wid yebɣan ad ttwasilɣen qabel, ad heggin iman-nsen i uxdam n sin neɣ tlata n lekwaɣeḍ kan imi tiwwura-nsen zgant ldint. Asileɣ ɣef wacu i d-ttɛeddayen yimdanen-a i ur nettwali ur yelli d uwɛir ɣef leḥsab n wid ijerrben yakan. Imi deg tazwara ad asen-slemden yiselmaden agemmay-nsen uzzig, win i sseqdacen s yifassen-nsen. Mi ara kksen aqeddic amenzu, ad yettwassemres ɣef yinelmaden wahil ideg ara ɣren allalen-a atraren n teywalt (communication) ; amezruy-nsen, azal-nsen, nnuba-nsen, akked yineɣmisen akk i ten-yerzan. Aḥric-a n wahil ad yemmag deg ddeqs n wakud alama gzan yinelmaden s telqey amaḍal-a n tilifun ladɣa, imi fell-as i xeddmen asileɣ. Syin akkin, mi ara ilin yinelmaden ugmen-d xilla n tmussniwin timeẓrayin, ad ɛeddin ɣer uqeddic n tidet : winna n usemres. Akken ma llan yinelmaden ad ɛeddin ɣer tigawt: ad yettwasres sdat n yal yiwen tilifun yersen (fixe), bac ad lemden amek ara ssiwlen i kra n wuṭṭun, amek ara refden i tiɣri, neɣ amek ara ceyyɛen win i d-yessawalen ɣer yizireg wayeḍnin. Mi ara lemden dayen amenzay n twuri-nsen tamaynut, ad sɛun yimdanen-a i ur nettwali agerdas n uɛessas n tilifun (standardiste). Dɣa yiwen seg wid i d-iḥellan agerdas (diplôme) ilindi yenna-aɣ-d: « Aseggas-nni i ɣriɣ dinna akked yimdukkal d awezɣi ad t-ttuɣ. Tura aql-i d axeddam s tallelt n la das. Ɣas ma lexlas ur igerrez, maca akka wala ulac maḍi. Ilaq ɣef yal aderɣal ad yeg asileɣ-a ». D asileɣ s wazal-is, skud d ayen ara yeǧǧen ameɛḍur-a ad yekcem ugar deg tmetti. Yuɣ lḥal, ula d internet akked wallal n uselkim tenwa tuddsa-ya n wid ur nettwali n Bgayet ad t-terr gar yifassen n wid ukud tlehhu, lemmer mačči d aḥraq i yettwaḥreq tikkelt yezrin uxxam n yidles n Bgayet anda ttuɣ dduzan-a. Ɣas ma yella, anemhal n uxxam-a yefka-yasen amiru (promesse) dakken ad asen-iqeɛɛed taluft deg wakud iqerben. 
Mhenni Xalifi
IḤIṬUSEN. Tetwassen aṭas s yisem n iḥeddaden. Zik, yella uxxam n tiḥuddeda yesɛa 7 n zzbari, izehher am teɣrast n tzizwa. Tugget n yimezdaɣ ttuɣalen d iḥeddaden, win yeɣran yeɣra, wayeḍ ad yuɣal d aḥeddad.Taddart-iw, ur telli d tameqrant, ur telli d tamecṭuḥt, d talemmast, maca tuget n yimezdaɣ-is ttidiren deg usamar n tmurt n Lzzayer, kra di tmurt n Fransa akked kanada. Taddart-iw tebḍa ɣef 7 n yigmamen: Annar, Taɣaza, Lḥara n at Aɛli, lɛezla, Agaraj, Lḥara n at Musa, Tabuccict. Tebɛed s yiwen n ukilumiter ɣef  tɣiwant n Buzgan. Ma tebɣiḍ ad tt-ruḥeḍ ɣer-s, ad tt-ɛeddiḍ Tabucict neɣ Agaraj. Ma tekkiḍ-d si temdint n Buzgan,akken kan ara tawḍeḍ s Agaraj, ilaq ad tt-berneḍ ɣef  zelmeḍ, ad  tt-ruḥeḍ ɣer Lɛezla, send ad tawḍed, ad t-afeḍ azamul n yimeɣrasen i yukan di ṭṭrad n 54-62. Mi tewweḍ-ḍ ɣer Lɛezla, ad tt-waliḍ aɣerbaz amezwaru, s yenna, ad tt-aliḍ ɣer Tɣaza, send ad tawḍeḍ ad t-afeḍ tala taqdimt, mi tewwḍeḍ ar tɣaza, ma tebɣiḍ ad tt-ruḥeḍ  ɣef yeffus ɣer lḥara n at Aɛli,  ad ttkemmleḍ ɣer tbucict. Ma tebɣid ad tt-ruḥeḍ ɣef zelmeḍ, ad tafeḍ lǧamaɛ ɣef yidis-is axxam n tiḥuddeda. Syenna, tzemreḍ ad tt- ruḥeḍ ar Wennar anida yella uḍummu n tadart. S yenna i d abrid ɣer tmeqbart id yezgan deg umkan iwumi qqaren lqern, anda tella daɣen tala iwumi neqqar :”tala n lqarn. S nnig lqern, yella uqacuc n lqern.Zik, yal tawacult tesɛa yiwen neɣ ugar n sin n yiḥeddaden. Deg tallit-ni, ulac icumuren di taddart, imdanen ttgallan s 7 n zzbari n Iḥiṭusen !Ass-a,  tbeddel teswiɛt, axxam n tiḥuddeda temdel tewwurt-is, yuli-t uɣebbar, ilmeẓyen n wassa, ɣunzan amahil-a n tiḥuddeda. Fernen ad menḍaren deg yiberdan, ad tekkin ɣef leḥyuḍ n taddart wala ad xedmen akken xedmen imezwura-nsen, ad ṭṭfen deg wansayen n lejdud-nsen. Yal ass, ad tt-cektin, ad tt-lummun zzher-nsen id ten-id-yesseɣlin di tmurt-a ideg neqqen tirga d usirem.
Bussaɛd Ḥemar
Tamazɣa n Yimaziɣen, Imaziɣen d nekni aya. Tilisa n tmazɣa hrawit. Agdud i zedɣen deg-s qqaren-asen Imaziɣen, tameslayt-nsen d tamaziɣt, tamaziɣt tebḍa ɣef waṭas n tantaliwin deg-s: taqbaylit, tacawit, tamzabit, tazennatit, tacenwit, tacelḥit, tamacaɣt. Tamurt n tmazɣa tesεa aṭas n yigeldan bdu-d seg Cicnaq. Tamazɣa tesεa daɣen tigeldatin Dihya deg Lewras akked Tinhinan deg tniri. Maca wid yeṭṭfen adabu n tmurt n Lezzayer smersen aṭas n tarrayin  iwakken ad mḥun isem n umaziɣ seg yidɣaɣen d yizekwan yettwarun s wureɣ seg zik n zik. Ulac timeẓra ǧǧan, deg tazwara smersen tasertit-a taɛrabt-tineslemt ! Timeẓri-ya n taɛrabt-tineslemt mačči kan d tamsalt n tutlayt d tesreṭ, maca d tamsalt yellan lqayet mliḥ, iswi seg-s d ahud n tɣerma yettwabnan zik; imi ẓran d akken tutlayt d lsas n tɣerma. Ihi ilaq ad teẓrem d akken ulac taεrabt d tneslemt deg tmurt n tmazɣa uqbel anekcum n Σuqba Ben Nafeε i d-yusan seg Lḥiǧaz. Seg waya yella-d uεerreb deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Ihi ulac maṭi Aεraben deg tmurt n Lezzayer send ad d-asen iserdasen inselmen seg usamar alemmas s yisem n lislam. D aya i yeǧǧan tamsalt n usenseb n tmaziɣt di tmurt n Lezzayer d tamsalt n tesnakta tasertant; neẓra yakk d acu-tt tesnakta-ya, d taεrabt-tineslemt ! Llan wid i yeddan deg lǧerrat n tsertit-a uɣalen ttuɛerben. Ihi ad d-naf tura llan kra n Yimaziɣen ttuεerben. Hatan wayen i d-qqaren wid yeṭṭfen adabu n tmurt n Lezzayer si 1962 ar tura « Nekni d Imaziɣen ….i tesseɛreb tneslemt ! ». Yezri wakud uɣalen At Udabu n Lezzayer yeqqar-d: « Nekni d Aɛraben ! Nekni d Aɛraben ! Nekni d Aɛraben ! ». Ma yella d tura bɣan ad aɣ-d-inin  » kunwi d Aɛraben ! kunwi d Aɛraben ! kunwi d Aɛraben ! » acku ufan-d ugur-nsen agejdan mačči kan d tutlayt.D wa i d aɣilif-nsen agejdan « idles, aẓar, amezruy » ɣas akken ur yebɣi ara ad d-mmeslayen fell-as ɛinani maca, yesseqdac tasnakta tadelsant, deg wannar-a ; yerna atawaɣit ! Teldi s tmeɣra n ccna. Tura bedlen isem tamanaɣt n tgelda n « Mass n Sen »  rran-tt d Γernaṭa deg wadeg n Sirta « Cirta ». Γas nutni ttun maca, amezruy d awezɣi d-yettu. Mass n Sen d agellid Amaziɣ. D agellid amezwaru n tgelda Tanumidit « Numidie ». Ilul deg useggas 238 av. J.-C d mmi-s n Gaya, jeddi-s isem-s Zellalsan, aneggaru-ya d mmi-s n Iles seg lεerc n  Massyles. Mass n Sen asmi yemmut baba-s yezdi akked Ruman deg useggas 203 av. J.-C  mgal Syphax agellid n Massaesyles ; Mass n Sen yerbeḥ deg traḍ yuɣl yezdi tamurt n Massyles akked tmurt n Massaesyles, yesbed-d tagelda Tanumidit «Numidie » yerra Sirta « Cirta » d tamanaɣt n tgelda-ya. Mass n Sen yemmut deg useggas 148 av. J.-C. Ma yella d anamek n wawal  Sirta « Cirta » llant kra n turdiwin: tamezwarut teqqar-d dakken isem n Cirta yekka-d seg wawal  Afniqi QRTN yettwasusru Kirta aneggaru-ya anamek-is « tamdint », sinɣur-s yuɣal-d d isem n Sirta. Ma yella d turda tis snat teqqar-d dakken isem n Sirta d isem amaziɣ anamek-is « tissirt » neɣ s teqbaylit « tasirt ».   Amek ad d-inin Sirta d tagelda n yidles Arab ? yerna semman-as 
 Dacu tettrajuḍ ay Amaziɣ? Cemten tutlayt-ik, huden taɣerma-k, srewten amezruy-ik.
Nacer-AKOUCHE
Zrin 35 iseggasen ɣef tafsut n-imaziɣen id yellan deg useggas 1980. Tadyant    id yegren  i tikelt tamezwarut ,s- lejher ,tamsalt n-timmadit  n Lẓẓayer ɣer unnar n-uskasi seg-imi tewwi tmurt tamunent –ines di 1962.  Am akken zrin diɣen 14 n-iseggasen ɣef tafsut taberkant n 2001 id yeǧǧen ccwami-is deg ixfawen n-leqbayel wakali imi lejruḥ-is mazal ɣman. Imenɣi n-umussu n-leɛrac akked  win n-warrac n-tafsut taberkent  yesenquqel ( ahat i lebda?)  tamuɣli n-imezdaɣ n-tmurt n-leqbayel  ɣer tisertit  imi ɣer wamur ameqqran deg-sen  amennuɣ aserti s- wudem aqbur(akken i t uɣen imeɣnasen n-ssin ikabaren  FFS d RCD d-umussu adelsan amaziɣ-MCB-)   yeǧǧa-t lawan, ttwalint d-abrid ireglen ur nsufuɣ. Maca uqbel a nsuk tamuɣli ɣef  taluft-agi , yelha lemmer ad nneg    ṭelqa ara aɣ-yewwin si tazwara  n-tamsalt  alamma d taggara-s. Anect-a ad yilli   s-lmendad n kra n-tuttriwin ara yillin d-timwelhin i uskasi nebɣa ad neger s-annar teɣzi n-waggur-agi n yibirir  yellan d-amuli n-snat n- tegrawliwin-agi . Ɣef aya  yelha ad nsuter seg tidmiwin-nneɣ aya-gi:  Acu-tt ssebba n   snat n-tafsutin-agi , yellan d yiwen umennuɣ xas ma mgaradent di ṣṣifa? Acu s-wacu id glant i yidles amaziɣ ? Amek  yella  udem n-umennuɣ ɣef timadit tamaziɣt ass-a d-wamek ara yilli azekka?  
Tamurt n-leqbayel deffir timunent:
Asmi yeffeɣ uṛumi deg useggas 1962 , tamurt n-Leqbayel yufa-tt-id lḥal tezwi .  Ur yelli id teǧǧa Franṣa seg-s. Amur ameqqran n-tuddar d-leḥwaṛi nhudent , ixxamen rraben, iberdan nexren, irgazen ya yemmut, wa iɛab, wa yenfa… ( hudden ḥerqen yixxamen, nɣan-aɣ izmawen, listiɛmar bu lemḥayen, yeǧǧa-d igujilen) . Ifaden n-tmurt n-leqbayel merra tezwi-ten Fṛansa. Tadamsa( l’économie ) ulac, allalen n-tdawsa ( santé) d-asafar, iɣerbazen  drus maḍi, iberdan  xerben yerna xuṣṣen, Tizi-Wezzu s timad-is tella kan d-Lbilaj …kulci ixus.  Ɣef lexṣaṣ-agi  yenerna llaẓ akked lmiziriya imi  imeḍqan n- lexdma , tafat, aman d-axayel kan  i ten-ttxayalen imezdaɣ n-tmurt imiren. Di Lẓẓayer tamanaɣt aɣbel d-ayen nniḍen. D- amḥizwer ɣer ukersi n-leḥkem gar  GPRA akked tarbaɛt  yellan di Tunes .  Amḥizwer  yesyazeg   tasilit n-lfetna. Widen yezdi umennuɣ ferqen  myuɣalen d-icenga, s ddaw tiṭ i ttemyaxẓaren.  Snat n-trabuyaɛ banent-d : tin n-Tlemcen ddaw tacdac-t n-Benbela, tin n-Tizi-Wezzu ddaw  leɛnaya n  Hocine Ait Ahmed . Maca lkil n-limizan imal ɣer terbaɛt n-Tlemcen acku  iserdasen-is d wid id  yekkan si tilist n Tunes (yellan ddaw leḥkem n Houari Boumedienne) . Isardasen-agi ur ten-issum ara umenuɣ akked  Franṣa, yerna    ttuhaggen akken ilaq , begsen akken iwata ɣer yimenɣi.  Ma yella d tarbaɛt n Tizi-Wezzu tsened ɣef yimjuhad id yesgra ṭrad akked  Fṛansa. Tufa-ten-id tagnit aɛyen, ifaden kkawen.  Rrnu ɣef anect-a  tadyant n war amsefhem gar ssin imdebren n tmurt n leqbayel n yimiren  Krim Belkacem akked Hocine Ait Ahmed imi temgared tmuɣli-nsen ɣef amek ara yilli umennuɣ mgal lbaṭṭel id teddun akken  yesbur tacḍaḍt-is ɣef tmurt wakali. Ahat amennuɣ, ɣef akken id qqaren yimsenqaden  n-unemzruy,  ɣef tugdut d tilelli   txesr-it tmurt n-leqbayel uqbel timunent s timad-is imi irgazen-is iṣaḥen, izemren ad qazmen taswiɛt,  am Amirouche, Abane Remdane, Ali Mellah d-waṭas nniḍen,  ɣlin d-imeɣrasen  uqbel a tefru lgira. Deg aya tamurt n leqbayel tenzef irekeli. Tidyanin am “ l’opération jumelle” ur d ǧǧin kra   deg  tanezmert tesɛa niqal( lawan n-trad akked urumi) tmurt n-leqbayel. D-anect-a d wayen nniḍen ( lexdaɛ, wer amsefhem gar imeɣnasen )  i-yeǧǧan tamurt n-leqbayel a tteknu i  lweɛd , xas ulama teɛrreḍ amek ara terr aman ɣer tiregwa-nsen  ddaw tacḍaḍt n-ukabar n-FFS deg useggas n 1963. Iswiyen yeḍfeṛ imiren ukabar n tirni n-iɣalen  inemlayen ( FFS) d-aressi n-tugdut akked izerfan n- umdan d tilelli n-tidet di  tmurt n Lẓẓayer  wakali.   Meɛna xas lebɣi yella, ifaden ulac. Amenuɣ ifuk s  tweṭṭfa n- Mass Hocine Ait Ahmed ɣef lḥebs. Yemmut win yemuten di trad-nni, yettujeggeḥ win yettujegḥendi lwan  deg  daxal uderbuz n tsertit   llant-d lemcawrat gar akabar FLN akked FFS  ɣef wamek ara  tefru  tamselt-nni . Maca ur iɛaṭel-ara yezzi-d Boumedienne d-tarbaɛt-is ɣef uselway amenzu n tigduda n Lezzayer  Benbela, iɣedel-it azekka-wen-nni  n luffaq id yellan akked ukabar n FFS di 19 juin 1965.
Seg assen treṣa tasnaṛeft ( dictature) n-ukabar awḥid ( FLN) iman-is ɣef ukersi n-leḥkem . Ddaw leḥkem n Boumedienne tamurt tesbekt deg-s tsertit. Yekfa lmenṭad. Isaggasen n-tugdi delqen ussu-nsen ɣef tigduda.  Tamurt telḥa s-lebɣi n-yiwen urgaz :  Boumedienne.
Xas akken yerwel Hocine Ait Ahmed si lḥeb-s , akabar n FFS yekcem tudert tuffirt. Krim Belkacem yettwenɣa( 1970), Boudiaf Yenfa, iɣmisen wakali fkan annuz i udabu isedduyen timsal yecqan  tmurt s-uzal akked tugdi ddaw leɛnaya n-wayen umi qqaren imiren asqamu agrawliw ( consiel de la revolution) . Akabar n FLN yesenta tuccar-is tirni , armi ulac acu i-izemran ad yeḍṛu neɣ ad yennulfu mebla rrda n-ukabar-agi. Tamurt tesburr talaba n-tinemla tulmist( socialisme spécifique) . D-anecta-agi yak  id yufraren  armi d-tagara  n- isaggasen n 60. Maca di ttnaṣfa n-iseggasen  n 70 bdant timsal tenfufuden-t.  Tuɣalen waman ɣer lǧedra n-useklu n- umennuɣ ɣef izerfan  d-wayen  yeqnen ɣer-sen . S-tufra, s-lemḥadra s-ttawil n ccna  akked isefra d-tisɣunin i teddun ddew  uffus  amenuɣ aserti yuɣal-d s-annar maca tikelt-a s-wudem nniḍen . lmeqṣud n-umenuɣ-agi  d tigrin  s-annar  askasi  mačči kan   tikti n tugdut  d-izerfan n-umdan  imi ayen si ara d-yeglu aḥerkal n-isagassen n 70  d-tamselt n-nekwa n-tmurt yeqqimen tettuɛalaq seg asmi feclen igrawliyen iqbaylien  n-umusu aɣelnaw ( mouvement national ) imesmaziɣen( berbérites) n-iseggasen n 1940/1950 am Benai Ouali, Mbarek Ait Menguellet, Ouamrane Idir, Laimeche Ali , Ali Yahya Rachid , Hocine Ait Ahmed ,Amar Ould Hamouda….
Yettkemil  
Ait Slimane Hamid 
Ddurt yezrin yella-d Tari Azizi, yiwen seg izumal-nni i ibeggsen i wesnulfu n Tefsut i Yimaziɣen, d inebgi n n yinelmaden n tesdawit Akli Mohand Oulhadj n Tubiret . Uqbel, ad d-yesmekti taluf  i d-nejren abrid i 20Yebrir, yerra uneɣmas tajmilt i yimeddukal-is yeddren tallit-nni .  yenna-d daɣen deg wawal-is : « ur s-qqaret ara ḥala 24 d ameḥbus i yellan : aṭas n yinelmaden d ixeddamen i i kecmen lḥebs » . Lmaɛna n wawal : tafsut n yimaziɣen tga-yas irebbi tmurt n leqbayel s lekmal-is, ɣas ulamma deg tesdawit i d-nefufed . Ayen akk d-yenna d wayen d-yesmekta Aziz Tari  tḍebeɛ-it rruḥ n tellil d tugdut (esprit de liberté et de démocratie). Dɣa d rruḥ-nni i wumi yefka azal u yebɣa ad t-egzun inelmaden n tesdawit i d as-d-ittḥessien . Akken yekfa ameslay—s, tezzi-d nnuba  i wesqerdec. Ɣef aṭas n tlufa i ɣef steqsan yelmeẓyen d telmeẓyin n tesdawit . Tikti d usteqsi d-yufraren yeɛna azekka asertan n tmurt n leqbayel                                 <span style="white-space: pre;">             
 A.I             
Awah! Wid yesfili-n akken idles aqbayli ad « yengeṛ » seg sya ɣeṛ kṛa 50 n yiseggasen, ɛni xedmen abaṛgu (cauchemar) neɣ ḥiwlen aṭaṣ n yifelfel aqeṛḥan ? Aḥlil ! Acu-t? Aḥeq n yillu, ad yengeṛ ngeṛ, aqbayli ad yeqqim deffiṛ-s ! Iseggasen-agi inegguṛa ngaṛ tamawt ɣeṛ t’metti n leqbayel, nufa belli yella akken yiwen n lebɣi akken ad d-t-uɣalen-t laɛwayed n zik iṛuḥen, iɣaben ɣef « yiẓṛi »! Ama d-amenzu n Yennayeṛ, neɣ d-amenzu n Tafsut, neɣ d laɛwayed n t’maɣṛiwin n zik, d timecṛaḍ, tiwizi, atg…leqbayel bɣan am akken ad yuɣal zik nni. Aṭaṣ n yimdanen is yeqqaṛen :' » Ih,zik nni! »…Yewwiten ubaḥṛi n yizṛi (la nostalgie). Ay at laɛṛaḍ, seg wass-nni id yennulfa Facebook-agi am akken d ttawla tewwi leqbayel meṛṛa. Ulac win uṛ nexdim aṛa teswiṛa n yixxamen n zik nni, neɣ n leqbayel n zik akk d tuččiyin neɣ iselsa iqbuṛen. Nefhem belli tella yiwwet n t’muɣli ɣeṛ usaḥbibeṛ n yidles aqbayli. Ihi, ussan-a, aṭaṣ id yegṛen tiɣṛi deg Facebook, yagi tilawin tiqbayliyin, akken ass n 11 Ibṛiṛ ad yuɣal d-ass amaḍal n t’qenduṛt n leqbayel.(Journée mondiale de la robe Kabyle). Aṭaṣ n tmaɣnasin lakked d yimaɣnasen n yidles aqbayli, neɣ Amaziɣ, gṛen-d tiɣṛi nsen deg Facebook akken ass-agi n 11 deg wagguṛ n yibṛiṛ 2015 ad d-tefɣen-t timaziɣin, anda ma llan-t deg maḍal, s t’qenduṛt n leqbayel yesɛan izaṛigen n myal initen. Ayagi akken ad wekden-t belli aẓaṛ nsen-t d-amaziɣ, yeṛna akken att-uɣal taqenduṛt-agi yesɛan azal muqṛen, d ttaqenduṛt tamaḍalt, akken llan « les Jeans » akk d yiselsa nniḍen yettlusu umaḍal s-umata. Ma yella dagi deg t’muṛt n leqbayel, tilawin tt-heggin-t ayagi akken ad lsen-t akkit taqenduṛt-agi ɛzizen fella-sen-t fella-neɣ. Wissen kan ma yella attenǧaḥ tiɣṛi-agi ? Nessaṛam…D-acu kan, tilawin-agi timaziɣin waqil gṛen-t aɣ d cwiṭ n tismin, nukni s yiṛgazen. Iwacu, uṛ ttemsefhamen aṛa iṛgazen imaziɣen ad lsen kṛa n wass, abeṛnus amellal ɣas ma yella akken yebda iḥemmu lḥal ! Ddin uqabac, i tuṛa nukni s yiṛgazen uṛ nezmiṛ aṛa an axdem aya?<span style="white-space: pre;">       <span style="white-space: pre;">                 
 Syphax Y
Ah, ctaqaɣ ad « glilezeɣ » ɣef ugertil, ad ḥulfeɣ i lḥelfa nni taqurant, « atteskikeḍ » azagur ! Ddin uqabac, iḍelli yella, ass-a ulac-it, neɣ iruḥ yengar. Agertil amaɛzuz zik ulac axxam neɣ tawacult ur t nesɛi ara. Ass-a ma t’kecmeḍ ɣer yixxamen ur tettafeḍ ara, acku ur yettnuzu ara. Cfiɣ-d kan as mi meẓẓi-y-eɣ, nella nesɛa agertil, anda glalezeɣ, qqimeɣ, kesleɣ, ẓleɣ, urareɣ,…Ass-agi d-aktayen (souvenirs) kan i yeqqimen ! Azeṭṭa n yigertyal yeǧhed dayen kan deg yizri iqarben (alarmi deg iseggasen n 1980) uqbel ad « yenger » uxeddim-ines, acku widak lakked d ttidak it ixedmen muten, wwin yid-sen lḥirfa-agi. D-agerruǧ ger igerruǧen i ruḥen deg t’murt n leqbayel. Ladɣa taleɣt, neɣ aẓeṭṭa n tzerbiyin lakked iḥembelen…Ɣas akka an « neqqim » kan ɣef ugertil imi d wagi i d nebder. Agertil-agi ẓẓaḍen-t s yileẓwiyen n lḥelfa. D ttusna ay at laɛraḍ. Imdanen it yeẓẓaḍen zik nni ḥesbiten d-imusnawen, neɣ d-iselmaden n lḥirfa-agi. Ɣas akken ur ɣrin ara deg yiɣarbazen, sɛan tussna syes i qublen lḥif, yerna ɛacen s lḥirfat is-en-d ǧǧan leǧdud nsen. Tama n’At Ɛebbas, i d-yezgan deg unẓul n t’wilayt n Bgayet, tettwassen s-uẓeṭṭa n-igertyal. Yagi tuddar n: Tigrin, Ḥamda d At Wihdan i d-yezgan deg t’ɣiwant n Buǧlil. Lḥirfa n-ugertil deg tuddar-agi mucaɛ-it aṭaṣ, yerna ttwassen-en-t deg yal tama. Ayen yesneflin lexdma-agi, d lḥelfa yeṭṭuqten s uaṭaṣ deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas. Medden zik nni ḥemlen igertyal, ttɣimin neɣ gganen fellas-en. Ɣas akken qquren cwiṭ, maca lhan. Am ddaɛwessu, lḥirfa-agi truḥ d yimawlan-is, ur « tturiten » ara imeẓyanen. D ttagi i ttawaɣit yeḍran deg t’murt nneɣ. Ass-a, tuddar-agi d-abeḥri kan i yettṣuḍun deg zuqaq nsen-t. Kulec yuɣal d-aktayen (souvenirs) t’mektayen-ten-id yimɣaren. D-acu kan, tella yiwet n t’ɣawsa is ɛejlen « nger » n lḥirfa n-ugertil: Agertil n Plastik. As mi i d-t-yennulfa wagi, medden uɣalen ttaɣen-t-id acku yerxes. Deg tama-agi n’At Ɛebbas, ẓẓaḍen zik tiɣurasin n t’zizwa s lḥelfa. Tiɣurasin-agi sɛan-t tafekka iwumi n ssawal s tfransit « forme cylindrique ». Cebḥen-t dayen kan. Nufa deg taddart n Tigrin kra n tiɣurasin tiqburin yettufeṣlen s lḥelfa. Surfet-aɣ kan: D-ayen ur ttamen-en-t ara wallen; cebḥen-t dayen kan…Ah a lqum amcum s-anda i t tteddu-ḍ…?<span style="white-space: pre;"> 
Syphax Y.
Iḍelli i tebda tfaska taɣelnawt tis tlata n unelmad di tesdawit n Bgayet. Tafaska-agi ara yilin d asmekti i wass aɣelnaw n unelmad 19 mayu 1956 d tedyanin n 19 mayu 1981, i tt-id-yessudsen d Aqusis ussnan n yinelmaden n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Bgayet s lemɛawna akked tɣiwant n Bgayet . Wid i d-yeswejden tafaska-ya, xedmen-d yiwen n wahil d amerkanti ara yeqqimen i teɣzi n 04 n wussan (seg 17 ar 20 mayu), anda ara mmagen waṭas n warmuden idelsanen, ussananen d waddal ama deg wammas n tesdawit Ubudaw neɣ deg tmezduɣin tisdawanin yecban 17 tuber d Bercic 1. Taṣebḥit n wass-a, ad yemmag di ludiṭuryum n Ubudaw wass n tezrawin ɣef tmaziɣt d usexdem-is di ttawilat atraren n tiknulujiya iɣef ara d-yili i lmendad pṛufisur Kamel Bouamara. Deg urmud-a, ad d-ilin waṭas n yisaragen ara d-yawin ɣef yisental icudden ɣer tmaziɣt di tsenselkimt d lantirnat. Seg wid ara d-yefken isaragen, ad d-nebder : Nacer Mehdi d Mohand ou Ramtane Ighit i sin yid-sen d iselmaden deg ugezdu n tmaziɣt n Bgayet. Yella daɣen usarag ara d-yefk, Paul Anderson, netta d yiwen n umnadi agnizi i ixedmen aṭas n yinadiyen ɣef tmaziɣt di tsenselkimt. Ma d tameddit n wass-a, ttiɛad ad yili di tmezduɣt tasdawant 17 tuber, anda ara d-tili temlilit n ddabex n ufus ger tnelmadin, ad d-tili daɣen temzizzelt n umezgun anda ara d-yili umyezwer ger snat n tceqqufin i yettwafernen. Deg wass n ttlata 19 mayu, ad d-tili yiwet n tmeɣra ɣef lweḥda n tmeddit di Abudaw, ma deg yiḍ, leqdic ad yemmag di tmezduɣt tasdawant Bercic 1 anda ara tkemmel temzizzelt n umezgun, yerna ad d-tili temlilit n ddabex n uḍar ger yinelmaden.  Deg wass aneggaru, leṛebɛa 20 mayu, ttiɛad ad yili deg uxxam n umezgun n temdint n Bgayet anda ara ttunefken warazen i wid d tid i d-yufraren di temzizliyin. Rnu daɣen, ad d-tili temzizzelt n tira n tullist d tɣuri n tmedyazt. Akken ad d-nesmekti, aqusis Tumast d netta i d-yessudsen meṛṛa tifaskiwin yezrin n tmeɣra n unelmad di tesdawit n Bgayet. Aya yessebgan-d leḥrara d takayt i yellan ɣer yinelmaden iɛemṛen aqusis-a d yinelmaden n tmaziɣt s umata i d-yufrarin ɣef wiyaḍ ilmend n leqdic-a yesɛan azal. <span style="white-space: pre;">       
 Mokrane Chikhi<span style="white-space: pre;"> 
Ilmend n tuffɣa n udlis «Abrid ɣer ukayad n Tmaziɣt» s tallelt n Tesbeddit Tiregwa, ara yili d aɛwin i warrac ara yesɛeddin ikayaden n BAK d BEM, nefren ad d-nessesten ameskar-is mass Lɛerbi Yeḥyun akken ad nesɛu ugar n yisallen fell-as. Hatan wayen iɣef nemmeslay.
Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Ahat Ad aɣ-d-tiniḍ tazwara anwa i d Lɛerbi i wid ur k-nessin?Mass Lɛerbi Yeḥyun, ilul deg Uqbu, aɣir n Bgayet. D aselmad n tutlayt d tsekla Tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz alemmas n Yiɣil Ɛli. D yiwen umeɣnas i irefden amennuɣ ɣef tumast d yidles amaziɣ s wawal akked dira. Yura yakan ammud n yisefra i wumi isemma «Tayri n Umedyaz» i d-yeffɣen s lmendad n Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa (HCA) deg useggas n 2014.
Tessufɣeḍ-d taggara-a yiwen n udlis i yinelmaden ara yesɛeddin aBAK s tallelt n Tesbeddit Tiregwa, eg-aneɣ-d taḥawact fell-as… </strong>
Adlis-iw «Abrid ɣer ukayad n Tmaziɣt» d adlis wis sin i d-ssuffɣeɣ s ufus n tallelt n Tesbeddit Takanadit Tiregwa, xedmeɣ-t-id i yinelmaden yeqqaren tamaziɣt, akken ad asen-yili d amnir (guide) ara ten-yallen u ad ten-iɛiwen deg umecwar-nsen n tɣuri, akken ad heggin iman-nsen i yikayaden unsiben : BEM d BAC. Ma d ayen yerzan agbur, deg-s ad naf : agzul n temsirin s tewzel ; 10 n yikayaden yemgaraden ilmend n tsekka taḍrisant (aḍris ullis, aḍris agelman, aḍris asegzay d uḍris imesfukel) ; aseɣti n yikayaden-a d yifarisen s tira ; iḍrisen i tɣuri ɣef tmedyezt d tsekla taqbaylit ideg yella yiwen usefru yessaḍsayen akked yiwet tmezgunt i warrac.
Akken i t-id-yeqqar uzwel-is, adlis-a ad yenfaɛ ihi wid ara yesɛeddin akayad n BAK? Imi ulac-it deg tnedlisin anda yezmer ad t-yaf unelmad?
Win ileḥḥun akk deg ubrid n yidles d tnaslit, yettmaggar-d uguren, d abrid n tẓuri neɣ d abrid n tira kifkif-nsen, ula d amaru yesɛa uguren-is, imi adlis n tmaziɣt ur iteddu ara s waṭas acku drus i t-yeqqaren imi tugget n yiqbayliyen ur tt-ɣrin ara deg uɣerbaz. Tin ɣur-s, ugur n teẓrigin, imi yuɛer ad tafeḍ win ara d-yessuffɣen adlis n tmaziɣt, ɣef waya i ttwaliɣ dakken «Tira d amennuɣ», amaru ilaq ad yennaɣ d yiman-is akken ad d-yaru ayen yettxemmim d wayen yettḥulfu, ilaq ad yennaɣ d teswaɛt akken ad yaf win ara as-d-yessuffɣen adlis-is, ilaq diɣen ad yennaɣ d tmetti akken ad yessiweḍ izen-is i yimdanen d wid akk ara t-yeɣren, akka i d tudert n umaru deg tmurt ur nerri azal i umaru.
 Awal-ik n taggara?</strong>
Ad d-iniɣ kan, tanemmirt i kra n win d tin i d-yefkan afus n tallelt akken ad d-yeffeɣ udlis-iw u ad yaweḍ afus n unelmad, tanemmirt i kra n win i yi-d-yefkan tabɣest akken ad kemmleɣ tikli-w deg ubrid n tira, tanemmirt diɣen i kečč a M’henni ɣef tdiwennit-a. Ar tikkelt-nniḍen deg lehna.
Yesteqsa-t : Mhenni Xalifi
n Murad Irnaten
“Di lǧerra-k ay awal…” d amud n tullisin n Murad Irnaten d-yefɣen ussan-a ɣer tezrigin Achab.
Atan cwiṭ deg wayen yuran deg usebtar aneggaru : 
“Tira d tala yettaken  aman I tara n ccfawat  i waken ad tegmu.  Aya d ayen n wala di tmettiyin ibeddent  ɣef idelsan-nsent, tutlayin-nsent,  d umezruy-nsent yettqadaren imyura-nsent, anida akken yal adlis yeḥrez amur si ccfawat, yal awal yeqqel i bab-is d ayla . Yal t ira d tirmit, d rreḍma n tudert i tutlayt. D tudert s unamek-ines ubriz, alqayan, ahrawan. Yal asekkil yella d aẓru  amenzu i wawal yesrus umyaru ɣef lkaɣeḍ, yettfuki,  yettnerni am waken yettfuki uɛeqqa  n yirden di teɣzut yerẓa lmaɛun i tikkelt tamezwarut. 
Yal tira tettak inzi ɣer tiɣwist-nni tamenzut swayes d-ikeččem umdan ɣer tudert. Yal awal d taẓunẓut , d aẓar i wejgagal n usenlfu”
Axxam n leqbayel d azamul n lbadna n tdukkli, d watas n t<span class="st">γ<em></em>awsiwin niden. Xas akken yemgarad di tmnadt <span class="st">γ<em></em>er tayed, ad t-tafed yesɛa yiwet n t<span class="st">γ<em></em>essa, yiwen n wazal. Qqaren-ak : «argaz d taftilt n berra, tamettut d taftilt n daxel» Acku lec<span class="st">γ<em></em>al n tmettut akk deg uxxam, d nettat i t-yesbeddayen, tetteg-as azal, fell-as i tesɛedday leɛmer-is akken ad ibedd wa ad iğğuğeg, axxam icudd <span class="st">γ<em></em>ef tmeṭṭut, ma yelha yewqa deg-s lxir d lbaraka, teḥsid d tameṭṭut nni i yelhan ma yewqa deg-s umennu<span class="st">γ<em></em> d yi<span class="st">γ<em></em>eblan yemme<span class="st">γ<em></em> di lḥif, neḥsid d tamettut ay dir, tesdehza deg uxxam-is .
Yal ta<span class="st">γ<em></em>awsa deg uxxam n leqbayen tesɛa anamek, seg unnu<span class="st">γ<em></em>en d teqbucin <span class="st">γ<em></em>er i<span class="st">γ<em></em>erban d sqef, <span class="st">γ<em></em>ef ayagi i ruḥe<span class="st">γ<em></em> <span class="st">γ<em></em>er tmurt akken ad issine<span class="st">γ<em></em> uger <span class="st">γ<em></em>ef uxxam aqbayli d wamek yemmug. Mi wwde<span class="st">γ<em></em>, tewwi-iyi setti <span class="st">γ<em></em>er uxxam aqdim, mi nekcem <span class="st">γ<em></em>er da<span class="st">γ<em></em>el n ubraḥ, tenna-iyi-d d akken irgazen zik, mi ara ad d-awden <span class="st">γ<em></em>er umdiq-agi , ilaq ad xedmen lḥess ara yeğğen tilawin n uxxam ad heggint iman-nsent, wa ssrent. Nkemmel akin deg ubrid wala<span class="st">γ<em></em> axxam yedrem , tenna-iyi-d setti akken wagi qqaren-as «axxam n Tmana», tteqsadent mi ara d-tekcem teslit axxam i tikkent tamezwarut ne<span class="st">γ<em></em> mi ara ad d-ilal uqcic, ayagi <span class="st">γ<em></em>ef lfal i yesɛa , syen tqubel-iyi-d yiwet n tewwurt s sin n lelwaḥ, tessebrareḥ-itt setti, nekk qqime<span class="st">γ<em></em> zdat n umnar, ma d nettat tebda la iyi-d-tettezzi amek yeddes uxxam-is, axxam anda tɛac.
Axxam n leqbayel yebda <span class="st">γ<em></em>ef sin yeḥricen: yiwen seg-sen d ameqqran, qqaren-as taqaɛet.ma d wayed mezzi fell-as qqaren-as adaynin.
Taqaɛet ne<span class="st">γ<em></em> agens ne<span class="st">γ<em></em> ti<span class="st">γ<em></em>er<span class="st">γ<em></em>ert d adeg anda ttqeggilen wat uxxam.ad tt-tafed teṭṭulem,imi ulac anda ara d-tekcem tafat anagar n yiwen n ṭṭaq amectuḥ anda i d-ikeccem ubeḥri. Ti<span class="st">γ<em></em>er<span class="st">γ<em></em>ert tettili texla madi.ur tettafed ṭṭabla wala taxzant wala akersiw, maca tella kan yiwet n t<span class="st">γ<em></em>awsa i yettilin di akk ixxamen : «azetta» wagi yezga-d akkin, <span class="st">γ<em></em>er u<span class="st">γ<em></em>reb i d-iqublen tawwurt. Win i wumi qqaren Tasga «mur de la lumière».ttarran azeṭṭa din imi anagar adeg-agi i d-tettawed mliḥ tafat n yiṭij, a<span class="st">γ<em></em>reb i d-iqublen Tasga qqaren-as «tinebdatin», wagi yezga-d rrif n tewwurt, Tinebdatin akked Tesga d inemgalen,imi Tinebdatin d azamul n tafat, <span class="st">γ<em></em>ef way-agi i ttcuddun lferḥ mi ara d-ilal uqcic <span class="st">γ<em></em>er Tesga, qqaren-ak «mi ara d-ilal uqcic ddesent tsegwa» ma d Tinebdatin «mur de l’obscurité» ttcuddun-t <span class="st">γ<em></em>er leḥzen am mi ara yemmet waldeɛad, qqaren-ak «mi ara yeffe<span class="st">γ<em></em> lmeyyet ttrunt tnebdatin»
Agens deg-s i ttilin lec<span class="st">γ<em></em>al n uxxam: lmakla d usewwi,ides d i<span class="st">γ<em></em>imi.ma tmuqled akin <span class="st">γ<em></em>er tqernit ak-id iban lkanun.ad tafed rsen s ufell-as yinyen deg-s sewwayen yerna sseḥmuyen di tegrest. S nnig lkanun yettili udekkan ttilint da<span class="st">γ<em></em>en tekwatin, rrif-s kan ad ak-id- iban use<span class="st">γ<em></em>wen, seg-s ttɛelliqen lebsel akk d ticcert. Ma tmuqled <span class="st">γ<em></em>er tama tazelmadt yella udaynin.deg-s yettili lmal d t<span class="st">γ<em></em>eṭṭen d tsita, imi wagi d azamul n rrbeḥ.maca adaynin ur yekmil ara srid i usgen tefreq iten yiwet n terkabt, deg udaynin yettili lmedwed deg-s i ttarran lqut i lmal-nni, s ufell-as tella t<span class="st">γ<em></em>imit. Syen tella teɛrict, deg-s ttağğan ikufiyen, wigi ttarran deg-sen rrezq.
Sɣur: Ʃedwan Ʃebdeɣani.
S ddaw laɛnaya n useqamu unnig n timuzɣa, theyya-d t ɣiwant n At Wasif d comité des fêtes n temdint n At Wasif rreḥba tamezwarut i tmedyazt n At Wasif (premières poésiades d At Ouacif). Tameɣra-agi ara i dumen tlala wussan d tajmilt i umedyaz n temnaṭ Lḥadj El Mokhtar Ait Said.Mebla tameɣra-agi i wumi iga irebbi Usqamu Unnig n Timuzɣa, ad d-tessekfel acḥal d amedyaz n temnaḍt n At Wasif.Ad d-nesmekti belli ussan-a n tmedyazt ad faken azekka n tlata
Četkayen inelmaden n master 1 di tseddawit n akli muḥend ulḥaǧ di tubiret seg ugur iten-yemmugren aseggas-a d win icudden ɣer tnezduɣt n tseddawit(la citè universite) imi tuget n yinelmaden n uswir-a uffand iman nsen ur sɛin ara azref akken ad sԑun tixxamin di tnezduɣt n tseddawit , abeԑda inelmaden izedɣen berra lwilaya n tubiret am tizi uzzu, bumerdas , bgayet ,msila dayen yeǧǧan inelamden-agi ar turra werԑad bdin leqraya alami id-uffan tifrat i uɣbel-a , ԑɛlaḥsab inelmaden wekden-d akken zedɣen di temnaḍin i yebeԑden azal n 30,40 yikilumiṭren ɣef tseddawit yerna ur zmiren ara ad as -ruḥun tisebḥiyin ad d-ttuɣalin tameddit ladɣa deg ussan n ccetwa am wid id-yezgan di tɣiwanin n seḥriǧ , at leqser , taqerbuzt , ṣur lɣuzlan , am wakken daɣen llan wid ara yeɣren ama d lxemsa n tmeddit ayaggi ur yettaf ara allalen n usiweḍ ɣer yixxamen nsen, ɣef wannect-a inelmaden ssuturen seg yimḍebren teԑna temsalt ad d-ggren iman nsen iwakken ad d-affen tifrat s lԑejlan akken ad bdun leqraya di tegnatin iwilmen mebla iɣublan.
Menas Abdelhak
Ahat ɣur ddeqs n medden, yemmug ugḍiḍ akken kan ad yidir tilelli-yis d afferfer deg yigenwan, ɣur wiyaḍ d lɛali-yas kan tiqeffet yettɣurrun akken ad n-yeǧǧ dinna tarwiḥt. Maca ɣur kra nniḍen, ur d agna-ya (choix) ur d wa i smenyifen, imi nutni ur ten-ttaǧǧan ttebrariɛen deg yigenwan, ur asen-meddin tiqefftin daɣen ; wanag ttaɣen-ten-id s udrim sɣur yimrebbi-nsen seg ulzuz (ssuq) neɣ seg taddart, akken ad ten-id-ssekren ula d nutni deg uxxam, daɣen n tfergact (lqefs). Akken iban, mačči ɣef menwala n yigḍaḍ i la nettmeslay tura, zun ɣef uzeggaɛbur, abuḥeddad, neɣ d imdukkal-is. Maca, wid i d-ijebbden awellih n medden d wid yuqan, icebḥen, i yeɣlayen daɣen. Ɣef waya, imi babaɣayu ur yezmir yiwen ad t-iqerreb skud leḥsab n wazal-is s yimelyan, rnu wiss ma ad tafeḍ deg-s ayen akk tessarameḍ, rran ihi medden ɣer yigḍaḍ nniḍen i ten-yettcabin, ma neẓra belli qqersen-d seg yiwet n twacult, ed umi ssawalen tibiracin (tipirucin). Ɣas ur d-ttsaraxent ameslay n umdan am babaɣayuyat, maca deg ccna ẓewrent ayendin, deg ccbaḥa n tfekka-nsent daɣen skanayent-d ayen i asent-ihewwun i wallen n umecṭuḥ ed umeqqran. «Acḥal nekk d arebbi deg-sent almi uɣaleɣ nnumeɣ-itent, ur zmireɣ ad idireɣ ma ulac-itent». Ay d-yenna yiwen n yilemẓi yettrebbi-ten. Ma yella d ssuma n yibirucen-a, temgerrad seg yiwen ɣer wayeḍ, seg tewtemt ɣer uwtem, maca tettemtuttul gar 1500 n yidinaren almi d 2500 n yidinaren i uqerruy. Skud ur yewɛir usker-nsen, imi sran kan i waman akked tgella-nsen i yettnuzun, xilla n medden ttwalin deg-sen tadfi (plaisir) ugar n uqeddic.
Mhenni Xalifi
Taddart n lḥemmam i yetabaԑen ɣer tɣiwant n at raced id-yezgan deg usammer n lwilayt n tubiret d yiwet n taddart yettwasnen s wakal-is yelhan i tfellaḥt imi imezdaɣ n taddart-a xeddmen tafellaḥt ,ɣas akka tettwasen s wannect-a yella wayen ixusen deg-s dayen iccuden ɣer lexsas n wallalen n tudert imi tettidir s waṭas iɣublan seg uɣbel ɣer wayeḍ , ɛlaḥsab iɣublan id-wekden imezdaɣ i uɣmis n yimaziɣen akken aɣbel ameqqran iten-icuɣben d tazeqqa n tujjya ( udawwi) imi ur sԑin ara anda ara d awwin imi tazeqqa yellan teɣlaq tiwwura-is azal n 10 yiseggasen-aya ar ass-a d wussan mazal-i-tt teɣlaq dayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n taddart-a ttafend iman nsen yesefk fell-asen ad ruḥen ɣer temnaḍin nniḍen iten- iqerben, imi ttruḥun ama d taɣiwant leqser iwakken ad sifsen liḥala ɣef umuḍin, si tama nniḍen wekden-d akken ayen yettnernin di leɛtab nsen lexsas n wallalen n usiwed dayen iweɛren ɣef twaculin ur yesɛin ara tikkeṛṛusin ilaq fell-asen kkeru n tkkeṛṛusin seg taddart nsen alami d sbiṭṭar n leqser s suma yettawḍen ɣer 500, 600 idinaren , ayaggi ur yeḥbis ara kan da imi aɣbel n lekwaɣeḍ yettkemmil ɣef yimezdaɣ iwakken ad d-yexdem yiwen lkaɣeḍ n leɛqed neɣ leԑmer neɣ ayen nniden ilaq ad iruḥ alami d taɣiwant n at raced , gar iɣublan nniḍen aman n tissit imi ttruḥen yal ass ,lgaz n temdint, ur sɛin ara annar n waddal ideg ara yuraren yilmeẓyen rnu ɣur-s tazeqqa n yidles, lexsas n trisiti n yiberdan i yeǧǧan tugdi ad teɣli fell-asen ladɣa deg ussan n tegrest , ula d inelmaden si tama nsen sḥisfen ɣef lmeḥna ideg llan imi rwan ula d nutni leԑtab sebba n lexsas n wallalen d lebɛed n tkubaniyin anda qqaren ladɣa wid yeqqaren berra n taddart ama d wid yettruḥen ama d tasnawit n leqser neɣ tasnawit at raced, llan daɣen wid yeqqren deg uɣerbaz alemmas i yellan deg assif n lexmis imi beɛden s waṭas ɣef taddart ttefɣen seg yixxamen tafejrit ur d-ttuɣalen alami d lxemsa n tmeddit, ayaggi akk d iɣublan iten-yettmagaren d wuguren iten-yeṭṭafaren yal ass di tudert nsen ,ɣef waya imezdaɣ n taddart nnan-d akken taddart nsen tettwaɛzel ,ɣer taggra imezdaɣ ssaramen seg yimḍebren n tɣiwant akken ad rren lwelha nsen ɣef liḥala ideg ttidiren s yiṣenfaren unegmu i lfayda n yimezdaɣ i yettwaɣen si yal tama d tifrat s lɛejlan am wayen yeԑnan tazeqqa n tujjya ,iwakken ad asen -sneqsen lmerta d lmeḥna iten-ixenqen.
Menas Abdelhak
Llan kra n yimdanen, nwan awi-d kan ad d-afen tifrat i wugur xas ulamma ad d-xelqen wayeḍ yugaren amezwaru-nni. Ɣur-sen, meɛlic d tayerza n ulɣum, ayen akk i d-yekrez ad t-yerkeḍ. D ṣṣaḥ, imdanen sḥassfen imi iberdan n tmurt ččuren d ammus, uɣalen d igudiyen mebla tilas. Aṭas i yettlummun wid-nni iḥebbsen s ṭunubilat ɣer tama n ubrid, tessen, syin ṭtaǧǧan tiqreɛtin dinna, ttembbabbayent ta ɣef ta alamma tewweḍ d taffa. Aya yettak udem n ddir i twennaṭ akked yimezdaɣ-is. Acu kan, ilaq ad iwali bnadem tidet s yiwet n tmuɣli, mačči s tneḥyaf neɣ s wuden n ddin kan. Ugur n wammus mačči d tamsalt n wid itessen kan, d tamsalt n yimezdaɣ akken ma llan. ‘’Wid itessen, ṭeggiren tiqreɛtin, wid yettẓallan, ṭeggiren iḍuman’’ i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umezdaɣ. Llan kra, ɣillen ufan-asen-d tifrat i wugur-a. Kkren ssan akk leryaf n ubrid d tiqreɛtin n lbirra i wakken ur ḥebbsent ara tkeryas dinna. Ɛlaḥsab-nsen, ma ur ḥbisent ara ur d-yettili ara uḍegger n teqreɛtin. Acu kan, ttun yiwet n lḥaǧa : d nutni i yeččuren rrif n ubrid s teqreɛtin, ayen icemten nezzeh iberdan. Ula d wid yebɣan ad ḥebsen ma yettuḥettem fell-asen, ur d-ttafen ara amek, ur d-ttafen ara ciṭ n umekkan ilem. Daymi qqaren : ’’ad yekkat aɣyul, ad yettdari taberda’’. Yerna, tifrat, tella ɣer tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel. Tella ɣer taddart n Zoubga akked Yigersafen d tiyaḍ-nniḍen. D imedayaten limer yella ‘’cit n ṣswab maḍi, maḍi’’.
Et puis, akken i as-yenna winna : ‘’Ḥemmleɣ tayri d waman ṣemmneḍ,
Ḥemmleɣ ajeǧǧig n tefsut,
Ḥemmleɣ lemwansa n tmeṭṭut.
I merde i win iruḥen,
Ɣer lgirra yegla s tefruyt.
Awit-d un coup, awit-d sin,
Di lxater n wid yemḥemmalen,
Di lxater n wid yessefruyen.
I merde i wid iruḥen,
Ɣer lgirra akken ad nɣen,
Ɣer lgirra akken ad mten.’’
Hocine.M
Ar tura, mazal ur nwala ara tira n tmaziɣt ɣef lebni n Lezzayer berra n tmurt n leqbayel. Wamag deg tmura taɛrabin, werǧin i tt-id-yewwi umeddaḥ deg teqsiṭ. Wissen, ahat, ad tt-arun, alebɛaḍ n wussan deg tmurt n Qurayc. Anwa ara tḥesbeḍ d gma-k ? D win i ak-yefkan azal, neɣ d win i yesneqsen deg lqima-k ? Imezwura-nneɣ, qqaren-d : ’’win i ak-ibeddlen s yibiw, beddel-it s yiclem’’. Deg Fransa, ugar n 10 n yiberdan i yettusemman s yisem n ucennay ameqqran Matoub d wiyaḍ. Aṭas n tiddukkliwin iwumi fkan afus n tallelt ameqqran i wakken ad qedcent ɣef yidles amaziɣ, gar-asent ‘’Agraw n Yimaziɣen’’. Aṭas n tesdawiyin, daɣen, i d-yelhan s unadi deg uḥric amaziɣ, am l’INALCO. Mačči d yiwet n tɣawsa ad tt-id-yader bnadem. Ula d tira n tmaziɣt fkan-as azal ameqqran imi uran yis-s ɣer tama n tutlayin-nniḍen deg yiwet n tfelwit n sbiṭer deg Paris : uran s tifinaɣ ‘’ansuf s yis-wen’’. Sbiṭer-a yella d aqdim n lqedma. Yefteḥ tiwwura-as ass 22 deg meɣres 1935 s yisem ‘’Hôpital franco-musulman de Paris. Yella i yimuḍan kan inselmen n la Seine. Deg tazwara, kra yellan d amuḍin deg sbitrat-nniḍen, ad t-id-awin, s ddreɛ, ɣer din. Deg useggas n 1978, yewwi isem ‘’Avicenne’’ s taɛrabt ‘’Ibn Sina’’ i yellan d amussnaw ineslem deg tujjya, tamedyazt akked uẓawan (musique).
Hocine.M </strong>
Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, taddart d taddart-ik a winnat. Xas tezgiḍ-d akkin i lebḥar, meɛna ‘’Tassa tamcumt’’, akken qqarent temɣarin-nneɣ, ur ak-tetthenni ara. ‘’Aẓar yettabaɛ tara’’ i as-nnan, diɣ, yimeɣnasen. Inzan-a, ad ten-naf s ttbut ɣer yiminigen iqbayliyen imi mazal-iten la seḥbibiren ɣef wassaɣen i ten-yezdin akked tudrin-nsen : tafekka-nsen dinna, ul d yiḥulfan da. Ihi, ula d iminigen n taddart n Tala Athmane ddan deg umecwar-a imi tiddukla-nsen ‘’TALA’’ iqeddcen deg Fransa tettɛawan, yal tikkelt, imezdaɣ n taddart-nsen deg yisenfaren i d-ssewjaden. Tikkelt-a, wwin-d arrazen imeqqranen i yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg ukayaḍ n uswir wis5 n uɣebaz amenzu ‘’Atmaten MOULA’’. Ɣef waya, dɣa, i fursen yimḍebbren n tiddukla n yimawlan tagnit i wakken ad d-heggin yiwen n temlilit anda i rran tajmilt i yinelmaden ifazen n uɣerbaz-a. Am yal tikkelt u tura tuɣal d tannumi, d tanelmadt Anais yettmeslayen 3 n tutlayin (Tamaziɣt, tarumit d taɛrabt) akken igerrez i iseddan leqdic n temlilit seg tazwara ar taggara. Am wakken, diɣ, tella temlilit-a d taswiɛt i yimḍebbren n taddart i wakken ad ṛeggmen(ad fken awal) tifrat i yal ugur i d-yettmagar uɣerbaz, ladɣa imi d imḍebber deg tɣiwant i t-id-yennan. Ma d aselway n tiddukla n yimawlan n yinelmaden, yessnemmer aṭas akk ixeddamen n uɣerbaz, ama d anemhal-is aqdim, ama d ajdid-a akked yiselmaden. Yesmekta-d, s yiseɣ, d akken snat n tnelmadin n uɣerbaz i d-yezgan gar tmezwura deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu s tezmilt : 9,90/10. Tigi d, BENKANOUN Tifinagh d HANNOUCHE Ines. Gar yiminigen i yellan deg temlilit, ad naf : Boumala Mourad d gma-s Rezzak, Moula Ramdane akked Ouanouche Yasser. Wigi, beggnen-d lferḥ-nsen imi i d-uɣalen ɣer umekkan anida ɣran yakan. Wehmen, daɣen, deg udem ajdid i yesɛa uɣerbaz-a akka tura. Yuɣal igerrez nezzeh ɣef wakken i d-nnan. Tekfa temlilit s tukci n warrazen i yinelmaden deg yiwet n tegnit n unecraḥ d lmakla n kra n tẓidanin. Ma d arrazen, zyada ɣef les télescopes i d-wwin yiminigen n taddart, tefka-d tenmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu idlisen i yinelmaden akken ma llan.
Hocine.M
Tala Amara, d taddart tameqqrant gar 17 n tudrin n tɣiwant n Tizi Rached, tezga-d ɣer tama n usamer n Tizi Uzzu, tebɛed fell-as s 15 n kilumitr. Zedɣen deg-s 2189 n yimdanen. Llant deg-s 5 n tliwa d ugar n 8 n yiḍwaren : Tileqqamin, Iwexliǧen, Tazrut, Tiɛerbiyin, Taqrabt n ugemmaḍ, Agni n Yisulan akked Tbelluḍt. Tesɛa sin yiɣerbazen : aɣerbaz amenzu d ulemmas, tesɛa axxam n yilmeẓyen, lbusṭa, axxam n usejji…atg
Isem n tala Amara
Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, mazal ur tefri s ttbut ɣef wansi i d-yekka wawal-agi ‘’Tala Amara’’. Nezmer ad d-nader 4 n turdiwin : tamezwarut, Tala Amara, bnan-tt iṭerkiyen deg useggas n 1690 ; tis snat, yekka-d wawal uddis Tala Amara seg Tala i iɛemmren imi teɛmer mačči am tliwa-niḍen ; tis tlata, d yiwen isem-is Amar U Yebrahim i iḍelben deg Yiṭurkiyen ad bnun tala-agi, dɣa, semman-as ɣef yisem-is ; ma d tis rebɛa, nnan-d d yiwen urgaz isem-is Amara i d-tenfa yemma-s iwumi qqaren ‘’Taɛbiṭ’’ netta akked gma-s Athmane seg tama-agi n Tamda imi xedmen tawaɣit. I wakken ad asen-semḥen u ad xelṣen tucḍiwin-nsen imi ulac leḥbus deg tmurt n leqbayel, ilaq ad d-afen tiliwa. Yal yiwen yufa-d tala, tettusemma ɣef yisem-is : Tala Amara, Tala Athmane.
Imezwura ɣer Tala Amara.
Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Youcef Yefsah, tiwaculin timezwura ɣer Tala Amara d Yefsah akked Seklaoui. Acu kan llan wid i d-yennan d akken tawacult tamezwarut d Rakem, akka i d-yeffeɣ deg temlilit n tezrawt i d-ihegga uxxam n yilmeẓyen n Tala Amara.
Amezruy d tmetti n Tala Amara.
Taddart n Tala Amara, d taddart i d-yufraren seg yal tama n tmetti : ama seg tama n tdamsa, idles neɣ tafellaḥt. Tettuneḥsab d amuggar n tudrin : ttemlilin-d yimsebriden deg-s mi ara ttɛeddayen ɣer yixxamen-nsen neɣ ara qessden adrar i uḥewwes. Tuli ɣef lebḥar, neɣ ɛlayet s wazal n 300 n lmitrat. Tettwassen aṭas s uneɣmas n tilibizyu Smail Yefsah i yettwanɣan ass 18 deg tuber 1993 deg Bab-Ezouar. Am wakken ttetwassen, diɣ, s lǧameɛ-is i yebnan s yizamulen n yimaziɣen. Yesɛa, aṭas n ziyyar umekkan-agi. Deg tlemmast n taddart, tella yiwet n teẓrut iwumi qqaren ‘’Taẓrut n lfatiḥa’’. Taẓrut-a, yal wa d taqṣiṭ i d-yettawi fell-as : llan kra qqaren-d d akken d Ccix i yeɣran lfatiḥa deg umekkan-agi asmi i yemsefraq akked yiwet n terbaɛt n ziyyar iwumi yefra ugur-nsen. Ma d wiyaḍ, qqaren-d d akken aẓru-a, yeɣli-d seg yigenni (météorite) deg useggas 1770. Aẓru-a, yemxalaf mliḥ ɣef wid n lqaɛa, ayen yeǧǧan amur ameqqran n yimezdaɣ ad amnen s turda-agi taneggarut. Kran n yisalifiyen, bɣan ad t-rẓen imi tettẓuren medden u ssaɣayen fell-as ticemmuɛin, cwi kan ur ṣsawḍen ara ɣer lebɣi-nsen imi i asen-tugi taddart ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen yimḍebber n taddart. Mechuret, daɣen, taddart n Tala Amara s’’Tqerrubt n Useklawi’’(Deg-s lemqam, deg-s timeqqbert) akked ‘’Taxxamt n lǧir’’ i ttẓuren yimdanen s waṭas. Am wakken mazal ar tura ‘’Lǧameɛ n ṭṭelba’’ anda qqaren zik ṭṭelba u sɣaren deg-s Yirumyen deg lgirra-nni. Ɣer tama n lǧameɛ-a, yella yiwen uxxam aqdim yegrarben i yezdeɣ lɛesker n fransa anda yella ar tura lefḥem ‘’le charbon’’ n useggas 1957. Deg Tala Amara i teḍra tfaska tamezwarut taɣelnawt n umezgun, aseggas 1998.
Kra n wudmawen n Tala Amara.d aneɣmas deg tilibizyu tazzayrit (1987-1993). Ilul ass n, 29 deg tuber 1962, nɣan-t ass n 18 deg tuber 1993 ɣef 8 n ṣbeḥ, 39 n wussan mebɛed zwaǧ-is. Sidi Hend Aseklaoui :</strong> d amrabeḍ n taddart. Mazal ar tura ttẓurun ‘’Taqerrubt n Useklawi’’. Nnan-d yenfa ɣer tmurt n Suriya imi ur iɛedda ara wawal-is deg temlilit-nni n Meqleɛ asmi mlalen ‘’Sḥab n ṭnac’’, imeqqranen n tmurt n leqbayel i wakken ad kksen lewrata i tmeṭṭut akken ur ttewraten ara Iṭerkiyen i yettaɣen tiqbayliyen ḥala ɣef lǧal n wakal.Amar Ouyacoub :</strong> yettwassnen aṭas deg radyu tis snat s tmezgunin-is. Yurar netta d Jean Gabin deg yiwen n usaru. Yesɛa ugar n 1000 n tmezgunin timecṭaḥ, yurar deg 90 n yisura. Ilul Amar Ouyacoub deg Tala Amara, isem-agi Ouyacoub mačči imi n Wat Yaqub. Nnan-d d isem n zyada. Yella yettrebbi uccen, yettawi-t ɣer lexla mi ara iruḥ ad yeks. Iwala-t-id yiwen, dɣa yenna-as :</strong> ‘’Amar akked yaqub, meḥsub Amar akked wuccen. Syin ṭṭfen-as-t’’Amar Ouyacoub’’.Abelkader d Abederrahmane Yefsah :</strong> d imyura. Gar wayen yura Abderrahmane, ad naf : ‘’…et Cain tua Abel, 2012 i yewwin arraz wis sin n Taher Djaout, ma d adlis wis sin i d-yefɣen ɣef demma n usmekti n tmettant n gma-s Smail, isemma-as ‘’Souvients-toi, O Algérie, de Smail et de tous les autres’’Koceila Hamadini :</strong> yewwi talɣuɣa n tefriqt deg lkarati (Karaté).Lyes Izri : </strong>amyurar i yellan ɣer terbaɛt n JSK. Yekker-d akka tura mgal uselway n JSK, Hannachi.Ramdane Chibani : </strong>d amedyaz n taddart.Mebla ma nettu snat n tlawin yettdawin imuḍan s leḥcawec i yesɛan ccan d ameqqran,ɣef wakken d-nnan.
<span style="white-space: pre;"> 
Hocine.M
Am waɣiren merra n tmurt, aṭas n tdukkliwin i d-yennulfan deg Bgayet deg yiseggasen ineggura ; d ayen i mu nessawal amussu asduklan (mouvement associatif). Tal tidukkla amek tqeddec, tal yiwet deg wanwa aḥric i tefren ad d-tbin. Skanayent-d dɣa iqeddicen igerrzen, daha ed dihin, deg teɣzi n useggas, i ubaɣur n yimdanen s umata. Seg tdukkliwin-a aṭas i yellan, ɣas mačči kifkif i ttḥerrikent; imi llant ttxussunt deg wallalen, tiyaḍ deg tedrimt, tiyaḍ deg ufus, tiyaḍ nniḍen deg lebɣi idumen. Ma nemmeslay-d kan akka ɣef kra n tdukkliwin i d-ibanen xilla aseggas-a deg wannar-a n leqdic alsan (humanitaire), neɣ xersum i neẓra nekni, war ma nga leḥsab alqayan. Yettusemma neẓra ad ilint tidak i nettu. Ad d-nini kan tga ayen igerrzen Tdukkla n Ugezdu n Tujjya n Tesdawit n Bgayet (AFMB) s teɣlamt tasnujjyant i txeddem i tɣiwanin, akked tigawin nniḍen i txeddem i yimuḍan. Tidukkla i Yimeɛḍar ed Yimuḍan Idumen «Tiɣri», tga ula d nettat daɣen ddeqs n warmuden ar tura segmi d-tennulfa deg tlemmast n useggas-a. Iɛeggalen-is d wid ixedmen ccɣel yelhan ama deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel neɣ berra-yis. Tidukkla n Yimuḍan n Tgeltemt (DEFI) n Tezmalt tɛerreḍ daɣen ad d-terr yella wayen ur nelli, i lfayda n wid mu yekkes waṭṭan tikli. Am tirzi n tukksa ɣef lxaṭer i Uweqqas, i yettwassudsen deg unebdu yezrin. Tidukkliwin i iqeddcen ɣef yimuḍan n uqerruy, aṭas daɣen i yettazzalen da ed din, snulfuyent-asen-d kra n tegnatin n ucmummeḥ, am DEFI n Uweqqas, Tidukkla n yimuḍan n uqerruy n Bgayet, akked tin «Taɣect n Ugrud», ed tiyaḍ… Amḍan-a i d-nebder d kra seg-sent kan, wamma neẓra caḍent tdukkliwin i yettarran ddhen-nsent i wid ixussen ed wid yuḍnen. Ad yessirem kan umdan ad idum waya!
M. X.
D lewhayem! mazal ar ass-a timetti-nneɣ tettwali aṭṭan-agi n sida d ucenna neɣ d aṭabu ɣas ulamma aṭṭanen i merra tettmeslay fell-asen, ula d aṭṭan-nni n lkunsir tekkes-as awal-nni: ad aɣ-yenju rebbi yenju lmumnin! yettɣid win ara ihelken di tmurt-nneɣ ,imi si tazwara iban kan ad yettuxeṭṭi ama sɣur medden ama sɣur-s, waya ad t-ncudd qbala ar nekkni ur nezri tidet n waṭṭan-a n abribus n VIH i yuɣalen ass-a seg waṭṭanen yezgan s dwawi d-snulfant tmura yeddan d wamek yettanṭaḍ imi nekkni ɣur-neɣ ma nemmeslay d win ihelken ad aɣ-yenṭeḍ,ma neḍsa-as ad aɣ-yenṭeḍ?dɣa ma nemsalam yid-s tenger fell-aɣ, Xaṭi!abirus n VIH yettanṭad s tuzzuft (sexualité ),s tsegnatin-nni yettwasnen deg uksum n win yuḍnen,ula ljerḥ amectuḥ yezmer ad as-yili d tawwurt i ubirus-a ma yemlal yid-s war ma nettu tyemmat t-issenṭaḍen i mmi-s ama di tadist neɣ s usuṭṭeḍ. Deg useggas n 2014 iban-d wazal n36,9 n yimelyan n wid ihelken sida maca mačči d leḥsab iseḥḥan imi aṭas n wid iteffren leḥlak-nsen, Dɣa ma nesteqsa acimi? tiririt tban kan imi s yes i d-nebda ameslay d acu kan imi nekkni nettwali ala s yir tiṭ , mi nesla s walbaɛd ihlek neqqar-as yekcem iberdan -nni n yir tuzzuft war ma nezra d acu n sebba s tidet imi yezmer ad tili d ayen nniḍen s wakka nettkemmil i taluft am wakken i as-yettkemmil win yuḍnen imi sida ur d-yettban ara s amdan arma f kant 7 ar 10 n yiseggasen d asawen bexlaf ccirat-nni timeẓyanin ur nettawi lewhi ɣur-s d ayen ara t-yeǧǧen ad yezzuzur deg ubirus -agi. D acu kan ayen yessewhamen imnadiyen d tamurt-a tageswaḥt tineslemt akk d tid i tt-icuban anda tuzzuft d leḥram ma teffeɣ i lɛada n zwaj meɛna mazal yettnerni sida deg-s! u acimi ur d-tettili ara tikci n yiḥaraben (préservatifs ) baṭel am wakken xeddment tmura irebḥen? i wakken ad nessenɣes talilit n waṭṭan-agi icudden deg ugar 80% n tikkwal ar tuzzuft.
Salima.D
‘’Tidderwect n Wat Uẓeffun, d taẓuri anda-nniḍen’’. Azeffoun, d taddart taqdimt i d-yezgan deg tewrirt, ɛlayet ɣef lebḥar s 465 n lmitrat. Mazal ar ass-a tewwi isem-agi. Ma d tamdint yettusemman akka tura ‘’Azeffoun’’ u d taɣiwant n 51 n tudrin, d Fransa i tt-yebnan deg yiseggasen n 1870. Tsemma-as ‘’Port-Gueydon’’ d tajmilt i l’amiral Comte Louis Henri de Gueydon. Taddart-a ɣef wageg ad d-nawi awal, tebna s ufella n later n Ṛruman. Imir-nni, qqaren-as ‘’Ruzazus’’ (Grand Cap). Uqbel, ḥerran-tt Ifniqeyyen. Syin, yekcem-itt-id Ṛruman. Ar tura, later-nni mazal yettmenṭar u yettengar seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ: ur yelli win i d-iceɣlen deg-s. Seg tama-nniḍen, ur tezmireḍ ara ad d-taddreḍ Azeffoun mebla ma txemmeḍ ɣer kra n wudmawen, yecban: Didouche, El Anka, Iguerbouchène,Issiakhem, Djaout, Fellag, Lalmas, Hilmi d waṭas-nniḍen. Ɣef sser n wanect-a, daɣen, ara d-nawi awal. Azeffoun mačči d lebḥar kan deg unebdu. Azeffoun yesdukkel amezruy d tmucuha, cbaḥa d iberḥriyen.
Takerḍa n taddart.Tezga-d taddart-a deg tewrirt. Tetabaɛ lɛerc n Yibeḥriyen. Tebɛed ɣef lebḥar s 7 n kilumitr. Ɛlayet fell-as s 465 n lmitrat. Tebɛed ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu s 65 n kilumitr, ma ɣef Bgayet s 82n kilumitr. Amur ameqqran n yixxamen-is d iqdimen, bnan s uẓru, seqfen s lqermud. Iberdan, daxel n taddart, d izenqan, ur hrawit ara. Yal tama, ad temmagreḍ later n Ṛruman, am lḥemmam, tasebbalt n waman, lɣiran, iqudas d tregwa n waman…atg Ur yelli d acu tesɛa taddart-a. Ulac ula d aɣerbaz amenzu. Leḥḥun warraw-nsen ugar n 5 n kilumitr i wakken ad awḍen ɣer yiwen uɣerbaz i cerken nutni d 4 n tudrin-nniḍen. Ula d tiddukla tadelsant ‘’Tigemmi’’ i d-yelhan s tkurmit n later (aseḥbiber) teḥbes seg useggas n 1998.Tesɛa taddart 4 n yiderma: At Ḥewali, At Ramḍan, Ijanaten akked Iqejuɛen. Ɣur-s tilisa akked Iḥemziwen seg usamar, At Rhuna seg umalu, Lebḥar seg ugafa d Tidmimin seg unẓul. Zik, tesɛa taddart tlata n tiwwura. Ur tezmireḍ ara ad d-tkecmeḍ ɣur-s ma yella ur d-tekkiḍ ara seg yiwet n tiwwura-a: Tawwurt n temdint, Tawwurt n Ɛisa d Tewwurt n usiweḍ. Azeffoun (taɣiwant), tesɛa 500 n yimeɣras n 1871 (Ccix Aḥeddad) akked 716 n yimeɣras n lgirra 1954-1962.
Isem ‘’Azeffoun’’.Isem Azeffoun, yal wa uɣur i t-yeqqen. Llan kra qqaren-d awal Azeffoun, qqaren-t s tmeslayt tatergit i umekkan anda yettnejmaɛ waḍu. S tcelḥit, ad t-naf d taseǧǧigt neɣ d islem (La langouste). Ma d wiyaḍ, nnan-d yekka-d seg wawal ‘’Uzzaf’’, d tawrirt iɛezlen. Wwḍen armi i qqnen awal Azeffoun ɣer taɛrabt, nnan-d yekka-d seg ‘’Ɛaazifun’’, meḥsub wid yekkaten agambar. Ula d acennay El Ankis, d wa i d rraw-is. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Amar Aridj, aselway n tiddukla ‘’Tigemmi’’. Imezwura ɣer taddart d Ifiniqeyyen, semman-as ‘’Ressirin’’. Syin d Ṛruman , semman-as ‘’Ruzuzus’’ (Zus=Grand, Ruz=cap). Tettwabna deg 200 n yiseggasen uqbel talallit n¨ Ɛissa. Gar useggas n 248 d 251, yella yeḥkem-itt Decius. Ad t-naf deg ( Comptes kabyles n Camille Lacoste Dujardin)Ma d tamdint n tura yellan ɣer rrif n lebḥar i yewwin ula d nettat isem-agi ‘’Azeffoun’’, tebna-tt Fransa deg yiseggasen-nni 1870. Tsemma-as ‘’Port-Gueydon’’, d tajmilt i l’amiral Comte Louis Henri de Gueydon. Llant ttidirent deg-s 367 n twaculin n yirumyen, Iṭelyanen d Isbenyulen, 24 n twaculin n wudayen d 7 n twaculin n yiqbayliyen.
Amezruy d tmetti.Qqaren ɣef yimdanen n tama-nni: ’’lɣaci, ḍeɛfen, tamurt, teḥma.’’ Meḥsub tesɛa daɛwessu. Taddart-agi teččur d later n Ṛruman, ǧǧan-t kan akken mehmel. Ur yelli yemḍebber i d-yelhan s tkumit-is, ur yelli win yeqqaren hemma i usdergel-is. Ula d tiddukla tadelsant ‘’Tigemmi’’ i d-ilulen ɣef lǧal n waya, tebra i ṭṭbel deg waman imi ur tufi ara afus n tallelt ɣer wid teɛna temsalt. Akka ara reqqen yisebtar n umezruy sdat wallen n yimdanen mebla ma ẓzlen-d afus-nsen i wakken ad tt-sensen. Dayen ur iqebbel leɛqel. ‘’Iṣurdiyen iqdimen d leḥwal i d-ǧǧan yimezwura, ama d Ṛruman, Ifiniqyen neɣ leqbayel, ttwabeddlen-d s yigerra n duxxan, zik asmi nmeẓẓi. S yiẓra-nni n later swayes i nekkat lmal neɣ iqejjan’’ i aɣ-d-yenna Mass Aridj. ‘’Deg yiseggasen-nni n 1990, mi d-nexleq tiddukla ‘’Tigemmi’’, nufa-d yiwen umekkan yeččur d icbula. Mi d-nufa amezwaru, nugad ad yerrez. Ur nessin ara amek ara t-id-nessekfel. D ameqqran, nekcem deg-s deg tlata yid-neɣ. Ihi, nessawel i wid teɛna temsalt. Nettraǧǧu, nettraǧu, ulac. Syin, negzem-itt deg rray: nexdem ticemlit, nerra-ten akken llan. Nerra-asen tidima-nsen, nerra-asen akal, uɣalen akken llan. Mazal-iten ar tura deg umekkan-nni. Ur yelli win i d-inudan.’’ Ikemmel yenna-d Mass Amar Aridj.
Lḥemmam n Ṛruman.Ar tura mazal kra n leḥyuḍ-is ttwabedden. Mazal tasebbalt-nni d tregwa ansi i d-ttruḥun waman ɣur-s. Nnan-d ttruḥun-d tlata n leṣnaf n waman: isemmaḍen, wid yemmuzeɣlen akked yiḥmayanen. Xedmen ttawil i wanect-a. Ṛruman, ḥemmlen asteɛfu akked lḥemmamat.
Imɣi ‘’Tajrumit’’ akked Ṛruman.  S kra n wanda i yella yimɣi-agi n tejrumit, ḥṣuk-id ɛeddan syin Ṛruman. Acuɣer?Nnan-d d akken xeddmen yis-s aṭas n leṣnaf n tissit, ladɣa, Ricard. Nesteqsa ɣef wamek i t-xeddmen, ur d-nufi ara tiririt. Tessen-tt, diɣ, am latay d ddwa neɣ i uqraḥ n uɛrur.
Lǧameɛ lekbir.Lǧameɛ-agi, yebna-t winna yebnan lǧameɛ lekbir n Lezzayer tamanaɣt akked winna n Bgayet. Acu kan, taqubbet n wagi, tesqef s uqerrum. Ala netta i yellan deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Asmi i tella Fransa deg taddart-a (1958), tesseqdec taqubet-a, d taɛessast imi tzemreḍ ad twaliḍ ɣer yal tama.
Lǧameɛ n Sidi Abderrahmane Bnu Djaffer (Sidi Abdellah).Timeqqbert n taddart-a, tettusemma ɣef umrabeḍ-a. Ɣef wakken yura deg lǧameɛ-a, yusa-d deg lqern wis 9. Ibeddel isem-is, yuɣal Sidi Abdellah, i wakken ad yessedreg iman-is. Nnan-d yettwanṭel deg yiwen umekkan, syin azekka-nni, ufan-d aẓekka-s deg umekkan-agi n tmeqqbert anda i as-gan taqubbet. Ḥekkun-d, diɣ, ɣef wasmi xedmen lembat (asensi) deg tqubbet-agi, nnan-d nawlen seksu s uksum. Acu kan, ass-nni lɣaci yusa-d s waṭas. Ur d-tekfi ara lmakla. Iruḥ yiwen ɣer daxel n tqubbet u yenna-as i yiwen: ‘’ha-t-an netwakcef, tekfa lmakla.’’. Winna, yerra-as-d:’’ruḥ awi-yi-d snat n tḍebsiyin tilmawin, yiwet anda rran aksum, tayeḍ anda yella seksu.’’ Yewwi-tent-id winna. Akken i tent-yerra ɣer umekkan anda nawlen, uɣalent ččurent-d leǧfun.
Ṣelṭan akked yelli-s.Nnan-d ṣelṭan n taddart-agi yesɛa kan yiwet n yelli-s. Ihi, i wakken ad tt-yefk, yecreḍ d akken argaz i yebɣan ad tt-yaɣ, ad yexdem ayen yessewhamen. Kkren sin mecqarwen gar-asen: yiwen yenna-as, ad ak-d-ssaliɣ aman seg lebḥar s tɣunam, wayeḍ yenna-as, ad ak-d-awiɣ aman seg Temgudt, azal n 50 n kilumitr. Kkren bdan lecɣal-nsen. Iɛedda lweqt, winna i d-yewwin aman seg Temgudt, yebda la d-yettqarrib. Ihi, yekker winna n tɣunam, isekker ahraḥu deg taddart am wakken dayen yessaweḍ-d aman. Mi yesla winna-nniḍen, dɣa, yeḥbes. Acu kan, yelli-s n ṣelṭan ur tt-yuɣ yiwen. Tenɣa iman-is. Wissen ayen ?
Taqṣiṭ n umcic d ubehlul.Mi nerza ɣer tmeqqbert-nni n taddart, nufa azal n 25 n yiẓekwan n yiwet n twacult meḍlen deg yiwen umekkan, weḥd-sen. Nesteqsa, nnan-aɣ-d taqṣiṭ-a. Ur d-nettader ara isem n twacult. Tella yiwet n twacult, tedda d Fransa. Iɛeggalen-is, zgan tteḥqaren yiwen akken ubehlul. Anda i t-id-mmugren, ad ttmesxiren yis-s. Armi d yiwen wass, yerfed-d amcic, iḍegger-it s ufella n sqef n yiwen uxxam u yenna-as: ‘’ur d-tettṣubbuḍ ara syin alamma mmuten akken ma llan iɛeggalen n twacult-a.’’ Syin, ttmettaten yiwen, yiwen.
Kra n wudmawen.Mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin i yellan d anaẓur ameqqran n tama-agi. Nebɣa ad nẓer sser n waya. Yenna-d Mass Amar Aridj, yella ɣur-i, yerna mačči sser, ha-t-aya: ‘’ ihi, ad d-greɣ tiɣri i wid yebɣan ad uɣalen d inaẓuren imeqqranen, ad d-rzun ɣur-neɣ seg 24 duǧember i wakken ad sɛeddin yid-neɣ 40 n yussan n lyali. Agemmuḍ d yiswi, yettwaḍman. Deg lyali-a, llan 40 wussan, ferqen ɣef sin. 20 wussan, llant tcebḥanin n wass, llant tberkanin n yiḍ. Syin, 20 wussan-nniḍen, llant tberkanin n wass, tcebḥanin n yiḍ. Agu, ur tettwaliḍ ara sdat-k. Ad tefɣeḍ deg leɛqel-ik. Nuɣal akk d iderwicen. Acu kan, tidderwect n da, d taẓuri anda-nniḍen. Inaẓuren-agi akk imeqqranen, fɣen lawan n lyali-agi. Syin, s kra n win ara d-yuɣalen, leqrar-is deg Lwed Ɛisi.’’
Tamedyazt d tsekla :  Tahar Djaout, Bachir Hadj Ali, Med Aouine.Aẓawan : Boudjemaâ El Ankis, El Hadj El Anka, Mohand Iguerbouchène, Meziane Rachid, Boualem Chaker, Med Allaoua.Amezgun d Sinima : Rouiched, Fellag, Said d Med Hilmi, Med Ifticène.Addal : Lalmas, Younes Ifticène.Taklut: M’hamed Issiakhem.Lgirra n 1954: Didouche Mourad, Yacef Saâdi, Taleb Abderrahmane, Ourida Meddad, Capitaine Si Abdellah.Ddin : Chikh Mohand Ouamer (Sadou).Deg taggara, ad snemreɣ ameddakkel Kader Belaidi, Amar Aridj, aselway n tiddukla ‘’Tigemmi’’ d Ali Bekacemi. Tanemmirt, daɣen, i Nacer Oukacha.
<span style="white-space: pre;"> 
Hocine.M
Ɣer tama n rreḥba t-is snat n ssuq ( foire) n zzit n uzemmur id yellan deg Tizi-Wezzu zdat n teḥnayt n uxxam n tɣiwant aqbur si 15 ɣer 22 deg aggur n meɣres s ddemma n umezday n tfellaḥt n Tizi Wezzu , axxam n tannuzt n Tizi-Wezzu, axxam n tinzi( artisanat) n Tizi Wezzu akked usqamu n Lwilaya n Tizi- Wezzu , tella-d gar-nneɣ akked Mass Dahmane Cherif asefrak( gérant) n tkwebbanit taciṭa n tzemmurt ( branche d’olivier) yesɛan adeg( siège/site) deg At Jennad timlillit -agi deg id newwi awal ɣef lɣella n uzemmur akked iɣeblan icudden ɣer tanafrast( production) n zit n uzemmur deg tmurt n Leqbayel.
Amek i d-yufa iman-is Mass Dahmane Cherif deg uḥric-agi n taafrast n zzit n uzemmur?</strong>Tisin-iw ɣer uḥric-agi n tfellaḥt yesɛan azal meqqren ur d-yelli ara s ugacur imi aya werteɣ-t ɣef imawlan-iw yellan deg unnar-agi si zik n zik. Lejdud-iw xedmen deg uzemmur seg useggas 1830 ɣer ass-a n wussan. Zik s wudem aqbur (lemɛinṣrat tiqdimin) nekni tura nerna-d allalen atraren akked d tmuɣli tadamsant ɣer cɣel-agi. Nekni nella seg imezwura i d-skecmen timacinin timaynutin yeɛnan afres ( production ) n zzit n uzemmur , am akken d nekni id imezwura i inudan as-fkan udem atrar s tawil n timmumit-ines(mise en bouteille ) ddaw ticreṭ( marquee/ label).
Sani tessaweḍ tanafrast n zzit uzemmur taggara-agi?S umata yuɣal-d wazal i lɣella n zzit n uzemmur, a sbedd-i rreḥba yecban tagi ( tafeska n zzit n uzemmur) akked izumal n yemdanen id rezzun akken ad walin acu id nhegga d yiwen walɣuɣ id yessebganen amek terza taluft lɣaci. Tamsalt tella-asen deg ul. Akken simmal ad tt-nerni lqima n zzit uzemmur ilaq ad ddukklen iɣallen, acku zzit n uzemmur d yiwen uferdis di tdamsa i zemren ad yawi aṭas n reẓq i tmurt wakali…
Awal d kečč i t-id yenan s timmad-ik, tadamsa. Meɛna nekni nettwali d akken di tmurt-nneɣ ulac win srebḥent tizemrin-ines. Acu id ssebban waya ?Ayen yeǧǧan , di tmurt n leqbayel, ur serbaḥent-ara tizemrin bab-nsen-t d imdebṛen( isekf ad nini imdegren) terza taluft n tfellaḥt, imi lqidaṛ deg ara ldin tiwwura i uɣellet n ṣṣenf agi n tfellaḥt s wudem atrar, nitni zgant d iɛakkir mgal a mteddu-ines deg ubrid n yimal. Nekni yellan deg annar mačči d yiwen ugur id nettmagar akken lɣella-nneɣ a tesɛu ticreṭ-ines( label) s w acu ara ttettwassen akked d taɣra-ines ( qualité) s wacu ara tettweɛqel. Ilaq a n ẓẓer belli lbenna n zzit ur teɛdil ara si tama ɣer tayeḍ. Amedya zzit n At jennad yesɛa ṛṛuḥ-is, win n At Ɛabbas daɣen… Ɣef aya iswi-nneɣ ad nessiweḍ ad tuɣal zzit deg tiqraɛtin s lqaleb-nsen-t , s ticret-nsen akken yal zzit yellan ad tufrar, a tt-ṭṭef amkan-is di ssuq aɣelnaw , yerna ( ayen ala?) a tt-namer zzit n tmura nniḍen di ssuq agraɣlan.
Si melmi i tebda takwabbanit- -nwen leqdic-agi? Nebda cɣel-agi n usiǧǧew n zzit s wudem atrar dge useggas n 1987. Nniqal negga ṛṛeḥba di temdint n Freha. Tura ɣer-nneɣ qrib 20 isaggsen deg abrid-agi. Lebɣi-nneɣ d amek ara s nner azal i lɣella-agi, ad teffeɣ seg udem-is aqbur neɣ amensay (traditionnel) akken as nelli abrid ɣer tannuzt tagraɣlant (commerce international). S w akka ara tenerni tafarest (production) n zzit yerna ad tawi lfayda i wid is yellan di lmendad( imawlan n tizemrin akked imawlan n lemɛinsrat d wid yettarran zzit ɣer tiqerɛunin).
Wissen dɣa ṛṛeḥba am tagi id yellan dag-i deg Tizi-Wezzu ma teskfa i wakken ad terr azal i lɣella n zzit n uzemmur…amek id abrid akken a naweḍ ɣer iswiyen-agi id bedreḍ.. Yella ssuq n daxel , win n tmurt .. timliliyin am t-igi ilaq ad ɛumen-t akken a nḥaz yal tama di tmurt. Akken medden ad ferzen gar leṣnaf n zzit yellan.Aya di tazwara. Sin akkin ilaq daɣen a nekcem rreḥbat tigraɣlalin akken leǧnas nniḍen ad isinen azemmur–nneɣ, zzit n tmurt-nneɣ. Nekni s tkwabanit-nneɣ nekcem yekka di leqdic-agi usefhem akked usbuceɛ. Nettikki deg acḥal n tfaskiwin yecqan zzit n uzemmur ama di Tunes , Fṛansa, Lmaruk…Meɛna a ttikki –agi yella kan s tawil-nneɣ , s tezmert n yiman-nneɣ, ulac asnnad sɣuṛ imdebran n tfellaḥt akken ad nufrar amek ilaq di rreḥbat-agi tigraɣlanin anda la “conccurence” teǧǧhed mačči d izli.. acu ara d yexdem yiwen weḥdes zdat n tkwabaniyin n ṭalyen neɣ n Fṛansa…? S tewzzel n wawal zzit-nneɣ tesɛa lbenna ines i tt-yessemxalfen ɣef tiyaḍ.. lemmer le CALPRF ad yefk afus n talelt nezmer u leqrar a n ssiǧǧew lɣella –agi ɣer beṛṛa n tmurt akken ad terfed tadamsa, yerna ad tt-serbeḥ imawlan n tizemrin …
Tineggura-agi nettwali aṭas n iffelaḥen id yezzin ɣer uzzu n tizemrin, maca ṭṭaqqa seg-sen qqaren d akken tizemrin-agi n uzzu ur t idiren-t- ara aṭas..acu id ssebba ?Ayen ilaq a nẓer d akken tizemrin agi n uzzu d aneqqel. Mačči d tinaṣliyin. Mi ara d nekks neqla akken a sen iwɛed amkan ur d iteddu ara ixf n uẓar n tejra. Ixf n uẓar-agi uẓar d netta i yeqqazen s talqay deg akal akken ad ijab aman. ɣef aya ur yettiɣzif ara lɛamur-nsen-t. Lemmer id ak terbiḥ ay ul tili d tiẓebjin tinaṣliyin ara yettwaleqmen . Tidak sɛant aẓar d anaṣli, ttidiren d leqrun.
Amek ara s nneg udem amguran ( industriel) i senɛa agi n zzit uzemmur ?Ilaq zzit ad tettejmaɛ ɣer yiwen umkan anda ara yuɣal ddaw yiwet n ticret( label). Sin akkin ilaq ad ɛummen imeḍqan n uzenzi i w akken ɛad ad yewweḍ ɣer tiḥuna timecṭaḥ neɣ tiḥuna timeqqranin ( grandes surfaces). Simmal ɛumment tikwabaniyin yesɛan label-nsen, simmal yettili-d u mzizzel, ɛaned gar-asent? d tismin-agi ara s yeggan azal i zzit ad acku amsaɣ ad yesɛu nnuba lextyar gra lmarka-agi akked d tihin. Ilaq zzit, am yal aferdis i keččmen ɣer ssuq, ad yekcem deg urar n “lbɛi u cra” . D ssuq ara iḥekmen mačči d-isemṣaren.
Ugur nniḍen tettmaggar tafellaḥt –agi n uzemmur tizemmrin ur ttarwent-ara yal aseggas…Aya icudd ɣef lxedma n w akal, afras n tizemrin. Nekni di tmurt n leqbayel nefres tizemrin lawan n ulqad.. xuḍi afras n tizemrin isefk ad yili deg aggur n Meɣres akkin d asawen…
Awal aneggaru i yimeɣṛiyen-nneɣ ?Ilaq d lawan akken yal yiwen ad iẓer belli zzit n uzemmur ma yella yettwexdem s lmul, deg-s lfayda tameqqrant i bab-is, i tmurt( tadamsa n tmurt). Ass-a zzit n uzemmur d yiwen usafar yesɛayicen timura s lekmal ( am Surya , Tunes) ayen ɣer-nneɣ nekni ala? Ɣef aya ilaq as nner azal, ad naf iberdan amek zzit n tmurt-nneɣ a teɣzu leswaq ibeṛṛaniyen , ur telli-ara kan d lɣella n at wexxam..
Ait Slimane Hamid
Twekded tneɣaft n ttrebga taɣenawt ahil n ikayaden uḥric wis kraḍ umbaɛd aqeɛed i texddem tneɣlaft ttrebga nuriya ben ɣebrit d akken ad bdun seg ayyur agi ideg i nella 15 si maggu deg yiswiren yemxalafen ama deg iɣbazen (amenzu ,alemmas , tasnawit ) , aqeɛed-agi i tesbed tneɣlaft ttrebga yussa-d umbaɛd aṭas n tmesbaniyin i xeddmen inelmaden n lwilayat unẓul n tmurt mi yella ayagi deg ayyur n remḍan yunyu , anda inelmaden-a ssuturen si ben ɣebrit awexer n yikayaden acku lwilayat n unẓul ttwasnent s lḥuman qessiḥen , dayen yeǧǧan taneɣlaft n ttrebga ad tbeddel rray terrat ɣer 15 mayyu meḥsub aswir 1 ,2 , 3 ,4 deg uɣerbaz amenzu , ma yella d aswir 1, 2 ,3 deg uɣerbaz alemmas ma d 1,2 di tesnawit , Ma yella d ikayaden useldem ad bdun si 12 yunyu imi d tagnit ara farṣen yinelmaden . Ma yella d ikayaden n taggar yemxalafen am wayen ye3nan akayad n taggara deg uɣerbaz amenzu ad yili 22 may , akayad n taggara aswir wis 4 deg uɣerbaz alemmas ad yebdu si 24 ɣer 26 may , ma d akayad n taggara di tesnawit ( BAC ) ad yebdu si 29 may ad ikemmel di 02 yunyu umbaɛd ad bdun imuras unebdu si 07 yulyu , am wakken ad tilli tuɣalin ɣer uɣerbaz aseggas ajdid ( 2016-2017 ) deg ass n tlata 30 ɣuct i yixeddamen d wid ixeddmen di tedbelt , 01 september ttuɣalin lecyax d yiselmaden , ma yella d arrac ad uɣallen ass n lḥed 04 september , ihi abeddel -agi deg ahil n yikayaden yella-d ɣef tmesbaniyin warrac unẓul imi ur bɣin ara d-illin ikayaden di remḍan .
 Abdelhak Menas</strong>
Deg zik-is, Tala-Xlil d yiwet n taddart iǧehden nezzeh deg lεarc n At Dwala di tmurt n Leqbayel.Taddart deg-s aṭas n yiderma d yirgazen n at yiɣil d wat ufud, rebεin n yirgazen s tmira, rebεin-niḍen war timira. Qqaren-d ḥekmen s ẓẓur ɣef tudrin i ten-id-iqerben, tekksen-asen ula d timecṛaḍ. Mi ara ruḥen ad d-kksen timecṛeḍt i webεaḍ n tudrin ttceyyiεen kan rebεin n yirgazen. Ma ruḥen rebεin n yirgazen s tmira, rebεin-nni war timira ad qqimen, ad qablen ma yella-d kra n cekk fell-asen, ad inin nekni ur nesεi ara di taddart annect-a n yirgarzen isεan timira. Ma d rebεin-nni war timira i iṛuḥen, rebεin-nni n yirgazen isɛan timira d nutni iqablen, ad inin am yimezwura. Yiwet n tikkelt, mmsawalen yimeqqranen n tudrin-nni ɣef i iεedda ẓẓuṛ ad nnejmaεen, ad mcawaṛen acu d wamek ara xedmen akken ad ḥerzen ɣef yiman-nsen d nnif-nsen. Yal taddart, tuzen-d tlata n yirgazen, lamin d sin n ṭemman ad mlilen di Tala n At Dwala. Wwḍen s amekkan, qqimen zzin d agraw ttmeslayen yiwen, yiwen; mi yekfa yiwen ad yuɣal wayeḍ. Iṣella-d yiwen ɣef sin yiberdan yenna: ‘‘ llah mselli aεlik ya ṛasul llah, llah mselli aεlik ya ṛasul llah’’ dɣa ibda awal. ‘’Ay atmaten, ayen iḍran yid-neɣ teẓramt, iḍra ula yid-wen. Kksen lmal i yimeksawen-nneɣ, kksen-aɣ timecṛeḍt, ittwakkes sser fell-aɣ. Tura ma nnejmeε ass-agi dagi di Tala n At Dwala alammi tewweḍ tkerza s aḥdid, alammi tewweḍ tfidi ɣer yiɣes,ifukk ṣbeṛ, issefk akken nella, akken i d-nnejmeε ass-agi, ad nedukkel ur nettɣimi ara nemferwazeε am ibawen ɣef lluḥ, yak teẓram awal nnan-t imezwra: bḍu-ten terniḍ-ten. Ihi ass-agi issefk fell-aɣ ad nedukkel, ad nemtawa-t ɣef yiwen n ṛṛay, ad nbedd ɣef yiwen wawal, ad nekfu-t cedda i d-iɣlin fell-aɣ, nekk deg wawal kfiɣ, ma sxesreɣ εfut-iyi, ma uqmeɣ ḥemdullah.’’ Wid i-as-id-izzin, nnan-d akk d awal n lεali. Rnan-d di lǧeṛṛa-s wiyaḍ, mtawan ɣef yiwen n ṛṛay ad d-suddsen yiwet n tmecṛeḍt ara isdukklen akk tudrin-nni akken ara d-sbedden daɣen yiwet n taggayt n yirgazen n at yiɣil ara iqamren wid ad d-iṛuḥen ad asen-kksen timecreḍt. Ssuq i-d-iḍefren anejmu&amp;epsilon,; sewqen imeqqranen n tudrin-nni, uɣen-d izgaren ara immezlen. Yal taddart txelleṣ ayen i as-d-tewwi n yidrimen a laḥsab n wazal n yimdanen i tesεa. Lexbeṛ n tmecreḍt iffeɣ, iwweḍ tudrin d leεruc, slan-as yis-s di yal tama n tmurt. Mmlalen yirgazen n tudrin-nni di Tala n At Dwala, ggan timecreḍt am tid yezrin, qedcen akken uɣen tanumi qedcen. Mmezlen yizgaren, igzem uksum, ibḍa d idura d tuna. Syin, sbeddent yiwet n taggayt n yirgazen n at ufud, wa yewwi abeckiḍ, wa d acaqur, wa d ajenwi, yal wa d acu n leslaḥ i iṭṭef ger yifassen-is. Ddurin isekla ttrajun wid ara d-yasen ad asen-kksen timecraḍt akken ad d-ẓedmen fell-asen, ad d-rren ttaṛ, ad tekfu cedda fell-asen. Wwḍen-d wid itekksen timecṛaḍ, isegras ɣef tuyat, ḥaren-d amzun d imnayen. Inṭeq-d yiwen seg-sen yenna i wid d-yufa ɣer tmecreḍt-nni: ‘’salamuεlikum ’’ Rran-as-id kra: ‘’salam ureḥmatellah lεeslama’’ Inṭeq-d wayed seg wid itekksen timecraḍ yenna: ‘’ah! Timecreḍt n tikkelt-a, tzad, tgerrez aksum-is llah ibarek d ayen kan!’’ Yerna-d wayeḍ di lǧeṛṛa-s yenna: ‘’d tidet! Aksum-a d aleqqaq ala i nekni iwumi ilaq!’’ Refden awal imeddukkal-is qqaren s utihi: ‘’aksum-a d aleqqaq ala i nekni iwumi ilaq! aksum-a d aleqqaq ala i nekni iwumi ilaq!’’
Timetti taqbaylit ur tefka ara azal i tmeṭṭut deg tmeddurt, ulama ula d nettat s ccan-is. Fell-as i tbedd akk ddunit. Akka yerna mazal tettemririɣ deg tɣerɣert n tneḥyaft imi argaz-is yeḥrem-as tuffɣa. Yerra-tt d taqeddact-is, ad texdem deg uxxam, ad ternu tiqwirin. Deg tazwara, ur tesԑi ara izerfan am urgaz deg twacult: tezga tettwaḥqqer imi ur tt-id-yettali wawal gar watmaten-s. Zik, llant ula d tiqcicin i meḍlen d timuddirin. Llant tlawin iwumi berrun imi i d-seԑԑunt kan tullas. Llant tiyiḍ zewğent 3 neɣ 5 yiberdan, daymi qqaren: «Taqcict ma tedder tenfa&amp;epsilon,; ma ulac, timeqbert tewsaε».Tis snat, tameṭṭut ur teswi, ur terri, deg uxxam-is. Ur tesԑi rray ala argaz i yesԑan awal. Werğin tella d tilellit deg lecɣal-is. Ilaq ad texdem kan ayen yeffɣen ɣef urgaz-is, yerna axeddim-is d axxam kan, Ma teffeɣ, ad teffeɣ kan ɣer tmazirt. Ulamma truḥ ɣer yimawlan-is, xas ma llan deg taddart, ilaq ad yeddu urgaz-is, am wakken qqaren: «Taqcict mm tɣaltin, ur tbennu tixxamin». Tis kraḍ, tallest segmi ara d-tlal nettat tettwaḥqar, ama deg uxxam n baba-s neɣ win n urgaz-is. Leqbayel n zik, mi ara yernu ɣur-sen uqcic, ad sɣerten neɣ ad xedmen urar. Ma d taqcict I d-sԑan ad yeḥzen uxxam am akken d tamḍelt. Mi ferqen ttrika, ama d idrimen neɣ d akal, yal awelli (ilemẓi) ad yawi amur-is, ma d tawellit lḥeq-is ad t-rnun watmaten-is, acku ɣur-sen, d lԑib ad tewret teqcict. Ma deg uxxam n urgaz-is, akken kan bɣan nutni ara tili, limer ad tԑeddi deg rray, ad as-d-brun neɣ ad rnun fell-as takna. Ulamma yella way-agi zik, maca ass-a d tamuɣli-nniḍen. Imi d tameṭṭut i d agerruj n tudert, d nettat i d tigejjdit n uxxam-is. Nezmer ad d-nini belli ulac aɣref iɣef teԑziz tmeṭṭut nnig n uɣref Azwawi, axaṭer yegza d akken, amer ur tettili ara nettat, ddunt-is ur teswi ara neɣ ur tesԑi ara lebna. Ayen ara d-yessebganen aya-agi d inzi-a i d-ğğan wat zik: «Axxam mebla tameṭṭut, am lebḥer mebla lḥut». Deg tama, kra n lbaḍna d sseriya yellan, ur teԑlim ara yis-s tmeṭṭut tazwawt imi aṭas n yirgazen i yettcawaren tilawin-nsen deg yiḍ. Ɣef-aya-agi i qqaren imezwura-nneɣ:«Ulac d acu nettugad am lehdur n tsumta». Deg tama niḍen, xas akken ur heddrent ara deg tejmaԑt, maca aṭas n tikkal i yettԑeddi rray-nsent deg-s s tuffra, yerna iferru timsal ur frin yirgazen. Mebla ma nettu, tilawin-nneɣ asmi sԑant tilelli, ulac agdud i tt-yefkan i tlawin iwakken ad seknen tidet-a, yerna ad sfesxen lekdeb yellan ɣef tmeṭṭut tamaziɣt. Tagellidt Dihya d Tinhinan d amedya ɣef tlelli tekseb tmeṭṭut-nneɣ imi mačči siwa i uxxam iwumi tezmer, ula d agdud yella itteddu ddaw ufus-is, yerna tessebgen-d iman-is d akken tezmer i wayen iwumi yezmer urgaz neɣ ugar. Ihi, ddunit-a, tebna ɣef urgaz akked tmeṭṭut, d nutni i d sser n tudert, daymi ilaq tameṭṭut d urgaz ad kesben izerfan kif kif-iten. Imi ulac amgarad gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut di tmendawt, ilaq d lḥeq n urgaz i d win n tmeṭṭut. Ihi, ha-ten-in deg yiwen n umḍiq, dɣa qqaren: «Argaz d llsas, tameṭṭut d ajgu alemmas»
Adaoun Abdelghani
At yanni d yiwet temnaḍt n leqbayel i d-yezgan tama ɛlayen i ibeɛden s 40 km ɣef temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Tesɛan kraḍet n tɣiwanin gar-asent : At yanni, Ibudraren, d yiɛeṭṭafen. Ad naf tamnaḍt –agi tettwasen s waṭas n yinaẓuren n ccna am Ait Manguellat, Idir, Brahim izri d yimyura imeqqranen yecban Muloud Mammeri , neɣ wid yettwassnen s umezgun am Mohia, neɣ wid yeɣlin ɣef tmurt n Lezzayer, Amirouche Ait Hamouda. Ttwasnen Wat Yanni s tuṭṭfa deg leɛwayed d wansayen, gar-asen lxedma n uẓref ( lfeṭṭa). Lxedma–agi, dayen i d-ğğan lejdud–nsen. tTasuta tettak-itt i tayeḍ. Ad naf yal aseggas, lawan-agi, taggara n yulyu d tezwara n ɣuct, smektayen-d armud–agi ɛzizen fell-asen, aɛzizen ɣef leqbayel, s temsikeniyin ixeddmen deg taddart n Tewrirt Mimum deg tneɣriyin n uɣerbaz alemmas Lɛerbi At Aɛmer ( Larbi Mizani), deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen Keddache Ali akked yiwen umḍiq n yidles iwumi semman ( Espace culturel Mouloud Mammeri ). Imezdaɣ n temnaḍt-agi n Wat Yanni, qedcen akken iwata, abeɛda inelmaden n tesnawit Hsen Outaleb, imi win i d-yusan s tkerrust ad as-ttɛasen, ad as-mlen abrid i wid akk i d-yusan seg yal tama n Lezzayer s umata. Xedmen ahil seg wasmi tebda almi d asmi tekfa. Tebda ass n umhad 28 deg yulyu ɣef 10h 00 , timsikent d lbiɛ n lfeṭṭa icebḥen dayen kan, tkemmel akken yal ass. Beddun ɣef 9h00 almi d 19hoo, Akka tekfa ass n 05 deg ɣuct s usenemmer n wid yettekin deg-s. Ad d-nernu ɣer waya aselway n tɣiwant n Wat Yanni Mass Smail deghoul d win yettaken afud i yal yiwen ixeddmen akken ad yenerni yidles n tmaziɣt. S lferḥ d ameqqran i d-yemeslay neɣ i d-yura ɣef teẓrigt-agi tis telṭac n tmeɣra n lfeṭṭa ( 13ème édition de la fete du bijou), rnu ɣur-s Mass Adal Arezki yettaken afus i yinelmaden yal mi ara yili usmekti n wayen akk icudden ɣer tmaziɣt. Tanemmirt-nsen , tanemmirt i yiḥeddaden n lfeṭṭa i as-yernan ccbaḥa i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit.
Zakia Ben yahia </strong>
Aemer n Ḥmed d afellaḥ n uxerrub n Wat Weḥmed si taddart n Tala-ixlan. Izdeɣ tama n lǧamaε n At Lfayda. Ɣer-s yiwet n teqcict, isem-is Taseɛdit.
 Yiwen wass, mi ikerrez agemmaḍ i taddart-is, deg tama iwumi ssawalen Takenna, isla-d i laeyaḍ n tmeṭṭut-is. Yiwen n yilemẓi n At Saɛdi ittlaei-d yelli-s Taseɛdit. Itahi fell-as. Tesla-as-d yemma-s, teeggaḍ fell-as, tennuɣ-it, ur as-teǧǧi ara. Netta diɣen ur as-icuḥ ara.
 Aεmer n Ḥmed, iǧǧa lmaeun yuzzel-d, iḥerḥer-d akken deg usawen n Leinser, yuli-d s axxam. Aqadum-is yuqqel d aberkan seg urrif. Iddem-d tamekkḥalt, iffeɣ ɣer yilemẓi-nni n At Saɛdi iwwet-it, inɣa-t. Ssyin, tekker lfetna gar sin yiderma. Gar Wat Saɛdi d Wat Ḥmed. Gren-d iman-nsen iderma-nniḍen, fran-ten, tensa lfetna. Seg yugad ttar, Aεmer n Ḥmed, isuter lanaya i udrum Ufella, iruḥ izdeɣ din.
Send ad yemmet, isḥarrem ɣef yismawen n Amer d Tasedit deg uxerrub-is. Yenna-as : «Ur ttegget isem n Aɛmer, imi ur d-yettilli Aɛmer ara yi-d-yecbun, wala isem n Taseɛdit imi fell-as i ikker imenɣi.»
Qqaren-d, s kra n win iwumi semman Aɛmeṛ neɣ Taseɛdit deg uxerrub-is, yella yuḍen, yuɣ-it kra.
Ramdane LASHEB
Isufar
250gr n seksu, 50gr n wudi , sskeṛ ma tebɣam , 1 n tremmant, ½ n tɣenjawt tamectuḥt ( tijɣelt ) n lmelḥ, 2 n tɣenjawin timeqqranin n zzit n uzemmur, 1 n tɣenjawt tameqqrant n waman n ujeǧǧig n ččina.
Aheggi
Tamsalmit n twermin(angine), tettḥaz ddeqs n yimeẓyanen, labeɛda di tallit n cctwa. Aya, ad t-ncudd ɣer lexṣas n tezmert n uḥareb di tfekka-nsen. D acu kan, ssebba n waṭṭan-a, d abirus ur nuklal ara ddeqs n ukukru. Tezmer, diɣ, ad tili ssebba-s d tabaktiritt i d-yeslalayen ddeqs n wuguren ɣer umeẓyan ma ur ttusejjint ara twermin-is akken ilaq. Ayen akk i itezzin ɣef waṭṭan-a, nessaram ad tafem deg umagrad-a, kunwi ay imeɣriyen-nneɣ
Amek i d-yettban lehlak-a ɣer yimeẓyanen?</strong>
S umata, tamsalmit n twermin tettban-d s tawla, anbeddal (talɣa d yinit) n twermin , d uqraḥ di lweqt n usebleɛ n yimetman.Tikkwal, llant kra n ccirat am uqraḥ n tɛdebbuḍt, tifidi deg uglim, ccirat n waṭṭan n turin d kra n yiwelsan di temgaṛt, yettefren neɣ i d-yettbegginen akken iwata lahlak-a.
Amek i d-tettban temsalmit n twermin s tbaktiritt?</strong>
S umata, tettḥaz win yesɛan gar 5 d 15 n yiseggasen. Tettbini-d s tawla yettɛeddin 38 n tṣeddarin, iwelsan qerṛiḥen di temgaṛt, ulac tusut, tiwermin beddunt-d d tizeggaɣin s umata, syin s teɣzi n lweqt, ad uqqlent d timellalin neɣ ad d-ilal deg-sent waṛṣeḍ, d ayen ara yessekkren lḥerǧ ɣer yimawlan akk d ṭṭbib akken ad idawi s lɛeǧǧlan amuḍin, imi talalit n waṛṣeḍ d ccira tameqqṛant d akken tabaktiritt telḥa di twermin.
D acu n wuguren i d-yeslalay ustehzi sdat n waṭṭan-a ?</strong>
