Yefra-tt colonel Dezdeg : « ad nerr ɣer 1953, ad nẓer Ɛebban Remḍan. »
Akken rekben tamacint n zzman, Kaci l’angoisse propose d’aller d’abord faire un tour du côté de Juillet 62. Qqimen sin n wussan di Lezzayer. Ccbaḥa n tbannagin n 62 tessidiri iminigen n At Rgad. Cubant ɣer les actrices-nni n sinima noir et blanc. Yal taqcict ara d-temlile&amp;#7693,; ad as-tiniḍ d Ingrid Bergman. Aḥeq Sidi Valentin qu’elles sont tout simplement belles tihdayin n Lezzayer sans jelbab !
Cwiṭ akka, wwḍen yiminigen ɣer rue Tanger (tura, rue manger).
Tɣil tesla Sadiya n l’euro i : « ulac sma&amp;#7717,; ulac ». Ala, mačči d la négation n les brobros. D taɣect « …ma bqac istiɛmar fi bladna » n Hadj El Anka.
Tameddit-nni rran ɣer 1953. Γef setta d uzgen afen-d iman-nsen di la prison d’Albi dans le Tarn di Fransa, tama n l’architecte du congrès de la Soummam.
Deg udem-is, yettban-d Ɛebban yeɛya. Γas akken, yelha-d d tira. Sya ar din, ad ibedd, ad yelḥu cwi&amp;#7789,; daɣen ad d-yuɣal ar tira. Yuqa-asen wawal di tgerjujt i yiminigen n At Rgad. Kaci d Dezdeg smaren imeṭṭi asusam. Sadiya ur teksan ara : tserreḥ-as i uslilew. yerfed aqerru-s Ɛebban, yecmumeḥ.
D’une voix tremblante, yenṭeq Dezdeg : « a…z…u…l mass Ɛebban! »
Yerna yerfed aqerru-s umeḥbus, yecmume&amp;#7717,; yenna :
– Ihuh, anect-agi akk i ɛyiɣ !!
– Ala, mass Ɛebban ur teɛyiḍ ara !
– Anwa kečč ? anida-k ?
– Nek d Rezqi n At Dezdeg. Tella yid-i Sadiya d Kaci. Nruḥ-d si Lezzayer n 2009. naǧǧa-n tamurt terwi, iɛerreq-as ccḍeḥ…
– C’est quoi “azul mass” ?
– C’est “bonjour monsieur” en tamazight.
– Tamaziɣt !!! Mais c’est très bien ! Tamurt ur terwi ara tant que ça.
– D taqsiṭ ! En fait, nruḥ-d t’avertir ɣef yiwet n txazafit tettraǧu-k di Maroc. Kra seg yimdukal-k… »
Yecmumeḥ Ɛebban. Yuɣal s astilu-s d tkarnitt-is.
Awal ulac, les trois visiteurs qqumcen di tekwatt n lqefs et savourent ce fragment de l’histoire. Ur yeḥbis ara tira umeḥbus. Il esquissait sans doute les contours d’une république démocratique. Inessef yiḍ iɛedda, yejmeε Ɛebban astilu d ukarni, yerra s usu.
La d-nesmektay ljil yettun
 Γef uḍar asmi nẓemmed arkas
 Mi yiftel i uεdaw seksu
 Nekk fetleɣ-as aḥlalas
Si zman aqdim, agdud Aqbayli yurez tudert-is ɣer wansayen d leɛwayed I d-ǧǧan yimezrua. Di yal taswiɛt n lḥers, ad d-yaf amek ara yessukk leḥwal gar yinyen. Ɣas akken llan wansayen iwumi yebra umdan, imi d wid yeǧǧa lweqt, wiya&amp;#7693,; mazal fettin, ttnernin, ddren yes-sen yemdanen. Timecreḍt, d yiwen seg leɛwayed-agi i d-irezzun ɣer tmetti yal lɛid. Yal wa amek i yettwali ansay-agi, maca ɣer taggara iswi d yiwen. Ass-a, ssawalen medden ɣer tmecredt imi aḥric ameqran ur zmiren ara ad zlun akraren iwumi tewweḍ ssuma ɣer tqacuct. Ihi, d tamsalt n tedrimt i d aɣilif, i yeǧǧan imdanen ad gen lewziɛa. di tama nniḍen, timecreḍt tesdukul atmaten, lǧiran d leḥbab. Ad d-aɣen izgaren, ad nezlun ad ten-ferqen d tixxamin, imir yal wa ad yawi amur-is. Da, ad d-nini d ansay iteẓẓun tagmat, yessawalen ɣer tdukkli. Melba ma nettu da&amp;#611,; belli di tmecredt, ameɣbun yesɛa amur-is ɣas ma ur ixelles ara. D ta i d tagmat, d ta i d tterbegga. Tikkelt-a di Leɛǧiba, aṭas n yemdanen i iddan deg ubrid-a n wansayen, xedmen timecreḍt deg waṭas n tudrin. S kra n wid i nesteqsa, qqaren-d d akken: “Awer neffeɣ si lḥerma n yimezwura nneɣ i aɣ-d-iǧǧan agerruj n yinsayen inefɛen.” M.Smail
Am yal aseggas, yesfugul umaḍal Ass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut neɣ n tlawin i d-yettuɣalen 8 deg meɣres. Seg wasmi i d-bdant tlawin amennuɣ ɣef yizerfan-nsent, seg useggas n 1908, ar ass-a, aṭas n yiswiyen uɣur ssawḍent. Xas ulamma yettili-d lexsas ula deg tmura yeṭṭfen taqacuct deg umtawa gar urgaz akked tmeṭṭut, acu kan yettdub cwiṭ cwiṭ seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ. Ass-a, amur ameqqran n tmura n umaḍal, ur ttgen ara amgarad gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut deg yiṣudaf-nsent neɣ deg tmendawt-nsent. Acu kan, aya ur yerri ara tilisa i meḥyaf i d-yettilin deg unnar, ladɣa deg yiḥricen istratijiyen neɣ deg umḍebber n kra n tuddsiwin akked yikubar.
Aya, seg tama tiberraniyin. Wammag deg tmura n Tefriq Ugafa, mazal amennuɣ ad iḍul ɣef yizerfan n tlawin, ‘’imi mazal ur tesɛi ara azref ad tḍebber ɣef yiman-is xas ulamma meqqret u txeddem’’, i twala F.H. Ɣef leḥsab-is, d timetti i d ssebba n waya. ‘’Xas nesɛa azref deg uxeddim, deg leqraya, acu kan mazal ttwalin-aɣ-d s yir tamuɣli : d timeẓyanin ; ur nezmir ara i yiman-nteɣ’’. Amur ameqqran n tlawin, walant d akken axsim ameqqran n tmeṭṭut d tameṭṭut. ‘’Wali tura mi ara ak-d-tini tyemmat : ‘argaz akken yexdem yecbeḥ’. Neɣ argaz, yezmer ad yecceḍ, ma d tameṭṭut ala’’, i tesḥassef G. Lila. I usmekti, yella ula d ass n urgaz i d-yettilin deg yal 19 deg unbir. Meɛna sfugulen-t kan deg 60 n tmura seg useggas n 1990, yerna mačči d unṣib deg Ugraw n tmura yeddukklen ONU.
I wakken ad as-fken azal-is i tmeṭṭut, i wakken ad gzun wid ur neẓṛi s wazal-is, d nnuba-s deg usegmu n tmetti, ddeqs n tuddar deg tdayṛa n Yiɣil Ɛli, ara yesfugglen ass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut. Amedya, deg tɣiwant n Yiɣil Ɛli, msefhament tullas n tuddar, belli ad nnejmaεent akken ma llant deg yiwen n umkan. Ayagi i waken yal yiwet ad terfed tarmit sɣur tayeḍ, imi ddeqs n yiqeddicen ara yilin di ttiεad. Γef leḥsab n teɣbalut-nneɣ, llant lxalat ara d-yerzun ula seg twilayin-nniḍen, am Lezzayer tamanaɣt, Wehṛan, akked Tizi Uzzu. Iswi-nsent dɣa, d asissen n wayen i xeddment i tiyaḍ. I yisalli, ddeqs n temsikniyin ara yilin di ttiεad, ama d tid n yiselsa, n tneččit tuzzigt n yal tamnaḍt neɣ tid n tẓiḍanin. Am wakken ara d-yili ttiεad-a, d tagnit i tukksa n lxiq, d zzhu.
Ma yella nemmeslay-d ɣef tukksa n lxiq, yewwi-d ad d-nebder urar n lxalat i yesεan lbenna d texlaft. Ladɣa ma yella dduklent tuɣac n tlawin deg yiwet n tezlit, neɣ mi ara ttcewwiqent. Ihi i tin yebɣan ad tfaṛeṣ tagnit-a, d Massa Suεad, akked Gemṛa, seg taddart n Tqeṛṛabt, ara yewwten abendir. Ma yella d tameɣṛa-a, ad d-tili ass n sem, 13 meɣres i d-iteddun deg uɣerbaz amenzu Sasi Muḥend Ttaher, deg taddart n At Sasi. Tulawin n temnaḍt-a, umrent ayendin s ttiεad-a, ladɣa imi amur ameqqran deg-sent, ur teffɣent ara. Γef usentel-a dɣa, tenna-aɣ-d yiwet n tlemẓit: «Ssarameɣ ad ṭṭuqtent temliliyin-a, acku tameṭṭut di taddart-nneɣ, mazal ur tesεi ara tilleli-s. Ahat imi lejdud-nneɣ d imṛabḍen, llan sḥeṛṛṣen nezzeh ɣef tmeṭṭut. Lameɛna, ass-a d lawan ad tbeddel teswiɛt”.H.M/K.K.
Lynda Chouiten, d tamarut tilemẓit i d-yufraren s tira-s iseggasen-agi ineggura. Tewwi arraz Assia Djebbar 2019 n wungal-is « Une Valse ». Ha-t-an d acu i aɣ-d-tenna ɣef wass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut. ‘’i lmend n 8 deg meɣres, ilaq ad d-nesmekti mačči d tameɣra, maca d asfugel n umennuɣ n tlawin ɣef yizerfan-nsent. Amennuɣ mazal ur yemmid ara, llant aṭas n tɣawsiwin i ilaqen ad beddlent deg ddunit ; mazal tettili-d tneḥyaft gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut. Mazal ttidirent tlawin tamḥeqqranit akked temdellit seg yal tama. Ɣur-neɣ, ula d tid-ak yeɣran neɣ tid i izemren i yiman-nsent seg tama n tedrimt, mazal-itent s ddaw n tecḍadt n urgaz, ama d baba-s, gma-s neɣ d argaz-is…atg. Mazal d nutni ara iḍebbren ɣef wayen ara lsent d wanda ara ruḥent.
Meḥsub ɣef wamek ara tili tudert-nsent. D lewhayem, mazal ar tura nettmeslay ɣef tmeṭṭut am wakken kan d tayemmat, d tameṭṭut n urgaz, d yelli-s, d uletma-s, am wakken ur tesɛi ara tudert-is i nettat kan, s timmad-is. Ttwalin kan assaɣ yellan gar-s akked urgaz, tella kan i lmend n waya. Aṭas n tɣawsiwin-nniḍen i ilaq ad d-ttwabdarent, aṭas i mazal ad yettwaxdem, ama seg tama n uṣaduf neɣ n lɛaqilyat. Limmer d lebɣi ur yettili ara ass n 8 deg meɣres, d ass n ucebbeḥ akked ccḍeḥ, syin ad tuɣal tmeṭṭut ɣer tkuzint akked meḥyaf. Ilaq ad yili 8 deg meɣres, d ttiɛad i wakken ad d-nesmekti d akken mazal ɣezzif umecwar’’. H. M.
Akken akk nettwali, nettzellim tagnit, tban-aγ-d taddert-nneγ amek tella, amek tuγal, anda tessaweḍ. Nettat yellan d tamenzut tuγal d taneggarut ger tudrin.
Ihi taddert-nneγ tettidir deg yiwwet n tegnit tuεar atas, tettidir deg yiwet n teswiεt berriket, yal tazγent terza-d γer teγraγrin n yexxamen teṭṭef tasga teqqim. Tugdi tesqaṭe&amp;#949,; teduri-d imnaren almi nuγ tanumi yid-s. yal axxam deg taddert yegra-d εeryan, yal adaynin yegra-d d ilem, yefeγ-it lmal, icbuyla udamen si zzit, ikufan xlan deg lerẓaq, tiẓegwin uγalent d asuki, ulac win ara ixedmen akal. Lḥaṣun yeεreq webrid ara naγ !
 Nekni s imezdaγ n taddert nettawi kan lewhi s wallen. Allen ceεlent, brarḥent maca ulac d acu i nwala. Nettemεassa kan ger-ane&amp;#947,; tezdaγ-aγ teεdawit amzun mačči d atmaten, wa yekwa γef wa. Ulac lḥara id-yemzagan d taye&amp;#7693,; wama iderma fiḥel fell-asen awal! Ula d allaγ yekref, yeḥfa deg ttexmam. Γas akken nesεa tigzi maca ulac d acu i nefhem, ulac win iγ-d-ifehmen.
 Akka id taddert ur nesεi aqerru, akka i d atmaten ur nesεi tagmat. Ulac win irefden iman-is, yal wa amek yekkat akken ad-iban nnig n gma-s, nnig lḥara-s, nnig wedrum-is. Wama akken qaren “win izemren yejbed mulac yesres lmejbed”. Ass-mi iεedda wayen iεeddan, yewweḍ-d yiwen wemγar azemni, ilḥa atas deg leεmer, yelḥa ula deg tmusni. Ziγ d mmi-s n taddert-nne&amp;#947,; yeffeγ-itt deqs-aya. Tasuta-nneγ ur tessin ara, maca llan wid is-d-yecfan. Amγar azemni yesla s wayen yeḍran deg taddert-is, yewwit-id nnif yesefqed-d γur-s. yufa-d tarka teswiεt, luγent tlufa, yewwet iγisi annect. Γas akken muḥal yekna i ddel, muḥal izdeγ-it facal, yezewr-d leεqel, muḥal rẓen ifadden-is.yemuger uguren s tebγest, yessaf tegnit s tegzi-s zeddigen, yewwi-d tejbirt i iγisi yewten deg taddert. Yerra-d asirem yerẓa asalu i tikli, yerẓa leqyud s wayes s iγ-cudden. Yebγa ad iεiwed lebni i taddert s wadda, deg lsas. Yebγa ad yekkes tamuḥqranit, tijεal, tukerḍa,lexdeε…atg. Yebγa ad d-yerr asirem γer wulawen n terwa-s,yeččur d tayri n taddert. Almi itt-yecrew merriγet id-yufa tifrat, maca iεdawen n taddert-nneγ zgan εusen-aγ.akken walan qrib ad yeffel γer tizi n liser, akken walan qrib ad yaweḍ γer yeswi, xedεen-aγ deg-s, swezlen-as leεmer.Lulen-d mazal ad-lalen wid yesluγuyen aman zeddigen. Ihi γas yemmut wemγar-nneγ azemni, iga tajbirt i iγisi, yeẓḍa tadukli d tegmat ger-ane&amp;#947,; ixdem-aγ ifadden d tebγest. Yerna yenna:
 Umsen wulawen s qeḍran
Ayen n dir nugi at-neṣfeḍ
Nwala akk ayen yeḍran
Lbaṭel nugi at-nenneḍ
Γas bγan ad snegren iẓuran
Win gezmen ad-ilal wayeḍ
 Sγur Islam BESSAC
Ass n Ssebt 13 furar 2010, texsi yiwet n teftilt i d-yefkan tafat d cbaḥa i tayri, yemmut ujeğğig di tebḥirt n tẓuri taqbaylit swayes i zzuzunen wulawen n wid yuḍnen, wagi d-acennay-nneγ ṚaḤim. ṚaḤim yeḥbes wulis i tyita deg-wul n temurt n Leqbayel, i tlemast n temdint n Tizi-Wezzu, yesεa 47 issegasen di laεmer-is. Tamḍelt-is tella-d ass n 15 uar 2010 di taddert-is Imqecren, tamnaḍt n At Σissa Mimun (At-Wagnun, Tizi-Wezzu). Issem-is aḥeqqani Raḥim Mohammed, ilul ass n 07 dujember 1963 deg irebbi n turt n leqbayel, taddert n Imqecren, Raḥim mucaε yur yemdanen s tezlit-is mucaεen nezzah “Yya-d ad m-ini&amp;#611,; yecnatt ukud d Yasmina. Isalli n lmut n Raḥim yeγli-d am siεqa γef yedanen ara acku d axalaf meẓẓiyen i yemuten, maca ayen yexdem ad-yeqqim ilebda. Aṭas n yemdanen id-yussan aken ad-ḥedren i temḍelt-is, ger-asen icenayen, inaẓuren, imusnawen d wiyaḍ mara : Hacène Ahrès, Salah Mammar, Ali Ferhati, Siham Stiti, Ould Ali El Hadi, Moh Oubélaïd, Mohamed Allaoua, Taleb Tahar, Rabah Ouferhat, Zedek Mouloud, Yasmina, Ahcène Aït Zaïm…atg. Sgunfu di talwit ay acennay-nne&amp;#947,; ṣṣut-ik d tezlatin-ik ad qqiment i lebda.
  Islam Bessaci
Di tallit ideg Ṭurk teglled tamurt-nneγ ddaw uzaglu-s akked d draɛ-is, At Jennad d amedya ger tudrin n Leqbayel i yuggin azaglu-a n Ṭurk. Ger yirgazen i yellan sedduyen imenγi nutni d at Qasi yellan d lqeyyad n dewla taṭerkit di Lzzayer n lawan-nni Yusef u Qasi : Yusef u Qasi ilul γer lewhi n iseggasen n 1680 deg taddart n at Gurat. Ur d-cfin ara fell-as mi meẓẓiy armi kan i d-yufrar s tmedyazt-is. Qqaren beli d netta i ttawin wat Jennad mi ara yili yimenγi. Neγ d netta i ten-yettawin :
Kkert ad tewtem
Ay at Jennad ur neɛrif
Begset ulanda teffrem
Ttif Muḥend Azwaw lγir
Kra akka yedder ittuseggem
Ttif ma nekseb-it axir
 Ihi wagi d asefru d awezlan i swayes yessadaf1 tabγest2 i yijennaden akken ad naγen nutni d at Qasi γef uẓaγer. Daγen deg usefru anda yenna:
Nekk d Ajennad men llasel-iw
Yettruẓun leɛdu.
Meyya d irekkben ur iris
D amnay nettɛud
Njebbed ddal s leḥris
Mi γ-yeẓra weɛdaw yeknu.
 D acu kan wagi d amɛeẓbber kan i d-yellan gar-as d Muḥend u Ʃebdellah n at Yiraten. Armi ten-yefra yiwen umrabbeḍ i d-arsen γer laɛqel nsen.imi tikwal amɛeẓbber yettuγal d amennuγ i d-igellun s twaγiyin meqqren imi ijebbed-iten nnif. Armi wezzaf.Dagi daγen yenna Yusef u Qasi :
 Nekkni nussa-d ad nrebbi arrac
Lemer ad slen laɛrac
Nennuγ γef tiγilt uḥerrac.
Yenna daγen :
Cwiṭ nettɛeddi fell-as
A wi yebγan deg-s yimγur

1) Yessadaf: seg umyag adef( kcem) entrer
2) Tabγest : courage.
Γas ulama Izegzawen ḍeyεen aṭas n tegnatin i sen-yettunefken akken ad awin iswi n rbeḥ γef terbaεt n Legniz maca imyuraren qessren akken ilaq. Akk wid iferǧen timlilit tεeǧben deg afud i d-fkan deg unnar yemyuraren yecban: Haliche, Buguerra d uεessas urzin Raïs Mbolhi. Imnasren n Yizegzawen tqenεen s ugemmuḍ n ulac γer ulac,imi ssawḍen rẓan lqid-nni n tugdi n terbaεt yecban Legniz imi tarbaεt-a tesεa amezruy meqqren deg tkurt n uḍar.Ladγa ḥaca i tekfa temlilit aṭas i d-yefγen γer yiberdan akken ad sbegnen lferḥ-nsen. S wakka yuγal-d usirem γer yimdanen akken ad yili rbeḥ γef terbaεt n Marikan deg temlilit ara d-ijemen yid-s Izegzawen, slazekka ( ass n larebεa 23 deg agur n yunyu ). Afud igerzen i Terbaεt-taγelnawt.
Mokrane Chikhi
Taggara agi imsexdamen n l’Internet ggten, simmal d anerni. S ttawil n l’ADSL yuɣal wallal agi ikcem ɣer yixxamen, uɣalen yimdanen ur ḥwaǧen ara les cybercafés iwakken ad kecmen ɣer uẓeṭṭa n le Web ad qḍun tiɣawsiwin nsen. Yal wa d acu n lebɣi i d yettaf deg uḥric agi n taywalt ( communication). Yennulfa d yiwen n wudem n taylawt yezdin gar yimdanen di dunnit meṛra s ttawil n les sites yesseqraben gar asen am « facebook » neɣ asali n les blogs. Deg tirza nneɣ daxel n uẓeṭṭa agi, nufa aṭas n yIzzayriyen i iḥemlen ad ssudsen les blog nsen iwakken ad d- inin kra ɣef timadit nsen, neɣ ad ssiwḍen tiktiwin nsen ɣer yimdanen n temnaḍin nniḍen. Nestqsa yiwet gar asen akken ad aɣ-d-tini tikti s ɣef cɣel agi, amek i tettwali ttawil n l’Internet d wacu n lfayda yellan deffir n usbeddi n les blogs.
Acu i am- id- yettawi le Net deg tudert – inem ?</strong>Cukkeɣ yettawi-d ayen nniḍen ixulfen tilawt. Deg targit n le Net nettserriḥ i yixfawen nneɣ akken ad mlilen d timadit nsen mebɣir ifeṭṭiwjen yestullusen tidet, yesserwalen iman ɣef yiman is. Tikwal nettḥulfu s yiman nneɣ zun nɛawed talalit,nuǧew-d ismawen ijdiden, wid iɣ id -inejren abrid nniḍen akken ad nili nekni d wiyiḍ, am wakken i nettḥulfu s itdet, mačci am waken i ilaq. Lxuf yebṭel, tilelli tettili dɣa yal wa yettaf ayen i t ixuṣṣen deg tudert is n yal ass.
Aya d acqirrew neɣ d nmara?D tabɣest ? Ur ẓriɣ ara. Meɛna mi ara nmuqel ɣer les blogs xeddmen Iṛumyen, nettaf belli nutni ttmeslayen ɣef wayen akk i ten- yeɛnan mebla akukru, ḥemlen ad d- inin timeẓyanin d tmeqranin iten iceɣben. Ɣer ɣur-sen ur yelli lɛib deg wannect a, ma da ɣer neɣ cukkeɣ imdanen ttkukrun ad d-bedren tinekkit nsen acku leqyud mazal kersen, tilelli n yixfawen mazal ur d- telli ara, rnu ɣef wannect a timetti ideg nettidir tewɛer. Degmi leḥder ɣer tura mazal d netta i d ameskan n wacu ilaqen ɣef umdan ad t id-yaru deg lblog ines. Akka, yiwet am nekk xas ceɣbent -iyi kra n temsal beqquɣ ad tent id- iniɣ, lameɛni reggleɣ- asent, amer I d- qqaren medden ! Ur bɣiɣ ara ad « ccukiɣ » wiyad, akken neqqar ihi nteddu s lemḥadra.
Acu i yesmendigen imdanen akken ad mmeslayen ɣef tinekkit nsen ?Deg tidet yal amdan yassaram ad iḍleq tinekkit ines zdat wiyaḍ. Ayen ala ? Ur cukkeɣ ara ayen nni d acqirrew neɣ d anamar, di yal tallit di yal zman di yal amkan amdan iḥemmel ad d- yesken iman is. Maca, aya di tudert n yal ass ur yelli ara d afessas, degmi ttawil n l’Internet yessishil lecɣal, wid yessexdamen ttawil agi ttafen-d tagnit iwakken ad mmeslayen ɣef yiman nsen d yixf n yiman nsen. Nekk cubaɣ ayen nni ɣer usteɛfu. Amdan, mi d- iger nnehta yesrusuy taɛkemt n tudert. Tella tilist gar targit n l’Internet akked tilawt ?Xas tella yakan tilist, ad teḍhu rqiqet. Temyekcam targit akked tudert n yal ass. Imsexdamen n l’Internet d imdanen n tidet, sɛan iḥulfan, kesben tidmi. Xas ma ttefren deffir n les pseudos lameɛni llan d nutni i yettarun i yettmeslayen, i d yeqqaren timsal ɣef i d- yezzi wawal. Simmal yettaf umdan ayen I t ixussen deg-s, simmal yettnadi fell as alamma tuɣal as d yiwet n tɣawsa ara yesɛun azal deg tudert is. Xas ini tettuɣal d ddunit n yinig uɣur irezzu yal mi ara yebɣu ad yessenser iman is seg yiɣeblan i d yettmagar deg tudert n yal ass. Ɣef aya, nezmer ad d-nini belli l’Internet yelha i kra, am wakken ur yelhi ara I win ur nesɛi ara tilist ara yexdem i yiman is s lebɣi n lebɣi s.
Ait Slimane Hamid
Idurar ɛlayen n Ǧerǧer gren irebbi deg yimalas yezrin i yiwet n tfaska n ccna i d-yellan di Tikjda ɣef teɣzi n tlata n wussan seg 5 almi d 7 deg waggur n yulyu ideg nella. Tanmehla n yidles n Tubiret i yellan deffir n uheggi n tmeɣra-agi yettwaxedmen s ddaw leɛnaya n lwali, Mass Ali Bouguerra, ur testehzi ara deg wallalen iwulmen, aya nettwali-t deg tegnatin ideg tɛedda tfaska. Ama si tama n laman anda srabes llan s ṭṭaqa, neɣ d imukan i yimnezhen, asensu n Tikjda ur yessaweḍ ara ad yawi akk imdanen yerzan ɣur-s ak ksen lxiq.Deg wass amenzu n tfaska i d-yusan d amulli wis-48 n timunent n Lezzayer, d Lhasnaoui Amecṭuḥ i inedhen d amezwaru deg tmeɣra-agi. Seg «la maison blanche » alamma d « Bu tabani », tɛeddiḍ ɣef « init-as ma ad d-yas », anaẓur-agi yessuzen imezdaɣ n Tubiret n ṣṣut n win akken yenfan seg tmurt deg yiseggasen n 30. Akken kan i yekfa, d yiwen seg yifennan mucaɛen deg umalu n tmurt i d-yulin. Wagi, d Chab Anouar. Ifren-d kra akken n tezlatin I yeǧǧan tuget n yilmeẓyen kksen amcum, imi tikkelt-a, imḍebbren n tfaska heggan-d s ddemma asarag I ccḍeḥ. Deg wass wis-sin, d tarbaɛt Abranis i yerwin taqaɛet. Karim amzun akken d winna n yiseggasen n 80, yewwi yid-s ilmeẓyen di lbabur n Rock Aqbayli. Ɣer tama-s, Bélaid d Yuba, rnan-d aɛeqqa n lmelḥ i tmeɣra. Ɣef teɣzi n yiwet n tsaɛet, taɣect n Abranis terra-d ṣṣut deg yidurar n ǧerǧer. Usan-d yimdanen s ṭṭaqa iwakken ad t-ẓren, ad ḥeḍren i tmeɣra, imi bɣan daɣ ad ttun taluft n tfaska n uheggi i d-yellan deg umkan-agi kra n wagguren yakan. Ass-nni, mi d lawan ad d-yecnu Abranis, yella-d akken kra n yimenɣi i yeǧǧan imḍebbren ḥebsen tafaska deg wass-is aneggaru. D ayen i yessawḍen aṭas n yimdanen usan-d ɣer Abranis, tuget deg-sen s twaculin nsen iwakken ad d-beggnen leḥmala nsen i wudem n ccna n terbaɛt-agi. Uqbel ad d-yali Nasserdine Hourra, yekker yiwen seg wid yettmetilen Lwali n Tubiret akked umḍebber n Daira n Bechloul iwakken ad as-fken yiwen n warraz i ucennay-agi yuklalen leqder. Imir, tkemmel tmeɣra akked ccna s Tcawit.Deg wass aneggaru n tfaska, nezmer ad d-nini yekker uɣebbar deg waluḍ ! D Mohamed Allaoua i yessaḥman taqaɛet. Ur ufin ara yimdanen anda ara ddun ! argaz tameṭṭut, aqcic taqcict, ula d timɣarin rzant ɣer Tikjda. S tidet, yekkes lxiq i yimdanen, netta icennun tizlatin n lferḥ, n usirem d tayri. Rnu, aẓawan axfifan yessekcamen s asarag mebla ttḥalil. Nezmer ad d-nini d akken tikkelt-a tafaska-agi tessaweḍ s iswi-is, imi tɛedda deg tegnatin igerzen, d ayen ahat ara yefken afud i yimḍebbren ad d-swejden ɣer zdat timeɣriwin yecban tigi ama di Tubiret neɣ deg umkan-agi yettwasnen s ubeḥri azedgan d waman isemmaḍen. Udem n yimezdaɣ d win yessefraḥen, imi d tagnit i twaculin fɣent-d ad kksent lxiq, nutenti iwumi ur tettunefk ara tegnit ad ẓrent tifaskiwin.
Kra tekka ddurt tamezwarut n wagur n unbir ageffur netta d tiyita war aḥebbus deg yakk lwilayat n usammar d tlemmat n tmurt.Aṭas n lwilayat ideg d-yegla s txessarin ladγa deg yiberdan n ukerrus ideg d-ḍrant laksidat.Aya d ayen i yeğğan tuget n yimdanen tteffγen s lemḥadra di leεḍil ad tεeddi tallit.Llan daγen wid ur tessaged ara lehwa-ya gar asen-imdanen imeqqranen i tt-yettwalin d tagnit akken ad ilin waman yerna ad yekker lεic di lexlawi ideg ara snefεen yifellaḥen yettrebbin lmal.
M.C
Tala Σetman d yiwet n taddart gar tuddart n tγiwant n Tizi Wezzu, tebεed fell-as azal n 15 n kilumitr. Tala Σetman tettwassen γer yimdanen s ssuq n lxeḍra akked ssuq n wass lğemεa. Acu kan, iseggasen-agi ineggura, tettwassen diγ s wayen-nniḍen : s wayen ur nemεin. Aṭas i yeḍran u mazal ay iḍerru : si tukksa n sser ar tukerḍa d usqiṭṭeε deg yiberdan. Di ddurt iεeddan, kra n yimdanen sqaṭṭεen i yiwet n ṭunubil, εerran wid yellan daxel, wwten-ten s lebγeḍ, ksen-asen llebsa nsen, ğğan-ten din, ksen-asen ula d tisura n tkarrust.Ulac ass ara iεeddin mebla ma yegla-d s teqriḥt. Yal wa yeqqar :’’akka akk i tḍerru di tuddart n leqbayel, mačči ala dagi.’’
Hocine. M
Temxurgag di tesdawit n Akli Muḥend ulḥaǧ anda inelmaden n ugezdu n tussna SM d ST gezment di rray ad ḥebsen ɣef leqraya azal n 09 n ussan aya ; mbaɛd imi tasudut n ugezdu-agi ur d-terri ara lwelha-s ɣer lexṣas i ttidiren inelmaden am : lexṣas n yiselmaden ifazen, aneɛdam n yedlisen di temkerḍit, lexṣas n duzan deg les laboratoires. u ayen yernan asmenteg i tmest d akeččum n yigezduten nniḍen (Agezdu n izerfan, win tnefsitd d win n tdamsa ) deg uḥbas leqraya iwakken ad ɛiwnen Agezdu n tussna, daɣen ad d-beggnen lɣiḍ-nsen ɣef wayen yeɛnan leqwanen n uɛeddi ɣer master. Seg unnar yenna-d unelmad F.Z « ugur yellan di ugezdu n tussna yella-d mbaɛd aɛzal n tenmahla i kra n iselmaden yesɛan aswir aɛlayan deg unnar-agi, asmi llan ɣef uqerru n ugezdu n tussna uklec ileḥu akken iwata ». Yerna-d wayeḍ T.B «d ayen yessefraḥen imi ɣef aḥbas leqraya heggan-t-id i yinelmaden wahed-sen mebla ma tella-d deffir-sen tuddist (organisation) yetabaɛen ɣer walbaɛḍ n yikabaren n tsertit ». Akka ! qqaren : taxettart ɣer yiwen d lferḥ ɣer wayeḍ… !
Mazigh At Sai
Deg ssin isaggasen-agi ineggura, qrib yal ddurt iɣmisen n tmurt ttawin‑d ɣef taxazabiyin i‑iḍerun di tmurt n Leqbayel armi yuɣal lxuf ikcem leḥwari, yekkseb izenqen, yeduri tiɣamar. Imewlan n yinelmaden deg uɣerbaz amenzu zgan deffir n waraw‑nsen acku laman iffuk, yal wa yettergigi ɣef terw‑as amer ad yilli wacu ‑iten yettaɣen. Ula d‑at lḥirfat ur mniɛen ara seg txazabyin‑agi imi yennulfed diɣ di tneggura‑agi uxḍaf‑nsen sɣur kra n tirebuyaɛ ur nettwexir deffir yal taɣawsa akken ad sewren adrim. Anwi i‑yellan ilmendad n wencat‑a ? hedd ur yeẓri. Ass‑a tjara tella deg yegrazen: “ awid adrim ma ulac mmi‑twen iɛedda lqec‑is”! Ass‑a imadanen ttmeslayen ɣef wigi yettkren igerden akken ad zenzen tigeẓal‑nsen, ɣef wigi yesqiṭiɛen i yemɛelamen akken ad sutren adrim, deg iberden am deg yiḍ naɣ deg uzal. Yal taxlijt di temanḍt n tmurt n Leqbayel ala ɣef anexct‑a i ttemjadalen, deg zenqen, deg leqhawi, deg yixamen: anti tirebutaɛ ‑agi ila yesserwaten yerna deg uzal qayli akken u amek isen‑t yehwa? Ayen serbes n laman gumman ad affen anwi yella deffir anect‑a n tedyanin timerzuga? Acu n lɣerd yellan deffir iɣissan ihuzan lehna di temnaḍt ‑agi n tmurt? Di lejweyhi n tmurt anda akken zik yeserwet rebrab akken id as yehwa, lehna tuɣal-d, ayen ihi tamurt n Leqbayel yellan zik d agni n laman, deg talwit tufa iman‑is trebba afud armi id ‑ttcuben ɣer la Suisse tamecṭuḥt yenquqel ujgu n lehna ɣef akal‑is?D taqenuzrt gummen ad sefrun wid yettmzyizen.Tuttriwin i d‑ iɣalin s annar n unadi d tid yecban diɣ tigi:Anda akka d gren ikabaren n tserrtit bḥal l RCD d L FFS, acu umu yezmer umussu n timanit ad t‑yexdem?Anda‑t wawal n dewlap ɣef ayen yeɛnan talut‑agi?Lḥasun tugdi teskecem tucar‑is deg ixfawen n medden, telli‑d tawwurt i watwar ur nesɛi tillisit, yal asteqsi yesawal i westeqsi nniḍen, yal lejwab yuffa‑d iman‑is ixus, imi tazwert n tagra n temselt ur teben ara. Ddwa n taluft, di teswiɛta yella‑d kkan deg umjazi n yemdanen mgal anct‑a, yal tikelt mi ara d teḍru txazabit, nettwali imezdaɣ n tmurt n Leqbayel ddukulen akken ad frun tamselt am akken teḍra tikelt‑a deg tamanḍt Nat Jennad imi yettwexḍef Omar akked Moḥand Slimana deg Yimexllef. Deffir urif n yemdanen wid id t‑yewwin uɣalen rran aḍar serehen‑as ‑id, lamaɛni ar melmi?Du leqrar imdanen ad aɛyyun deg anect‑a, yal wa ad yeseḥbibir kan ɣef yiman‑is, imir annar ad yuɣal d ‑ayla n wid yellan deffir n txazabiyin‑agi. Tasusmi n imdebren yettukelfen ɣef anect‑a tesenerna lḥir deg ulawen n yemdanen, ma d teswiɛt teɛejel ilaq ljwab ɣef tuttriwin d yeɣlin s annar, ilaq wid teɛna tamselt ad meslayen ɣef liḥala n laman di tmurt n Leqbayel, amer ad uɣalen‑t tregwa s amkan. D wa i d asirem n kra n wid nemeslay ɣef tadyant‑agi.
Ait Slimane Hamid
Ilmend n usmekti n wass aγelnaw n yimeεḍar,terza-d γer tγiwant n Sidi Σic tudukla « Tariq Essalama » i iqedcen γer uswir n lwilaya n Bgayet deg wayen yeεnan aseεlem n yimezdaγ s wayen akk yerzan tanhart d leqwanen-is akked wuguren-is.Di tirza-ya n useεlem i d-yellan ass n ssebt 04 dujember,iεeggalen n tdukla i d-nebder nutni akked yiγallen n usellek,ggan yiwet n temzikent n tsawer i d-yesbegginen laksidat yemxalafen yeḍran deg yiberdan n tmurt-nneγ;rnan daγen fesren-d aṭas n lekwaγeḍ ideg uran yisuḍaf d yakk isallen icudden γer tenhart.Γer yidis n temzikent-a i d-yellan deg uzniq iqublen axxam n ssinima,yella-d daγen usenεet n tetiqniyin i iwulmen ad tent-yexdem umdan akken ad isellek imejraḥ di tegnatin n laksidat.

Sadi Kaci
Tisuqas n yiseggasen. Isufa reqqen ttaẓen. Times tezga tecɛel, wa yesmendag-as, wa yettleddim-as-d isufa. At wadda d at ufella, am yiḍelli am wass-a, wa yeṭṭef taqacuct, wa yugad ad tt-yaweḍ, iḥuder iman-is ɣef trusi. Wa yekkat irgazen s wiyiḍ amer a t-id-iṣaḥ wemkan, amzun akken amkan-nni d lxali, win i as-yennan yexla i yexlan d iman-is ! Nessaked akin akka ma yella wayen ara ɣ-yeččaren tiṭ, ala tira d ccna i ɣ-dyettarran cwiṭ n ṛṛuḥ yal imi ara d-iḥder uneɣluy, yal imi ara nɣen tinekriwin n yemɣiden. Uuuuuuuuuh ay aḥbib ! Tanekra imi ara tt-id-nebder yettṛuḥ deg-naɣ nnefṣ, i nugad ala ameslay-agi i d-yeqqimen, iweqqeɛ-itt zemmem qemmem, ṭṭef imi-k susem : Cckal, rrebg, rriḥa n wussan n ẓẓmik, amek ara tefru ? Ayen nniḍen, kullec d aḥettet, kullec d tisigar.Wissen aseggas-agi ma ad as-necfu ? Wissen ma ad necfu ɣef tecṛaḍ iḍebɛen s idammen n imeẓyanen ? wissen ma ad necfu ɣef wid i ɣ-yerran takmamt, gezzren deg-naɣ nekni nettwali ? wissen ma neɛyu seg yiseflan, ad yeɛyu lhem, ad nbeddel tikli i teflukin yewwin acḥal d ilemẓi d asfel ? Wissen ma ad beddlen wussan n tesdawiyin, ad ɣren warrac, a nezdi lqed am nekni am medden ? Wissen ma ad aɣ-ǧǧen abrid a nɛeddi, ad teɛyu tmettant deg ucelqef n leṛwaḥ, a tibnin teswiɛt, fell-asen fell-aneɣ ? Wissen ma ad negren wid yessengaren tudert di tmurt-nneɣ ? Wissen ma ad d-nelli allen, ad nessiked ar zdat, ad nwali i ɣ-yeggunin si tsuqas n yiseggasen ? Wissen…? Ssya ar ass-n, aseggas amerbuḥ i medden meṛṛa !
Zira– 500g n lfarina.– 15 cl n waman n ččina.– 20 cl n uyefki.– Tubya n lemleḥ.– Iqcer n ččina i yeẓden.– 4 n tɣenjayin n zzit.– 4 n tɣenjeyin n skar.– 200g n lexmira n temtunt.– Tabakit n les fruits confits.– Tamellalt.I ucebbeḥ</strong>– 2 n tenjayin n la confiture n lmecmac.– 2 n tenjayin n la noix de coco.– 2n tenjayin n waman n ččina.Aheggi :</strong>Daxel n ljefna ad nesmir aman n ččina ad as-nernu ayefk, iqcer n ččina yeẓden, lemleḥ, zzit, skar, tamellalt akked les fruits confits. Ad nexled mmliḥ, ad as-nernu lfarina akked lexmira i nessefsi deg uyefki d tabakit n lexmira. Arukti-nni d win yeḥlulin am acemma. Ad t-neǧ ad yers azal n nnefs n ssaɛa. Ad nedhen ifassen-nne s cwiṭ n zzit, anebbi arekti, sakin ad t-ner ɣer sniwa timdewwert, ad neǧ wanej littaɛ gar-asent, ad tent-num ad tent-neǧ ad aent azal n 20 d qayeq, u as asent-nexdem afares n tamellalt sufella, ad ner ar lkuca ad wwent. Mi wwant ad nessefsi la confiture akked waman-nni n ččina, sakin ad as-nesmir siru, ad as-nezzuzer la noix de coco.
S ɣur Nora.</strong>
Imezdaγ n taddart n Wizgan ttidiren yiwen wugur meqqren nezzah, deg acḥal n wagguren-agi. Ugur-agi d win n yibardan, imi takebbanit n lgaz tγez ibardan, terwi-ten tunef-asen akken. Ma yella teγli-d tiqit n lehwa, yekkar walluḍ di lqaεa, ulac win izemren a d-yelḥu wama tumubilat fiḥel awal fell-asent. Iberdan merra yettawin neγ yessufuγen xeṣren, ulac win iṣelḥen.Ula d abrid amenzawi (principal) n ṭumubilat icuden ger Tḥemmalt d tγiwant n Wizgan yuγal d iγzar. Akken kan ar ay-reqqaε webrid a d-tas tkebbanit niḍen a d-tγez, tagi d takebbanit n wamman n tγiwant n Wizgan (ADE). Muḥal texdem lxedma zeddigen, muḥal texdem lxedma tffuk-itt, tezga teqqaz, tettağğa ixemjan brarḥen, muḥal rran aγbel i yemγaren d warrac imecṭaḥ γef yγelluy. Ihi imezdaγ n taddart n Wizgan sḥasfen aṭas i waya, syen gren tiγri i yemḍebren n tkebbaniyin-agi, Lgaz d Wamman akken a d-ṣegmen lxedma-nsen, syen a d-ṣegmen ibardan.
Islam Bessaci
Illula Umalu Reffu n yimezdaγImezdaγ n tadart n Bubhir, taγiwant n Yillula umalu, dayra n Wizgan begnen-d lγiḍ-nsen ass n 17 yennayer n ddurt-agi yezrin s wagzam n yibardan. Tamentilt n wugur-agi, d-tugin i yugin asenfar n wuẓu n yiwen uḍummu ( centre d’enfouissement technique CET) γer yiri n tadart-nsen i lfayda n krad(3) n tγiwanin, At-Yaḥya, Illula Umalu d Ṣwamaε.Yuγ lḥal, imezdaγ n Bubhir gren tiγri i yemḍebren i tennul temsalt, am uselway n tγiwant n Yillula Umalu, aselway n Dayra n Wizgan, anemhal n twenaḍt n twilayat n Tizi-Wezzu i tuksa n usenfar-agi deg weḍiq-agi i yellan tamḍiq n tfellaḥt. Rnu γef waya, aṭas n lemḍara swayes ara d-yeglu i tezmert n yemdanen akk d-tfellaḥt, dγa wwin-d yiwen n ttbut n tusnawit n lemḍara-agi amedya (« lixiviation (“jus de poubelle”) et du biogaz (méthane). Ussan-d yemḍebren-agi acḥal d tikkelt, maca ugur muḥal yefra. Tikkel-agi taneggarut, atan imḍebren fkan awal i tuksa n usenfar-agi s wudem unṣib.
Islam Bessaci
I tikkelt tamenzut deg twilayt n Tizi Wezzu ad yili useqdec n ttawil n l’Internet deg unexzur n les bulletins n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas amaynut i_d- yezgan deg Abaṭṭwar deg temdint n Draɛ Lmizan. S waya, imawlan n yinelmaden ad izmiren ad walin tizmilin n warraw nsen deg le site www.webgesco.com, mbeɛd mi ara d- awin isallen i ilaqan « le code n uɣerbaz d le mot de passe » deg tnemhalt n uɣerbaz. Ad nerr lwelha belli d anemhal n uɣerbaz-agi i yellan deffir cɣel-agi, iwakken ad iɛiwin, am wakken i yessewjad ttawilat ara t-yeǧǧen ad yettazen tibratin i yimawlan s ttawil n les e-mail. D ayen ara yessisehlen i yimawlan ad ḥsun acu i ixeddmen warraw nsen deg uɣerbaz, ama d ayen yeɛnan tanabat, leqdic nsen …. Deg taggara, ad ner lwelha belli aɣerbaz- agi yettili yal aseggas gar wid i d-yettawin igemmaḍ ifazen..
D.Imgaline
Asenfar n ubrid n Tizi Wezzu- Ɛumer Asenfar n ubrid ara icudden tamdint n Tizi Wezzu d ubrid ameqran Asamar- amalu ara iɛeddin seg temdint n Ɛumer deg twilayt n Tubiret ad yebdu deg setta n wagguren imenza deg useggas ideg nella. Ad nerr lwelha belli asenfar-agi i yetturajun deg « le plan quinquennal », d win iɣef qedcen tlata n « les bureaux d’études ». Am wakken ad d-nesmekti belli abrid- agi d win ara icudden tamdint n Draɛ Ben xedda, d temnaḍin nniḍen am At Yaḥia Musa, Draɛ Lmizan Qbel ma ad yaweḍ ɣer Temdint n Aomar deg twilayt n Tubiret. Deg taggara iwulem ad d- nini belli asenfar- agi d win ara d-yawin anegmu n tdamsa n twilayt n Tizi Wezzu, s usiweḍ n sselɛa i-d yettawḍen s Bgayet d ǧenǧen s lemɣawla. Am wakken ara yesswaḍ ubrid- agi ɣer temnaḍt n Buɣni seg temdint n Draɛ Lmizan asmi ara bdun lecɣal n CW128.

Ass n 29 d 30 deg waggur iεeddan, tella-d yiwet n temilit γef tudert n Ccix Muḥend U Lḥusin deg uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer n temdint n Tizi Wezzu. I lmend n waya, yettwagga-d wahil i sin wassan-a : timsikent n yidlisen, tamedyazt sγur Ahmed LAHLOU, Mourad RAHMANE d Hafid CHENNANE. Ma dayen yeεnan isaragen heggan-ten-id : CHEMAKH Said, yewwi-d awal γef tmedyazt taqdimt n Ccix Muḥend anda i d-yesmekti amezruy n tmedyazt taqbaylit. I wakken ad yefk udem n tussna i umeslay-is, yebda-d si Hérodote, Platon, Ibn Khaldoun akked wayen uran Mouloud Mammeri d Boulifa. GHOBRINI Mohamed yemmeslay-d si sefra γef temlilit i d-ixeyyel gar Ccix Muḥend akked Si Muḥend U Mḥend. Mohand Ouramdane LARAB netta yeḥaka-d tudert n Ccix Muḥend U Lḥusin. Abdenour ABDESLAM yefka-d tamuγli-s γef Ccix Muḥend U Lḥusin AMUSNAW. Asarag aneggaru yewwi-t-id Brahim SALHI γef Ccix di tariqa Rreḥmaniya.  Xas yal wa d acu n uḥric γef wacu i d-yemmeslay meεna akken ma llan beggnen-d d akken Ccix Muḥend d bab n tmussni, d Amussnaw i iferrun timsal. Γef wanect-a dγa i d-yenna Abdennour Abdeslam : iruḥ yiwen wass le juge n Larebεa γer Ccix Muḥend iwakken ad iẓer amek iferru timsalt. Mi yewweḍ yenna-as : sliγ tferruḍ akk timsal n wid i d-yettasen γur-k a Ccix, amek i txeddmeḍ ? Nekni di craε yewεer ad tent-nefru. Yerra-as-d Ccix :’’mi d-usan sin, yiwen yefhem wayeḍ ixus, ad d-nekkes ciṭ n lefhama γer winna i ifehmen ad tt-nefk i winna ur nefhim dγa ad msefhamen. Ma yella usan-d sin fehmen, dinna yeshel ad msefhamen’’. Din din, yenna-as-d le juge :’’ i ma yella usan-d sin ur fhimen ara, acu ara asen-txedmeḍ ? Yerra-as-d Ccix :’’ d wid i nettceyyiε γur-wen’’.

D.I
…Tameddit-nni, polyclinique ssirklin-tt ibuliḥiyen d yijadarmiyen. Seg ṭṭiqan, nettnezzih deg wahruḥu ssekrent tmacinin antiémeute.Amcwar akka, ɛeqleɣ yemma gar les adultes yemlalen deg ubeteḥḍaḥ n polyclnique. Terfed tabeḥnuqt yura deg-s “vive abibiḍ !! “ u tettuɣu s lqed n uqerru-s “abuliḥ dégage ! “.Ad as-settwahiɣ s ufus-iw, ur d iyi-d-wala ara. Baba aussi i ḍehriyi-d gar kra n yemdanen, ula d nutni refden tibḥenyaq d teɛlamin u cennun : “min ǧibalina ṭalaɛa ssawt…”.Pendant ce temps, daxel n lbiru n wefremli, imeddukal-iw ibibiḍen ttruẓun tiseknatin n vaccin. Deg yiwet n tekwat, yiwen ubibiḍ d tbibiḍt mmyuṭafen afus, ssefruyen tayri. Cwiṭ akka, yeslalew tilifun. Teɣli-d tsusmi. Ur faqeɣ ara d yiman-iw almi refdeɣ combiné.– Allo ! Dagi d imḍebber n srabes n laman. Anwa keč ?– Euh…nek d abibiḍ– Isem-ik ? – Abibiḍ ! I keč isem-ik ?– Terwam ayefki d petit suisse, testufam-d i umesxer… ad awen fkeɣ nnefs n ssaɛa akken ad d-tefɣem, sinon d moustache ara n-iẓedmen.Sserseɣ tilifun sfehmeɣ-asen i yimeddukal-iw ayen d-yenna ubuliḥ. A l’unanimité suɣen-d : “ulac ulac, ulac tawafɣa ulac !”. Mi d-teɣli tsusmi, ibedd ubibiḍ n teqrbuzt ɣef ṭabla u yenna-d : “baba d l’ancien délégué n larac. Skifi sɛiɣ cwiṭ n l’expérience di temsal-agi n wemberrez mgal adabu. Tamezwarut, ilaq ad nemmtafaq ur nettuɣal ara ɣer deffir. Tis snat, ilaq ad nexdem akunklab, akken xeddmen larac, u ad d-nessebded une plateforme de revendications…” Netta akken ihedder, yerna yeslalew tilifun. Refdeɣ daɣen combiné.– Allo ! dagi d France 2 !– D acu ?– D tilibizyu n fransa. Nebɣa ad nemmeslay d yiwen seg yibibiḍen igrawliyen”  yettkemmil

« Amulli Ameggaz » d isem n yiwen seg yisefra i d-yeddan deg wamud, i yebγa umyaru ad yili d azwel n udlis-is aneggaru i d-yeffγen γer teẓrigin Tira. Am akken i nuγ tanumi yid-s, mass Brahim Tazaγart yezga yettawi-yaγ-d di tirawin-is γef yisental n tudert tatrart ideg nella ; tikelt-a yessfel-aγ i tizi n Akkin i Tira γer Tgelda n Tayri anda ttidiren Salas d Nuja. Yuγ lḥal kra kan n wussan i γ-iferrqen γef lεid n tayri neγ Saint Valentin, ass ideg ttafen tagnit wid yemyeḥmalen akken ad mbadalen lehdiyyat, neγ ad myehdun awalen ḥninen ladγa tamedyazt ifazen am yisefra n Brahim Tazaγart imi ddan akked lweqt d tatrara. Isefra yellan deg wamud « Amulli Ameggaz » d tamedyazt tilellit i yerẓan leqyud i icekklen ulawen i yebγan ad ssenfalin γef wussan izegzawen i yesεedda (neγ i yettmenni ad yesεeddi) yal amdan ; yenna deg usefru « Skaddbeγ » :Tecfiḍ !Ulac tiγmert i neğğa,Ncula di yal tama ;Nγemmes deg waman n yilel,Neglalez deg yal lεedra,Nuzzel γef yijdi yerγan,Nessumet iẓra di teẓgi ;Nnig-neγ llan yibkan,Wehmen mi nerfed tiγri.Amedyaz Brahim Tazaγart, ur yeqqim ara kan deg uwessef n cbaḥa n tmeṭṭut d usenfali γef tayri s ucucref neγ sufella kan, netta yetεemmeq deg unadi γef yizumal d tewlafin, yessetεan s tneqqist akken ad ibeyyen yes-s tidet n tayri-s d telqay-ines, yenna deg usefru « Ad am-d-awiγ » :Ad am-d-awiγ ayefki n tseddaDeg teglimt n mmi-s.Ad am-d-ččareγ urawD aman iγef mcenqaren yidurarAd am-t-in-ssendiγ s imi.Ad n-rzuγ fell-amGar yifassen-iw tteffaḥ ninuḥYerran amγar d amecṭuḥ.« Nnul n wallen-im », « Rriḥa n temẓi », « Tameṭṭut n tiselbi » d yisefra-nniḍen i d-yeddan deg wamud, yal yiwen seg-sen d tafelwit i d-yettalsen tamacahut n tayri i yedder neγ i yezmer ad yidir yal yiwen ; acu kan amedyaz yura-tt s yisekkilen n wureγ yeččuren d lemεani. Akka i d amedyaz, netta yezga yettḥussu s kra yellan, ula s wayen iγef rran tadimt yimdanen, timsal umi d-tezzi s weεrur tmetti-nneγ armi i uγalent d iṭabuten. Mass Brahim Tazaγart, yerẓa yiwen s yiṭabuten-a s usefru i d-yewwi γef lmeḥna n tmattakin ; tilawin-a i ixellsen di tugti-nsent, azal n lqanun n twacult i yessulin deg uzref n urgaz γef tmeṭṭut, i taswiεin yetεedday fell-as armi i tuγal d sselεa iγef ttemqacaren wid yettnadin γef lbenna n tuzzuft. S umata, amyaru Brahim Tazaγart, yenna-d s tmedyazt ayen akk i yezmer ad yini yal yiwen seg-neγ γef usentel n tayri d yisental-nniḍen n tudert tatrart, acu kan netta yenna-t-id s tmeslayt icebḥen yeččuren d lemεani ; ta d lbaḍna-s, ala netta i tt-yessnen.

Deg ussan iεeddan, mi d-yella uneḥbus n lxedma n yixeddamen n paramédical, nεedda γer sbiṭer Nedir Mohammed n temdint n Tizi Wezzu i wakken ad nẓer amek teddun lecγal dinna. Mi newweḍ, nemlal d srabes n SAMU n temdint n Tizi Wezzu. Nesteqsa yiwen gar yimḍebbren-nsen.
<span style="color: #ff0000;"><span style="color: #000000;">Aγmis n yimaziγen : aṭas, ahat, ur nessin d acu-t SAMU ?
<span style="color: #ff0000;">Ahcène Larabi : Le SAMU-nneγ yettwaxleq-d deg useggas n 2004, d yiwen n service i yettεawanen imdanen i yellan di yir liḥala berra n sbiṭer, ama deg yixxamen-nsen neγ di twaγiyin i iḍerrun di berra, ladγa les accidents. Acu lxilaf yellan gar sbiṭer d SAMU ? Lxilaf amezwaru d wa : sbiṭer ttruḥun-d γur-s imuḍan, le SAMU yettruḥu γer yimuḍan. D acu kan lant tlisa ur nezmir ara ad tent-nεeddi. Nekni neṭṭef kan tamdint n Tizi Wezzu, ur nezmir ara ad nruḥ berra ines alamma yefka-aγ-d ttriḥ lwali d wiyaḍ…ma daxel-is, win ara aγ-d-yessiwlen, din din newweḍ-it.Anwi yettilin di SAMU, acu diγ n ttawilat i tesεam ?Ttilin ṭṭebbat d yifremliyen i d-yettwaggan i lmend n waya. Ixeddam-a ferqen γef sin yigrawen axaṭer lxedma-nneγ iḍ d wass. Nesεa daγen snat les ambulances daxel-nsent llan akk ttawilat ilaqen.  Tzemreḍ ad d-tiniḍ acḥal i awen-d-yessawlen deg wagguren-agi ineggura ?Di 6 wagguren iεeddan, sawlen-aγ-d azal n 1477. Llan wid uγur nruḥ, llan wiyaḍ nefka-asen kan iwillihen. Gar wid uγur nruḥ, 256 nduwa-ten deg umekkan. 192 newwi-ten-id γer sbiṭer n Tizi Wezzu.
Awal-ik aneggaru.Xxas akka aql-aγ di la grève, meεna llan wid ixeddmen, ama d nekni ama d ixeddamen n sbiṭer. Akken yebγu yili lḥal, nelha-d d imuḍan-nneγ. Ad asen-iniγ i wid yeḥwağen lemεawna deg uḥric-agi n seḥḥa, zemren ad aγ-d-ssiwlen γer wuṭṭun-agi n tililifun : 026 21 29 12/026 21 29 18.
Hocine. M
Ass n n sebt 12 Furar 2011, yekker uhetwir di net. Imdanen ttemsawalen s tawil n Facebook akked ismilen imetiyen nniḍen yecban tewweter, mysapce. Si tama nniḍen iɣmisen i d-ittefɣen s wudem n lweb ttaznen-d isalen si dqiqa ɣer tayeḍ. Yefud lɣaci ad iwali. Yebɣa ad iẓer acu i iḍerrun di Lezzayer tamanaɣṭ. Kra ahat sarmen d tagrawla ara yesenquqlen adabu am tin n Tunes neɣ n Maṣṣer. Wigi d wid mazal ttlen deg ufezqi n nniya. Wigi d win yettun belli uqbel ad tezrɛeḍ timẓin, ẓẓer qabel amek yegga akal. Awah aṭas umu tteksent ccfawat. Di tillawt, amek akka i iga wakal ? Amek yeɛrek urekti n tegrawla wuɣur tesfiliteḍ? Amek yenǧǧer ubrid deg tenwiḍ ad ddun yimdanen amer ad bedlen leryaḥ? Amek ur ak-d-iban ara illuḍ? Amzun yella nṣib deg yixmir ! Win ur nessin ad iɣer di zmam n tsertit ula d i t-yewwin ad yarru tiwriqin deg ad yesefru udem n uzekka. Widen yurgan ad tbeddel yezwer usḥisef ɣer nadam-nsen. Lawan n tnekra yefka-t unebdu i wayeḍ, mazal ur d yelḥiq. Eṭṭes, eṭṭes mazal lḥal ur yelli d ass i deg ar aɣ-id-iṣaḥ wawal. Lezzayer tuɣal d taɣremt ur yezmir ad yekcem ḥedd. Imṣulta nniḍen, isardasen yettaken lhiba ɣer lebɛid. Leḥwari rgagint, igenni yujaq, lebḥer yulwa. Imezdaɣ n tamdint ur d-ligen. Wid i yessawlen ɣer tikli am yal tikelt d imsedurar. Si zik d nutni kan. At temdint, aya yettwasen, d awezɣi ad ddun akked imesdurar. Akka i d udem n tnakriwin. Widen iḍemɛen telluled taddukli tefeɣ-asen tirga mxelfa. Deg akken izad ukerfa, tagnit terra awal ɣer Qsentini akken ad yewwet deg wide tečča tmes. Ahat yesɛa lḥeqq melmi akka timesbaniyin ferunt lecɣel? Lamaɛna aɣbel d times. Ih Times-nni, anwi i tt-yeẓran mi tečča igelman n widen yeɛyan d iṣsber? Gar timerɣiwt d tayeḍ tuli-d tiɣri n Amaziɣ Kateb i laslaf : “win yebɣan ad tebddel, ixemel ɣef iɣalen-is”. Maca, yella deg awal yiwet n tfirelest d awezɣi ad teg tafsut! Anda akka xemtent tuɣac n yinaẓuren-nneɣ? Yettuɣad ziɣ win yenwan di lehlak ad yeǧbu ḥellu. Aneɣlaf n daxel yessufeɣ-d timajatin-is. Ala tikli ur d nettili. Wid iḥercen fran-tt dr ṛay, tikli-agi ur ten- id-tecqi. Ma d wid umu yeqqers uhdum, at tiwenza berriken, si zzman i yeẓran belli abrid ɣer Leẓẓayer yettwagdel. Asmi i d-nnan, i d-berḥen ɣef anect-nni yiwen ur asen yesli. Ihi imi akka tura aɣbel d aɣbel n wegdud mačči d ayala nsen. Fuken les tabous, akka i d FFS ! Mu mačči d netta ara yesnehren tamacint a wer teqleɛ. Widen yeẓran faqen ur yelli d Buhadef neɣ d Jamel Zenati ara ijebren taluft. Yehwayeɣ kan wama si zik I neẓra belli uqbel ad tezrɛeḍ timzin ẓẓer amek i iga wakal. Akal iluɣ, d awezɣi ad yili tmaɛ deg walluḍ. Lwiza Ḥanun ula d nettat tfaq. Amek aka ara lḥun ixadamen akked imsehraniyen ? Amzun deg tasqamut i d -yegran tiɣri ɣer tikli ala akabar n RCD i yellan. i wiyaḍ ? Ahat ɣer Lwiza Ḥanun llan kan d ixeclawen rnan-d s ufella. Win umu tekkes tirẓi n ugris lhem d lmuḥal ad yecfu. L’internit ur yezmir i kra di tagnit deg amur ameqran n yimezdeɣ n tamdint smenyafen duminu ɣef allalen n tmusni. Asṭebṭab ɣef ṭabla ur ǧǧin ara. Ttun kan belli ula d duminu si zzman i tettwerqed. Teɣleq duminu ma d leḥsab yugi ad yers. ɛad teɣli lkerta-k ay aḥbib akken id as -yenna umedyaz deg awal-is. Diri-t wurar s tidas iwen d-snulfan. Win teṭṭef tcerket, ilaq ad yesɛu tasa ad yegzem afus. Ziɣ deg yir tagnit nḥamel yir urar, afus yeffeɣ -aɣ, armi nettceliḥ di tassiwin-nneɣ s yicaren i aɣ-d-fkan. Diri-t urar s tmes. Diri-tt tikli deg yiberden yettwareglen, diri-t anamar n uwaɣzen, diri-t win iḍefren azrem ɣer lɣar. Lamaɛan nnif aṣṣeṭaf ur irahen ur yettwaṭṭef. 90 isaggasen di lɛemer- is mazal yettnaḍaḥ. ma d imezdeɣ n temdint ṭtsen. Anda lɛez? Andat nnif? Anda-tt lḥeṛma? Yettɣad win yenwan ad yessaki agris di teṣmed deg ayen akken yeẓẓel. Asmi ara yegger affus-is a d iqujer. Aqarif iḥuzan allaɣ yeǧǧad iɣisan di tidmi n yemdanen. Timuɣliwin myarẓent ɣef ẓerb n leɣṛur. Wi cqa ma ttmaǧiden warrac, wi cqa ma times tekker deg iɛrar n wid ur nuklal, wi cqa ma ddel yerẓa ifaden i tulawin d yergazen. Lẓẓayer telha ! Ur telli d Tunes ur telili d Maṣṣer. S tidet Lẓẓayer telha, wissen kan acu itt- ixusen. Win yettun, yella Matub at id yesmekti. Di linternit iɣmisen n lweb ttaken isalen, imazdaɣ nLẓẓayer tamanaɣt zedwen ɣef tugdi akked ustehzi. Annef i umesdrar ad ixalas. Ziɣ diri win yenwan anṣib deg yixmir, ziɣ diri win izerɛen melba ma yeẓra amek yegga wakal. Deg akken izamaren d yelḥeq wuccen ur ksin ur d uɣalen,, di tamdint yulwan ur d telli tikli ur yelli yiɣimi. Bexlaf zhir n ṛublan nnig iqerra yedewir akken ad icebel tirga nneɣ. Wid yetterguin nnan ljerya ad ttuɛawed. Sebt ad yesiwel i ssebt, zhir n isardasen si tura yetthuzu akal!
Ait Slimane Hamid
Ulamma tuget n yizzayriyen sfuglen akken i zemren tameɣra n Lmulud, anemhal n yidles n twilayt n Tubiret, Omar Reghal, yemmuger asiher-agi s lhif d uɣilif. Imḍebber-agi i d-yusan deg taggara n useggas n 2006 yeɣli-d fell-as isalli n uḥbas seg lxedma iḍ n Lmulud. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i d-nesqucced seg kra n tamiwin, O. Reghal ur yessawed ara ad yefhem ssebba i t-yessawḍen ɣer liḥala yecban ta, imi ulamma tettwasebded yiwet n tesqamut ara inadin anda tedda tedrimt n uḥric n yidles di Tubiret, maca, mazal ur tekfi ara axeddim-is iwakken ad yettwigzem dir rray. Din yettwakkes, din yettwabeggen-d win ara yettfen amkan-is. Wagi, d Nacer Mourad, i yellan d anemhal n yidles deg Bgayet. anda i teɣunzan inaẓuren. Anemhal-a amaynut, ur yelli d aɣrib ɣef Tubiret, imi iɛedda yakan seg-s d amaray amatu deg tmehla n usegmi. Akken yebɣu yili lhal, atas n yisenfaren I yettrajun anemhal-a amaynut, ama deg uhric n temkerdiyin, neɣ ahat asekfel n kra n yigerrujen icudden ɣer yidles nneɣ.

Ayen ilaqen– 300g n lmaqarun yewwan deg waman imelḥen.– 3 n tɣenjayin zzit uzemmur.– 2 n tfednin n ticcert yeẓden.– Nnefs n tedmert uyaziḍ yewwan, igezmn d imursuyin imecṭaḥ.– 100 g n tjilbant ifuren.– la mayonnaise.– Tifewa (lqernun) yewwen deg waman (gezment d imursuyin).– Taḥebbuyt n timaṭic (d imursuyin imecṭaḥ).– Ifelfel n leḥlu yezzan, igezmen d imursuyin.
Aheggi Ɣef tmes ḥlawen, d axel n tmeqlit, ad ner zzit, lemleḥ, ticcert. Ad ten-ḥrrek (azal n d qiqa) u ad asen-nernu lmaqarun. Ad neqlu s leḥder azal n 3 dqayeq. Ad nernu la mayonnaise i nessaxef d lxedra-nni yewwan. Ad ten-nexleḍ akked imursuyin n uyaziḍ, ad ten-nessers daxel n uḍebsi n claḍa u aten-cebbeḥ s ṭumaṭic, ifelfel d lqernun.Aheggi n useqqi n la mayonnaise :Ad neddem taenjayt n la mayonnaise akked 4 n tenjayin n waman d 2 n tenjayin n lxel. Ad ten-nessexleḍ u ad asen-ernu cwṭ n lmaɛdnus.
S ɣur Noura
Kra kkant tmesbaniyin yeḍran di Libya i d-yeglan s tmettant d ujraḥ n yimeyyaten seg yilmeẓyen, lwelha n ttawilat n yisallen n tmura n ddunit ladγa tilibizyuwat, terra γer Lqeddafi d leḥkem-is arebrab ur nesεi lmital. Aṭas i iwehhmen seg yimeslayen-is, ideg yessawal γer usenger n ugdud i yeḥkem s yiγil i wazal n 42 n yiseggasen ; icuba imesbaniyen γer yiγerdayen, yettwali d lḥeqq fell-as ad ten-yessenger. Mačči kan d aya, Agellid n yigelliden n Tefriqt (am akken i yettwali iman-is) am netta am mmi-s, yal tikelt ideg ara d-mmeslayen di tilibizyu, qqaren-d : « Imesbaniyen i d-yettefγen γer yiberdan ur llin ara di lγerḍ-nsen imi ččan tikaciyin ! ». Deg yiwen n umaṭṭaf n tilibizyu, xedmen tidwilt γef usentel n « tmexlelt n Lqeddafi », anda i d-εeṛḍen yiwen n upsikyaṭṛ, yenna γef temsalt-a n tkaciyin : « Aṭṭan n Lqeddafi d lpaṛanuya, wid i yuḍnen lpaṛanuya di leεwayed-nsen ḥemmlen ad rren ayen xeddmen nutni γef wiyiḍ ; akken daγen ula d tamsalt n tkaciyin iγef yessaget awal, netta ma tmuqleḍ γur-s amek i yettmeslay neγ ula d llebsa-s d lefεayel-is s umata yettbin fell-as itett kra n uεeqqaṛ ama d tikaciyin neγ d kra n ladṛug-nniḍen ».Agdud alibi ur nuklal lhem, aṭas i yeṣbeṛ i tmexlelt n ubhim-a i yuγalen fell-as d lḥakem. I teγzi n leḥkem-is, Aqeṛṛu n Tegrewla n Lfatiḥ Alεaḍim(am akken i isemma iman-is) seg wasmi i yexdem akudiṭa deg useggas n 1969 armi d ass-a, netta d asxeṛweḍ d uḥettem n tiktiwin-is ur nesεi lmeεna γef yimdanen : yesbedd leḥkem n leεṛuc i yettwali yif win n yikabaren, yura tirga-s d wayen akk i yettxayal deg udlis umi isemma Alkitab Al-axḍeṛ neγ Adlis Azegzaw icuba-t γer Leqṛan neγ kteṛ, s yes-s i yesselḥay lumuṛ n tudert di Libya. Ifuṛes tagnit anda i yeεma leğnas s uṣurdi i d-yeggar deg lpiṭṛul d lgaz, wama yesban-d yakan tuccar-is deg yiseggasen iεeddan imi yella yettsanad imussuyen irebraben yerna yesseγli-d yiwet n tmesrifegt n Marikan deg umkan umi qqaṛen Lockerbie (tamnaḍt n Ecosse, Briṭaniya)deg useggas n 1988, ayen i yas-d yeglan s lεuqubat n usqamu n laman n ugraw n leğnas yedduklen. Segmi i as-ksen lεuqubat deg useggas n 2003, yuγal d ilelli, yesbedd sleṭna-s akken ilaq netta akked warraw-is, idrimen llan, wezzeε kan teṛnuḍ γas ṛṛay yetlef ! Ma d agdud meskin yerra-yas tawenza-s γer deffir s tiktiwin-is yeffγen i lwaqeε d lmeεqul ; d tekmamt i yerra γef tlelliyin d tugdut :ur yeğği imeγnasen n tmaziγt la wid n yizerfan n umdan neγ at icumar, wa yenγa-t wa yeḥbes-it wa yetlef-it γer tmura n lbeṛṛani, yenγa azal n 1200 n yimeḥbas di Benghazi deg useggas n 1996. Aḥun Ṛebbi tusa-d tegrewla n 17 di fuṛaṛ, d nettat kan i d-tagnit iwulmen akken ad d-suffγen iman-sen yilibiyen seg ṭlam, γas ẓṛan aya ad yeglu s waṭas n yiseflan.
 Mokrane Chikhi
…Mi nessezdeg tazeqqa, nheyya ṭablat d yikursiyen, nerra le plus vieux bibiḍ d lberzidan n ukunklab. Isem-is Ifsan. D abibiḍ n at Rgad, yessaweḍ 28 n wagguren di leɛmer-is. Sneɣ-t yakan: mmlaleɣ-t-id, uqbel n wass-a, deg polyclinique. Yezga yessuli asawen i yemma-s, mi ara d-yeḥḍer tour-is ad iwet tisegnit. Mačči d tisegnit i yugad : d afremli ur yeḥmil ara. “je refuse ad iyi-yiwet tisegnit buččamar-ina !», i d as-yeqqar i yemma-s, pendant que tettmatni yid-s ad as-tekkes la couche. “Aha, tikkelt-a i d taneggarut. La prochaine fois, di Val-de-Grâce ara tewteḍ tisegnit”. Asmi steqsaɣ baba ɣef Val-de-Grâce-agi, yenna-yi-d : “ – Tagi ay abibiḍ d polyclinique yekkaten tisegnatin ḥala i yibibiḍen i iɛeddan 70 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-nsen !– Abibiḍ n 70 n yiseggasen ! Ɛni ça existe a baba ?– Normalement, ala ! Mais… Lḥasun ad tfehmeḍ ayagi, asmi ara frurxent ugar les neurones-ik!” Atan ibedd Ifsan ɣef ukursi. “Cwiṭ n tsusmi deg leɛnaya-nwen !», i d-yenna lberzidan n ukunklab. Teɣli-d tsusmi. Izi ma yufeg ad as-tesleḍ.Akken i iruḥ ad d-yenṭeq Ifsan, yeslalew tilifun. Refdeɣ combiné– Allo ! wakka ?– D nek ! d…– Yemma ! Amek…?– Ccet ! Ḥess-iyi-d, aqli ssawaleɣ-d seg portable tura ara fakent les unités.– Yerbeḥ a yemma !– Aqla-ɣ neqqaz tunnel ar d-yefɣen ddaw lbiru n wefremli. Si sya ar tameddit ad nfak. si tam-nnwen rzet azal n rebɛa n tkarlajin di tlemmast n texxamt. pour réceptionner ayefki, aman, les compotes, les couches d wayen akk ara teḥwiǧem. Alih tura fukent les unités qim di lehna et vive tagrawla !

« Yella lbeɛd yella ulac-it, yella lbeɛd ulac-it, yella. » Zrin 22 n yiseggasen segmi i iɣab umusnaw, mazal ttaddren-t-id medden. Mehsub, ulac-it, yella.Di tegnit n wass-a, ahat nezmer ad d-nger yiwen n useqsi ma yella dɣa nemsawa akken ma nella zdat lmut ? D tidet, tura ɣef yimdanen irkelli, maca mi ara tili akken i neqqar : « D lmut n Rebbi ». lameɛna, ticki ara tt-yezdeɣ ccekk, amek ara s-nsemmi ? Tamettant n Lmulud At Mɛemmer terha achal d amdan. Yesberber fell-as wagu, almi i yeɛreq yixf-is.
Yura ɣef Si Muḥ u Mḥend, yura ɣef Yusef u Qasi. Yewwi-ten ddaw laεnaya-s isers-iten deg usqif n ṭmana akken asen-yesels tudert n lebda. Yenna Mulud Maεmmeri: “Ass-a lewqat bedlen. Yiwen ur yezmir ad yeɣḍel idles n weɣref akka kan εinani yernu s rda n imawlen-is” Yunag ɣer ccix Muḥend u Lḥusin, yugem-d di tdmi-s laqayen aṣeḍru n tafat akken ad icerreg amendil n tatut wa ad yeffeɣ ɣer tafat, amer talsa ad tẓer d acu i d tamuɣli n uqbayli ɣer timsal icudden amden ɣer wayeḍ, acu i t-yeqqenen ɣer tudert, acu id t-yezdin ɣer yigenwan. Am wakken id as-yenna Jean Lmuhub Ɛamruc: “Lḥif yugaren lḥif, mi ara nili nella lamaεni amzun nɣab. Nettawi deg ul tumert n wid yedren, d uḥulfu n tillin-nneɣ yezdin d uḥlufu n terzeg s war tilin n yixfawen-nneɣ. Tayematt i d aɣ-yesburen laεnaya, tamurt akked wakal ara ijemεen deg yiciwi-s, d nitini i d tafeka i aɣ-iccuden ɣer ugni n war tilin naɣ. Nezmer ad d-nini ma yehwa-yaɣ yewwi-yaɣ ɣer yixef n wasmi d teflali tudert. D nitini i d aɣ-yeqnen ɣer kra akken i d aɣ-inesren si gar ifassen. S wakka yettban belli inig akked unejli llan kan d udmawen n wayen iten-yugaren acku nnig timura deg i d-nettlal, ilaq ad nefreẓ lexyal n lǧennet yeɣban. Di tilawt kra yellan di dunnit d yiwen i d udem-is !” Urar n tudert akked d lmut, werǧin jlan deg tidmi n Mulud Mammeri. Yeẓra deg tlalit te’lla tmettant deg tmattent tettili-d tlalit. Kra ur yerwil ɣef kra. Leḥmala tettarew-d lkerh, lkerh yettnawal tayri. Seg yixef n ta i yettwweḍ wul ɣer yixef n tihin. Yenna Mulud Maεmmeri: “Xas yemgared udem n lmut, lamaεni i merra udmawen-is d imessasen. Maca tella lmut yugaren yakk tiyaḍ d tamettant n yidles. Tagi d timurseḍ ur nesεi amtil imi tella-d mgal laεqel d lmaεqul. Nezmer ad as-nkellex i kra yellan s wawal yezazalen tikerkas, nezmer ad nezzuzen tudert s ubeḥri n leɣrur, maεna di leqrar tilwat ad aɣ-teṭṭef gar tuccar-is” Mulud Mammeri, yeẓra ansi i d-tek ubeḥri n leɣrur. Mi nzan yergazen, mi iten-iɣur uṣurdi ttuɣalen d aεekkaz n lbṭal yeseqdac udabu mgal wid yettanadin ɣef tafat. Yeẓra diɣ xas ihuz yifer n useklu s waḍu n ẓur i d-iṣuḍen, ma iressa uẓar deg akal ur yelli d acu ara t-yesenquqlen. Yenna Mouloud Mammeri: “Teqqareḍ-as wihin iccennun timuzɣa d acu i d iswi-s ? D tidett cennuɣ timuzɣa. Idles amaziɣ d ayla-w. Maca ḥader ad tettuḍ belli ula d keč i d as-d-yekren d axsim dayla-k. Tamaziɣt d yiwen udem n timadit-nneɣ, tebɣiḍ neɣ tugiḍ. Trennu azal i nekwa-nneɣ, tettega-yas ccan, tettessu zdat-as abrid n tneflit. Ɣef waya d lwajeb-iw(am wakken d lwajeb-ik ula d keč) mačči kkan ad neseḥbiber fell-as, lamaεni as-neg akk alalen s wacu ara tefti wa ad tenerni” Iger Moulud Mammeri tamuɣli ɣer zdat. Ɣer uzekka acku yeẓra belli azekka, ibeddu seg ass-a. Ayen i ibeεden di tidet yeqrab. Ayen yellan d awezɣi ikennu zdat n lebɣi n yemdanen. D irgazen d tilawin i ibennun taɣerma, mačči d teɣerma i irefden igduden. Win yebɣan yidir yemmet, win yebɣen ad yemmet tewwi-d ad yidir; Yenna Mulud Maεmmeri: “Ticki ddant timsel mxalfa am leεwayed–nsent. Ticki di tettfent di neqma i umdan, ticki abrid deg tleḥuḍ yassawen,zmumeg-as i wugur tεeddiḍ, ɣur-k ad tereḍ aḍar! Xas kra teεniḍ yugi ad yeddu akken tebɣiḍ, ur as-ttεemid i facal ad ak-yeṭṭef afus. Xas kulci imal, yettban ẓẓay wecmumeḥ n wagaḍ ɣer yiswi ur tezriḍ melmi ad yaflali. Tudert tessewhem s sin n wudmawen-is: s rbeḥ-is akk d lexṣara-s. Qqaren d udem i iqeḍεen lewhem” Facal yegguni amdan i wumi reqiq lḥal. Ma ɣer at rẓana d ṣṣber, ẓran belli simmal tkerres, simmal telha i tulya. Yal accudu mexdum akken ad yefsi ! Yenna Mulud Maεmmeri: Acku Ticki fad yeseḥreq deg ulawen Ticki laẓ igezzem deg yiẓerman Zun akken n rennu asɣar i tafa Ɣer tagara… Yiwen usɣar seg ufus n wakli Yezmer ad yessiɣ Deg igenni n rebbi Deg ulawen n lɣaci Times Tin ur nxetti.

Ait Slimane Hamid </strong>
Ass n 26 di furar 1989, tameddit n wass, yuɣal-d umusnaw seg Lmerruk anda i yehder i yiwet n temlilit s wazal-is ɣef wayen icudden ɣer tmaziɣt d tmazɣa. akken kan i d-yewwed ɣer Ain Defla, din i as-d-uɣent akal, imi yiwet n lmusiba turag-d fell-as, yessufeɣ din rruh. Qerrihet tyita, imi argaz yecban wa mazal tehwag-it tmurt, ladɣa imi akken i tekcem Lezzayer deg tallit tamaynut i yeldin tawwurt i tugdut s yikabaren d tlelli n umeslay. « Le démocrate impénitent » ur yesɛi ara atas n wakud iwakken ad yesseftutes tiktiwin-is deg unnar, tiden akken i izedɣen allaɣ-is.D argaz i yettnaɣen yal ass ɣef lasel mi akken adabu yezzi-as s uɛrur. Amek ihi, deg useggas n 197ɛ, yesselmed tamaziɣt deg tseddawit n Lezzayer. Atas i ibehten amek akka tutlayt yecban ta tezmer ad tekcem annar n tussna ? Netta ibeggen-d aya s lxedma.Tafsut n yimaziɣen inedhen ass n 20 si yebrir 1980, d netta i as-ismendgen. Tamentilt tamenzut d akken mi ugin yimdebbren ad d-yemmeslay deg tesdawit n Tizi Ouzou ɣef udlis-is yerzan isefra n Si Muhend. Di teswiɛt-nni dɣa i d-mmeslayen fell-as deg tilizri n tmurt d akken d amdan i yebɣan ad yessuzzer ssem di tmurt. Llan wid iwumi yerra deg yiɣmisen, anda i asen-isemma : « Les donneurs de leçons ». Tudert-is i merra bedren-t-id snat n tikwal deg tilizri. Asmi n 2à yebrir, akked tmettant-is. Aya, ad t-naf deg tebrat i as-yura Tahar Djaout, seg yemmut.Ma nezzi-d kan s agerruj i d-yessegra, d ayen i yezmer umdan ad t-yesseqdec i tussna d tmusni. « La colline oubliée » yellan yakan d ungal yeqqel d asaru. Tagi d yiwet n tamawt gar tiyad anda ara naf annar wessiɛen deg tsekla taqbaylit yesseqdec Dda Lmulud. Nnig waya, yewwi-d tamusni yekseb s tutlayt tafrensist ɣer lasel-is netta. Yerra lwelha-s ɣer yisefra imi d nutni i d ljedra n tnaslit. Yura adlis ɣef Ccix Muhend U Lhusin. Yewwi-d yiwet n tezrawt d talqayant ɣef tudert n umusnaw-agi, d wamek i yessedda timsal di tallit-is. Imi ccix yesseqdac taqbaylit s unamek wessiɛen, Dda Lmulud yugem-d s ɣur-s tamusni, yerra-tt gar yifassen n kra n win yeɣran adlis-a. Macci deg-s ara naf tadyant n At Qasi ? £as akken cnan fell-as yimezwura, maca tuget n yiqbayliyen ur zrin ara anamek n tedyant-a, anda yenna :Wiyyak a Sɛid hess-iyiMuqel deg At QasiUr yelli hed akkan llanSi Tizi armi d tiziHe dur ten-yettɛasiS lbarud i tt-id-hellanAsmi i asen-iras s trusiCwit d iɣisiNegren, ggran-d ala aklan. Am wakken i d-yemger ayen akken mmeslayent snat n tgejda n teqbaylit, Ccix Muhend akked Si Muhend. Mi yewwed ɣur-s uneggaru-a, yenna-as A Ccix Muhend U LhusinNusa-d ad k-nissinNedmeɛ di lgiha-k cwitA lbaz izedɣen lehsinIhubb-ik uhninDdaraga-k hed ur tt-yewwidA ssfer heggi aɛwinUl-iw d amudinTamurt ad tbeddel wiyid.Gar sin yimusnawen-a, yemlalen yiwet n tikkelt kan, yuzzar wawal s lemɛun, yal wa amekn i yenna. Imeslayen nsen ggran-d ressan di tmetti, ttawin-ten medden d amedya, neɣ ahat d timsirin i tudert nsen. Ayenn yecban imeslayen-a :Macci d tiselbi i neslebAtas i nɛettebAql-aɣ d imehzan kullasLweqt-agi yeskaddebSalet lmujerrebWin ur nnuda ur ɛeddant fell-as.Imi Dda Lmulud yuran s tutlayt-is adlis-a iwala d akken tamaziɣt tehwag lsas iɣef ara ters, yessufeɣ-d deg useggas n 1976 yiwen n udlis iwumi isemma : tajerrumt n tmaziɣt. dɣa d tin i yellan di lmendad i uselmed n tmaziɣt yebdan deg uɣerbaz Azzayri deg useggas n 1995.
