Sylia. M</strong>
Ayen Ilaqen – Aqerru n lkrumb alemmas.– 500 g n wekesum n ubeqri.– Tibselṭ – Taenjayt n tumaṭic n tewwaṭ.– Taenjayt n zzit.– Amursu n wudi.– Tameqqunt n lmeɛdnus.– Lkumca n lḥemmes i ilexsen.– Ifelfel aberkan, lqerfa, lemleḥ, amursu n lbenna n ttib (jumbo).– Amursu n ufermaj yezḍen – Nnefs n tlimet.Aheggi Ad neddem aqerru n lekrumb ad t-negzem ɣef 4, ad s-nekkes tagurza-nni yeqquren, ad t-nessired, ad t-ner daxel n waman ad yeww. Ad as-nernu lemleḥ akked nnefs n tlimet ad t-neǧ ad yesli azal n 10 dqayeq. Sakin, ad t-id-nekkes, ad t-neslil, ad t-neǧ ad yudam. Daxel n tmermit, ad nessefsi udi akked zzit, ad asen-nernu tibselṭ inegzem d tarqaqt akked d imursuyin-nni n wekesum. Ad ten-neqlu u ad asen-nezuzer lemleḥ, ifelfel aberkan, lqerfa, lmeɛdnus, tumaṭic n tewwaṭ. Ad ten-neqlu akk akken, ad asen-nernu lḥemmes. Mi yewwa wekesum, ad t-id-nekkes, ad ner imursuyen n lekrumb daxel n u seqqi, ad as-nezzuzer amursu n lbenna n ubeqri, ad t-neǧ ad ikemmel tiwwin. Mi yewwa, ad ner s aseqqi imursuyin n wekesum.Tamawt : nezmer daɣen ad ner aseqqi daxel n sniwa n lkuca. Ad nseqqi akk imursuyin n lekrumb u ad asen-nezzuzer afermaj yezḍen, ad t-ner ar lkuca alamma yewwa lekrumb, u ad issew aseqqi.
S-ɣur Noura
I tikkelt niḍen, imezdaγ n taddart n At-Wizgan mazal ttidiren deg yiwet n tegnit tuεer nezzeh acku gten wuguren fell-asen. Takebbanit n STGE n lgaz tγez ibardan, terwi-ten teğğa-ten akken. Ibardan n ṭumubilat uγalen d iγezran, γef uḍar ulamek ara telḥuḍ. Takebbanit n wamman ADE (l’Algérienne des Eaux), si tama-s tneqqeb deg-yibardan, urεad ad-tekkfu lxedma ad-teṭṭarḍaq anda niḍen, teswaγ ula d-nettat ibardan s waṭas, tγez acḥal d axemmuğ teğğa-ten akken brarḥen, win ara yeγflen ad-yeγli γer-s. Uggur meqqren nezzah dwin n waman n uzulliγ n tγiwant n Wizgan i d-iccuden γer wamman n uzulliγ n taddart n At-Wizgan, tama n Welma, ṭreḍqen wamman-agi uzulliγ ttazalen sufella, tfuḥ tegnitt rnu tettwaggad aṭas ma yella xelḍen wamman n zeddigen d wamman illuγen (azulliγ).Ma yella terna-d teγli-d tiqit n lehwa, yekkar walluḍ di lqaεa, ulac win izemren a d-yelḥu wama tumubilat fiḥel awal fell-asent. Ibardan γelben iγezran. Rnu γef waya, tiqqendert n Lεinser truḥ tsax. Iberdan merra yettawin neγ yessufuγen xeṣren, ulac win iṣelḥen, ulac tama i selken. Ula d abrid amenzawi (principal) n ṭumubilat icuden ger Tḥemmalt d tγiwant n Wizgan yuγal d iγzar. Ihi ulac win ixedmen lxedma zeddigen, ulac win ixedmen lxedma tffuk, muḥal rran aγbel i yemγaren d warrac imecṭaḥ γef uγelluy.Ula d imḍebren n tγiwant n Wizgan, muḥal gren-d tamawt γef ugguren-agi merra, ttawin-ten deg was γer wayeḍ. Ihi imezdaγ n taddart n Wizgan sḥasfen aṭas i waya, syen gren tiγri taneggarut i yemḍebren εlayen n temnaḍt n Wizgan, ama taselway n tγiwant, aselway n Dayra, tikebbaniyin teεna temsalt, imḍebbar n iγallen laman n tγiwant n Wizgan akk d Lwali n Lwilaya n Tizi-Wezzu, akken a d-affen tifrat i wugguren-agi mulac ussan i d-iteddun a d-γelqen Axxam n Tγiwant d Wexxam n Dayra n temnaḍt n Wizgan.
Islam Bessaci
Yal tikkelt mi ara d-yelli usenfar n ucuddu n lgaz n temdint deg temnaḍin yemgaraden deg Tmurt n leqbayal, ad t-id-iqabel umenuɣ s sebba n yimawlan n wakal i yettagin ad iɛdi uqadus n lgaz deg wayla-nsen. Dayen dɣa i yeǧǧan asenfar-a ameqran n usekcem n lgaz ɣer yixxamen ad yaweḍ ala ɣer 34% deg lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu.Tikkelt-a d tamnaṭ n iɛkuren, yettwasnen s tiẓgi-ines wessiɛen, anida imezdaɣ n tudrin Azru, Aḥmil d Cebel suteren, deg yiwet n tebrat, seg uneɣlaf n ssehd d leminat, yusef Yusfi, ad isekecem iman-is deg temsalt n ucuddu n turin-nsen ɣer uqadus n lgaz. Deg tebrat-a, iqqera n tejumuyaɛ n tudrin-a, rran lewelha belli, aqadus, naɣ la conduite principale uɣur tcud tɣiwant Iǧer ( Buzegen), d tin iɛeddan deg wakal- nsen mebla ugur s-ɣur imawlan n wakal, mbaɛd imi ten-waɛden srabes n tekubanit n Sonalgaz belli ad yili ucuddu n tudrin deg kea n wagguren kan, maca ar assa kra ur d-yelli. S wakka tijemuyaɛ n tudrin-a d tid yessawelen imezdaɣ i wakken ad d -sbegnen leɣiḍ-nsen ma yella ur d-telli tifrat i weɣebel. 
Dalila.I
Draɛ LemizanRfan imezdaɣ n Maɛmar Imezdaɣ n tadert Maɛmar deg udewar n Bumhenni i d-yezgan ɣef teɣzi n 7 ikilumiteren deg ugafa n tɣiwant n Draɛ Lmizan, deg unẓul n lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu, d wid i d-ibegnen reffu-nsen mgal n yir tasewiɛt deg ttidiren. Ɣas akken aṭas iseggasen seg suturen awenaɛ n tudert-nsen, maca ar ass-a acema ur d-iban. Imḍberen n tɣiwant d wid n lwilaya ur rrin ara lwelha-nsen ɣer temnaṭ-agi tiglilt. Aɣbel ameqran deg ttidiren imezdaɣ n tadert-a d temezduɣt ur newulem ara (l’habitat précaire). Ilmend n usuter n wezref-nsen deg tudert iwenɛen, ladɣa tamezduɣt iwulemen, ilemẓyen reglan abrid aɣelnaw W-25 deg umalas yezrin. Ad d-nesemkti belli imezdaɣ-agi d wid izedɣen deg yixxamen i tebna Fransa, tura atna deg yir liḥala, ɣas akken yella-d rray n lebni n tmezduɣin, maca acemma ur d-iban, aya imi akal i deg llan yettuɛeyen i lebni n tmzeduɣin i iḥuza useyax.
D.I
Lbaṭel d win iḥuzan tameṭṭut di yal tamnaḍt n ddunit. Ula di tmura i yuẓan ar zdat di tneflit a ten-naf ḥegfen tameṭṭut di yal aḥric n tmetti. Tamentilt–agi i yeğğan tameṭṭut tettnaγ γef yizerfan-is, ayagi d ayen idumen acḥal iseggasen. Asirem-is tewweḍ-it, tmuger talwit, tallit ideg dduklent tlawin afus deg ufus, tallit ideg zdint taktiwin-nsent i wakken ad beddent γef yiwen wawal.  Γef waya i d-tella tnekra n tmeṭṭut anda i d-tessuffeγ ayen yellan deg wul-is. Ul yellan yeččur d urrif, d lḥif yeṭṭerḍaq, yeslul-d tagrawla n 8 maγres. Ass amezwaru ideg d-teffeγ tmeṭṭut tsuγ-d mgal tmeḥqranit yettεeddayen fell-as, tbeggen-d tazmert-is d akken tezmer ad tili am nettat am urgaz di yal aḥric n tudert d ass 8 maγres 1856 di tmurt n Marikan. Grent-d tiγri i iḥuzan amaḍal s umata, anda sutrent izerfan-nsent akk tlelli-nsent, ugint lbaṭel d tmeḥeqranit yettεeddayen fell-asent, ugint tamεict n ddaw uḍar, ugint tudert n leγder. D luluf n tlawin i d-yeffγen γer yiberdan n tmanaḍt n Nyuyurk.Tinegmiyin-nsent d tid yeggten, gar-asent, asuter n yizerfan-nsent di yal aḥric n tudert, amsawi ger urgaz d tmeṭṭut ama d tjernaḍ n txeddimt-nsen ama di tewtilin neγ di talγiwin akk tγara d wukud n uxeddim…Di tnekra-yagi-nsent, ṣṣawḍen iγallen n laman ad wten tilawin i d-yeffγen γer yiberdan bγan a tent-ḥebsen, neγ a tent-qerεen deg umennuγ-nsent i d-bdant, bγan ur ttkemmilent ara di tikli-nsent maca amecwer-nsent d win γezzifen imi abrid d-wint d win yeṣṣawaḍen.. Ihi nutenti ugint ad brunt i tilla, ugint ad brunt i wawal-nsent, ṭṭfent deg-s, qeblent tiyita n uεekkaz, ttmenyif laεtab n yiwen wass wala win n yal ass.Iẓuran n tnekra-yagi mden, ẓḍan, uγen iẓuran n tegmatt akk d tdukli, dγa tanekra ur teqqim ara kan di tmurt n Marikan, tuγal telḥa taluft tennul akk tilawin n umaḍal, ffγent-d ula d nutenti γer yiberdan s yiwen yeswi, tella-d tuffγa n tlawin di :– Lahay di tmurt n la hulund deg useggas n 1889– Kubbenhagen deg useggas 1889– Di Rrus deg useggas 1913– Di Fransa deg useggas 1936– Di Lalman deg useggas 1936Tinekriwin-agi, glant-d s yemtawayen d tudsiwin n tlawin, uγalen yemdanen umnen d akken tameṭṭut tettiki di lebni n uzekka n tmurt, γef waya terra-ten tmara akken ad tt-sikin di yal aḥric n tmetti ama di tsertit, ama di tdamsa, ama deg yedles, ama deg umezruy,… atg.  S wakka tameṭṭut tḥella-d amḍiq-is di tmetti, amennuγ-is d tnekra-yis yegla-yas s wayen tessaram, yeffeγ-as laεtab ar tafat. Deg wagur n wunbir 1954 yeḍra-d yiwen uswir agraγlan amenzu n tmeṭṭut anda i d-slulent tiddukla tagraγlant n tmeṭṭut ideg ṣṣawḍent ttikint nnig n 129 n tuddsiwin n tlawin n 114 n tmura. Aswir-agi ttikint deg-s 41 tmura ideg llant 81 imelyan n tlawin. Γef waya yettwajerred deg wass-nni 8 maγers ad yili d ass agraγlan n tmeṭṭut.
Islam Bessaci</strong>
 “Akal d wawal” d adlis i d-yessufeɣ mass Arezqi Djamal deg useggas n 2009 ɣer tezrigin “Tira», amyaru-agi am akken musnaw d aselmad n tmaziɣt di tseddawit n tubiret, illul deg useggas 1966 di Tezmalt/Bgayet, yella yakkan d amaswaḍ n tutlayt tafransist akk d tamaziɣt di tubiret, si tama n usizreg adlis-agi i d ahil amenzu id-yesufeɣ, maca, mazal assirem ɣer zdat; imi netta yenna d akken yesεa idlisen nniḍen yettrağun asizreg. Deg ugbur n udlis-agi ad naf llant mraw d yiwet (11) n tulisin, yebda-tt s tin iwumi yega aẓewel “D acu i ixeddem Rebbi” sin ḍefrent-ed tiyaḍ ta deffir ta; “D ddker neɣ d llenta ?», “Irgazen kkaten uzzal», “Taqsiṭ n ugellid d wakli», “Tadyant n Ccix», “Aqelmun ɣer yiḍarren», “Teẓram neɣ ur teẓrim ara?», “Winna imecḥen aḍaḍ-is», “Bu snat n tlawin” “D acu i txeddem temẓi” sin yesegra-d s yiwen weḍris yerra-t d tijemilt i yaya-s tamedyazt. Myal yiwet di tulisin n wamud-agi ɣef acu d-tewwi ameslay, isental mgaraden si yiwet ɣer tayeḍ, ulac kra iten-yesduklen ala anziz n tutlayt(awal) d wakal i deg ḍrant, meslayent-ed ɣef trugza, yir jwaj, sεaya, lεeza, tusḍa d wayen nniḍen. “Akal d wawal” di tidet d yiwet n tira yellan di tlemast n webrid ger tmacahutt akk d tulist; ur telli d ta, ur telli d tihin, deg udlis-a yesdukkel urezqi Djamal ger weqbur d umaynut, deg-s yules-aɣ-ed timucuha s uɣanib amaynut, maca, nezmer ad d-nestaqsi: amek d-yeḍra waya? Amedya, di tulist tamenzut ”d acu i ixeddem Rebbi” taqsiṭ d tin n yiwen umaɣbun iwumi qqaren Ɛmer Aḥwayli, iḥḍer-as-ed ad yawi tarzeft i lqayed id-iḥuğen ussan-nni, dɣa mi is-tt-yewwi yaff-en din lḥeğağ n taddert win-d myal d llxir d wayen iwumi ur yezmir Ɛmer Aḥwayli, εedda yeqqim di ṭerf, yesetḥa; imi netta ur d-yewwi ala taɣaṭ-nni n lḥif… ihi seg ukufer-nni, yenṭaq ɣer lḥeğağ-nni yenna-asen: d acu i ixeddem Rebbi ass-a? yal yiwen amek is-d-yerra, keč tjahleḍ, ur tettsetḥiḍ ara… maca netta yezzi yenna-asen: ẓriɣ d acu i ixeddem, sin staqsant-id: d acu? yinni-yasen: ixellu ixxamen-nnwen iεemar wid n lqayed!! din mfaraqen irkkel.Ger tamawt deg tulist-a, am tulisin akk nniḍen n udlis-a, ad naf taqsiṭ tettban kan akka tettwasqucḍ-ed si tsekla taɣerfant, dɣa tuget n tulisin ḍrant di zman aqbur maca tameslayt swayes ttwarunt d tin n tura, ula d allallen n tira d wid n wass-a, dɣa netta yakkan iwelh-ed di tazwara n udlis d akken ad yefk azal i weglim, win yeṭṭfen s tidet amur ameqran deg tulisin n udlis-agi. Am akken nger tamawt daɣen d akken myal tulist tkefu s yizen, izen-nni dɣa id-yesebganen s wudem unṣib d akken tulist tettwazedmed seg idles aɣerfan. Гer tagara yettban-iyi-d d akken udem-agi n tira deg-s aṭas n wayen yelhan, ama i yemyura aceku ileddi-d abrid akken ad nḥiwec akk tasekla-nneɣ taɣerfant, am akken yelha i yimeɣriyen aceku deg-s aṭas n zhu d tfeḥcic, dɣa taɣuri igerzen akk d “wakal d wawal” n urezqi Djamal.
Bahlouli Ferhat
Ur nezmir ad d-nebder 19 di meɣres mebla ma nerra lwelha ɣer yiwen seg wid ijerden timunent n tmurt n Lezzayer. Ass yecban wa, iressan deg wallaɣ n yal azzayri ibeddel tikli d tmuɣli i tmurt yurzen azal n 132 n yiseggasen. Letfaq n Evian, yerra talast i lhers, yessufeɣ leɛtab n yizzayriyen ɣer tafat. Maca, widen akken iqublen De Gaulle d imdanen yumnen s wayen i ixeddmen, yerna kesben tabɣest ijehden. Tarbaɛt yennuɣen, yemmeslayen yella-d ɣef uqerruy-is yiwen n umsedrar, iwumi tǧa fransa isem n «le lion de Djurdjura».Krim Belkacem, imi d wa i d izem n ǧerǧer, ilul ass n 14 di ctember 1922 di Draâ El Mizan. Yewwi-t baba-s ɣer tmaneɣt anda yeɣra iwakken ad yessiwed ɣer taggara n uswir amenzu (certificat d’études), yerra-t-id ɣer taddart anda yebda lxedma deg tɣiwant. Tiktiwin-is ɣef lihala n tmurt ssaǧdent baba-s i yuɣalen yettaǧad ɣef tudert n mmi-s, dɣa yuzen-it iwakken ad d-yesɛeddi lɛesker am netta am tizyiwin-is. Di taggara n useggas n 1943, yekcem Krim s akabar n PPA, anda yebda ilemmed tasertit. Asmi walan Irumiyen d akken d yiwen n urǧaz i izemren ad yawi yid-s imdanen, ssawlen-as deǧ useǧǧas n 1947. Maca, yegguma ad yerr tudert-is deg yimi n yizem, yerfed iman-isɣer umadaɣ anda yettidir di tuffra. D ayen i t-yeǧǧan yexdem kra n tqullaɛ i watas n yimdebbren n fransa. Deg useggas n 1950, yuɣal d amdebber ɣef terbaɛt n PPA-MTLD anda llan lawan –nni azal n 22 n yiserdasen.Ɣer tama n Ouamrane, yelmal ass n 09 di yunyu 1954 akked Didouche, Boudiaf d Ben M’hidi anda i mmeslayen ɣef tnekra n tegrawla. D tin i d ssebba i t-yessawden iwexxer ɣef Messali iwakken ad heggin tanekra i tegrawla. Mi tenhewwal tegrawla, yuɣal d aqerru n temnadt n Leqbayel. Akken kan yekfa uǧraw n Ssumam, yerna di ccan iwakken ad yuɣal d argaz wis-sin n ǦPRA. Asmi i tefra teǧrawla, yugi ad yeqbel asqamu yettwasbedden n FLN, imi yugi rray n Ben Bella. Di 1965, asmi i d-yuli Boumediène ɣer leḥkem, ibedd Krim mgal iɣil yettwasxedmen, d ubrid i d-wwin widen yewwḍen ɣer tqacuct. Yunaǧ ɣer Lalman mi akken i as-sbabben aɛrad n tmenɣiwt n uselway Boumediène, almi i as-ḥekmen s lmut.Deg wass n 18 di tuber 1970, yettwanɣa di Franckfurt, daxel n texxamt n usensu anda yettidir. Ass n 24 di tuber 1984, nuqlen-d iɣsan-is ɣer tmeqbert n yiɣersiwin.Akka i d taggara n tudert n win akken i d-iɣedlen rrehba deg yirumyen ikesben lawan-nni yal ttawil n tegrawla.
Sylia. M
Ayen Ilaqen :– Aqerru n lkrumb alemmas.– 500 g n wekesum n ubeqri.– Tibselṭ – Taɤenjayt n tumaṭic n tewwaṭ.– Taɤenjayt n zzit.– Amursu n wudi.– Tameqqunt n lmeɛdnus.– Lkumca n lḥemmes i ilexsen.– Ifelfel aberkan, lqerfa, lemleḥ, amursu n lbenna n ttib (jumbo).– Amursu n ufermaj yezḍen – Nnefs n tlimet.
Aheggi :
Ad neddem aqerru n lekrumb ad t-negzem ɣef 4, ad s-nekkes tagurza-nni yeqquren, ad t-nessired, ad t-ner daxel n waman ad yeww. Ad as-nernu lemleḥ akked nnefs n tlimet ad t-neǧ ad yesli azal n 10 dqayeq. Sakin, ad t-id-nekkes, ad t-neslil, ad t-neǧ ad yudam. Daxel n tmermit, ad nessefsi udi akked zzit, ad asen-nernu tibselṭ inegzem d tarqaqt akked d imursuyin-nni n wekesum. Ad ten-neqlu u ad asen-nezuzer lemleḥ, ifelfel aberkan, lqerfa, lmeɛdnus, tumaṭic n tewwaṭ. Ad ten-neqlu akk akken, ad asen-nernu lḥemmes. Mi yewwa wekesum, ad t-id-nekkes, ad ner imursuyen n lekrumb daxel n u seqqi, ad as-nezzuzer amursu n lbenna n ubeqri, ad t-neǧ ad ikemmel tiwwin. Mi yewwa, ad ner s aseqqi imursuyin n wekesum.Tamawt : nezmer daɣen ad ner aseqqi daxel n sniwa n lkuca. Ad nseqqi akk imursuyin n lekrumb u ad asen-nezzuzer afermaj yezḍen, ad t-ner ar lkuca alamma yewwa lekrumb, u ad issew aseqqi.
S-ɣur Noura
Tanemhalt n uselmed n leḥirfat n Tizi Wezzu tegzem-itt di rray: ad yili i tikkelt tamenzut aselmed n leḥirfat i lemend n tilawin ur nxeddem ara. Aselmed-a d win ara d-yillin ɣef teɣzi n 2 ɣer 6 n wagguren, u ad setfaydint deg-s 575 n tilawin deg yeḥricen yemgaraden gar-asent amcaḍ, aẓetta, abrudi … Leḥirefat-a d tid i tezmer tmeṭṭut ad tent-xeddem deg uxxam-is. Ad ner lwelha belli aselmed-agi n leḥirfat d win ara yesaɛden aṭas n tlawin d telmeẓyin yeqqimen deg uxxam, yettidiren deg tamiwin ibaɛden n tmurt n leqbayel, melba ma xelsent. Tilawin i teɛna temsalt d tid ara yenejmaɛen deg wazal n 12 yid-sent. S wakka ad sutrent aselmed i tnemhalt n leḥirfat n lwilaya. Si tama niḍen ad ner lwelha belli aselmed-a d win yaɛnan daɣen tilawin yesɛan aswir n leqraya i igerzen d tid yesɛan yakan agerdas (le diplôme) imi aselmed yaɛna aḥric n leḥsabat ne ( la comptabilité (BT), d texegaṭ (le prêt-à-porter) i lemd n usewejed n le certificat de maitrise professionnelle (CMP) d l’’informatique. Deg taggara ad nesemekti belli lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu d tin yesɛn azal 45 n yexxamen n uselmed.
Dalila.I
Ain ZawiaTiwaculin deg yir taswiɛt Timzeduɣin n wazal n 10 n twaculin d tid yenṭaren mačči d kra deg taddart Ikoubaen d-yezgan deg usamar n tɣiwant n ain zawia deg wunẓul n lwilaya n Tizi Wezzu. Tiwaculin-a d tid ur neẓri anida ara ddunt s sebba n iɣeblan deg ttidirent. Taswiɛt-a d tin yeǧan imezdaɣ deg ddurt yezrin ad reglan abrid n lwilaya w-128 I yettawin ɣer Buɣni, i lemend n usuter n temzduɣin i tewaculin-a. Am akken suturen tifrat n weɣbel n wesyax i yellan d sebba yesenṭṭaren timzeduɣin. Ad nar lewelha belli yiwet n tesqamut i d-yesdukelen iɣalen n uḥareb, srabes n tmezduɣt n tɣiwant d tin yerzan ɣer wemkan anida I d asent—d-iban belli aseyax d win yelḥan azal n 150 n m2, d win yessenṭeren 10 n tmezduɣin.
D.I
Ma tecfiḍ ay amdakel ɣef yiḍ-nni amezwaru, ɣef tmuɣli tamezwarut, yuder ccfaṛ yuli, temmermeɣ d imeṭṭawen, uzzlen am waman, aman n igenni, aman n lebḥer, aman n ṣṣura … ad tuɣal ad d-teswawi lehwa taneggarut . Iḍ-agi ɣezzif fell-I, ad faṛsaɣ leḥbab n wul: lḥal iṛuḥ am acemma, d lewhi n leḥdac n yiḍ, qrib ad yemmlal wass d yiḍ am akka I d-nemlal. Nemlal-d s wallen, s tikti, s tira, s ṣṣut, s nnhati, s ssuṛa, s ubeḥri. Nessuk-d tamuɣli ɣef taddart bnan at Ṛebbi ɣef waman. Ixxamen tḥenncen, wa s idis n wa, xas ferqen-ten waman, ijemɛi-ten ṣṣut ubeḥri n lyali am wakken d asčenčen n tzebgatin n yelli Ɣriba. Tasusmi n yiḍ tecbeḥ s teftilin , s rriḥa n lehna, s rriḥa n liser. Imi ara sen-tesselfeḍ s tmuɣli am zun tebriḍ I yman-ik ɣef waman, ad tiliḍ akken kan telliḍ, am uqeclaw, fessus, akken i s-yehwa ad yurar d waman, rsen neɣ rwin kif kif. Iḍ-agi ɣezzif fell-I ad faṛsaɣ leḥbab d tirni: d asuden n yiwen yiḍ, d tamuɣli n yiwen yiḍ, d iḍes n yiwen yiḍ, d lemḥibba n yiwen yiḍ, d afares n lehna n yiwen yiḍ, d ccnawi n yiwen yiḍ, d azuzen n yiwen yiḍ, d ul n yiwen yiḍ.Ɣer-I d asayes, ɣer-s d afaṛes. D iḍ aneggaru, iḍ n lebɣi, iḍ n lembat, iḍ n uraju n win tuyes. Qim-d yid-I si leɛḍil, ad tɛeddi zzedwa n uḥemmel, zzedwa n targit, zzedwa n lemni.. iḍa-agi ɣezzif fell-I, ad cnuɣ taɣect n waman, ad iliɣ am waman, ad lḥuɣ tikli n waman yettecruruden am wecrred ufus-is ɣef leḥrir, ad iɛzizeɣ I tmuɣli, “ad rwunt tarda wallen-ik, a winna ḥemmlaɣ”.
Zira
Taddert n yigreb di tγiwant n Yillula Umalu,( 65 ikilumitren γef usammer n Tizi-Wezzu), tesudes-d yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is i wass n 04 d 05 yulyu 2011,s teγzi n sin n wussan ilmend n umuli wis n 49 n timunnent n tmurt n Lzzayer anda ar ad-ldin yiwen n usebdad n 46 n yimeγrasen (Stéle) i yeγlin d asfel i tlelli n tmurt n Lzzayer. Ass n 04 yulyu ad d-tillint temzikniyin, isura n tegrewla d waddal (Karaté-do). Tasebḥit n wass n 05 yunyu, d tulya n usebdad n 46 n yimeγrasen s wudem unsib, syen a d-yilli usarag n umazray mass Zinedine Kacimi γef umezruy n temnaḍt n yillula umalu. Tameddit n wass mbaεd imekli a d-yilli umeslay anagi (temoignage) γef yimeγrasen d xazabiyin ixedmen deg tallit-nni. γer tagara d tekfu s tmaγra n taddert. Iwesmekti kan, taγiwant n Yillula Umalu d tamnaḍt tamenzut deg-γlin waṭas n yimeγrasen, ger-asen γlin 740 d amdan, γef waya teṭṭef amḍiq amenzu i tmurt n Lzzeyar.
Islam Bessaci
Ayen Ilaqen :– Kra imurṣuyen uyaẓiḍ.– Tibṣelt i igezmen d tarqaqt.– Ticcert yezḍen (4 n tfednin )– Lemleḥ, ifelfel aberkan, skenjbir, lmeɛdnus.100g n wudi, 2tɣenjayin n zzit.
Aheggi n tkerbabin uyaẓiḍ :250g n wuksum yeẓḍen, taɣenjayt n rruẓ, ifelfel aberkan, lemleḥ, tibṣelt i igezmen d tarqaqt, lmeɛdnus i igezmen d imurṣuyen imecṭaḥ, cwiṭ n wudi ara nejmeɛ s tmellalt d tikerbabin.Aheggi :Daxel n tmermiṭ ad ner udi , zzit, imurṣuyen n uyaẓiḍ, lebṣel ,ticcert , lmeɛdnus, ifer n rrend d lemleḥ. Ad ten-neǧ ad qlun azal 5 n dqayeq , ad asen-nernu ifelfel aberkan d skenjbir. Mi yeqla mliḥ ad tenɣum s waman , ad as-nernu takummict n lḥemmes i yewwan nnefs n tiwwin. Mi qrib ad yeww uyaẓiḍ, ad as-nernu tikurbabin-nni ar d axel. Mi yeswa aseqqi, ad as-nezuzzer lmeɛdnus wa ad t-id-nessers.
Nora
Abrid aɣelnaw uṭṭun 09, i yellan gar Bgayet d Ṣṭif, yella deg-s lexsas d ameqqran. Ama seg tama n uxeddim-is, imi yeččuṛ d imedwab, d yiceqqiqen, ama seg tin n tafat i iɣaben meḥsub deg-s. Amedya d abrid yellan gar Bgayet d Tici. Neɣ ma tella ur tleḥḥu ara. Rnu ɣer waya, llan yimukan deg-s d amahi ameqqṛan ɣef yinehhaṛen. Amedya d aɣayan (virage) i yellan deg temnaḍt iwumu qqaren At Ɛnan, i yettabaεen i tɣiwant n Yiderginen. Aɣayan-a, idewwer mliḥ, ula d tafat ur yesεi ara. Mebla ma nettu belli, d abrid i iḥezzqen mliḥ, armi ur zmirent ad mlilent deg-s snat n tkeṛyas. Ayen yessuhamen ugar, amek i ttɛeddayen syin-a yikamyunen imeqqṛanen ? Acku amkan-nni, yettwassen s umahi-s, ṣṣawden dɣa kra n yinehhaṛen, semman-as “ṭṭuṛna n lmut”.
I yissali, deqs n yisehwa i d-yeḍṛan deg wadeg-nni. Ḍran-d yineggura ass n 04 akked 07 fuṛar yezrin. Deg-sen dɣa llan aṭas n yimejṛaḥ. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, abrid-a i yellan gar tɣiwant n tsexriwt d win n Ssuq Letnin i yettεeddayen seg win n Yiderginen, segmi yettwaxdem deg useggas n 1879, ar ass-a ulac d acu i ibeddlen deg-s. Γef usentel-a yenna-aɣ-d yiwen n yilemẓi seg tɣiwant n Yiderginen : “mačči d tikkelt mačči d snat i d-nehder ɣef uɣbel-a, isehwa deg ubrid-a ur ḥebbsen ara, ladɣa deg unebdu. Tecfam ahat ɣef wayen i yeḍṛan i umḍiq n uẓebbuc ilindi, imi i yegrareb. Ayagi mi ṭṭuqten wid yettεeddayen syin-a. Lameεna imasayen ur d-ggaren ara tamawt i waya, ḥacama tewweḍ tiyita ɣer yiɣes. Ihi ad d-nεiwed tiɣri i yimasayen i wakken ad xedmen abrid-a, ad t-swessεen, uqbel ad ifat lḥal ».K. K.
I lmend n usmekti wis 58 n tmenɣiwt n Lmulud At Caɛban (Mouloud Feraoun), nesseqsa mmi-s Ali ɣef wanda yewweḍ leqdic n Tesbeddit Mouloud Feraoun imi d netta i d aselway-is. Ɣef waya, yenna-d : ‘’Tella-d Tesbeddit Mouloud Feraoun i yidles d usedwel, i d-ilulen deg useggas n 2012, i wakken ad d-tessifrir isem n Mouloud Feraoun akked leqdicat-is, ladɣa i tsutwin timeẓyanin. Aṭas n leqdicat i nexdem, ama d isaragen neɣ timsikniyin. Mačči kan dagi deg lwilayat n daxel, meɛna ula deg usammar, deg unẓul d umalu, am Batna, Wehran, Sṭif, Xennecla, Sɛida, Biskra akked tiyaḍ. Nezmer ad d-nini, nxeddem azal n 12 ɣer 15 n temliliyin deg useggas.
D Tasbeddit Mouloud Feraoun i yidles d usedwel i d-yeskecmen, i tikklet tamezwarut, amsuḍen n tira n umaru. Aṭas n yimussnawen n taɣult-agi i ixedmen akked Tesbeddit Mouloud Feraoun i wakken ad fken afus n tallelt i Mass Abdelwahab Medjadj, amaray amatu n Tesbeddit i yessawḍen ad yexdem azal n 5 000 n yisebtar gar wayen yura Mouloud Feraoun. Leqdic-agi, ad yili deg uẓeṭṭa inmetti i wid yebɣan ad t-yesseqdec, ama d inelmaden, isdawanen neɣ wid yettnadin s umata ɣef tira n Mouloud Feraoun. Iswi agejdan n Tesbeddit, d tullya n yiwen n wammas i medden anda ara yilin yidlisen n temkerḍit n Mouloud Feraoun, ayen yura d tɣawsiwin-is s umata. Deg useggas n 2019, teqdec Tesbeddit akked yiwen n umsuffeɣ i wakken ad d-swejden yiwen n usaru-arrat ɣef Mouloud Feraoun i lmend n umulli wis 60 n timunent n Lezzayer akked lmut n Mouloud Feraoun.
Ma ɣef yisenfaren ara d-yilin deg ussan i d-iteddun, ad d-nebder tuffɣa n tesɣunt taseklant Fouroulou, asizreg n wungal ‘’La cité des roses, livre que Feraoun avait titré L’anniversaire’’, anda ara yili, diɣ, ciṭ n umeslay ɣef Etsuko Aoyagi n tesdawit n Tokio i yessuqlen u yesizergen deg Japon ungal ‘’Le fils du pauvre’’ deg useggas n 2017. I usmekti, i lmend n tuffɣa n wungal-agi, tella-d temlilit deg Tokio anda teḥder Tesbeddit Mouloud Feraoun i yidles d usedwel. Am wakken ad yili usizreg-nniḍen sya ar anebdu n ’’Journal 1955/1962’’ anda ara d-ddun tikkelt-a iḍrisen yura Feraoun deg meɣres, wid-nni ur d-neddi ara deg tezrigt n 1962. Am wakken ara d-yili usizreg s taɛrabt n ’’Journal 1955/1962’’ i yettwaxedmen deg Maṣer. Llan diɣ aṭas n yisenfaren i useggas-agi n 2020, ara d-nini deg lweqt-nsen’’.Yesteqsa-t H. Moula
Ad tessuddes Texxamt n tfellaḥt n lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu s lmendad n tenmehla n srabes n tfellaḥt n Tizi-Uzzu d Iferḥunen, yiwen n wass n tussna ad d-yilin ass-agi, 24 deg waggur n yulyu 2019, ɣef 10h n tsebḥit, deg taddart n Zubga, yettabaεen ɣer tɣiwant n Illilten.
Ad d-yili usentel n temlilit-agi ɣef yidles d wayen i icudden ɣer tfellaḥt n unetrum, neɣ Lḥebb Lemluk (cerise). Ɣef waya dɣa, tger-d Texxamt n tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu tiɣri i yifellaḥen n temḍiqt-agi akken ad d-asen s ṭṭaqa, akken ad-d sfaydin seg temlilit-agi ideg ara yilin aṭas n yimussnawen n uḥric n tfellaḥt.
Ad-d-awin yimussnawen-agi awal ɣef useklu n lḥebb lemluk, d wazal n lɣella-agi, ama seg tama n tdawsa, ama seg tama n tdamsa. Am wakken ara mmeslayen diɣ ɣef wamek i ilaq ad d-tili tuẓut iwatan n useklu-agi, amek i t-fersen d wamek i t-leqmen.
Gar yimussnawen ara d-yessidren timlilit, ad naf Mass Kaci Boukhelfa, d amazzay, d amaswaḍ n wayen yeεnan yakk iberden n useḥbiber ɣef yimɣan d yisekla. Rnu ɣef waya d imeḍebber deg tenmehla n srabes n tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu.Ali Zalouk
I lmend n zerri n ṭam n yiseggasen segmi yemmut Muḥemmed Benḥanafi, awadem n tsekla d tmedyazt taqbaylit, yiwet seg tgejda yefkan tudert-nsen i rradyu n teqbaylit, thegga-d Ourida Sider, yiwen n usenfar asaru-arrat fell-as. Tessenked-d tazwart ɣef tikti n leqdic-a, ass-nni n 4 meɣres deg tiliẓri n Brtv, anda i d-fkan kra n yiwudam, inaẓuren d yimnadiyen, seg wid ixedmen d Benḥanafi, neɣ wid i t-yessnen, tinagiyin fell-as i temsuffeɣt Massa Sider. Taneggarut-a, tebges i leqdic-a, seg wasmi i d-tessuffeɣ adlis n tejmilt fell-as. Tikti, tusa-as-d seg Tfaska taɣelnawt n usaru amaziɣ, tenna ayɣer ala ur d-yettili ara usaru ɣef Benḥanafi i d-yewwin abrid n Si Muḥ Umḥend? Tenna-d “Ur yeshil ara akken ad texdmeḍ anadi ɣef yiwen am Benḥanafi, ladɣa ma d ayen yerzan asaru, yesran i waṭas n wallallen, itiknikiyen neɣ d wid n tedrimt”.
Maca, s tebɣest d lebɣi n tririt n tejmilt seg tama, d tririt n ureṭṭal seg tayeḍ, tessaweḍ ɣer lebɣi-s, acku akken i d-tenna Massa Sider, aṭas i tt-iɛawen Benḥanafi deg umaṭṭaf, telmed-d aṭas seg tussna-s, tamedyazt-is, d tudert-is s umata. Am wakken tella daɣen seg wid icerken amahil i waṭas n yiseggasen yid-s. Akken i iɛawen azal n ukkuẓ n tsutwin i d-iɛeddan seg uxxam n umaṭṭaf wis sin, I wakken ad nẓer azal ila urgaz-agi. Dɣa teṣber aṭas akken ad temmed aṣenfar-is. Asaru-a, yewwi-d ɣef tmeddurt n urgaz aseklan s umata, anwa-t, tudert-is di tegrawla, imi yekki d anesɣamu (lkumisar) deg tama n umalu, leqdic-is di rradyu tis snat i wazal n 45 n yiseggasen akked tudert-is deg temnaḍt n Medrissa deg Tyaret.
Ɣef wayɣer armi d imir-a i tebges temsuffeɣt n umaṭṭaf wis sin i leqdic am wa, tenna belli “Ahat asmi yella yedder Benḥanafi, tili ur iqebbel ara, neɣ ur yettmuddu ara azal i wayen-nni, acku ur iḥemmel ara ad mmeslayen wiyaḍ s waṭas fell-as, yezga yeqqar anwa i ɣef tettmeslayeḍ”, ɛlaḥasab n Ourida i ixedmen yid-s. Tessarem d leqdic ara iɛejben wiyaḍ, acku akken tenna dima, ilaq d nekni ara ixedmen ayla-nneɣ, ad as-nefk lqima, u ad nesseḥbiber fell-as. Asaru, ur yettɛeṭṭil ara ad d-yeffeɣ, s sin n yiḥricen n 52 mn. Syin, ad d-yezzin i tzeɣwa n tẓuri d ccna. Khaled Achoui</strong>
Mbeɛd ddeqs n yiseggasen n uraǧu, tberreḥ-d Tebniqt n teywalt n Bgayet deg yiwen n ulɣu d akken, ɣer taggara, ad d-sfaydint tɣiwanin n Yiderginen d Tsexriwt, deg usamar n Bgayet, s usenfar n tuqqna ɣer lgaz n temdint deg wakuden iqerben i d-itteddun. Iban-d d unsib waya mi d-yessawel lwali n Bgayet i yiselwayen n tɣiwanin-a i d-nebder, Massen Xalef d Buǧiṭ, akken kan ad asen-d-iberreḥ s telɣut. Yuɣ lḥal, akken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, yella yuzzel s timmad-is s usuter ɣur Uɣlif n wafud (énergie) armi i as-t-id-qeblen. Deg wawal i d-fkan i tɣamsa seld timlilit-nni akked lwali, yesnemmer lmir n Tsexriwt Mass Mɛabed, yerna ibarek lgaz-a i yiɣermanen.
Akken ula d lmir n Yiderginen, ulamma yessarem ur ttilin ara abeɛda yisergal seg tama n yimezdaɣ mi ara d-yaweḍ lawan n usɛeddi n usenfar seg tferkiwin-nsen. Ilaq ad d-nini, yusa-d yisalli-a am tmuffirt yessefraḥen i yimezdaɣ n tɣiwanin-a acku tuɣ ur llin deg wahil n useggas-a. Seld mi d-yeffeɣ usenfar n lgaz i tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, ara d-yettwawin si twilayt n Sṭif, aṭas i yellan ttmesteqsayen acuɣer ur d-ddint ara tɣiwanin n Tsexriwt d Yiderginen, neɣ daɣen ansi ara d-ɛeddin yijeɛbuben-nni n wurrig (lgaz). Ma yella si tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, amek ara yili lḥal d taddart n rrif, neɣ seg Suq Letnin iɣer i d-yewweḍ yakan usenfar n lgaz.
Tura ihi, seld asenseb n yisalli n tuffɣa n usenfar i tɣiwanin-a, yezmer lḥal seg Suq Letnin ara d-iɛeddi, ad d-ikemmel alamma d Tasexriwt. Yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti belli yettuneḥsab usamar n Bgayet gar tamiwin tineggura i d-yesfaydin s usenfar-a n wurrig agaman. Ula d imezdaɣ, ɣas ulamma umren, ḥsan iɛeṭṭel mliḥ wurrig-a ad yekcem s ixxamen-nsen di tmurt i yettwassnen tesnuzuy-it ula i tmura tiwerdanin.M. K.
Deg yiwen udewenni i texddem Tselwayt n Tudssa taɣelnawt n yimɛelmen d iṛemmasen izzayriyen ( ONPE) i yiwen uɣmis, tuɣal-d s wawal tselwayt n Tudssa ɣer tezɣint (crise) tettidir tmurt n Lezzayer deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, ladɣa ayen i icudden ɣer tdamsa n tmurt. Ɣef Leḥsab n Massa Samia El Makhloufi, taselwayt n Tudssa  » Ad d-yili uneḥbus n qrib n umelyun n yixeddamen sya ɣer taggara n useggas-agi i deg i nella, ma yella ur d telli ara tifrat n tezɣint i ttidirent wazal n 5 800 n tkebbanit timeẓyanin d tlemmasin (PME/PMI). »
 Agemmuḍ-agi n yimeḍqan n uxeddim ara iruḥen, ad yernu ɣer 600 000 n yimeḍqan n uxeddim iḥebsen s ssebba n uɣlaq n 30 000 n tkebbaniyin timeẓyanin d tlemmasin gar waggur n fuṛaṛ d yulyu iɛeddan. Tger-d tiɣri tselwayt n Tudssa-agi i yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt akken ad d-rren lewhi-nnsen i tifrat n yiɣeblan meqqren i ttidirent tkebbanit-agi n tmurt d uxlaq n uxeddim i yelmeẓyen yesɛan tikebbaniyin. Dima ɣef Leḥsab n Massa Samia El Makhloufi  » Azal n 5 800 n tkebbaniyin (PME/PMI) i yeseftayen deg taɣulin yemgaraden, ladɣa deg taɣult n lebni, tadawsa, tafellaḥt d temguri ara iɣelqen tiwwura-nnsent, d ayen ad d-yeglun s ustixer n qrib n umelyun n yixeddamen ».
Tenna-d daɣen d akken  » Tamguri tazzayrit ur tezmir ara, akken yebɣu yili lḥal, ad tidir kan s 9 neɣ 10 n yigrawen imaguriyen yettabaɛen ɣer yimɛelmen imeqqṛanen. » D luluf n tkebbaniyin timeẓyanin, i d xelqen yilmeẓyen yesɛan tissugra, yettwaḥesben gar yinesmalen igejda n uxlaq n tbaɣurt (sɛaya) taɣelnawt, ass-a, twaxenqen akken iwata seg yal tama, dayen ad d-yeglun s uɣlaq-nnsent ma yella ur d-yessekcem ara iman-is Uwanak i tifrat n yiɣeblan yeṭṭuqten ɣef tkebbaniyin-agi. « Tuɣal-d s wawal daɣen ɣef wayen s wacu i d-glant temsalt n tejɛal i d-yellan i seg d-glant temsbaniyin seg 22 furar iɛeddan, dayen i d-ixelqen aṭas n yiɣeblan n tukci n tedrimt i tkebbaniyin timeẓyanin’’.
  » D luluf n tkebbaniyin yesɛan ṭṭlaba, ufant-d iɣeblan meqqren deg unerḍul n tedrimt seg lbankat akken ad d- xedmet isenfar-nnsent, s ssebba n ṛṛayat i iḥuzan igrawen imeqqranen i ittekkan deg tjeɛɛal d tkerkas ». Tenna-d daɣen :  » Tuget n yiḥricen n tdamsa ad ten-tḥaz tezɣint n cceḥa n tedrimt d usenqes deg usefti n Uwanak deg yisenfar imeqqranen’’.
Ali Zalouk
Ɣas akken ɛeddan qrib kraḍ n yiseggasen segmi i d-iberreḥ uneɣlaf amenzwaru s tuɣalin n tutlayt n tmaziɣt d tunṣibt, maca leqdic deg unnar, ixuṣṣen nezzeh.
Abrid tura i yebda i tikli, imi aṭas n uxeddim i yurǧan akken ad d-tbin tmaziɣt d tidet d tutlayt tunṣibt deg unnar. Dɣa ussan-a, tceyyeɛ yiwen n lamer teɣlift n daxel i yiqerra n lwilayat, akken ad d-tili tira s tutlayt n tmaziɣt i teplakin tiwilayin timeqqranin i d-iḥerren tilisa gar twilayt d tayeḍ (tid i d-yettmagar umdan mi ara yekcem deg wakal n twilayt). Deg tebrat i yuzen umaray amatu n teɣlift-a, Ṣaleḥ Ddin Deḥmun, ass n 27 duǧember yezrin, yessuter deg-sen ad gen leqdic iwulmen i ccɣel-a, ad bdun seg tura i uheggi n usenfar-a unṣib deg yakk aɣiren n tmurt, seg 12 yennayer 2018. Annect-a ad yili i lmend n usfugel n yennayer, ixef n useggas n yimaziɣen. Deg umeslay n umazan, yenna d akken leqdic-a amaynut yekcem gar tezwariyin (priorités), acku tura tamaziɣt tuɣal d tutlayt taɣelnawt tunṣibt seg useggas n 2016, ɣef waya yessefk ad yili uɣiwel deg leqdicat yecban wi. Ladɣa deg wayen yarzan asuɣel n teplakin n usnubget neɣ tideblanin.
Deg lamer-a yettuceyɛen, ddan-d akk yismawen n twilayin d twilayin tinesmigalin (délégués) ttwarunt s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Maca, ar tura ur neẓri ara s wanwi isekkilen ara yili ccɣel-a, ma yella s yisekkilen n tfineɣ akken i yennum useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa yetteg s lemɛawna akked tdeblin timatuyin, imi yella-d yakan usuɣel n waṭas n teplakin ɣer tmaziɣt s yisekkilen-a n tfineɣ. Neɣ wissen tikkelt-a, ma yella s yisekkilen n tlatinit, i yettwasemrasen ass-a deg tuget n tirawin yettilin s tmaziɣt, ama deg tesdwiyin, deg yiɣerbazen, neɣ deg yidlisen n tmaziɣt i d-yetteffɣen.
Ad yeldi uɣerbaz tiwwura-s i tuɣalin n yinelmaden ass n larebɛa, 4 deg cutember 2019, i lmend n useggas aɣurbiz 2019/2020.
D inelmaden n uɣerbaz amenzu d wid n ulemmas akked wid n tesnawit ara yuɣalen deg wazemz-a, i d-isenṣeb uneɣlaf n usegmi. Ma d iselmaden, ad yaɣ lḥal uɣalen, imi nutni ad kecmen uqbel yinelmaden, ass n lḥedd, 1 deg cutember 2019. Yetturaǧu, ad tebdu temsirt tamezwarut, s wudem unṣib, ass-nni n tuɣalin n yinelmaden, meḥsub ass n larebɛa, 4 deg cutember.
Ma d afraq akked usenzi n yidlisen, ilaq ad ifak uqbel deg wussan imenza n waggur n tuber i d-iteddun. Ma d tuɣalin n yixeddamen akked yinemhalen ad tili ass n lḥed, 25 ɣuct 2019. Ma deg wayen yerzan leǧrida n yimuras n useggas-agi aɣurbiz amaynut, yefka-d uɣlif n usegmi aɣelnaw azemz n talliyin-agi. Imuras n ḥertadem (lexrif), ad d-ilin aseggas-a seg wass n ttlata 29 tuber ɣer wass n lḥed 3 unbir 2019, wid n tegrest (ccetwa), ad d-ilin tikkelt-a, seg wass n lexmis 19 duǧember 2019 alamma d ass n lḥed 5 yennayer 2020.
Imuras n tefsut, yetturaǧu ad d-ilin seg wass n lexmis 19 meɣres alamma d ass n lḥed 5 yebrir 2020, wid n unebdu ad d-ilin tazwara n yulyu. Am wakken i tetturaǧu tullya d uɛiwed n usexdem (mise en service) n 656 n yisɣuren seg tuɣalin-agi n 4 cutember i d-iteddun. 426 d iɣerbazen imenza, 137 d iɣerbazen ilemmasen akked 93 n tesnawiyin, yettwaferqen ɣef 48 n lwilaya n tmurt n Lezzayer.A. A.
Ɣef wakken i d-yenna ussan-a yezrin uneɣlaf n umahil, n useqdec n tɣellist tinmettit, Mass Ḥasan Teǧǧani Haddam, ad yili kra n ubeddel deg uɣram (Remboursement) n yisɛeddiyen insnujjyanen. Yenna-d aya deg wawal-is i d-yefka i tɣamsa di tama n Galma, i lmend n tirza i t-yewwin ɣer din imi, akken i d-iberreḥ, ttheggin deg ugezdu-is i usemres n sswami-a timaynutin akken ad ḍemnen aqɛad n tedrimt n Yisenduqen n ṭṭmana tinmettit.Yerna-d daɣen d akken ssuma n uɣram n yisɛeddiyen isnujjyanen ɣur yimsujjiyen imatuyen d wuzzigen « yeǧǧa-tt wakud acku tettuɣal i yiseggasen n 1980 », am wakken i d-yessegza belli ad d-yeḍru uɛiwed n tmuɣli ɣef sswami n uɣram akken ad tezg akked tzemmar tidrimanin n Yisenduqen n ṭṭmana tinmettit. Rnu ɣer waya, ɣef wakken i d-yenna dima, yewwi-d ad d-yili uɛiwed-a n tmuɣli n uɣram ɣef leḥsab n wannect i d-sqamen yisɛeddiyen ɣur ṭṭebbat.
Seld ameslay-a ɣef « wuguren » n tedrimt n Yisenduqen n ṭṭmana tinmettit, aṭas n yimdanen i yettmesteqsayen si tura amek ara yili ubeddel-a, abeɛda igellilen seg-sen. «Nessaram d ayen ara yilin ɣef leḥsab n tdamsa n yal axxam d liḥala tinmettit n yal tawacult. Acku ma yella amek ara yili uɣram n win irekden si tama n tedrimt ara yili ɣef uẓawali, dinna d ugur, d lbaṭṭel ameqqran », i d-yenna yiwen n uɣerman si Bgayet. Ad d-nesmekti ɣer taggara, d akken yebder-d uneɣlaf aheggi, deg wakuden i d-iteddun, n temliliyin ɣef tɣellist tinmettit akken ad yettwaldi uskasi azedgan ɣef taluft-a gar waṭas n tamiwin, akken ad suffɣen ɣer yisumar n tifrat yelhan, syinna ad ttwaseknen i snat n texxamin n uparlaman, APN d Sénat.
I wakken ad d-afen tifrat i uɣbel n yiselmaden yellan deg umuɣ n tmeṛjiwt ( liste d’attente ), nnejmaεen yimutlayen( porte-paroles ) n yiselmaden-a, akked yimasayen n uɣlif n usegmi. Ayagi imi ddeqs n yiselmaden i yettεassan ad asen-d-ssiwlen, meεna ur d-iban kra. Ama d wigad n uswir amezwaru, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2018 neɣ d wid n uswir alemmas akked tsenawit, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2017. Rnu ɣer waya, ɣef leḥsab n yimutlayen n yiselmaden, llan imukan ideg xuṣṣen yiselmaden. Meεna imḍebbṛen n tenmehliwin n usegmi, ur d-ssawlen ara.
Seld amciweṛ gar yimutlayen n yiselmaden d yimasayen n uɣlif n usegmi, ineggura-a, nnan-asen-d belli ad ḥebsen asiwel i yiselmaden n umuɣ n tmeṛjiwt, seld 31 duǧember 2019, imi acḥal-ayagi segmi i d-yeffeɣ umuɣ-a. D ayen i yeǧǧan iselmaden i yellan sεan asirem ad xedmen, yeffeɣ-iten leεqel, ladɣa imi aseggas-a meḥsub yekfa. Seg tama-nniḍen, llan wid yumren s teɣtest-a, ladɣa inelmaden i d-yeffɣen seg tesdawit ur ufin ara axeddim. Acku ad asen-tettunefk tegnit ad tekkin deg temsizzelt i d-iteddun.
Ad d-nesmekti d akken iselmaden-a i rebḥen deg yiseggasen n 2017, 2018, ur qbilin ara s ṛṛay-a n yimasayen n uɣlif n usegmi. Ɣef waya i refden ula d nutni taɣtest belli ad uɣalen ɣer tikliwin, d yinejmuεen sdat n tenmehliwin n usegmi armi d ass ara d-rren i wayen i ssuturen. Ladɣa imi di lawan-a ideg nella, ssuturen akk abeddel, bɣan ad d-rren izerfan-nsen i iruḥen. Γef usentel-a, tenna-aɣ-d yiwet n tselmadt : “sin n yiseggasen-aya nekk ttεassaɣ ad i yi-d-ssiwlen, yal mi ara rzuɣ ɣer Tenmehla n Bgayet, qqaṛen-iyi-d ulac imukan, nekk di taddart anda i zedɣeɣ llan yimukan. Daymi i zriɣ belli kullec s tmussni, ihi d awezɣi ad nessusem ɣef uzref-nneɣ i ṛuḥen”.
Ulac d acu akk iweɛren deg ddunit am tegnit n ṭṭiq d waṭṭan, ladɣa ma tekka-d nnig-iɣil-ik. Asli Mohand, argaz bu 37 n yiseggasen, yessexdem akk ttawilat-is d tedrimt-is, armi ur yezmir ara ad iqabel iman-is. Daya i yessawḍen tawacult tameẓyant d tmeqqrant n Asli Mohand, ad d-tger tiɣri i yimezdaɣ n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i wakken ad ttekkin akk deg twizi n ujmeɛ n yidrimen i ilaqen i umuḍin-a. D mmi-s n taddart n Ikhelouiene deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, d ababat n sin n yigerdan. Ixeddem aṣeffi n yidamen seg useggas n 2015 deg ssbiṭer n Tizi Uzzu, d acu kan tikkelt-agi, ilaq-as ad yinig ɣer berra i wakken ad yexdem tamhelt n uleqqem n tegẓelt. Ass-nni n lǧemɛa, tameddit n wass, temlal teseqqamut n taddart-agi n Ikhelouiene d waṭas n tuddsiwin-nniḍen; tidukliwin, tiseqquma n tudar, iselwayen n tɣiwanin… Tettwasbed yiwet n teseqqamut ara d-yelhin s ujmeɛ n tedrimt-agi ilaqen. Dɣa syin i tebda twizi-agi n ujmeɛ n yidrimen, ama di ssuq n Tala Atmane, ama deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Yella-d diɣ usersi n wayen din n tbewwaḍin di tḥuna d leqhawi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. “Asli Mohand, yeḥwaǧ lemɛawna-nwen” d wagi i d alugu n twizi-agi. Taɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun merra, tecmel i yiɣallen-is i wakken ad tefk asirem n tudert i mmi-s Mohand, i d-yessutren lemɛawna-s. Yal yiwen yebda s wayen iwumi yezmer, wa yerfed tibewaḍin, wa iɛawen s tedrimt-is, wayeḍ s ttawilat-is, iswi d yiwen d ajmeɛ n tedrimt ilaqen d usellek n Mohand. I wid yebɣan ad ɛiwen, ha-t-an usmiḍen n lbanka : 00200034034130010803 BNA n Tizi Uzzu. Nessaram-as ccfa d ḥellu i ASLI Mohand, akken gar-nneɣ ad ibedd.Adaoun Abdelghani
Tadayṛa n Yiderginen, seg tid ikessben idigan icebḥen nezzeh deg twilayt n Bgayet, amedya d aceṛcur n Kefrida akked win n Umazzer. Rnu ɣer wigi, amkan iwumu qqaṛen Amḍiq n uẓebbuc, dɣa deg-s, tzad thuski. Imi tazeggzuyt n yimɣan d ttjuṛ, tjebbed tamuɣli n umdan s tduli-s taṛbiεit. Mabla ma nettu asif n waman i yettuɣalen d lemri n ccbaḥa n temnaḍt-nni, ladɣa ma terna-d fell-as tafat n tafukt. Lameεna, ayagi yakk, ur as-fkin ara yimḍebbṛen n tdayṛa d tɣiwant n Yiderginen azal imi rran-t d amkan n udeggeṛ n uhicuṛ, εedmen isem n ugama deg-s . Ad d-nesmekti d akken, ula d asif n Uɣeṛyun ur yeslik ara.
Acku ayen akk yettenḍeggaṛen deg Umḍiq n uzebbuc, ijemmeε-it wasif n Uɣeryun. Aneggaru-a, yuɣal d asif n umuṛej d uhicuṛ n lmaεeṣrat. « Ayen yessewhamen ugar, d amek i εemmden yimasayen n twennaḍt n twilayt n Bgayet i uxessar yecban wagi, di lawan anda i zemmren ad terren d adeg i tmerrit ». D awal n yiwen n umezdaɣ seg tɣiwant n Yiderginen. Seg tama-nniḍen, asif n Uɣeṛyun, yeṣṣawaḍ aman i yilel n Ssuq Letnin. S unamek wayeḍ, d amahi d ameqqṛan iɣef nettmeslay.
Ama i twennaḍt, i yimdanen neɣ i tilmas (espèces) i yettidiren deg yilel. Rnu ɣer waya, d anebdu i d-iteddun, ihi d tazmert n yimdanen i yellan deg urar. Di taggara, yewwi-d ad d-nebder belli, imezdaɣ n tɣiwanin n Yidergiben akked Ssuq Letnin, zgan d acekti, ahat ad d-sslen yimḍebbṛen n tɣiwanin-nsen, ad frun aɣbel n ugudu.K. K.
Macahu tellemcahu ad tt-yeḍbeε Ṛebbi d asaru. Yiwen urgaz yeqqar-as i mmi-s: “Ammi i wacu teṛṛiḍ akk medden d imeddukkal deg ur d-itekk nfaε? Ugadeɣ limmer ad ten-tiḥwiǧeḍ di tegnit n ddiq, yiwen ur ak-d-yeqqaṛ anεam. Mmi-s ur yesmeḥsis ara i wawal acku iɣil tizegzewt d leḥcic meṛṛa.Yeqqaṛ-as i baba-s: “Sεiɣ leḥbab yal amḍiq, mačči am kečč, ur tufiḍ ara win ara ak-iḥemmlen seg wakken teswaεreḍ timsal aṭas. Baba-s: “A mmi, nekk sεiɣ yiwen n uḥbib beṛka, deg-s lbaraka, jeṛṛbeɣ-t, ufiɣ-t d argaz. Yugi mmi-s ad yili d uḥdiq. Argaz terra-t tmara ad ixdem kra i wakken tabṛat-is ad d-taweḍ s allaɣ n win ara d-yeǧǧ d asalas n uxxam. Tusa-t-id tikti amzun-itt. Iddem ikerri, yezla-t, iɣumm-it s ubeḥnuq mellulen, yessames-it d idammen. Yuzzel ɣer mmi-s, yessawel-as: “Kker kker a mmi, teḍra-yi-d dagi taluft”. Ikker-d mmi-s s tɣawla: “Acu a baba d acu ?” Nɣiɣ yiwen s ujenwi.
Tenɣiḍ -t? Anida-t ?
Ṛwaḥ ad t-twaliḍ.  Mi t-iwala mmi-s yexlaε, yenna-as: “A baba amek ara as-nexdem?”. Baba-s: “Ruḥ a mmi muqel-d albaεḍ seg leḥbab-ik i wakken ad aɣ-iεiwen ad t-nawi sanda ara t-nɣebbi”. Iruḥ uqcic ttnaṣfa n yiḍ, yezzi-d akk ɣef leḥbab-is, win iwumi yeḥka tadyant ad as-d-yerr: “Ala, ur zmireɣ ara i tigi”. Yuɣal-d uqcic s axxam. Baba-s: “Acimi akka ur d-tewwiḍ ara imεawnen?”. Mmi-s: “Ugin, uggaden”.
