Yeffeγ-d γur-s ugellid, yenna-as: ‘’Yak a tameṭṭut, γileγ ifuk fell-am lḥif, acimi akka!’’ Tameṭṭut: ‘’Annaγ ay agellid, tannumi, d yir aṭṭan’’. Yerra-as: ‘’Ruḥ ihi ad tkemmleḍ ccγel tennumeḍ. Yahia Yanes
Tessuddes-d tddukla n yimezlan d yirmuden n yilmeẓyen n temdint n Tegzirt, « Taɛeqquct n yiri n yilel n Tegzirt (ALAJPL) » s lemɛawna n tddukkla talsawit, « Tiddukla tazzayrit n tgemmi n twennaṭ d izerfan n umdan (AEPDH) » n temdint n Tizi Uzzu d Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri yiwet n teɣlamt tasejjant si tṣebḥit armi d tamedit n wass-nni n sem, 14 furar 2020, deg uɣerbaz amenzu “Muḥamed Ahras” n taddart n Tifra. Anda i d-yella udawi baṭel i yimdanen i d-yerzan s waṭas di tsaɛtin timezwura n wass. Am wakken i d-yella, daɣen, unadi ara d-ibeggnen ma yella kra lehlak I yesɛa umdan-nni netta ur yeɛlim ara. ama s tukksa n yidammen, neɣ s tmacint.
Tenna-d yiwet n temɣart: “Ad asen-yefk Rebbi ṣṣeḥa i wigi i ixemmemen fell-aɣ, imi i d-ruḥen armi d ixxamen-nneɣ akken ad aɣ-dawin ». Yernaa-d wayeḍ: “Ad cekkreɣ yakk wid i d-iheggan leqdic-agi. Nessaram mačči d tikelt taneggarut ara d-yili waya”. Xedmen yiɛeggalen n tddukkliwin-agi yakk ttawilat i ilaqen akken ad iɛeddi wass di tegnatin igerrzen. Ula d taseqqamut n taddart, tella-d i lmend-nsen. Asɣal-agi, d ayen yefkan tumert i yimejjayen. Yenna-d yiwen seg-sen: “Nukni anda i aɣ-d-ssawlen, ad nruḥ. Aql-aɣ dagi i lemziya n yal amdan, n yal amuḍin. Ad asen-iniɣ tannemirt i wid i d-iqurben ɣur-nneɣ”. Aya yella-d s leḥdur n wazal n mraw (10) n yimejjayen, imazzagen di tiɣula yemxalafen am waṭṭan n skker, n wallen, n yiɣsan …atg. Taggara. furṣen tagnit, fkan-asen i wid d-iruḥen kra n yisemtar ara ḍefren akken ad tgerrez ṣseḥa-nsen.Yacine Meghzifene
Deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, yella-d lḥir meqqren sɣur imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, akken ad beddlen udem n tɣiwanin n dayra-nsen yenḥafen s waṭas. Dɣa seg tectliwin n usizdeg n tudrin, i d-iḥellan imeḍqan deg temsizzelt n taddart tazedgant, ɣer tiwizi n useḥbiber ɣef twenaḍt, d tfaskiwin n tzemmurt n ufexxar. Tikkelt-agi, d taddart n Yiɣil n Teqḍibin yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, i d-yefkan afus n tallelt i tɣiwant, s tukci n wakal i lebni n unnar n ddabex uḍar, deg umḍiq iwumi qqaren Assif. Deg tazwara n ddurt iɛeddan, heggan-d yimezdaɣ n taddart n Yiɣil n Teqḍibin d yimezdaɣ n tudrin n Iberquqen tiwizi i usewseɛ d uwenneɛ n unnar-agi n ddabex uḍar, anda smarsen yakk ttawilat iwatan yellan gar yifassen-nsen, akken ad fkan tagnit i yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant, ad tturaren deg-s. Seg lǧiha-nsen, ferḥen nezzeh yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa seg tcetliwt-agi n Yiɣil n Teqḍibin. Ula d aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan Aɣiwan n Mɛatqa , Mass Laguel Lyes, ibeggen-d lferḥ-is s tigawt-agi, u yewɛed s uwenneɛ akken iwata annar-agi n ddabax uḍar i la ttraǧun yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant ugar n 30 d aseggas aya. Ad d-nesmekti kkan d akken dayra n Mɛatqa yesɛan ugar n 54 000 n yimezdaɣ, ur tesɛi ara ar ass-a annar n ddabex uḍar iwatan. Ala yiwen n umḍiq kan i yellan anda tturaren, ula d winna ur iwulem ara, ur yeqɛid ara. Yerna ffkan-t i lebni n usenfar n Sbitar n dayra n Mɛatqa.
Seld 5 n yiseggasen segmi yeḥbes usenfar n usiweḍ n lgaz agaman seg Tala Ifassen ɣer tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, a-t-an berrḥent-d kra n teɣbula s userreḥ i tedrimt ara d-yawin akemmel n lecɣal. Ilaq ad d-nini d akken ulamma aẓeṭṭa n ubḍaw yella yettmagga deg wakuden iɛeddan di kra n tuddar n tɣiwant, maca asenfar n tiwin n uqadus ara d-yasen ɣer Uswel, seg Tala n Yifassen, yella yewḥel. Iqeddicen-nni dɣa i yellan ttmaggan deg yiberdan, gan-d ayendin d uguren i yimezdaɣ. Tikwal, ttilin d amihi fell-asen, abeɛda arrac imecṭaḥ i izemren ad ɣlin, seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, deg yiḍerfan yettwaɣzan.
Rnu-as attwiɣ n yiberdan i yesserfan nezzeh inehharen n yikerrusen. Ula d iqeddacen n termisin ur ttarran ara abrid amek i t-ttuɣ, mi ara kfun lecɣal-nsen. Maca tura, ad snuffsen yimezdaɣ xersum s yisalli n userreḥ n usenfar ara asen-ibeddlen kra di tɣara n tudert, ara asen-yekksen kra n tɛekmin i niqal ttidiren seg lgaz n tqerɛet. «Seld annect-nni d araǧu, yettwakkes dayen lqid ɣef usenfar-a n usiweḍ n lgaz i tɣiwant-nneɣ. Mazal ad aɣ-d-mlen amek ara tili tura akken ad nwali tirmisin deg unnar», i aɣ-d-yenna uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi. Ad d-nesmekti d akken seg Sṭif i d-tewwi tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, acku tezdi tilisa akked twilayt-a.
Dɣa, tuqqna ad d-tas ɣef teɣzi n wazal n 15 n yikilumitren akken ad tessečč ayen yettqaraben ɣer 3 000 n yixxamen. Kra n yiɣermanen ssarmen lemmer i d-yeḍra waya deg unebdu yezrin. «Lemmer ur sweḥlen ara asenfar-a ɣur-nneɣ iseggasen-a ineggura, tili tagrest-a nesɛedda-tt teḥma akken iwulem», i iwala yiwen n umezdaɣ.
M. K.
Deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, yella-d lḥir meqqren seg teseqquma n tudrin i usizdeg d ugerrez n tmurt n Leqbayen.
Ayen i d-yefkan afud deg waya, d tamsizzelt n Aissat Rabaḥ i d-yettheggi Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i d-ixelqen tismin ɣer wayen igerrzen. Dɣa, ilul-d lḥir, tikelt-agi, ɣer teseqqamut n taddart n At Zɛim s tallelt n yimezdaɣ. D taddart i d-yezgan 4 n yikulimitren ɣer unẓul n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, i d-yessuddsen tacemlit n usizdeg d ugerrez n taddart. D tacemlit i yettilin sin n wussan deg yal ddurt, deg wass n Sem d Sed. I uttekki deg temsizzelt n taddart zeddigen deg ugezdu, aṭas n leqdicat i d-yellan deg unnar, s tallelt n Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu, Aseqqamu Aɣerfan Aɣiwan n Mɛatqa, imɛelmen n taddart. Gar leqdicat-agi, ad naf asenfar n lebni n tuget n yizenqan n taddart s wuzru i wumi qqaren s trumit  » Ardoise « , d asenfar i d-yefka Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu, daɣen asenfar n usiweḍ n waman, trisiti d lgaz ɣer yal ixxamen imaynuten ur nesɛi ara isenfaren-agi igejdanen. Daɣen, llan yisenfaren n lebni n tliwa deg tlemmast n taddart d lebni n yiɣeṛban n yimeḍqan i d-yettsaxan, wigi d isenfaren i d-yettunefken sɣur Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Mɛatqa.
Deg tcemlit-agi n taddart, ttekkant, tikelta-agi, ula d tilawin, sddaw n leɛnaya n tddukkla tamaynut n tlawin yettusemman Ixulaf n At Zɛim, i d-yefkan afud meqqren deg leqdicat n usizdeg d ugerrez, ladɣa s tiktiwin timaynutin deg useḥbiber ɣef twennadt. Rnu ɣef waya, tiẓẓin n yijeǧǧigen deg yal tiɣmert n taddart. Ayen i d-yefkan udem igerrzen i yizenqan-is. Yal taggara n ddurt, ad ddukklen yimezdaɣ n taddart meẓẓi meqqer, am tmeṭṭut am urgaz, deg yiwet n twizi meqqren, iswi-ines awḥid, agerrez n wudem n taddart. Ayen igerrzen deg leqdicat yecban wigi, d tadukli i d-yettlalen, i yettnernin seg wass ɣer wayeḍ, deg lfayda n umdan, syin n twacult, ɣer tmetti d talsa sumata. Deg tirza-nneɣ ɣer yizenqan n taddart, nufa lḥan yimezdaɣ deg ugerrez n taddart, wa d lebni n yiɣeṛban, wa deg usizdeg n yizenqan, yiwen yettreqqim iɣeṛban n tala. Ayen yelhan yakk deg waya, tuget n yisufer n ugerrez, ttwaksen-d seg ugama, ama d asɣar, talaxt, lmuɣri, usbiɣ, azṛu…Ali Zalouk
Tella-d di taggara n ddurt iɛeddan, tezrigt tis tlata n rreḥba n udlis i warrac deg taddart n Uɛfir deg tɣiwant n Bujimaɛ. Ass-nni n lǧemɛa d ssebt 27-28/09/2019, imezdaɣ n taddart n Uɛfir n Bujimaɛ, llan di ttiɛad u deg yirebbi n yidles s umata d udlis s wuzzig. Mebeɛd tazrigt tamezwarut n 2016 d tis snat n 2018, i iɛeddan deg tegnatin igerrzen, tefka afud meqqren i tddukkla tadelsant “Amnir” n tama n Uεfir n Bujimaε, i wakken ad suddsen tazrigt-a tamaynut. D ashier i d-yettwaheggan s tallelt n Tenmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, tin n usegmi d usedwel ɣer tama n Useqqmu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya (APW) n Tizi Uzzu, d wiyaḍ. Yella-d leqdic-agi adelsan n sin wussan, deg uɣerbaz amezwaru “Addar Belɛid” yellan deg tama-agi n Uεfir, anda i txeddem ddeqs n yirmad tddukkla-agi tadigant, di yal tikkelt.
D Rreḥba n udlis deg tezrigt-is tis kraḍet, ideg ttekkint wazal n 12 n tezrigin, i ixedmen timsikniyin s usenzi n yidlisen. Ad d-nedber gar-asent; Tamagit, El Amel, Richa Elsam, Jelis…atg. Am wakken daɣen, i d-llan wazal n 15 yimyura, yettarun i ugrud, i yessenzen s ubuddu idlisen-nsen, s tutlayin-a yemgaraden (tamaziɣt, tafransist d taɛrabt), i d-yerzan seg waṭas n tamiwin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ad d-nebder gar-asen: Tinhinan Ḥarrac, Ali Ḥeǧǧaz, Racid Buxerrub, Ḥusin Luni…atg. Imsuddsen n rreḥba-a, heggan-d leqdicat-nniḍen, i d-yellan deg wahil n tezrigt-a, anda ara naf sin n yisaragen ɣef tfelsafit, yiwen ɣef tfelsafit s umata sɣur Mass Ḥerrac Ḥmed, yellan d aselmad n tfelsafit yeffɣen ɣer tasaɣt.
wis sin, yella-d ɣef tfelsafit n ugrud, sɣur Massa Marie-Laure Dupin, d taɛeggalt di tddukkla “Algerie-France Amitié” . Am wakken daɣen, ara naf isikwan (ateliers) n usuneɣ akked tɣuri, ɣer tama n umseḍsi akked useḥḥar d wayen-nniḍen. Yella-d diɣ, usarag s ssenf n table ronde, sɣur tezrigt La Pensée, i yettarun i ugrud, yezzi-d deg-s wawal ɣef wazal n udlis n ugrud. Bɣan yiεeggalen n tddukkla-agi “Amnir”, ad ẓẓun tikti n udlis, tayri n tɣuri ɣer warrac imecṭaḥ, d asebɣes daɣen i yimura yettarun i tsuta-agi. Ma ɣer taggara n ttiɛad-agi, fkan arrazen d igerdazen n usebɣes i warrac i d-yufraren deg n temsizliyin, i xedmen yakkan.
Am yal aseggas, ḍeṛṛunt aṭaṣ n txeṣṣaṛin di tegrest, ama d isehwa n yiberdan, aṭṭerdeq n tbutayin n lgaz, neɣ d axnaq n yimdanen s wayen i iteddun s yis-s. Amedya, d tin yeḍṛan di Xeṛṛaṭa, ass n 13 unbir yezrin. Taluft-a, tamentilt-is d lgaz, dɣa qrib i tegla s teṛwiḥin n 6 n yimdanen seg yiwet n twacult. Γef leḥsab n teɣbalut-nneɣ, tadyant-a, teḍṛa di temnaḍt n Yijermunen, taɣiwant n Xeṛṛaṭa. Ɣef 02: 00 n tnezzayt, yekker leεyaḍ gar yimεacren n twacult-a, seld mi slan s wayen yeḍṛan. Imir-n kan i ssawlen i yiqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim. Ineggura-a leḥqen-d di lawan, dɣa ṣṣawḍen selken-ten-id seg lmut timḥettemt. I yisalli, deg wid i ixenqen llan kṛad n yirgazen, d kṛaḍ n tullas. Ma yella d leεmeṛ sεan seg 33 armi d 76 n yiseggasen.
Ad d-nesmekti d akken, ɣef leḥsab n yisallen i aɣ-d-yewwḍen, iεeggalen n twacult-a, ur ssensen ara lgaz uqbel ad gnen, nutni ur zrin ara belli llan yiteyyuten i yessuffuɣen. Daymi ur faqen ara, armi i d-ufan iman-nsen wa yeṣreε, wa yemlelli. Wwin-ten yiqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim s uɣiwel ɣer sbiṭer n Xeṛṛata, anda i asen-xedmen ayen i ilaqen. Ma yella seg tama n tɣellist, ttweṣṣin yiqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim iɣermanen ad ḥaddren iman-nsen, acku lgaz n umunuksid n kaṛbun, ur iṛeḥḥem ara. Ihi yewwi-d fell-asen ad ttaǧǧan tiṭwiqin i ubeḥri, ad snusun ayen akk i iteddun s lgaz deg uxxam uqbel taguni. Rnu i waya, yal yiwen yellan sdat yimseḥmu(chauffage), ma yella iwala times-is d tawṛaɣt, ad t-yessens, ad iwali d acu d aɣilif. Akken qqaṛen At zik aḥader yeɣleb aqader.
Tgellu-d twaɣit n tmes s umihi i umaḍal s umata. D tawaɣit i d-yettawin lemḍerra i umdan daɣen, imi deg kra n tamiwin tkeččem ula ɣer tuddar, tessexsar kra ara taf sdat-s. Yal aseggas tḥeggeṣ tiẓegwa, isekla d yimɣan. Ma d ssebbat d tidak dima, ma mačči d timental n ugama, d amdan i yettilin deffir n twaɣit. D igiman n yigeṭṭaren i ireqqen yal anebdu, ur ikeffu ara dɣa alamma berrḥent-d tenmehliwin n uḥuddu aɣarim s yigmaḍ i d-tessegra, ad ggarent tiɣri i leɛqel d leḥder. Dɣa deg twilayt n Wehran, tefka-d, seg tama-s, Tenmehla n uḥuddu aɣarim leḥsab n tjumma i tesserɣ tmes deg unebdu-a s 121 igeṭṭaren, seg umenzu n yulyu 2019 armi d 8 cutamber 2019.
Tenna-d d akken ɣas meqqer wuṭṭun-a, maca ur d-glint ara s txeṣṣarin timeqqranin i izemren ad ḍurrent amdan, acku tuget n tmess i inetren, tella-d deg tẓegwa. Seg tama-s temmeslay-d Massa Ḥalima.Ḥ, timḍebbert n uḥareb, ɣef yimihiyen n tmes, tenna-d 121-agi n yigeṭṭaren, 48 deg-sen d tiẓegwa timeqqranen i yerɣan, 63 n yigeṭtaren deg yimukan ur nelli d tiẓegwa, yexlan seg yimezdaɣ. Terna tenna-d belli “ma nesserwes amḍan-a ɣer win n yilindi, ad t-naf yuli mliḥ aseggas-a, imi ilindi tenker tmes 13 n tikkal kan, tegla s 12 n yigeṭṭaren, ma d timental ur banent ara”. Tiɣiwanin yenneḍruran s waṭas i tḥuza tmes-a, ad naf Busfer, Msergin, Arzew d Gdeyel. Ma d aggur ideg i tzad s waṭas tmes, d aggur n yulyu, imi tessaweḍ tečča 107 n yigeṭṭaren. Annect-a, yeǧǧa tanmehla-a ad d-tger tiɣri i uḥader, akken ad qqiment tẓegwa cebḥent, ur reqqen ara yisekla ladɣa wid ur d-nettuɣal ara seld timerɣiwt-nsen.
Khaled Achoui
Ɣef leḥsab n yiqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim, tendeh tmes deg semmus n yimukan yemgeraden di twilayt n Bgayet. Ar tura mazal ur d-tban tmentilt n undah-a, lameεna ssegran-d axeṣṣar deg yimeḍqan-a, ladɣa arɣay n ttjur d yimɣan.
Iqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim, xedmen axeddim-nsen, dɣa gren-d iman-nsen deg wakud ilaqen. Ass n 06 deg meɣṛeṣ ɣef 14:40 deg taddart Iwrissen, di tɣiwant n Tizi n Berber, rɣant azal n 2 500 m2. Ma yella di tɣiwant n Bgayet, deg umḍiq iwumi qqaren Ikubab, rɣant ugar n 3000 m2. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, ayagi yeḍṛa-d deg yiwen n wass ɣef 18:30 n tmeddit. Seg tama-nniḍen, tikkelt-a di tɣiwant n Tizi Ɛeyyad, i lewhi n 21:05 n yiḍ, tessreɣ tmes yiwen n useklu.
Ula d Taɣiwant n Melbu ur teslik ara seg uxeṣṣaṛ-a, imi rɣant deg-s ugar n 8 000 m2 ɣef 22:00. Imezdaɣ n tɣiwant-a s umata, irekb-iten zzεaf d ameqqṛan, acku ur ẓṛin ara d anwa i deffir n temsalt-a, i yellan d tementilt n uṛɣu n teẓgi tacebḥant i d-yezzin i tɣiwant n Melbu. Gar-asen aselway, d yimeltaɣen n tddukkla Awal Yessawal, i yesnemmren iqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim ɣef ufus n tallelt i asen-fkan i yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-a, armi ṣṣawḍen ssensen times-a uqbel ad d-teglu s temḍerrit-nniḍen.
Seg tama tayeḍ, deg temnaḍt n Tizi Ḥmed, deg tɣiwant n Ticci, yewweḍ ureqqas n umihi ɣer tseddart taεlayant. Tadyant teḍṛa ɣef 01:45 n tnezzayt, yerna times qrib tečča ula d ixxamen meḥsub, limer mačči d tiḥerci n yimezdaɣ, d ixeddamen n Uḥuddu aɣarim, i yessqedcen ugar n 7 n yikamyunen n ussens n tmes, acku deg yiḍ-nni yeqwa mliḥ waḍu. Lameεna ɣas gan ayen ilaqen, times tessreɣ ugar n 9 n yihekṭaṛen.
 K.K.
Deg tdiwennit-a, yewwi-d awal Daoud Mekhous ɣef tirmit-ines deg leqdic adelsan, deg tira, tamuɣli-s ɣef tsekla d temsal-nniḍen.
Aɣmis n yimaziɣen : Anwa-t Daoud Mekhous ?Daoud Mekhous : D mmi-s n lεerc n At Brahem. Yefru-ri-d seg taddart n Uɣalad Imeǧǧaṭ, ilul ass n, 5 deg yebrir 1973, deg At Wertiran aɣir n ṣṭif. Yelmed leqraya tamenzut d tlemmast anda ilul. Ma deg tesnawit, yeɣra deg Wat Wertiran. Yelmed tira n tutlayt n tmaziɣt i yiman-is d amselmad (Autodidacte) wayi akk asmi yella deg tesnawit. Yerna asmi i tebda BR.TV deg yiseggasen n 1996 d asawen kan, tella tedwilt win yebɣan tamaziɣt ad yisin tira-s sɣur n Mass. Nur fell-as as-yaεfu yerḥem, hefḍeɣ-d aṭas ula d iḍrisen ttaruɣ-ten yal ass nekk d araǧu i wakken ad waliɣ tilizri, ad issineɣ kra deg teskla n tmaziɣt. Ttekkiɣ deg waṭas n tddukkliwin deg tɣiwant n Ulgraj. Tura, aql-i d anawer (superviseur) deg uɣerbaz alemmas n At Brahem, acḥal d iseggasen-aya.
Amek i d-tufiḍ iman-ik deg uḥric-agi n tira ?Tussa-yi-d tikti n tira, asmi i bdiɣ axeddim d anawer deg uɣerbaz. Lliɣ jemεeɣ-d timucuha n zik-nni sɣur temɣarin d yimɣaren n taddart. Skelseɣ-tent deg tesfifin n zik, umebεed ttaruɣ-tent ɣef lkaɣeḍ, akken armi i d-jemεeɣ aṭas n tmucuha. D acu kan imiren, ruḥeɣ unageɣ ɣer Lezzayer ɣer, sbiṭer n Dwira, acku nekk rɣiɣ asmi lliɣ d amecṭuḥ. Rɣiɣ asmi sɛiɣ 8 n wagguren di leεmer-iw. Rɣiɣ, nekk mazal-iyi la ttmurudeɣ deg waguns. Baba, fell-as as-yeεfu, ur yezmir ara ad i yi-idawi di tallit-nni, acku aṭas n yigerdan i yesεa. Ad yawi aɣrum neɣ ad yi-idawi d. Acu, yexdem ayen yellan fell-as : yewwi-yi ɣer Ɛennaba anda i llan Icenwiten. D sbiṭer n tlemmast n Ɛennba, anda i qqimeɣ dinna aṭas n yiseggasen. Mi akken i d-uɣaleɣ, ufiɣ-d tisfifin-nni yakk rɣant, mugent d iɣed deg wakal. Acḥal i ttruɣ fell-asent, iɣaḍ-iyi lḥal … Syin, lemdeɣ-d aṭas ɣef teskla taqbaylit. Yal yal mi ara d-xelseɣ, ad d-ddmeɣ kra n usurdi, ad d-aɣeɣ yis-sen idlisen, am tesɣunin Asalu, abc, atg. Ttaɣeɣ-d ayen yeεnan yakk tamaziɣt. Akken i d-xelqen HCA, ttawin-iyi-d yimeddukal-iw idlisen i d-yeffɣen syin. Acḥal ferḥeɣ s yimeddukkal-iw, yal yiwen deg-sen deg mi ara iruḥ ad yinig ɣer Lezzayer, ad d-yeglu s yidlisen-inekk, acku ẓran belli nekk ḥemmleɣ aṭas ad ɣreɣ idlisen n tmaziɣt. D acu ula ad nekk, yal mi ara ɣreɣ adlis, ad t-muddeɣ i wayeḍ. Lḥaṣun, imir-nni ula d nekk εemdeɣ-t, bɣiɣ medden yakk ad issinen tutlayt-nsen tamaziɣt.
Ma yella wamek ad aɣ-d-tefkeḍ agzul ɣef wayen txeddmeḍ neɣ ɣef wayen tetturuḍ…Uriɣ ungal Ussan n Tayri deg Fransa. Deg tallit-nni, lliɣ d aεeggal n tddukkla n tmerrit n tɣiwant Ulgrej (amaray amatu), yerna xedmeɣ d anawer deg uɣerbaz. Nexdem d waṭas n tddukkliwin i yellan deg tmurt-nneɣ, ama d tiddukkla n tiklat Leqser n Bgayet, tiddukkla n Itri n Uqbu, tin n Timimun n adrar, SDH Wehran neɣ tin n later n Bgayet. Lḥaṣun aṭas i neqdec i nexden yid-sen, syin neqdec d yiwwet n tddukkla n tmurt n fransa qqaren-as Abbé Pierre d tayeḍ, qqaren-as Génération 2010 n fransa diɣ. Imiren, nesεa yiwen uselway n tɣiwant-nneɣ, iḥemmel axeddim yid-nneɣ, akk d tddukkliwin i yellan. Akken akken armi i d-nebna 18 yixxamen i yimeεḍar d yiẓawaliyen, nerna-d Auberge i yilemẓiyin akked yimukan anda tturaren warrac imecṭaḥ d waṭas n tɣawsiwin-nniḍen. Neεreḍ, ad nreqqeε ixxamen n zik n leqbayel deg tudrin n tɣiwant. Lḥasun, nniɣ-ak-d aṭas n leqdic i nexdem ladɣa leqdicat n tddukkliwin-ayi n berra ddaw leεnaya n uneɣlaf n daxel n Lezzayer. Akken ẓran yiεgalen-nni n tddukkla Génération 2010 d iεeggalen n Abbé Pierre n Fransa leqdic-iw yelha, yerna xedmeɣ-d talilt (chorale) i yinelmaden yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz anda i xeddmeɣ, bɣan ad i yi-rren tajmilt ad i yi-awin ɣer Fransa, ad i yi-dawin, ad i yi-kksen cwami-nni n tirɣi i d-ibanen deg wudem-iw azelmaḍ d ufus-iw. Syin ruḥeɣ ɣer Fransa tikelt tamezwarut, qqimeɣ kan kra wussan. Iẓerr-iyi ṭbib ameqqran. Tikelt tis snat, qqimeɣ qrib 8 n waguren anda i d-yessicbiḥ udem-iw akked ufus-iw. Asmi i ruḥeɣ ɣer din i tikelt tis snat, cfiɣ ass amezwaru i kecmeɣ ɣer sbiṭer, iḍ-nni amezwaru i bdiɣ ttaruɣ ungal-iw amenzu, tusa-yi-d tikti. Yerna akken i d-ffɣeɣ syin, kra n wussan, tettawi-yi-d tddukkla La Génération 2010 imussnawen, imura d inaẓuren ɣer tddukkli, dinna i d-lemdeɣ amek ara aruɣ ungal akken iwata. Ttasent-iyi-d tektiwin n tira, uriɣ qrib 3 wungalen. Yerna ttruḥuɣ ɣer ACB anda i d-ufiɣ aṭas n tɣawsiwin ayen yeεnnan iɣriben d inaẓur-nneɣ. Rniɣ-d tamussni n tira tamεemmrit.
Amek liḥala n tmaziɣt deg lwilaya n Sṭif ?Deg lawilaya n ṣṭif, la tetteddu tmaziɣt ɣas ulamma am yifker. D acu, qqaren-tt warrac deg lakul amenzu akked uɣerbaz alemmas.
D acu twalaḍ deg tsekla tamaziɣt s umata ?D acu ulac imeɣriyen aṭas. Mmalen ɣer tutlayt-nniḍen am taεrabt. Dɣa aṭas i yi-d-yesteqsan ɣef wacuɣer ur ttaruɣ ara s taεrabt. Nekk, qqareɣ-asen yal ass nekk ttaruɣ taqbaylit axaṭer d aqbayli. Taεrabt, tesεa imawlan-is nekk imawlan-iw d taqbaylit d tamaziɣt s umata. Tasekla n tmaziɣt ɣas akken la tleḥḥu, d acu kan ilaq ad tili tkadimit i wakken ad teddukkel s yiwwet n tira. Tira-s s tlaṭinit i wakken ad teddu ɣer sdat. Ilaq ad tesεu imeɣriyen yal yiwen ilaq ad yesεu adlis n tmaziɣt deg uxxam-is ass-a, azekka ad t-ddmen warraw-is, ad t-ɣren.
Kra n yisenfaren-ik sya d afella…Isenfaren-iw, sin wungalen yiwen yekfa ad yeffeɣ deg wagguren i d-iteddun, azwel-ines Tawenza Umesbrid. Ma yella d wayeḍ, qrib ad yekfu azwel-ines Tizwal Uɣerbas. Rnu sεiɣ ammud n yisefra, yekfa azwel-ines Amsedrar. Aql-i leḥḥuɣ ɣas nekk d aawali, yerna d amuḍin ɣef tmaziɣt. Kkateɣ ad rnuɣ, ad neǧǧreɣ abrid ɣer sdat. Ɣas nufa-d isennanen, d acu tella tebɣest, tmeɣnest d leḥmala n uẓar -nneɣ i wakken tutlayt ur tettmettat ara sya ɣer sdat.Yesteqsa-t Hocine Moula
I lmend n wass aɣelnaw n yimeɣraṣ, thegga-d tesnawit n Maεuc Idris n Lbeṛǧ Mira, ass n, 18 fuṛar yezrin, yiwet n temsizzelt s wazal-is. Taneggarut-a, tella d tagnit i wakken ad walin yinelmaden n uswir aneggaru i yettheggin (BAC) aswir-nsen, ladɣa imi ur d-yeggri ara waṭaṣ i ukayad n taggara n useggas. Am wakken i tella daɣen d ttiεad i d-yessemlalen inelmaden d yiselmaden n ukuẓet n tnawiyin. Rnu i tin n umeɣṛaṣ Maεuc Idris, tettekka tesnawit n umeɣṛaṣ Xaled Mesεud, n Yiderginen, d tin n umeɣṛaṣ Ɛebban Ṛemḍan n Melbu akked tinna n umeɣṛaṣ Ḥusin At Ḥmed n At Smaεel.
Seld awal n unemhal n tsenawit n Lbeṛǧ Mira i yessṛeḥben s yinebgawen-is d wawal n kra n yimasayen n tesnawiyin-nniḍen, εeddan srid ɣer ttiεad n temsizzelt. Ad d-nesmekti d akken timsizzelt-a, tella-d deg sin n yiḥricen. Tamezwarut, d temsizzelt taggagt (Intellectuelle), tis snat d tin n usuneɣ. Di tmezwarut dɣa, ama d tinegwa tiseklanin neɣ d tid icudden ɣer tussna, llant akk di ttiεad. I yisalli d tasnawit n Lberǧ Mira i d-yusan deg umḍiq amezwaru, s 63 n tenqiḍin. Ayen yeṣṣefṛaḥen ugar d tanqiḍt n Tmaziɣt, imi wwin-d 10/10.
Teḍfer-itt-id tasnawit n Yiderginen, i d-yusan deg umḍiq wis sin. Ma yella d Tasnawit n At Smaεel, teṭṭef amḍiq aneggaru s 36 n tenqiḍin kan. Agemmuḍ-a, yessewhem inelmaden d yiselmaden n At Smaεel s umata. Γef usentel-a dɣa yenna-aɣ-d yiwen n uselmad: « sḥasfeɣ nezzeh, acku aswir n warrac-nneɣ n zik, yemgarad ɣef win n warrac n tallit-a. Ilaq ad ḥṣun yimawlan belli ula d nutni uraren nnuba tameqqṛant deg waya, imi bran i yifassen-nsen deg wayen yeεnan leqṛaya n warraw-nsen. Nessaram s tidet, ad tbeddel tegnit deg tesnawit n Ḥusin At Ḥmed ».
Ma yella deg temsizzelt n usuneɣ, d anelmad Xaled Xaled, seg tesnawit n Yiderginen, i d-yezgan deg umḍiq amezwaru. Seg tama-nniḍen, ddeqs n leqdicat idelsanen i d-yellan di ttiεad. Ama d ticeqqufin n umezgun, neɣ d tignatin n ccna. Ula d tufsirin n tewlafin n yimeɣṛasen akked yidlisin n umezruy, sεan amur-nsen di temlilt-a. Aredmani, ulac win i d-yeffɣen seg ttiεad-a, mebla ma yerna-d cwit n tmussni i wallaɣ-is. Mebla ma nettu, ula d Imjuhad n temnaḍt-a, εerḍen-ten-id ɣer temlilt-a i wakken ad d-mudden tanaga-nsen ɣef umezruy n temnaḍt-nsen di tegrawla. Γer taggara, fkan arrazen i wid i d-yufraren d tnagiwin n usnemmer i wid ittekkan. K. K.
Macahu, tellemcahu ad tt-yeḍbeε Ṛebbi d asaru. Qqarren zzman, yella yiwen n umdan d amesbaṭli acku d bab n draε u yesεa adrim swayes yuγ akk imdanen. Uuγalen s ddaw n ufus-is. Ihi, ṛṛay d ṛṛay-is γas γer yiγzer awal d awal-is ,γas ma yexser. Win ad d-yekkin mgal ines, ad as-iceyyeε iḍan-is, ad sεeddin fell-as lbaṭel. Yiwen n umdan, yesεa tabγest (d akuraji), yugi ad yuγal am wiyaḍ d axeddam-is, neγ xersum ad yessusem am umeγbun n taddart-nni yečča lḥif d tmara. Ihi, win akka, wayeḍ akka ulamma argaz akuraji ur yexdim ara kra, maca ur yekni ara i ddel, yerna at taddart yettban belli ḥemmlen-t γas ur d-sbeggnen ara ayen-nni. Si tama-s, amcum-nni ur t-yeεğib ara lḥal. Xedmen-as yiwet n tcerket i ukuraji-nni akken ad d-tesweqqɛen.
Yewweḍ γer sdat n lqaḍi, yenna-as: ‘’A leflani, aql-ak cetkan-d fell-ak at taddart belli la tzerεeḍ ccwal di tseqqamut, tebγiḍ ad tfarqeḍ tacemli’’. Akuraji : ‘’A sidi lqaḍi, nekk d amdan urğin nwiγ lexsara i yiwen, ruḥ steqsi imeγban yugten di taddart ad a k-inin’’. Lqaḍi iṣṣub-d γer taddart, yejmeε-d at taddart, la ten-yesteqsay. Seg wakken yaf-d lḥal yeggul deg-sen umcum-nni, cehden-d akken yebγa netta, yal yiwen akken i as-yemehmuh. Mi akken kfan, yenṭeq umcum nni: ‘’Twalaḍ a sidi lqaḍi, acu I d-qqarren?’’ Lqaḍi yaf-d lḥal yeḥdeq yessen: ‘’Ala, ur walaγ ara, sliγ kan’’. Amcum: ‘’Amek?’’ Lqaḍi: ‘’Sliγ i lehduṛ-nsen, maca ur walaγ ara ulawen-nsen’’. Yahia Yanes
Lhan yinelmaden n tesdawit n tubiret ass-nni n ttlata, 15 tuber 2019, akken ad d-inin ‘’Ala i tefranin n 12 duǧember i d-iteddun’’, ‘’I rrwaḥ n yizamulen n unagraw’’. Am wakken i ṭṭalaben, diɣ, ‘’Asuffeɣ n yimeḥbas n rray’’. Ffyen-d yinelmaden n tesdawit Akli Muḥend Ulḥagǧ akken uɣen tannumi s umgired n tektiwin d wannayen iwraɣen, izeggaɣen d izegzawen. Dduklen-d akken ad d-inin ulac tifranin di yir tignatin yecban tigi. Ssuturen daɣen aqlaɛ n udabu seg yiẓuran imi dayen yeqqur. Ur ttun ara diɣ amennuy-nsen mgal tuddsiwin imi, ɣur-sen, tigi squcdent-d seg udabu. ‘’Ihi, ad ruhent akken ara iruh uẓar-nsent, akken ad teǧǧuǧeg tesdawit’’, i iwala yiwen unelmad. Ṭṭuqten yinelmaden yeddan si tesdawit armi d lwilaya akken ṭṭuqtent tektiwin-nsen. Ad nerr tamawt d akken ɣer tama n yinelmaden, lḥan kra n yimezday d imeɣnasen akken ad ffken afud i yilelliyen n tubiret. Tella-d tikli deg tegnatin igerrzen nezzeh ɣas ulamma aṭas i yelḥan deg-s s wulɣuten i yessawalen i ubeddel, tugdut d tlelli. Ṭṭerḍiqent tuyɣac n Maɛtub, Ideflawen d Uleḥlu amzun d Ǧerǧer s timmad-is i icennun.
Nisma Tigrine
Yeffeɣ-d udlis amaynut deg wussan-agi, d yiwen wammud n tullisin i tura Massa Rabha Aïssou. D afaris-is amenzu ara d-tessiẓreg, yeffeɣ-d wammud ɣer teẓrigin Achab. Ddant-d deg-s tẓat n tullisin, s yisental yemgaraden, am; A Fa, Lemri, Tameɣra, Tiziri, Timerǧiwt, Tamwarebt, Ttxil-k a mmi. Dɣa d “Timerǧiwt” i tefren d asentel ara d-yeddun ɣef teɣlaft n udlis. Daxel n udlis-a, tenǧeɛ tmarut yiwet n taluft i mazal fell-as askasi di tmetti, yal wa d tamuɣli-s ɣef wamek i tt-yettwali, tagi d tamsalt n tmeṭṭut d uzref-is i urɛad i d-nban akken ilaq di tmetti n wass-a. Ma nudef s telqayt ɣer ugbur n tullisin, ad naf lwelha n tmarut, tcudd srid ɣer maḥyaf s tewsatin-is yakk i d-iḍerrun mgal tameṭṭut. “Seg wakken tuɣal di rrif, tikwal tameṭṭut mi ara tili s tadist, ad teḥṣu tettraǧu taqcict, ɣur-s ayagi icuba nnger, acku nettat ur as-tefki ara tmeddurt azref-is, amek ara d-tɣur d yelli-s !
Ma teḥṣa am nettat ara tidir !”. Annect-a, yezga d ttbut, ladɣa di tmetti n tallit taqburt. D timsal-agi yakk i d-tessegza Massa Rabha deg tullisin-is. Iswi-s, d asiweḍ n yizen i umdan s umata, ad as-tili tameṭṭut d amdan, d rruḥ, d leqdic, d iḥulfan, d tayri, d asnulfu, d tameddurt s timmad-is. Neddem-d ammud-a i d-tsedda deg yiwet seg tullisin-is. Hat-a-n wayen i tenna “…Mi tekfa ameslay teɣli di ddker armi tencef, tafekka-s tezzizrir d tidiwin. Tuɣal tekker, tuẓa ɣer yiwen ṭṭaq d amecṭuḥ, qqaren-as ṭṭaq n uɣrib, tserreḥ s ṭṭelq n taɣect-is : – A Belwid ɛzizen, anida telliḍ ? Melmi ara ak-id-iger ubrid, melmi ara tfak lɣerba fell-aɣ? Tessawel azal n tlata n yiberdan. Tessawal, allen-is cerrwent d imeṭṭi. Tuɣal tessusem, teṭṭef-d ijifer n lfuḍa-s, tesfeḍ yis-s udem-is, teffeɣ-d, tkemmel abrid-is…”. Aɣanib d tutlayt i tessemres tmarut, ttwagzan, imi ur d-tgir ara aṭas n wawalen imaynuten. Ɣef waya ara yishil i yimeɣri, am win yennumen taɣuri s tutlayt n Dda Lmulud, am wid urɛad i d-skeflen ccbaḥa n tsekla taqbaylit d yisental yemgaraden iɣef d-ttawin yidlisen-is.Kh. A.
Yessuffeɣ-d uselmad n tmaziɣt Adel Bachouche, adlis-is wis sin deg wussan-a, ɣer teẓrigin Tira. Sin n wagguren kan segmi i d-yessuffeɣ “Tamudemt n tfertin n temsirin”, iḍfer-it-id gma-s s usentel “Timsirin – Iluɣma – Aseɣti n yiluɣma”. Imi ameskar d aselmad yellan deg unnar, yefren ad d-yawi s leqdic-is amaynut ɣef uselmed, akken ad yessiǧhed ugar tamkerḍit n yidlisen n uselmed, acku d annar yesran i tektabin, akken ad yennerni. Ula d imazzagen n tutlayt seg yimesnilsanen d yiselmaden n tesdawit, xeddmen-d tizrawin u ssuffuɣen-d idlisen deg taɣult-a. Adlis-a, yebḍa-t Adel ɣef kraḍ n yiḥricen igejdanen : Timsirin + iluɣma + aseɣti n yiluɣma. D adlis yerzan ahil n uswir wis sin alemmas, n tsuta tis snat. Uqbel yal tamsirt, yettili uḍris, sakin ad d-ḍefrent temsirin n yiferdisen n tutlayt, am tjerrumt, tirawalt d tseftit.
Ɣer taggara n yal tamsirt, ad naf asiteg d yiluɣma. Ineggura-a, ttwaseɣtan deg uḥric aneggaru n udlis. Yerra umeskar lwelha-s ɣer kra n yiḥricen ilan azal deg uselmed s usenfar, am tegnit n tmenna, tamsirt n tmedyezt, tagnit n useɣred akked kra n temsirin n umawal. Ma neddem-d amedya n Tegnit n tmenna, ad t-naf d aḥric s wazal-is deg uselmed atrar, irennun-d abaɣur seg waṭas n tamiwin i unelmad. Nezmer ad as-nsemmi tanfalit s timawit, yezmer ad tt-ibedd uselmad ɣef tɣawsiwin-a; tugniwin, aḍris yuran neɣ ayen yettwali yerna isell-as (audio visuelle). Ma d tizemmar iɣer ara yessiweḍ, ɣef wakken i d-yedda deg udlis n Adel Bachouche; “Tettrebbi anelmad ɣef tmussni n tutlayt akken ad tt-yettmeslay ɣef yiles, asenfali s timawit war uguren, tettekkes leḥya ɣef unelmad ma yella ur yennum ara yettmeslay, tettrebbi-t ad yettqadar tawala-s (nnuba-s) deg tmeslayt”. Kh. A.
Seg zik n zik, ssuturen deg tudrin n leqbayel Anẓar yal tikkelt mi ara teẓruref lqaɛa ; mi ara tuɣal tmurt d aɣurar. Tisirit-a, teqqen ɣer tedyant n ugellid n waman Anẓar akked yiwet n teqcict i yugin niqal ad t-taɣ deg tazwara. Tameṭṭut-a, tezga tesucuf deg yiwen wasif, yal mi ara d-iṣubb ugellid n waman Anẓar, ad teffer iman-is. Yiwen wass yenna-s : ‘’Ad d-tefkeḍ ayen bɣiɣ, neɣ ad am-kkseɣ aman’’. Tugi teqcict ccerṭ n Ugellid, dɣa yekker yebren taxatemt, din-din yeqqur wasif. Deg taggara, teqbel teqcict lebɣi n Ugellid, syin uɣalen-d waman s amekkan-nsen. Ha-tt-an s tewzel tsirit-a. Seg yimir, ssuturen Anẓar yal tikkelt mi ara teqqar lqaɛa, meḥsub ur d-yewwit ara ugeffur deg lawan-is. Ddurt-a dɣa, yella-d usuter neɣ lxedma n Unẓar deg waṭas n tudrin n leqbayel.
Nnejmaɛent temɣarin, fkant ttiɛad i usiher-a. Mi d-yewweḍ wass-nni, cebbḥent i uɣenǧa, rrant-t am wakken d tislit ara fkent d tarzeft i Ugellid n waman Anẓar anda ara ssutrent tiririt n tunṭict-a, meḥsub ad d-iserreḥ i waman (ageffur). Ad ttɛeddayent axxxam axxam, ad d-jemɛent isufar n tgella i wakken ad xedment azekka-nni imensi n Unẓar. Timɣarin-a, ttawint arrac imecṭaḥ i yettɣennin yid-sent, ssuturen ageffur deg Ugellid n waman Anẓar. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnant temɣarin-a, ttawint igerdan axater d nutni i yesɛan nneyya, ad ten-iqader Unẓar u ad t-ɣiḍen imi meẓẓiyit, dɣa ad asen-yeddu deg lebɣi, ad d-yewwet ugeffur. Ladɣa imi timɣarin-nni kkaten igerdan-agi s uẓegduf, yiwen n yimɣi i iteqqsen mliḥ, syin ad ttrun warrac mi ara yennal yimɣi-agi taglimt-nsen. Akka, ara d-tettru tegnawt fell-asen, ɣef leḥsab n tsirit.
Ma d asuter n Unẓar, yettili-d s usefru-a deg waṭas n temnaḍin : ‘’Anẓar, anẓar, A Rebbi, sseww-itt ar aẓar. Ad teww nneɛma n udrar, Ad ternu tin n uzaɣar. Axenǧa, yetteqliliḥ,  Nnig n uxxam Uqiliḥ, A Rebbi, seww-itt-id Mliḥ’’. Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, awi-d ukan ad yili ugeffur, ladɣa ma neẓra d akken tettekk-d tidet seg yimi n ugrud. Akka, dɣa, i deɛɛunt temɣarin ‘’A Rebbi, ur aɣ-ttqassa ara ɣef wudem n llufan’’. Tisirit, d tisirit, akka ay tga, yerna d tigejdit n yal idles, xas ur tt-numin ara. Hocine Moula
Macahu tellemcahu ad tt-yeḍbeε Ṛebbi d asaru. Yiwen wass iεedda-d umqerqur, tenṭeq ɣur-s tɣirdemt tenna-as: “ A timjellebt”. Terra-as-d: “Acu a tiɣirdemt?”.Tenna-as: “ La t-ttwaliḍ asif iḥemel, nekk ilaq ad zeggreɣ ɣer tama-nniḍen. Tura ma ulac uɣilif, ad i yi-tzeggreḍ”. Ulac uɣilif, d acu kan ugadeɣ ad i yi-teqseḍ.
Annaɣ a timjellebt, ma qqseɣ-kem, ad temteḍ, uma temmuteḍ, ad d-tɣerqeḍ deg wasif, ma tɣerqeḍ ddiɣ yid-m. Ihi, ɣas ur ttagaḍ. Ulac win ara ihudden axxam i deg yella, ulac win ara yessegrirben ṭumubil deg i yedda. Twala temjellebt d tidet, dɣa tenna-as: “ Ihi, ali-d ɣef waεrur-iw ad kem-zeggreɣ”. Tuli tɣirdemt, terkeb, teqlaε temjellebt, truḥ qbala ɣer tama-nniḍen, akken kan wwḍen ɣer ttnaṣif, teqqes tɣirdemt timejeebt. Taneggarut-a, tenna-as: “Annaɣ a tiɣerdemt”. Terra-as-d tɣirdemt: “ Akka a timjellebt”.
I tura a tiɣirdemt, uqbel ad mmteɣ yerna ad tedduḍ ula d kemm, sfehmi-y-id amek ?
A timjellebt, nekk yexleq-iyi-d Ṛebbi ad qqseɣ, ad qqseɣ ɣas azal d ṛruḥ-iw.
Yahia Yanes
Seg yisental iɣef ttmeslayen yimdanen ussan-a, imi d ayen i ten-iceɣben, d ssuma n tfakturin n trisiti i yulin nezzeh. Ladɣa, deg ukṛadyur-a aneggaru. Ayen i ten-yeǧǧan wehmen ugar, amek armi d tura i teεlay ssuma n lexlas, di lawan anda ur seddayen ara medden trisiti s waṭas. Rnu i waya, tamsalt-a, tusa-d deg wakud anda i d-yennulfa waṭṭan n Kuṛunu, dɣa ula d ssumma n upitṛul tuder-d. Γef leḥsab n udiwenni i d-newwi akked kra deg-sen, qqaṛen-d belli d imḍebbṛen n SONELGAZ i d ssebba n waya. Ayagi imi, ttεeṭṭilen ugar n ukradyur i wakken ad ceyyεen i medden tifakturin-nsen. Yerna tamsalt-a, d ayen i ten-isuεden s tidet, acku imir-n, yettekcam umsuder (consommateur) deg uḥric wiss kṛad, neɣ deg win n ukuẓ n lexlaṣ. Ɣef usentel-a, yenna-aɣ-d yiwen : «Mačči d tikkelt i tɛeṭṭel tfakturt i wakken ad telḥeq, yerna imir-n d nukni i yettxelliṣen aɛeṭṭel-a.
Ayen iɣef sḥassfeɣ ugar, llan wid ur nefhim amek i xeddmen leḥsab n ssuma n trisiti, ihi ur ẓrin belli aɛeṭṭel-a ur yelli i ubaɣuṛ-nsen». Ddeqs n tnagiwin n yimdanen i aɣ-d-iwekkden d akken s tidet yella waya, ula d tuddsa Tazzayrit n uḥuddu ɣef umsuder, deg usebter-is, temmeslay-d ɣef uɣbel-a. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, yella-d umeslay daɣen, belli rnan ula i tẓeṭṭaṭ (taxe) ɣef tnezduɣt, imi tuli seg 150 n yidinaṛen, armi d 600 n yidinaṛen. Ayagi, mebla aṣexbeṛ n medden. Ula d ineggura-a seg tama-nsen, ssuturen sɣur yimasayen di Sonelgaz, ad d-seggzin taluft-a n ubeddel, d tmentilt-is.K. K.
Tineggura-a, anida tezzi tiṭ-ik ama deg yiberdan neɣ deg yimukan-nniḍen, ala tiqerɛatin d tebwaḍin n uplastik ara d-temlileḍ. Ulac tardast deg wakal n tmurt, ur tḥuza ara taluft-agi n yiḍuman n uplastik. Win iwumi tenniḍ, ad ak-yini : « Mačči d nekk ara d-iqeɛden tamurt ! ». Yal wa yettara-d ṭṭlam ɣef wayeḍ ; imezdaɣ qqaren-d d tiɣiwanin ur nxeddem ara axeddim-nsent, nutenti si tama-nsent, ur sawḍent ara ɣer lebɣi-nsent, yerna seḍlament imezdaɣ. Ma d tiddukliwin i iqedcen deg uḥric n twennaḍt, ula d nutenti sḥasfent ɣef liḥala n twennaḍt di tmurt, xeddment ahat nnig tezmert-nsent. Ula d asmi i yuɣalen yiḍuman d idrimen, ur cliɛen ara yimdanen, imi d tidet d idrimen-nsen i ṭeggiren mačči d iḍuman-nsen !
Mbeɛd mi d-yessawel uɣlif n twennaḍt ɣer tḥawact n yiḍuman deg wakal aɣelnaw, tettwalqeḍ-d tnecta (tasmekta) n 474,38 n yiṭunen yiḍuman n uplastik. D tigawt taɣelnawt iwumi semman « Aggur War Aplastik ». Tebda, ass n 21 cutember yezrin, ad tkemmel alamma d ass-a n, 21 tuber 2019. Ad d-yili uḍfar n tigawt-a taɣelnawt, sɣur teseqqamut n uḍfar d uktazel, yetabaɛen ɣer uɣlif n twennaḍt. Am wakken, i ssawḍen ad d-suddsen azal n 69 n yisaragen d yimyaggren deg yakk timnaḍin n tmurt, i usefhem i medden ɣef wazal d wamek ilaq ɣef umdan ad iseḥbiber ɣef ugama d twennaḍt. Rnu ɣer wahil uzzig i d-yellan i yigerdan (inelmaden) n uɣerbaz, ɣef teɣzi n 3 ssmanat n tigawt-agi. Yella-d deg-s uttekki n tmetti taɣarimt ur yesɛin tamtilt, ama d tiddukkliwin tisadarin (professionnelles), ama d tid n twennaḍt d yilemẓiyen, ama d tigrawin n yiskutiyen, ama d imezrawen (isdawanen), tiseqquma n tuddar neɣ n yimḍqan, iɣerbazen d udmawen n tmetti yettwassnen ɣer yidis n yiduba idiganen d yiɣsuren n ufran d wallus n usseqdec n wafrasen.I lmend n waya, daɣ deg lwilaya n Ǧiǧel d Ɛennaba, nulfan-d kra n tkebbaniyin i lmend n ulqaḍ n yiḍuman n uplastik, ara d-ixelqen ama d imekwan n uxeddim, ama d asizdeg n twennaḍt. Am wakken daɣen i d-heggan ticemliyin n uqɛad n kra n yimukan deg kra n lwilayat n unẓul n tmurt i wakken ad d-yili wallus n useqdec n wafrasen n uplastik, yernu iger-d uɣlif n twennaḍt tiɣri i yimdanen terza temsalt akken ad sseftin deg uḥric-agi i d-isekcamen idrimen.
Adaoun Abdelghani
Segmi yettwabna Umezgun n tzegzewt deg taddart n Ayt Ɛisa, taɣiwant n Uweqqas, ayendin d armuden i n-yettwaheggan s uɛraḍ n waṭas n yinaẓuren yemgaraden, ama d tirebbuyaɛ n umezgun, d icennayen, d imsaragen neɣ d imalasen. Ussan-a dɣa, yendeh deg ubraḥ warmud adelsan, ladɣa asenɛet n tceqqufin n umezgumm seg tmeddit d asawen. Ihi, i lmend n teẓrigt tis semmus n wuḍan n umezgun n Ayt Ɛisa, thegga-d tddukkla tadigant armud ideg i d-ttwasneɛtent ddeqs n tceqqufin deg yiḍ, mi d-rrant i tiɣri n tddukkla « Tadukkli » trebbuɛay yemgaraden n twilayt n Bgayet. Ama d tarbaɛt n Ticci n Mass Sɛidi, neɣ d tin iwumi ssawalen Ifeṭṭiwjen n temnaḍt n Tmeẓrit.
Daɣen, ula d acennay Lwennas Tagrawla, yewwi-d ass-nni kra n ccnawi berra i ubeḥri. Kra n wussan ɣer sdat, tettwahegga-d rreḥba n ccna sɣur unaẓur Azal Belqadi, seld winna n Tyaqut, Lwennas Gerruj d Arezqi Yaɛla. Imir-nni, nezmer ad d-nini ala tizlit taɣerfant i d-yettwawin i uzayez. Ddurt yezrin daɣen, muggen deg umezgun n Buṭeɣwa sin n yiḥuna (ateliers) s tallelt n kra n tddukkliwin n Bgayet. D ayen i yeǧǧan ad yili umalas Fares Idir d inebgi n yiḍ-nni, ideg i d-yessawel timucuha i warrac. Ayendin d annecraḥ i yezmer ad yettwaɛqel deg wudmawen n yigerdan di teswiɛin-nni. Yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti d akken yella-d lebni n umezgun-a azegzaw s tedrimt d ufus n yiɣermanen kan. D isenfaren am wi i yelha ad nettwali di Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen.
M. K.
Iɣil Ɛli d yiwet n temnaḍt anda ṭṭuqten mliḥ yiḥerqan n uzemmur, ladɣa imi lqiεan-nsen kkawen, mačči d wid isellḥen i tuẓẓut n ddeqs n tidal, d yigumma. D ayen i yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n temnaḍt n At Ɛebbas s umata, rran-tt i tuẓẓut n yileqqamen n uzemmur. Imi ineggura-a, ttwinniεen deg lqiqan-nsen akken ilaq, yerna ula d lɣella tettili s buhan. Aseggas-a dɣa, yugar wid iεeddan, acku urwent tzemrin d yileqqamen armi celxen. Rnu i waya, ula d lɣella n useggas-a tufrar, meḥsub yiwen n uqenṭaṛ yerra-d armi d 26 n llitrat.
Ula d wid yesεan s buhan, ṣṣawḍen senzen-t d iεeqqayen. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, kilu n llḥeb n uzemmur, yelḥeq armi d 80 n yidinaṛen aseggas-a. S unamek-nniḍen, tuli ssuma-s cwit ma yella nmuqel ɣer useggas yezrin, anda i yenza s 70 n yidinaṛen i kilu. Ma yella seg tama n zzit, d anemgal. Meḥsub tuder-d ssuma-s mliḥ tikkelt-agi. Aṛiḍa, deg kra n temnaḍin yettnuzu s 500 n yidinaṛen kan i litra, ma yella deg tiyaḍ, 600 neɣ 700 n yidinaṛen i litra. Aredmani, yettuṛaǧu ad d-yader deg ussan i d-iteddun,ɣef leḥsab n wid yesεan tarmit deg unnar.
Γef usentel-a newwi-d ameslay akked Dda Ɛetman, d yiwen n ufellaḥ i d-yeggaren aɣrum-is seg lbiε n zzit uzemmur. Dda Ɛetman, iteṭṭef-d iεemmalen n uzemmur, ileqqeḍ-iten. Ayagi, i wakken ad yessenz zzit-nni, ad iεeyyec s yidrimen-is tawacult-is. Dɣa yenna-aɣ-d: « Nekni deg tmurt-nneɣ, ur tettali ara nezzeh ssuma n zzit, acku meḥsub ulac axxam ur neksib ddeqs-is. Aseggas-a dɣa, ad neḥmed rebbi, tella mliḥ lɣella. Ihi sεan akk medden, armi sseggran nnig n wayen i yeḥwaǧen, ihi sennzen-t.
Imi yeṭṭuqet zzit di leswaq, tuder-d ssuma-s. Meεna seg tama-nneɣ nekni s yifellaḥen, mačči dayen yeffɣen fell-aɣ». Ikemmel deg wawal-is: « Amek akka segmi ara d-yali wass nekni d axeddim. Nqubel aṣemmiḍ, nerna leεtab n uleqqaḍ. Lameεna nesnuzu-t s 500 n yidinaṛen? Lameεna limer i d-tusa tmurt d tin iweqqmen, ilaq ur nettaf ara iεewwiqen am wigi. Ula d lbiε, ur nettaf ara iwumi ad t-nesenz ».
K. K.
Taddart n Wizran am tuddar akk n tmurt n Leqbayel, d yiwet n taddart tameqqrant. Akken i d-ḥkan yimɣaren n taddart-a, semman-as «Wizran», d yiwen n umdan iwumi qqaren Aεednan akked d umeddakkel-is, leḥḥun leḥḥun deg teẓgi armi i d-ssawḍen ɣer umkan-a n Wizran, yenṭeq Uεednan yenna i umeddakkel-is : «Wissen isem-is umḍiq-a ideg nella !» Yerra-as urfiq-is : «Wi yeẓran !» Seg wass-nni yeqqim akka yisem n taddart d Wizran. Llan, wid i d-yennan semman-as Wizran imi imezdaɣ-is imezwura, d At n tebɣest am yihran ( izmawen ).
Nnan-d, axxam amezwaru i yeẓẓan deg taddart-a, d axxam n Uεednan. Tezga-d taddart n Wizran deg Ugni deg tiɣilt, seg tama n ugafa d Iɣill Ɛli, Belεeyyal : ɣer umalu, d taddart n Ginzat d Buceqfa ; ma ɣer tama n usammar, d Tizi Ɛelwan, ɣer unẓul, d At Ɛidel d Tawrirt Uεebla. Teṭṭafar lεerc n At Ɛebbas, taɣiwant-is d Ayt Rzin, seg wasun n Yiɣil Ɛli, aɣir n Bgayet. Tesεa azal n 1800 nyimezaɣ, wa d amḍan n useggas n 2018. Deg taddart-a, ad tafeḍ yiwen n ubrid d agejdan, qqaren-as abrid n Yimrabḍen d awesεan d kra n yiberdan-nniḍen d tberdatin n uḍar yettawin ɣer yizenqan d yixxamen. Daɣen, ɣur-s kraḍ n leğwameε : lğameε n ddaw n Ssur, d aqdim, lğameε n Tiɣilt n ufella, lğameε n Tizi n waḍu.
Am wakken yella yiwen n unnar ideg tturaren yilmeẓyen ddabex n uḍar. Degt lemmast n taddart, ad naf yiwet n lqahwa akked sebεa n tḥuna. Iseggasen-a ineggura, slulen-kra n yilmeẓyen yeɣran yiwet n tddukkla iwumi semman : Itri n tlelli, d yiwet n tuddsai iqeddcen aṭas ɣef wansayen n lejdud-nneɣ, am wakken daɣen tettεawan imezdaɣ n taddart deg yal tagnit. Wizran, d yiwet n taddart yeččuren d tiliwa yecban Tala n Melyu, Ajejḍar…atg. Mmalen yimezdaɣ-is s waṭas ɣer tfellaḥat: ulac win ur neksib tazemmurt, ama deg yiḥerqan neɣ tama n uxxam-is.
Mucaεet taddart n Wizran, deg umezruy, s 86 n yimeɣrasen i yeɣlin d asfel deg lgirra n 1954 mgal acengu afransis, meḍlen deg tmeqbert n ccuhada daxel n taddart-a. GM.
