Ismawen n yinelmaden, Ğεefri Tilelli, Ɛisani Tafat, Twati Cahra, Bensaleḥ Ḥusam.Adel Bachouche
“Tamaziɣt di lakul” d yiwen yiswi aqdim; nennuɣ fell-as, newweḍ ɣur-s. Asmi i t-id-nessasi, nufa-t d ilem. Yusa-d, yufa-aɣ-d nexla. Akken nettkemmil deg-s, “nettrebbi ilem” (Ait Menguellet); ur-as-nhegga ara tisulal yersan. Ar ass-a, mazal tamasalt n tutlayt ur tefri ara : d tutlayt neɣ d tutlayin ? s tfinaɣ neɣ s wayen-nniḍen ? Deg temnaḍin anda tella tmaziɣt, yal tama, tesselmad tantala-ines; anida-nniḍen, yal aselmad yesselmad tin-ines : Aqbayli yesɣaray taqbaylit, Acawi yesɣaray tacawit, atg. Acimi akka ? Axater, ulac nneyya n lebni. Wanag d acu i yeṭṭfen adabu ur ibeddel ara talɣa i yiḍrisen n Uwanek akken ad iserreḥ yifer n tmaziɣt ? Mi ara tafeḍ “La Loi d’orientation, 2008) mazal teqqar-d almud n tmaziɣt ar bu lebɣi, d acu i tenwiḍ ad d-teglu yis-s deg wayen yelhan ? Tagi n bu lebɣi d akellex ! Cwiṭ-nni n yiεerbawalen i yeṭṭafaren almud n tmaziɣt, yettabaε-iten uḍad n usekkak, tixiren, yettɣimi-d uselmad i iman-is deg tneɣrit, war inelmaden. Dagi diɣen, ilaq ad beddlen yisuḍaf. Seg tmendawt alamma d asaḍuf aneggaru n usnas deg unnar. Ahat, d tuddsa n Uwanek ara ibeddlen seg uẓar.
Ayen yelhan deg temsalt n tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz, d tarmit-a i d-negmer. Amecwar i d-nedda di tpidagujit yelha. Simmal nsuruf, simmal ttbanen-d wuguren n tidet iɣef ilaq ad nadin yimassanen, yal yiwen deg taɣult-is. Yegget umahil. Llant kra n temsal tigejdanin, rzant arraten n ulmud d tarrayin n uselmed : Iselmaden mazal εad i sεin adlis n tjerrumt taɣurbizt. Ihallen n uselmed, bdan ṣeffun, tebda tzerri deg-sen tafat, maca mazal deg-sen afras d telqim. Yezmer ad beddlen seg uẓar ma tella tmuɣli talqayant ara d-yemlen iberdan iwulmen, ama i uselmed n tutlayt n tyemmat, ama i tutlayt tis-snat. Idlisen diɣen, ttbeddilen i lmend n yihallen. Tura, tarmit temla-aɣ-d acḥal i texser tarrayt-nni n usemnenni n waṭas n yilsawen deg yiwen udlis am winna n uswir wis-4 alemmas. Taluft n tarrayin n uselmed, ula d nutenti d taluft meqqren. Tebda tṣeffu deg wallaɣen, maca mazal amahil fell-as. Ilaq ad yekfu uṭebbeε, ad nekcem deg tallit n uselmed n tidet. Yessefk, yal yiwen iqeddcen deg unnar, ad yeqbel ad yekcem deg usileɣ imezgi akken ad yezmer ad yesɣer tamaziɣt s ubrid ussnan i yeddan d yimir-a.Yesteqsa-ten Hocine Moula
Yemgarad wamek ara d-yili umager d usfugel n yennayer n useggas-a. Deg yixxamen, tiddukkliwin tidelsanin, tizeɣwa n ccna, iɣerbazen…atg. Lḥasun ad yili s lferḥ n yimdanen, imi d ass n lfal amerbuḥ i d-igellun s usfillet yelhan d lxir d lbaraka. Ɣef waya, yessuddes-d Umaris aɣelnaw n yidles d wulɣu, i lmend n umager n yennayer 2969, yiwet n tuzzya n tẓuri n ccna d uẓawan n terbaɛt tamaḍlant Tinariwin deg tlata n twilayin meqqren n tmurt. Deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt, deg usamer (Qsenṭina) u deg umalu (Wehran). Tarbaɛt Tinariwin, d tin yettwassnen deg umaḍal s taɣulin n uẓawan yufraren i txeddem deg Rruk, El bluz d uẓawan amensay atergi, imi xilla n warrazen imaḍlanen i d-tḥerr yakan. Tebda tuzzya seg Sirta, deg temdint n Qsenṭina, ass-nni n amhad 3 yennayer 2019 deg tzeqqa Aḥmed Bay. Syin tkemmel azuzen deg tmanaɣt deg tzeqqa meqqren Aṭlas, ass n sed 5 yennayer 2019. Yetturaǧu ad tessali ass-a n arim deg tmanaɣt n umalu n tmurt, deg tzeqqa n El Maɣreb deg Wehran ɣef tis 17h00 n tmeddit.
K. A.
Ussan n 27 d 28 duǧember yezrin, deg uxxam n tddukkla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu, d uxxam n yilmeẓyen Ɛebderreḥman Fares deg Tefrit, i d-tella tfaska n tmedyazt n Ssumam, deg teẓrigt-is tis mraw d sin (12). D tajmilt i yuɣalen i tmedyazt d temyarut Nadiya Benamar. Ččurent-d tzeɣwa s yinebgawen; d imedyazen i yekkin deg temsizzelt, d imedyazen-nniḍen i d-yusan ad ḥeḍren, d iɛeggalen n teseqqamut n ufran (imedyazen iqburen), d wudmawen n yidles s umata. Usan-d daɣen kra seg yiɛeggalen n Tddukkla Numidya n Wehran, imi neẓra d akken Nadiya gar yiɛeggalen iqburen n tkdukkla-a, rnu d tamezdaɣt n temdint n Wehran. Yebda wass amezwaru s tukci n warrazen i wid i d-yufraren deg temlilit yezrin, syin tella-d tullya tunṣibt n temlilit-a tis 12 sɣur Mass Mulud Salḥi, aselway n tɣiwant n Uqbu. Umbeɛd, d asenẓer n usaru ɣef tmeddurt n tmedyazt Nadiya Bennaɛmer, syin yella-d urfad n wawal sɣur-s. Uqbel ad tebdu tedwillt tamezwarut n temsizzelt. Ma deg wass wis sin, llan-d yisaragen i d-wwin yiselmaden n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, Mass Muḥend Akli Salḥi d Mass Ḥasan Ḥelwan ɣef talliyin tigejdanin d umhaz n tmedyazt taqbaylit, syin d akemmel n tedwilt tis snat n temsizzelt. Ar taggara n usiwel n yisefra, ufraren-d : Zeyan Brahem, Ḥedduc Ǧilali, Arib Masinisa s warrazen imenza, wis sin d wis kraḍ. Xabar Salma, Bensid Sabrina s warrazen imenza d wis sin n usebɣes. Akken i d-tufrar Massa Idiri Nura s warraz n tmedyazt n tmeṭṭut. Wwin arrazen-nsen, seld mi d-yella ufran-nsen, mbeɛd asqerdec gar yiɛeggalen n teseqqamut n yimeẓẓurfa. Yenna-d yiwen n uɛeggal i yekkin deg uheggi n temlilit-a tis 12, d akken «tɛedda akken iwulem tfaska-a, aṭas n usfaydi i wwin wid iḥeḍren, umren s waṭas yimedyazen i d-yufraren, nessaram aseggas i d-iteddun d tafaska ara d-yuɣalen deg talwit». Akken daɣen i nemmeslay d Massa Nadiya Benamar, tumer ayendin s tejmilt-a, tenna-d «Ḥulfaɣ d akken armi d tura ara d-yebdu uxeddim ameqqran. Ɣas akken ul-iw yeččur d lferḥ, maca ḥulfaɣ d akken taɛkemt ẓẓayet amakter sya ɣer sdat. Ɣef waya, tura ur nesɛi ara lḥeq i ustehzi deg wayen merra yerzan tamaziɣt. Seg tama-nniḍen, tajmilt-a ḥesbeɣ-tt d asteɛref i umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt, neqqar : rendre à César ce qui appartient à César (Err i Sizar ayen yellan n Sizar)». Deg urajǧu n tuzzya n wakud, d tisin n tfaska n qabel, nessaram afud igerrzen i wid i d-yessuddsen aneḍruy-a. 
K. A.
I lmed n usmekti wis 60 n tmettant n umeɣnas yellan d aɛeggal asebdad n ukabar n Yitri n Tefriqt n Uqafa (Étoile Nord Africaine) daɣen d amaray Amatu n ukabar-agi, wagi d Imache Amar, tuɣal-as tejmilt meqqren, ass n Sem, 07 seg Furar 2020, deg taddart-is n At Masbaḥ i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n At Dwala.
Thegga-d tajmilt-a tddukkla tadelsant yewwin isem n umeɣnas, Imache Amar i yemmuten ass n, 07 furar 1960, deg leɛmer-is 64 n yeseggasen . Gar leqdicat i d-yellan, ad naf asersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen deg usmektay n yimeɣrasen n taddart n At Mesbaḥ d tmeqbert n Ixlef n Ugemun, daɣen yella-d usemekti n wayen yexddem Imache Amar deg taddart-is ɣef tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ, sɣur imeddukkal-is. Yeḍra-d waya deg uɣerbaz amenzu Hamroune Med Arezki. I lmed n usmekti wis 60 n tmettant n babat n tɣelnaẓṛit ( nationalisme), yessuffeɣ-d mmi-s Chabane, amaru, tameddurt n baba-s, akken ad t-issinen kter yimdanen. Ɣef waya, yenn-a : » adlis-agi i d-yettalsen tudert n Imache Amar, uriɣ-t akken tisutwin i ilulen seld timunent n tmurt n Lezzayer 1962, ad sɛun tikti ɣef tɣersawt (iseflan) n yimawlan-nneɣ , d lejdud-nneɣ i d-yeksen tamurt n Lezzayer seg ucengu, seg yifassen n yimttakren, d wid itessen idammen n yimdanen ». Ikemmel, yerna-d daɣen : » Ajajiḥ n tmes mazal ur yexsi ara, mziya, dɣa asafu yerfed-it, ass-a, ugdud n tmurt n Lezzayer’’. 
Imache Amar, d yiwen gar yimḥaddiyen imeqqranen n yigduden yettwaḥqren deg umaḍal, d yiwen yekkaten ɣef tmental tuɣdimin. Yebda umennuɣ-is asertan deg yiseggasen 1920, armi d amennuɣ amrig deg waggur n unbir n useggas n 1954. Yella gar yimenza i yebdan mgal tiktiwin n temnukda d temharsiwin yemgaraden. Yugi lḥers d lbaṭel mgal igduden yellan s ddaw uɣmar n wiyaḍ. Imdanen i t-ixulḍen, ama asmi yunag ɣer Fransa neɣ asmi i d-yuɣal ɣer Tmurt, daɣen ɣef wayen uran yimussnawen n umezruy, gelmen-t-id d akken yella d argaz d wawal, i ireznen mliḥ deg lecɣal-is. Yerna yesɛa yiwet n tmuɣli wessiɛen, yettwali ladɣa ɣer sdat. Yeẓra amek ara ddunt tedyanin ɣer sdat. Amedya deg udlis i yura deg useggas n 1937 iwumi isemma  » l’Algérie au Carrefour », iwumi i d-ɛaweden diɣ warraw-is deg useggas n 2012, yehder-d ɣef waṭas n temsalt i d-yeḍran mbaɛd, ama ɣef yizerfan n warrac, izerfan n tmeṭṭut d usemguri n tmurt n Lezzayer. Dayen dɣa iɣef i d-yuɣal mmi-s deg wawal i d-yenna deg tejmilt-agi i as-yuɣalen.
Isem-is yura deg yisebtar n umezruy s waman n wurraɣ, d awezɣiɣ ad yettwamḥu seg yixemmimen n ugdud amaziɣ, yeḥsan s tɣeṛsawt n Imache Amar, asaḍ n udrar n Ǧerǧer. Yebda umahil n umeɣnas s tlallit n ukabar n Yitri n Tefriqt n Ugafa (ENA) deg useggas n 1926, deg tmurt n Fransa, syin, ḥebsen akabar-agi deg useggas n 1929, maca amennuɣ-is asartan ur yeḥbis ara. Dɣa, yuɣal-d ukabar-agi s yisem-nniḍen deg useggas 1933 i yewwin isem n ukabar n Tmanagt n Yitri n Tefriqt Ugafa ( Glorieuse Étoile Nord Africaine, GENA). Deg waggur n unbir, seg useggas n 1934, i tikkelt-nniḍen yettwaḥbes ukabar n Tmanagt n Yitri n Tefriqt Ugafa, yerna wwin tuget n yimḍebbren n ukabar-agi ɣer lḥebs , anda ḥekmen fell-asen s sḍis (06) n wagguren n lḥebs d 2 000 n Francs n lxeṭya i yal yiwen seg yimḍebbren n ukabar-agi. Deg waggur n maggu 1935, yeffeɣ-d seg lḥebs, Imache Amar, yuɣal srid ɣef uqerru n Ukabar i iqeddcen s tuffra kan. Deg udlis n Imache Chabane, yeɣal-d s wawal ɣef yiɣeblan yezgan gar baba-s d Messali Lhadj, ur yebɣin ara ayen yexddem, ladɣa ad d-yili ɣef uqerru n Ukabar, ayen iwumi semman mbaɛd « le zaɛimizm ».
Mba3d mi yuḍen deg tmurt n Fransa, yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt n Lezzayer deg useggas n 1947. Dɣa uqbel ad d-iruḥ seg Fransa yura yiwet n tebrat i warraw n tmurt-is. Deg tebrat-a, llan sin yinzan, izen amezwaru , yeɛna ixeddamen iqbayliyen iminigen iwumi yessuter ad sɛun tagmat, ad myeḥmalen , ad mɛawanen gar-asen, ad kksen yakk iɣeblan yellan gar-asen, wa ad sɛun kan yiwen n yiswi : d tilelli n tmurt-nsen. Deg yizen wis sin, d tukksa n tikti n tukci n leqder ugar n wayen yuklal Messal Lḥadj, i ireṣsan iman-is d imeḍebber ameqqran n uUkabar mebla lebɣi n tuget n yiɛeggalen, aya, ɣef leḥsab wayen yura Imache Chabane. Deg useggas n 1948, yekcem ɣer Ukabar n UDMA n Ferḥat Abbas, armi d aseggas n 1952. Ɣef leḥsab n ccfawat n Hadj Hocine Ouyed n taddart n At Abdelmumen, d amjahed aqbur, yiwet n tmagla n yimḍebbren n tegrawla , anda yella Krim Belkacem, Mohammedi said, si Moh Touil et Dris Ahmed iwumi qqaren Ahmed At Ramdane, ussan-d kra n wussan Kan seld tagrawla n umenzu n unbir 1954, ad sɛelmen Imache Amar ɣer wamek i iteddu umenuɣ. Mbaɛd mi yesla i wayen i as-nnan, yerra-asen: » Dɣa ma yella tagrawla ad tetddu, mebruk fell-awn timunent ». s wakken yuḍen aṭas, iḥus d akken ur yettidir ara akken ad iḥus s timunent.Ali Zalouk
Seg yisental iɣef ttmeslayen medden ussan-a, d liḥala n tegnawt i iqessḥen nezzeh, armi tugi ad tebru i yimeṭṭawen-is. D tidet ur teqqim tegnawt teεdel akken i tella zik, imi deg tallit-a, tamurt ur teksib ara 4 n tsemhuyin( saisons ). Lameεna, ayen ideg nella aseggas-a, yugar wid yezrin. Meḥsub deg yiseggasen iεeddan, deg wayyur n fuṛaṛ, tekkat-d lehwa. Rnu i waya tifesniwin n lḥamu deg-s, εedlent. Ma yella d aseggas-a, tifesniwin tiεlayanin, lehqent armi d 26 deg twilayin n ugafa n tmurt, ad as-yini yiwen deg unebdu i nella. Ahat ula d ayen i iḍeṛṛun deg tallunt ( espace ), am uxemmuj aberkan, d tamentilt n ubeddel n unezwi( climat ). Γas ma yella mgaradent tmentilin ɣef leḥsab n tmuɣliwin n medden, dɣa wa yeqqar texṣeṛ liḥala n lqaεa. Wayeḍ yeqqaṛ d Bab n Yigenwan i yerfan ɣef medden. Wiyaḍ seg tama-nsen, nnan-d belli tamentilt n waya, d tiẓegwa n yemɣan i yerɣan uɣalent d iɣed, akked tuẓẓut n ttjuṛ ideg stehzan yimdanen.
Meεna, yella yiwen n uḥulfu i ten-yezdin, imi akken ma llan kukran imal i yettraǧun ma tkemmel akka. Aredmani, uzzlen yimezdaɣ deg tuddar ɣer tẓallit, ahat ad isel Yellu i wayen ssuturen, ad tebru tegnawt i waman-is, amedya d taɣiwant n Yiɣil Ɛli. Ma yella deg taddart n At Saci, nnejmaεen At taddart, ffɣen-d s ṛṛay, belli ad uɣalen ɣer leεwayed n lejdud-nneɣ. Ad d-ḥyun ansay n unẓaṛ. D arrac n taddart imecṭaḥ, ara yessutren i Yellu anẓaṛ. Acku nutni mazal sɛan nniya, mazal ulawen-nsen zeddig. Ahat ad d-imuqqel Ṛebbi i wudmawen-nsen, ad yebru i ugeffur. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, ula d arrac imecṭaḥ umren ayendin, dɣa d wagi tura i d ameslay-nsen. Ayagi imi, d tagnit i ucmumeḥ seg tama, seg tama-nniḍen, ad issinen yiwen seg wansayen n yimezwura-nneɣ.K. K.
Aouizet Kader, d yiwen gar yicennayen iqdimen, i yeffren iman-nsen acḥal d aseggas, syin yuɣal-d ɣer ccna n teqbaylit, mbeɛd 27 n yiseggasen. Deg yiseggasen n 80, i yebda amecwar-is di ccna, imir yella d ilemẓi, yessaramen ad yili d acennay. Yella yumen belli yal amdan mi ara d-ilal ad yebɣu ad d-yeffeɣ d kra: d acennay, d amejjay, d aselmad… Ula d netta akken i tt-yessarem i teffeɣ, yedder lweqt armi i d-yufa iman-is d acennay. D tizlatin n Ḥamiduc, i t-id-ijebden ɣer ccna, dɣa yuɣal yettɣenni tizlatin-is.
Ulamma yebda ccna deg yiseggasen n 1980, maca i yiman-is kan, yeqqim 27 n ssna n tsusmi. Deg useggas n 1991, yeskles tasfift-is tamenzut deg yiɛezzugen, maca ur tt-id-yessuffeɣ ara imi di tallit-nni yekukra, yerna yesɛa uguren. Syin akkin, ikemmel kan deg ccna n tmeɣriwin sya u sya. Armi d aseggas n 2018, i d-yuɣal s wudem unṣib ɣer ccna s tesfift iwumi isemma iḍelli, i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin New Music n Yiɛeẓẓugen.
D tasfift ideg llant 10 n tezlatin s teqbaylit, gar-asent: Tabrat, Staɣfir Llah, Timeqbart, Iḍelli, Ccwal…atg. Yal tizlit ɣef wacu i d-tettawi awal deg-s, amedya ɣef tayri deg tezlit-nni “Tin iɣef ɛawzeɣ uḍan”, ɣef temẓi d wamek yella umeskar d wamek yuɣal di tezlit-nni “Iḍelli”. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nini belli Aouizet, yettheggi tasfift tis snat ara d-yeffɣen deg wussan i d-iteddun. Ad yawi isem n “Sweɛdeɣ”, ideg ara yilint ddeqs n tezlatin gar-asent-: Sweɛdeɣ, Aɣrib, Aḥbib… Ad d-nesmeki kan belli, Kader Aouizet yexdem yakkan deg umaṭṭaf wis sin maca cwiṭ n lweqt kan syin yeḥbes.A. A.
Amek i d-nenna ussan yezrin, llan yiɣerbazen di Xeṛṛaṭa ur uklalen ara isem n uɣerbaz, acku ur ksiben ara ula d ttawilat imecṭah i ilaqen ad d-ttuhiggin i yinelmaden iṭuṭiḥen, ladɣa taɣellist (Sécurité), tezdeg, d umḍiq i iwulmen i tɣuri. Imawlan n yigerdan-a, fernen ad gren dderya-nsen deg yir addad, axir ma qqimen deg yixammen-nsen, ad semḥen di tmussni. Ɣef waya i ṣebren i wayen yellan. Meεna deg yimuṛas-a, furṣen tagnit i wakken ad qeɛεden ayen i d-yewwi ad yettwaqeεεed, daymi dduklen ddeqs deg-sen deg kra n yiɣerbazen di Xeṛṛata, i wakken ad d-ssizedgen kra deg-sen. Amedya d ayen i gan deg uɣerbaz amenzu n taddart n Ṭtabya deg tɣiwant n Xeṛṛata. Dɣa, dehnen leḥyuḍ-is, berrzen tineɣriyin, yerna ssizedgen-tent i wakken ad tteklen d akken arraw-nsen deg laman ara ilin di tuɣalin-a. Seg tama-nniḍen, deg tɣiwant n Draε n Lqayed, texdem tddukkla n yibabaten n warrac akked kra n yimezdaɣ n taddart n Ṣṣnaḍla leqdic igerrzen. Qeεɛden aɣerbaz alemmas n Xennic Sliman i wakken ad t-id-afen yinelmaden d yiselmaden ihegga. Iqeddicen-a, εejben nezzeh imezdaɣ n tuddar-a, acku iswi-nsen d yiwen; ad ḍemnen tudert yelhan i unelmad, i wakken ad ssiwḍen ɣer yigemmaḍ igerrzen. Ad nekfu s wawal n yiwen n uselmad i yellan d ababat daɣen: «Nessaram leqdicat am wigi ad ttilin mkul taggara n ddurt. Imi ayen yelhan yelha, am wakken i ssarameɣ ula d iɣerbazen-nniḍen ad ḍefṛen tikti-agi».
Ur wwiḍen ara sḍis n wagguren segmi i d-yella usewseɛ n tama n wadda n umraḥ n yimrigen neɣ “Place d’arme” akken i yettwassen, d asenfar i yeččan azal n 6 n yimelyaren. Almi taggara-a uɣalen yimdanen ttcetkayen seg waṭas n lixsas i d-yellan deg umkan. Yeldi ass n umenzu n unbir 2018 yezrin, newwi-d fell-as dɣa awal deg Uɣmis n yimaziɣen, d lwali n Wehran i t-yeldin, u deg umeslay-is lawan-nni, yesseḥres akken ad yettwaḥader wadeg-a, ad yettwasizdeg akken ilaq u ad yili deg-s laman.
Annect-a merra d taɣiwant n Wehran i d-yewwi ad tt-testeklef yis-s, ma neẓra d akken d amkan i d-yezgan di tlemmast n temdint rnu yecbeḥ, d ayen ara d-ijebden ladɣa tiwaculin ad qqiment di laman. Maca, segmi yebda waggur n Remḍan, imdanen tteffɣen deg yiḍ ad kksen ɣef lxaṭer-nsen u ad ttun aẓummu d laẓ n wass kamel. Tiwaculin i ifernen amkan-a i usteɛfu, zgant d acetki seg lixsas n tafat imi tuget n llambat i as-d-yezzin, xsint yakk, rnu ɣur-s lixsas n laman imi ur nettaf ula d yiwen seg yiɣallen n laman dinna seg lxemsa n tmeddit d asawen, ladɣa tura aql-aɣ deg waggur n Remḍan, ma d imdanen yal wa anda iḥemmel ad yawi abrid-is deg yiḍ.
Ula d tifewwaṛin-nni n waman yellan di tlemmast i d-yettaken initen icebḥen, seg waggur-nni amenzu ur d-ssuffuɣent ara aman. Dɣa asteqsi i d-yettuɣalen dima, ayɣer yal mi ara d-tili tullya n kra n uṣenfar i lfayda n yimdanen ur d-yettili ara uḍfar-ines akken ad yeqqim kan akken yella d amaynut ? D anwa i d ssebba neɣ d anwa ur nxeddem ara ixeddim-is, d wacu i ilaqen akken ad yekfu lḥif n uḍegger n udrim deg ulac ? Iban yakk d akken yal yiwen s uḥric-is n tuzzma am umasay am umdan s timmad-is.
Khaled Achoui
Ha-tt-an dima tmurt n Lezzayer gar tmura i yeṭṭfen imeḍqan imenza deg wayen yeɛnan ibaxixen n ubrid. Ɣef leḥsab n wulɣu n Ulemmas aɣelnaw n uḥezzeb d laman deg yibardan (CNPSR), i d d-yefkan igemmaḍ s waccu i d-glan ibaxixen n ubrid deg useggas n 2018, ad naf azal n 3 091 n lmuta, d 30 561 n yimejraḥ deg 21 568 n yibaxixen n ubrid i yettwajerden. Ɣef wakken i d-yenna unemhal n Ulemmas aɣelnaw n uḥezzeb d laman n yibardan, Mass Ahmed n Ait El Hocine, i d ihedren deg umaṭṭaf n Radyu taɣelnaw, yettkemil usubbu deg umḍan n lmuta seg yibaxixen n ubrid ma neserwes d umḍan n useggas n 2016 anda llan 4 500 n lmuta. Ma deg useggas 2017, ad naf 3 600 n lmuta. Yella-d, ihi, usubbu s wazal n 8,36 % deg umḍan n lmuta. Dɣa ɣef leḥsab n yimḍebber amezwaru n Ulemmas (CNPSR), ugar n 90% n yibaxixen n ubrid, ssebba-nsen d imdanen, ladɣa ayen i icudden ɣer uqadar n yilugan n tenhart iwatan. Ugar 25% nniḍen, yerza zyada deg uɣiwel n yimsebriden. Deg wawal-is, yenna d akken ugar n 45% n yibaxixen, xeddmen-ten yilmẓeyen yesɛan sddaw n 29 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-nsen, anda ara naf 23,49 %, sɛan kan turagt n tenhart ur nɛeda ara sin (2) n yiseggasen. Ma d ayen yeɛnan ttawilat n usiweḍ meqqren d ikumya, d nutni i d-igellun s waṭas n lmuta deg yibaxixen n ubrid. Ɣef waya, dɣa, i teddem tenmehla n Ulemmas aɣelnaw n uḥezzeb d laman n yibardan, aṭas n leblanat akken ad tessiweḍ deg usenqes n twaɣiyin n yiberdan.
 Ali Zalouk
Tuɣal tura am wakken d lɛadda. Yal mi ara d-yaweḍ waggur n Remḍan, ad alint ssumat n yisufar n wučči. D tagnit anda ttfarasen kra n yimetjaren akken ad senzen s leswami ɣlayen. Deq leswaq, nufa mgaradent leswami n yisufar, yal yiwen s lebɣi-s: Wa yesnerna deg ssuma, wayeḍ yeǧǧa-tt akken tella. Xas ulamma tenna-d tneɣlaft n tjara d akken ssumat n lxuḍra, lfakya akked uksum ad subbent, maca deg unnar, nettwali d ayen-nniḍen i iḍerrun.
D ayen ara yeǧǧen ameɣbun, ur yettizmir ara ad d-yaɣ ula d isufar i yettuḥesben d igejdanen n tgella. Seg tama-s, tiddukkla yettḥaraben ɣef umsider (APOC), ur tessusem ara imi d-tenna deg yiwen wulɣu “ma yella win iwalan ametjar ur iquder ara ssumat i d-tefka tneɣlaft, ad aɣ-d-yessiwel akken ad d-yeccetki”. Ɣef waya, dɣa, nesteqsa kra n yimsewqen, a-t-an wayen i d-nnan : “Ulint ssumat mačči d izli, ladɣa ussan-agi imezwura. Dɣa, ttmer, ur tezmireḍ ara ad t-tennaleḍ”. Ma H. G, tkemmel yenna-d: “Mi i d-yewweḍ waggur n Remḍan, aṭas n yimdanen i itteffeɣ leɛqel, ttaɣen kulec amzun akken ad tekfu lxuḍra-agi. Ma yella wid teɛna temsalt di lwilaya, ilaq fell-asen ad d-ffɣen akken ad ɛassen wigi ixeddmen leswami akken i d asen-yehwa acku di yal tamnadt amek ara tent-tafeḍ, ur ɛdilent ara”. Ma d wayeḍ iwala d akken : “Ula d imdanen, ilaq ula d nutni ur ttaɣen ara mi ara walin kra iɛedda tilas, syin akin taɣawsa-nni, ad tṣub di ssuma, imi akka i bɣa. Ula d wid yettɛassan, ulac-iten deg unnar. Teḥsiḍ kan d anect-agi ara yilin !”
 Souhila Yamani
Lgaz d yiwen n usafar yettselliken amdan seg tsuqas n tasmuḍi n wussan d wuḍan n ccetwa. Yettuneḥsab d allal i ssexdament twaculin deg yixxamen i umager n usemmiḍ d ugris i swayes i d-tgellu tegrest yal mi ara d-zzin wussan-is.
Ttafen-t yimdanen d amwanes, ladɣa deg wuḍan n ccetwa isemmaḍen, yesseḥmaw axxam ɣef tikkelt. Deg yiseggasen-a ineggura, aṭas n tamiwin n tmurt i mazal ur yekcim usafar-a, ssawaḍen kra n yimezdaɣ armi gezzmen iberdan, zun d tawsit n usuter i tuqqna n tnezduɣin-nsen s lgaz, i ubaɣur akk yesɛa. Maca, seg tama-nniḍen, ɣur-s lmaḍerrat, ur nenekker ara belli d allal amihan, i izemren ad yessiweḍ amdan alamma d tamettant, ma ur yeḍfir ara tarrayin n usemres-ines, neɣ ur iḥuder ara. Yal aseggas, mi ara tebdu tegrest, deg wussan-is imenza, ttɣawalen yimdanen ɣer ucɛal n lgaz deg yixxamen, ula d aneggaru-a seg tama-s, yettɣawal ɣer uḥwaṣ n terwiḥin i yestehzayen deg useqdec-is tikwal. Yessegray-d s twuɣa. Ɣef waya, tettheggi-d Tenmehla n Sonelgaz n Lezzayer tamanaɣt (tama n Gué de Constantine), tuffɣiwin n yiqeddacen-is ɣer yiɣerbazen, akken ad ssegzi u ad fken iwellihen ɣef wamek ilaq ad ḥadren iman-nsen yinelmaden seg tamiwin-nsen, ad ssiwḍen isallen-a i twaculin-nsen.
Nesteqsa tamasayt n teywalt deg tkebbanit-a n Sonelgaz, s ttawil n tilifun, tenna-aɣ-d “Nettheggi-d ussan-agi n useɛlem kraḍ n yiseggasen-aya, yal tallit n tegrest, imi deg-s i ṭṭuqutent twuɣa-a icudden ɣer lgaz, akken inelmaden ad ḥussen s umihi i d-yettekken seg-s, ad ssiwḍen isallen srid i yimawlan-nsen, akken ineggura-a, ad heggin tarrayin iwulmen, ara d-nadin ama deg internet, ama deg usira n uḥader ɣef umihi n lgaz deg tkebbanit-nneɣ”. Ma d Mass Tidadini Ali, d ajenyur deg tkebbanit, d yiwen gar yiɛeggalen i irezzun ɣer yiɣerbazen i useɛlem n twacult tasnedwalt, ikemmel yenna-d, ɣef wansa i d-ittek umihi, d wacu n yiwellihen i ttmuddun deg tuffɣiwin-nsen “Ur d-yettili ara ufras n yiteyyuten n lgaz. Rnu, sseqdacen iteyyuten ur nelhi ara, ssishilen tuffɣa n usafar n lgaz seg-s, dɣa imir i d-tḍerru twaɣit. Ilaq ɣef yimdanen ad ttaǧǧan xerṣum cwiṭ n tullya ama n ṭṭaq, ama n wayen-nniḍen, i unekcum n ubeḥri, u ad d-yettili ufras n yiteyyuten-nsen uqbel ad tebdu tsemhuyt n tegrest deg yal aseggas (ayyur n cutember neɣ tuber)”.
Tuɣal-d tddukkla tadelsant “Itri Uzekka” n taddart n Yixelwiyen di tɣiwant n At Ɛissa Mimun, ɣer leqdic adelsan mbeɛd mi gersen leqdicat-is i kra n wagguren. Ussan-agi ineggura, gren-d tikti d tamaynut, yeffɣen i wahil-nsen adelsan n useggas, gar tejmilin, timsizzliyin, tifugliwin…atg. Ulamma, aẓar n tikti yuɣ amkan gar yiswiyen n tddukkla-a, maca armi d tikkelt-agi i ssawḍen ad tt-ṛessin deg unnar. Dɣa, i lmend n ukraḍyur wis ukkuẓ n useggas-agi n 2019, thegga-d tddukkla-a ahil meqqren n usileɣ n yiɛeggalen n umussu aduklan.
Yetturaǧu ad d-ilint temliliyin-agi n usileɣ deg rebɛa n taɣulin yemxalafen, gar tuber, unbir akked duǧember. Asileɣ amenzu, ara d-yilin ɣef usbeddi n usenfar aduklan, ad d-yili ussan n 04 d 05 deg waggur-a n tuber i d-teddun. D aduktur Cennan Areẓqi, aselmad n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, ara d-yilin ɣef lmendad n usileɣ-agi n yiɛeggalen n waṭas n tddukkliwin tidelsanin. D netta diɣ, ara yilin d imsileɣ n usileɣ wis sin, ara d-yilin ɣef useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt. Asileɣ-agi n sin wussan 14 d 15 unbir 2019, ad yezzi wawal deg-s ɣef usentel-agi: “Asegmi n twennaḍt, i lmend n unegmu idumen”, ideg ara d-yefk Mass Cennan iwellihen d wamek i ilaq ad nseḥbiber ɣef ugama ideg nettidir.
 Mi yessuli usileɣ-agi, yetturaǧu ad tili tuffɣa s annar, ara d-yilin ɣer tkebbanit n usefreg n yiḍuman “Aluverplast”, i d-yezgan deg Tala Ɛetman. Ma d asileɣ wis kraḍ, ad d-yili ussan n 01 d 02 duǧamber 2019. Tikkelt-agi, ad yili usileɣ n umussu aduklan ɣef umnir n tikli deg udrar (randonnées). D Mass Lewnis Touati, d aɛeggal n tddukkla n twennaḍt Guraya, ara d-yilin ɣef lmendad n usileɣ-agi. Am wakken diɣ, i yetturaǧu ad d-tili tuffɣa s adrar deffir kan n usileɣ-agi, i wakken ad d-yili usnas deg unnar n wayen xedmen deg usileɣ-a n sin wussan. Asileɣ aneggaru, ad yili d asuffeɣ n tanant n tsellak timenza (secourisme), ara yeddun ɣef tegzi n waggur.
 Ad tebdu ass n 15 unbir, ad tessali ass n 15 duǧember 2019. D Mass Ali Xeddam, imsileɣ aɣelnaw n tsellak timenza u d aselway n Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri n tama-a n At Ɛisa Mimun. D netta, ara yilin d imsileɣ n tanant-agi n secourisme. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti belli d axxam n yilmeẓyen Dib Ali n At Ɛisa Mimun ideg ara d-ilint temliliyin-agi n usileɣ. D tiddukkliwin tidelsanin n tɣiwant-a ɣer tama n tiyaḍ, i yetturaǧun ad sfaydint seg usileɣ-agi. Am wakken diɣen i zemren ad jerden yimdanen-nniḍen iman-nsen i wakken ad ttekkin. I wugar n yisallen ad siwlen ɣer wuṭṭun-a: 0775 98 92 03.
Adaoun Abdelghani
Tennulfa-d iseggasen-a ineggura yiwet n tjara tamaynut i yuɣen aẓar deg waṭas n tudrin n Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen; ta d asenzi n yiɣiɣden i d-yettaǧǧa wayen yettwaserɣen. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i yeggugen s wazal n 65 n yikilumitren ɣer usamar n Bgayet, yuɣal warmud-a iḥuza akk imdanen d yakk tiḥricin n tmetti. D aẓawali neɣ d amerkanti, d agrud neɣ d ilemẓi, d tameṭṭut neɣ d argaz, merra-nsen, gren deg-s akken ad asen-d-uɣalen yidrimen send asenzi n tneɣda-nni i wid i d-irezzun beddemma ɣer tuddar akken ad tt-aɣen. Ɣas ahat yal amdur (leɛmer) issemras tjara-a, maca d tilawin akked yigerdan i yezgan deg-s ɣef teɣzi n umalas.
D tilawin, acku d nutenti i yessewwayen tal taɣawsa deg ukanun n uxxam, ma d igerdan, llan rezzun beddemma ɣer teẓgi akken ad d-ḥerqen isɣaren d kra n yimɣan, am tidekt. Ma yella zik tuɣ ur sɛin azal yiɣiɣden armi teddun deg yiḍumman, ass-a deg wussan caḍen wid iẓerren deg-sen agerruj meskud ayen i asen-ggaren d adrim i wayyur yettɛawan-iten ad sgerrzen addad-nsen n tudert n yal ass. Imi tikwal ,llan wid yesnuzuyen s wugar n 2 000 n yidinaren i wayyur. Ma d ssuma n yiɣiɣden-nni, tettbeddil ɣef leḥsab n tɣara-nsen. Amedya, iɣiɣden iɣef tseɣleb tebrek, xeddmen 20 armi d 40 n yidinaren i ukilu.
Ma yella d wid yesfan, ttnuzun 60 armi d 100 n yidinaren/akilu. Mi ara d-yerzu s tkerrust-is win i ten-yettaɣen, ad tafeḍ yal amezdaɣ acu i as-yessumur d ayen akken i d-yejmeɛ. « Yelha mi nufa ɣer wanda ara nerr iɣiɣden-nneɣ, rnu s uxelles. Ddurt iɛeddan i senzeɣ kra n wayen i d-ḥewwzeɣ deg yiculliḍen s wazal n 600 n yidinaren », i aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel.M. K.
Ass-nni n ssebt, 23 deg unbir deg-i nella, i d-yeffeɣ, dagi deg tmurt akked Fransa, walbum amaynut n ucennay ameqqran Zedek Mouloud iwumi isemma Neɣ ḍelmeɣ ! Mbeɛd mi tettuwexxer tuffɣa n walbum-agi i ilaqen ad d-yeffeɣ deg waggur n yulyu yezrin, ha-t-an yewweḍ-d lawan-is i waggur-a n unbir 2019. Deg-s ad naf 14 n tezlatin i d-yettmeslayen ɣef waṭas n yisental i yuɣ tannumi ucennay aqbayi Zedek Mouloud yettawi-d awal fell-asen, yecban tutlayt, tamurt, tirrugza, tayemmat, tagmat d wayen-nniḍen : meḥsub ayen yakk i icudden ɣer tmetti s umata.
Deg tezlatin n tikkelt-a, u xas ulamma Zedek yeqqim d Zedek akken i yuɣen yid-s tannumi wid i as-isellen, meɛna yella-d umaynut deg useqdec n wallalen atraren deg uẓawan-is. Yedda uẓawan s wallalen n tallit-a, ur yeqqim ara kan deg ugambar-nni-ines. Aya, yefka udem atrar i ccna-s. I wakken yessaweḍ ɣer uswir-a deg useqqɛed n tezlatin seg tama n uẓawan, yessawel i wid teɛna temsal am Allaoua Bahlouli, Mokrane Adlani, Malik Kerrouche…atg.
Am wakken i d-yextar, diɣ, imẓawanen imeqqranen i yekkan deg leqdic-agi azeddgan. Seg tama n uɣanib, ad t-naf yedda deg ubrid n wayen akken i icennu yakan, xas ulamma yesnerna-as acemma deg tiwḍin-is ɣer tmeẓẓuɣt. Ahat, ad ilin wid ara as-yinin ibeddel ciṭ deg uẓawan, maca, mi ara tesleḍ i tɣessa n tezlit, ad tt-tafeḍ tennerna s tidet, acu kan ur tbeddel ara seg uẓar-is. Deg walbum-agi, nezmer ad d-nini belli yejmeɛ-d akk aɣanib n umecwa-is ɣer yiwen umekkan. “Yejmeɛ-itt-id am lḥenni”, akken qqaren. Seg tama n usefru, mazal-it yeqqaz irennu deg usekfel n wawalen iqdimen akked useqdec s tḥerci n wawalen atraren. Yeẓra amek u anda i d-yettaf awalen iqburen. Yessen amek ara ten-id-yessekfel mi ara yaf asentel i yeffɣen fell-as.
Tikkelt-a, yerza ɣer Ubrid aqdim i wakken ad t-id-yeglem u ad as-d-yesmekti ayendin n yiḥulfan n temẓi. Din i as-yeḥka tameḍrurt-is, s usḥissef, i ubrid-nni aqdim ladɣa imi i d-yemmekti tuɛciqt-is. Am wakken, diɣ, i d-yegmer kra n wawalen iqburen s usuzen deg tezlit “I mimmi”, ladɣa deg wayen yeɛnan tineqqisin-nni n zik i d-ssawalent temɣarin. Seg wayen yerzan awalen atraren, ad ten-naf keccmen-d sya ɣer da, anda kan wulmen, ladɣa deg tezlatin timḥaddiyin s umata. Seg tama n tnaṣlit akked yizamulen n trrugza ɣer yimaziɣen s umata, yefka-d agzul fell-asen deg tezlit iwumi isemma “D Yennayer”.
Ula d iẓawanen n tezlit-a, mgaraden: ttaken acbih n tamiwin-nsen. Ma seg tama n tezlit tamḥaddit “A yemma yemma’’, ad naf asteqsi-a, i d-yettuɣal kan ɣef teɣzi n usefru “Acu yuɣen tamurt-iw? Acku, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna “Tesserxas deg warraw-is”. Am wakken, daɣen, “Ssnen abrid, xḍan-as”. I wigi yakk, yerra-asen-d s tezlit “Awer timlilit”, anda i d-yenna: “Zik, nettemlili-d ɣer ṣṣaḥ, d tinna i aɣ-yesddukkulen. Nettawi-tt-id am leslaḥ, nessergagay iɛdawen. Tura, nettemlili-d ɣer ccḍeḥ, ha-tt-an din a Muḥ Uḥsen. Win ur tɣaḍ Teqbaylit, awer timlilit”. Ha-tent-in tezlatin n walbum-agi: A yemma yemma, Awer timlilit, Awi-d ukan, Am yimeslab, Winna, Dda Lḥafiḍ, Ifuk uṣerbek, Abrid aqdim, I mimmi, Ɛzizu, Aḍu-nni, Tabaḥant-iw, Ad iniɣ, D Yennayer.
Hocine Moula
Aṭas n tudrin n leqbayel i d-yeggaren Anẓar, yal tikkel mi ara tili lqaɛa yeṭṭef-itt uɣurar, ssuturen deg-s i wakken ad asen-d-yefk ageffur ad swent tfarkiwin-nsen. Yella unsay-agi si zzman n zik ɣar tmetti taqbaylit. Yettili-d s ucebbeḥen n uɣenja am teslit, ad t-fken i warrac imecṭaḥ, ad d-zzin i tzenqatin n taddart s ccna-agi : « Anẓar, Anẓar a Rebbi seww-itt ar aẓar, ad teww nneεma n udrar, ad ternu tin n uzaɣar ». Dayen i ssutren ula d imezdaɣ n taddart n At Sɛid (Maɛyac), i d-yezgan di tɣiwant n Mizrana, dayra n Tegzirt.
Maca, nutni xtaren aya s tmamekt -nniḍen, tagi d yiwet n lweɛda i d-ǧǧan lejdud-nsen ugar n 700 n yiseggasen-aya ɣer deffir iwumi ssawalen « Nwal » i d-yettilin deg yiwen umekkan i d-yegan di tiɣilt, iwaɛan ɣer lebḥar iwumi qqaren Tawwurt n Mḥend Uḥend. Amekan-agi, yesɛa azal d ameqqṛan ɣar yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi, acku yekcem deg umezruy n tmurt n Lezzayer. Llan-d, eg-s, waṭas n yimennuɣen di tallit-nni n Ṛuman , n Ṭurk, n Fṛansa…atg.
Gar-asen win i d-yellan akked Yiṭurkiyen,deg useggas n 1 825 anda mmuten azal n 300 n yimjuhad. Taṣebḥit n wass-nni n sem, 21 furar 2020, heggant tlawin n taddart aɣṛum aquṛan, taḥbult , lexfaf akkedtgella-nniên, syin ṭṭfent abrid ɣer umekkan, ceɛlent-as ticemaɛin, ɣṛant-d lfatiḥa. Azekka-nni, swejdent-d tibaqiyin n seksu, sseččent yal win i d-yerzan. Ula d wid ur d-nruḥ, yewweḍ-asen ɣer yixxamen. Dɛant ɣar sidi Rebbi, ad tili lweɛda-agi d tin yettḥaraben, ad yekkes takawt wa d-yefk lehwa, ad sswent tebḥirin. Yacine Meghzifene
I lmend n wass agraɣlan n tutlayt tayemmat, i d-yettuɣalen di 21 furar n yal aseggas, ddeqs i yellan di ttiɛad i sfuggel-is.
Ama d tiddukkliwin, d tiɣiwanin, neɣ d tuddsiwin yemgaraden, yal yiwet thegga-d ahil beddemma akken ad as-fkent azal i yuklal wass-a ara sfugglen yakk yiɣerfan deg umaḍal. Deg wayen i yeṭṭafaren armuden n usfuggel n wass-a, ihegga-d dɣa Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa ahil n kraḍ n wussan, 20, 21 d 22 furar, deg ugezdu n Tɣerdayt. Deg-s ad ilin ddeqs n warmuden. Deg Uqbu, theyya-d tddukkla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu ahil d amerkanti ɣef teɣzi n kraḍ n wussan. Ad d-nebder seg-s asiwel n tmucuha, isaragen, amezgun akked tmenna n yisefra. Deg temkarḍit tagejdant n Tɣuri n temdin n Tizi Uzzu, thegga-d Tenmehla n yidles ahil d ameqqran, ideg i d-llan kra n yisaragen d tnezzuyin s ubuddu n yimura. Deg-s d asfuggel n wass n tutlayt tayemmat, deg-s d asfuggel n umulli wis 4 n usenṣeb n tamaziɣt. Yettwawi-n wawal ɣef wacu i d-yewwi usenṣeb n tmaziɣt, tutlayt tayemmat, d wacu i d azal n usuqel seg tutlayin tiberraniyin ɣer tutlayt n Teqbayli/Tamaziɣt s umata. Yella-d waya akked Massen Ḥamid Bilek, Ḥasan Ḥelwan d Yusef Merraḥi. Seg wayen i d-yellan di Fransa, ad d-nebder armud i d-thegga tddukkla SFK, mi tenced amaru Fahim Mesɛuden ad d-yeg asarag. Tusa-d ta d tagnit akken ad d-yemmeslay ula ɣef udlis-is amaynut  »Iziran n temẓi », i d-yessuffeɣ ussan-a yezrin kan ɣer teẓrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin. Ad yemmag usarag-d ass n sed 07 di meɣres 2020. Di Muntryal, tamurt n Kanada, llan deg usihar kra n Yiqbayliyen n dinna, ladɣa wid i d-yezzin i uɣerbaz n teqbaylit-tamaziɣt INAS, i iqeddcen ayendin i usider n tutlayt d uselmed-is i tarwa i d-yettnekkaren dinna. Din dɣa, yettwasuddes-d usarag ɣef userwes gar kra n tutlayin sɣur Mass Lhacmi Twahri. Taɣal-as tejmilt
I lmend n usmekti n wass agraɣlan n tutlayt n tyemmat, i d-yettilin yal ass 21 deg waggur n furar, tesfugel lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ttiεad-agi akken ilaq lḥal tikkelt-agi. Aṭas n yidisan i d-iheggan ass adelsan i lmend n usmekti-agi. Gar wid I t-id-yessuddsen ad d-nebder Tanmehla n Yidles, Axxam n Yidles n Tizi Uzzu, tasdawit n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n usegmi aɣelnaw, Taṣweḍt n tmaziɣt… atg. Heggan-d yiwen leqdic d anesbaɣur, i d-yellan ass-nni n lexmis, 20 deg furar 2020, deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu. Aseggas-agi, gan-as tajmilt i tmedyazt Bourai Djedjiga, i d-yefkan aṭas i tsekla d yidles amaziɣ; icewwiqen, isefra, tibuɣarin…atg. Gar wayen i d-yufraren deg wahil yettwaxedmen aseggas-agi sɣur yimsuddsen-agi , yella-d d anesbaɣur, imi llan-d waṭas n leqdicat idelsanen ɣef teɣzi n wass-nni. Ad d-nebder timsikent i d-heggan waṭas n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen n liwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i ittekkan deg tmeɣra-a. Tella tin n lmakla, tin n yidlisen, tin n wallalen iqburen…atg. Am waken I d-yella usenɛed n usaru “Tallit taqdimt”, syin akkin d tajmilt s timmad-is, anda i tfures tanagit tnemhalt n yidles ad d-awi abruy seg umecwar n tẓuri n Massa Bourai d wayen i d-tefka i teqbaylit. Si 10h30 armi d 12h00, d askan n yimuhal d yiremmad n kra n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen n Tizi Uzzu, gar-asen Mulud Ferɛun n Tizi Uzzu, win n Tassadurt, aɣerbaz alemmas Rakem n Tala Amara d uɣerbaz n sin yimeɣrasen Tellal Mohamed n Uqawej. Gar wayen i d-sneɛten, ad d-nebder tamezgun, ccnawi, ccḍaḥ d zwağ aqbur n Leqbayel, icewwiqen , tibuɣarin, tamedyazt, timseɛraq…atg. Ɣer taggara maḍi, yella-d usebɣes s yigerdasen i kra n win ittekkan deg leqdic-agi adelsan. M. K. / Gh. A.
Deg tudert n yal ass, ur yeẓṛi yiwen d acu i izemren ad d-yeḍṛu seg teswiεt ɣeṛ tayeḍ. Daymi i yelha uḥader, akken qqaṛen yimezwura “Aḥader yeɣleb aqader”. Γas ma yella amdan yettkukru tuqqsa mi ara yerzu ɣer tezgi, ama d tin n uzrem, neɣ d tin n tɣirdemt, lameεna amahi n tuqqsa-a yella ula deg yixxamen. D ayen i yeḍṛan d yilemẓi K.Wahib seg taddart n At Tεisiwt, taɣiwant n At Smaεel, i yesεan 17 n yiseggasen. Dɣa, am yal ass, seld tuččit n yimensi, yeffeɣ uqcic-a i wakken ad iwanes imeddukkal-is, imi ttnejmaεen yal tameddit ttqeṣṣiren. Lameεna tikkelt-a, ur yerzi ara ɣur-sen, acku yeffeɣ-d kan amnaṛ n tewwurt n uxxam, iḥus i kra i t-ikerrcen seg tefdent-is. Imir-n yecεel Wahib tafat n usawal-is yufa-tt d tiɣerdemt i t-yeqqsen.
Γef leḥsab n teɣbalut-nneɣ, ccil ur iḥus ara Wahib i leqriḥ ameqqṛan imir-n, meḥsub d ayen yezmer ad yeṣbeṛ yiwen, lameεna akken i ttεeddayent temrac i yettḥulfu s uḍaṛ-is ifeccel. D ayen i t-yeǧǧan iger teɣṛi i wat uxxam. Nutni seg tama-nsen refden-t ɣer sbiṭaṛ. Ad d-nesmekti d akken deg ubrid-is yemlelli, yerna yettara Imi yelḥeq ɣer dinna, iḥus i yiman-is yefcel akk. Rnu i waya, yuɣal ur yezmir i leqṛiḥ-nni, yebɣa kan ad yeqmec allen-is ad igen. Ula d aḍaṛ-is yuɣal ur yettḩussu ara yis-s. Kksen-as idammen s tazzla, xedmen-as asiṛum. Imi i d-ffɣen igemmaḍ n yidammen, ttwekkden belli d tuqqsa n tɣirdemt, fkan-as ddwa iwulmen. Yerna ǧǧan-t deg sbiṭaṛ iḍ-nni, armi d azekka-nni, imi iḥulfa i yiman-is yeḥla i t-id-ssufɣen.
Imawlan-is, d yimedukkal-is, umren ayen din imi yeslek. Di taggara ad nekfu s wawal n uletma-s dɣa tenna-aɣ-d: «Ulac d acu isehlen am lmut, ɣas ma yella s tacart, lameεna yelha win yettḥadaren iman-is».
 K. K.
“Leḥder yugar leqḍeɛ”. D inzi-a n at zik i d-yeggran ad t-sxedmen yimdanen, akken ad ḥadren iman-nsen mgal aṭṭan amihan covid-19, i d-yeččan amaḍal ussan-a. Imi urɛad i as-d-ufan yimussnawen d yimnadiyen n tujjya asafar n uḥbas-ines. Anfafad n Corona, yebda-d taggara n waggur n duǧember 2019, deg tmurt n Ccinwa, syin yeḥrured ɣer tmura-nniḍen, armi yelseq ass-a deg 113 n tmura, ɣef leḥsab i d-tmud tuddsa tamaḍlant n tdawsa. Dɣa iberreḥ-d unemhal amatu n Tuddsa ass-nni n amhad s uṣennef n waṭṭan-agi d aṭṭan amaḍlan amihan, ma nwala simmal yettnernay, qrib ad yaɣ akk amaḍal. Yewwi-d ɣef tmura ad ḥerzent s uḥader iwulmen, ma d imdanen ad ḍefren tarrayin ilaqen n usizdeg .
Ar tura, banent-d deg umaḍal azal n 124 101 n liḥalat, yenɣa 4 566 n yimdanen. D tamurt n Ccinwa ideg i d-yebda i yeṭṭef s waṭas, s 80 787 liḥalat, mmuten 3 151, jjin 61 475. Deg Lurup, ufan-d 22 307 liḥalat, mmuten gar-asen 930 d amdan. D tamurt n Ṭṭelyan i yenṭerren s waṭas mbeɛd Ccinwa, s 12 462 liḥalat, mmuten gar-asen 827 yimuḍan. Syin d tamurt n Iran, s 9 000 imuḍan, mmuten 354 deg-sen. Teṭṭafar-itt-id Kurya n wadda, s 7 577 liḥalat d 60 n yimettanen. Tamurt n Lispan, s 2 128 liḥalat d 47 n yimettanen. Timura n Albanie, Suède, Irlande, Belgique, Panama d Bulgarie, banent-d liḥalat timezwura n wid yemmuten taggara n ddurt-agi kan.
Ma d timura n Hundoras, Boulivie, Côte d’ivoire d Turquie, banent-d liḥalat n waṭṭan timezwura. Deg tmurt n Fransa, yuli umḍan n wid yemmuten ɣer 48, gar 2 281 n wid yeṭṭef unfafad n covid-19. Deg Lezzayer, ar wass n amhad, 26 n yimdanen i yekcem waṭṭan, 2 n yirgazen i yemmuten. Ɣef waya i d-yettili leḥder meqqren s umdal n yiɣerbazen d tesdawiyin, inurar n ddabex, d yidgan ideg d-ttemlilin s waṭas yimdanen. Deg Tizi Uzzu, ar yiḍelli, banen-d 3 n yimuḍan i t-ihelken. Ha-ten-in deg sbiter CHU Nedir Med n temdint-a. Kh. A.
Asenfar n useggem d tduli n wannaren, yeffeɣ-d i waṭas n tɣiwanin tallit-a taneggarut, gar-asent taɣiwant n Yiderginen i d-yezgan s tebɛed n wazal n 45 n yikilumitren ɣer Usamar n Bgayet. Dɣa, seld kra n uɛeṭṭel i icudden abeɛda ɣer lexsas n tedrimt, qrib yekfa usenfar s timmad, n tduli n unnar agejdan, imi temmug yakan tduli. ‘’Tura akka, nezmer ad d-nini amur ameqqran n lecɣal yemmug meskud qqimen-d kan sin. Yettusemma, tura mi nessa taduli i unnar, yeqqim-d kan usbedd n yijqa n tafat akked cwiṭ n ureqqeɛ daxel n unnar », i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant n Yiderginen. Yewwi-d ad d-nini xussen ayendin yimeḍqan d tzeɣwa ideg zemren ad d-sbeyyinen tizemmar-nsen yilemẓiyen n tɣiwant-a n Yiderginen, ama d ayen yerzan ɣer uḥric n waddal, isilaɣ, ɣer yidles d yiḥricen-nniḍen. Ɣef waya areqqeɛ n unnar-nsen aɣiwan i d-yezgan di tlemmast n Yiderginen, ad ten-yeǧǧ xersum ad ssemrasen addal n ddabex n uḍar s wugar n rraḥa d tɣellist. Tugart-tugart ma neẓra belli deg wayaqeddac, llan ur ttheyyin s waṭas tiberziwin (tournois) acku ur sɛin annar iwulmen, neɣ ma heyyan-d ad d-heyyin anda-nniḍen. « Aṭas-aya nettraǧu annar-nneɣ deg waddad igerrzen am wa. Tura yella wamek ara nesṭuqqut seg warmuden inaddalen. D ayen iseg ara d-sfaydin ama d arrac imecṭaḥ neɣ d ilemẓiyen », i d-yenna yiwen seg Yiderginen. Ad d-nesmekti d akken yeffeɣ-d usenfar-a i tɣiwant n Yiderginen s yidrimen n wayen iwumi qqaren FCCL. Yekker-d s wazal n 43 n yimelyan n dinar, neɣ ugar n 04 n yimelyaren n santim. Deg-s, gar cwiṭ n waṭas, taduli n unnar s ugazun, abnaw n ufrag d tseddarin, asbedd n unagraw n ujmaɛ n waman n ugeffur, asbedd n tafat d ubnaw n texxamin n usteɛfu d ucuccef.M. K.
Yeffeɣ yisalli ussan yezrin ɣef tukerḍiwin i d-yettilin deg ssuq n Xeṛṛata, imi aṭaṣ n medden i yettwakren: Wagi yetwaker-as usawal, wayeḍ d idrimen, ula d tullas dɣa, ur slikent ara.
Tamsalt-a, tesnerna-d aṭaṣ n tuggdi deg wulawen n yimezdaɣ, daymi i sxebṛen iɣallen n laman i wakken ad ḥeṛsen taεessast di ssuq-a, i d-yeḍḥan d amahi ɣef wid i d-irezzun ɣer dinna, ama seg tɣiwanin n tdayṛa n Xeṛṛata, ama seg tid-nniḍen am At Smaεel, akked Tṣexṛiwt. Ccil ulac wid ur nesli ara s tukerḍiwin-a. Imakaren ur ugaden ara, d anemgal, kemmlen di lecɣal-nsen.
Dɣa ddurt yezrin, yessawel yiwen n umɣar i yiqeddacen n yiɣallen n laman, acku yella win i as-yukren ugar n umelyun. Yerna amakar-a, yekkes-asen-t-id seg lǧib-is srid, ifaṛeṣ tagnit imi d amɣar ur yezmir ad yazzel deffir-s. Lameεna, tumert n ubandi-a ur tdum ara bezzaf, imi seld tanaga n umɣaṛ-a, i yeṣṣawḍen yefka tiweṣṣaf n umdan i t-yukren i yipulisen, ineggura-a uzzlen i uḥeffu fell-as. Di taggara ufan-t, imir-n i yebɣa ad d-yeffeɣ seg ssuq ad yerwel.
Ad d-nesmekti d akken, ula d imezdaɣ xedmen ayen ilaqen, s umecṭuḥ s umeqqṛan. Asaru-a, yekfa s tumert, imi amakar-a d win i yesεan abrid ixemjen, yerna mačči di Xeṛṛata i yezdeɣ, meεna di temdint n Bgayet. Lḥaṣul, iεedda di ccṛaε di teɣdemt n Xeṛṛata, anda i yeḥkem fell-as uselway-is s sin n yiseggasen d lḥebs, akkeḍ sin n yimelyan d idrimen.K. K.
Iberreḥ-d ass-nni n lḥed di Lezzayer tamaneɣt, uneɣlaf n Usegmi aɣelnaw, Abdelhakim Belabed belli atug n urbaḥ deg ukayad n n taggara n ulmud n uɣerbaz amenzu yewweḍ ɣer 83,31%, deg wakal n tmurt. Yerna yenna-d, agemmuḍ-agi, d ayen yettwaqbalen.
Deg yiwen n usarag n tɣamsa, i iga i lmend n beddu n yikayaden n Lbak, isegza-d uneɣlaf belli agemmuḍ-agi yewweḍ ɣer 94,90% deg 48 n lwilayat, mi ara d-nseddu atug n uɛeddi (atug n rrbeḥ deg yikayaden rnu-as talemmast n uktazal imezgi). Ad nesmekti kan belli 812.655 n yinelmaden i yeqqaren deg 18 000 n yiɣerbazen imenza yellan di tmurt. Ddeqs daɣen n yiɣerbazen i d-yewwin agemmuḍ n 100%.
Tizi Uzzu deg umḍiq amezwaru i tikkelt tis 11
Ass-nni n lḥed yezrin (16 yunyu), mi i d-banen yigemmaḍ n ukayad n taggara n uswir amenzu (5e) n useggas aɣurbiz 2018-2019, yeḍḥa-d belli d lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i d-yufraren i tikkelt tis 11, ta deffir ta.
Imi seg useggas n 2008, d nettat i yettaṭṭafen taqacut n umyezwar deg yigemmaḍ n tlata n yikayaden n taggara n useggas, gar-asen akayad-agi n 5e. Deg wayen yerzan igemmaḍ n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Ɛlaḥsab n unemhal n usegmi-ines, azal n 17 865 i ijerden iman-nsen deg umuɣen n usεeddi n ukayad-a, yerna sεeddan-t akk. Leḥsab n wid i t-id-yewwin yelḥaq 16 879, s lqidar n 91, 11%, ma yella s wid iɛeddan s asuffeɣ (passage) yewweḍ ɣer 96,64%.
Azal n 222 n yiɣerbazen imenza, ɣef 624 n yiɣerbazen, i d-iḥellan 100% deg ukayad-agi, s lqidar n 35,56%. Azal daɣen n 30 n yinelmaden i d-yewwin tazmilt n 10/10 deg ukayad-agi, ma 24 n yinelmaden i d-yewwin tazmilt n 9,9 d wugar n 851 n yimsizewren sɛan ugar n 9,5.
Ma deg umyezwar n lwilayt deg yigemmaḍ n ukayad-agi, i tikkelt tis 11 d lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yettifriren deg umḍiq amezwaru. Ad d-nesmekti kan, belli inelmaden-agi i yesɛan tazmilt n 5/10 neɣ ugar neɣ wid iɛeddan s usuffeɣ ad ruḥen deg wussan-agi ad jerden iman-nsen deg useggas amezwaru deg uɣerbaz alemmas. Ma deg wayen yerzan igemmaḍ n ukayad n BEM, yetturaǧu ad bannen ass, 01 yulyu 2019, ma d wid n BAC ad ilin ass n, 20 yulyu i d-iteddun.Adaoun Abdelghani
Am wass yecban iḍelli, 15 deg meɣres, i yettwanɣa Mouloud Feraoun deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt sɣur tuddsa OAS, netta akked xemsa-nniḍen n yixeddamen. I lmend n usmekti wis 58 n tmenɣiwt-is, ihi, thegga-d tddukkli, yewwin isem-is, yiwen wahil d anesbaɣur deg taddart n umaru, Tizi Hibel, taɣiwant n At Meḥmud deg lɛerc n At Dwala. Tasebḥit n yiḍeli n lḥedd, yella usrusu n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka n Lmulud At Caɛban akked tmenna n kra n tnagiyin ɣef umecwar d tmeddurt n umaru ameqran Lmulud At Caɛban. Am wakken i d-ɣran diɣ yinelmaden isenfaren-nsen i yuran s tlata n tutlayin (Tamaziɣt, taɛrabt d tefrensist) ɣef demma n usiher-agi.
Ma deg tzeqqa n tddukkla Mouloud Feraoun, tella-d temsikent n teklut, idlisen, iḍrisen d wayen yettwarun ɣef Lmulud At Caɛban akked Racid Ɛellic. Tella-d diɣ tmenna n tmedyazt sɣur kra n yinaẓuren. Ɣer taggara, tella-d lwaɛda. I usmekti, ad yelli usenfar n lebni n sin yisebdad, yiwen i Lmulud At Caɛban, wayeḍ i Faḍma At Mensur. Am wakken i d-tella temsizzelt n tira gar tlata n yiɣerbazen-agi ilemmasen : Mouloud Feraoun n Tizi Uzzu, Abdiche Mahdi n At Yiraten d Alliche Youcef n At Mahmoud. Ma d arrazen n wid ara d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-a, ad ttwafken ass n, 16 deg yebrir 2020, deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu. Ɣef leqdic-a, yenna-d Mokrane Nessah : ‘’Lmulud At Caɛban, d yiwen umdan i yettwalin ɣer sdat.
Ayen akk i d-yenna deg uɣmis-is, ha-t-an la d-iḍerru tura. Ma seg tama n leqdic-nneɣ, nebɣa ad yettwassen sɣur tsuta-agi timeẓyanin. Am wakken nebɣa ad as-nexdem yiwen n usebdad. Imi i d i yi-tettunefk tegnit, ad snemreɣ diɣ tanemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu imi tefka isem Mouloud Feraoun i temkerḍit n At Dwala, mebla ma ttuɣ Aseqqamu aɣerfan n Tizi Uzzu APW, i iqeblan ad d-yessewjed yiwet n temlilit tagraɣlant fell-as. Am wakken ara nexdem tazmart-nneɣ i wakken ad d-nessuffeɣ seg tatut Faḍma At Mensur, u ad as-nefk azal i tuklal’’.
Gar wayen yenna Lmulud At Caɛban ‘’Ay imdanen igujilen, aɛdawen n uzekka, ugaren wid n tura’’. Neɣ mi yenna : ‘’Ulac imuras i yecban ussan deg tmurt’’, ‘’Ilaq ad d-nsellek tasuta-a, axater ur tesɛi ara lxetyar : ya ad tt-nger neɣ ad tenker iman-is’’. Isem Feraoun, tefka-t Fransa i twacult-is deg useggas n 1873. Yekcem s aɣerbaz n taddart-is deg useggas n 1920, deg leɛmer-is 7 n yiseggasen. Mi yekfa leqraya-ines deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt, yuɣal d aselmad deg tmurt n leqbayel, syin yezzi daɣen ɣer tmanaɣt deg useggas n 1957. Yettwanɣa sɣur OAS ass n, 15 deg meɣres 1962 deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt. Gar wayen yura, ad naf : Le Fils du pauvre, Journal, Les poèmes de Si Mohand, Jours de Kabylie, L’anniversaire, La terre et le sang, Les chemins qui montent, Lettres à ses amis… atg.H. M.
Akken kan yebda ccekk la yettaɣ amekkan-is deg uxxam n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel JSK, ha-t-an yuɣal-d usirem i wid i tt-iḥemmlen, mbeɛd mi “tekkes sser” ɣef terbaɛt n MCA deg Lezzayer tamanaɣt s 3 n yiswiyen ɣer ulac. Waqila tufa-d ddebb-is terbaɛt n MCA imi i tt-trebbeḥ yal tikkelt JSK. Tettaɣlab-itt daxel neɣ deg berra n unnar-is, deg yal taswiɛt, “ama d anebdu, ama d ccetwa”, akken i d-uran kra n yimferǧen n ddabex uḍar. Rbeḥ-agi i d-tewwi tarbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel, ad yefk afud igerrzen i yimyurar-is i wakken ad kemmlen s lebɣi d tebɣest deg umecwar-nsen, u ad ṣefḍen lexsarat iɛeddan d usnuɣni n wid i tt-iḥemmlen, ladɣa wid-nni i yekkaten deg-sen.
Ma ɣef temliit, nezmer ad d-nini turar-itt terbaɛt n JSK akken iwata, mačči imi terbeḥ, meɛna imi yal amekkan n unnar tesseḥres fell-as. Ayen i tt-yeǧǧan ad d-tawi 3 n yiswiyen u ad teḥrez acebbak-is d ilem. Ula d abeddel n yimyurar i yewdem usleɣmay Velud, yewwi-d lɣella-s. Netta i yellan rrif n ucruf mbeɛd lexsara sdat n tarbaɛt n USMBA. Llan-d yiswiyen n temlilit deg uḥric wis sin sɣur Belgherbi, Hamroun d Bensayeh. S wakka i d-tqerreb JSK s 16 n tneqqiḍin ɣer trebbuyaɛ n MCA d CRB i yeṭṭfen imekwan imezwura. Mazal ihi yella usirem i terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel i wakken ad ṭṭfen taqacuct deg uḥric-agi n rrwaḥ, ma neẓra mazal 5 n temliliyin.
Yenna-d deg taggara usleɣmay n JSK “Tetturar JSK akken iwata sdat n trebbuyaɛ timeqqranin. Iaq ad nexdem akka akked wiyaḍ”. Acu kan, ilaq diɣ ad terr ddehn-is ɣer Telɣuɣa n Tefriqt i tt-yettraǧun deg ussan i d-iteddun. Asiher amezwaru-ines ad yili ass n 29 deg unbir-agi, akked Vita Cub, ahat deg unnar n 5 deg yulyu deg ezzayer tamanaɣt.
Hocine Moula
Deg Wat Yanni neɣ deg Yixxamen n yilmeẓyen akked Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, aṭas n leqdicat i d-yellan i lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 31 ɣef lmut n urgaz n yidles d tsekla tamaziɣt, Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Yella wahil d anesbaɣur seg wass n 27 ar 29 deg furar 2020. Deg usiher-agi, ad naf isaragen ɣef umecwar d umennuɣ-is, timsikniyin, asenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen n waṭas n yimura…atg. Am wakken i d-yella, ass-nni n lǧemɛa, 28 deg furar, usrasu n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s deg taddart n Tewrirt Mimun deg Wat Yanni.
D tagnit i fursen wid iḥemmlen tasekla, sser n tmedyazt, cbaḥa n wawal, tahuski n ugama, leḥdaqa n tidmi, asduqqes n tugniwin, talqa n tizumna, rẓana n umeslay, azal n tmenna, anamek n tira, tirga n umaru, teɣzi n tmuɣli, tilelli n yimru i wakken ad t-id-smektin. Ha-t-an ubruy gar wawalen i d-yeǧǧa d tarzeft i tsutwin. «Ḥeḍṛeɣ yemmut umɣar aneggaru i d-yettawin abrid n tmussni : Newwi tafekka-s ɣer uẓekka ideg yenṭel. Mi nerra akal fell-as, nuɣal-d, nettmesmuqal am win iṣeṛɛen la d-yettaki. Indel usafu gar-aneɣ i seg d-nettagem tafat.
Ass-nni, ay Azwaw, i ak-id-mmektiɣ, i as-nniɣ : A yimɛazzen n yiwen wass, ɣurwat ad tuɣalem d imeɣban n kullas si tmussni d tmuɣli taɣezzfant, d tutlayt n wul d leɛqel. Mmektiɣ-k-id, mmektiɣ-d akk tisutwin ara d-yemlen. Amusnaw aneggaru, nemḍel-it, daɣ nemḍel yid-s tamusni. Ulac tijmuyaɛ d yigrawen ideg ara tḥefḍem tamussni akken i tt-ḥefḍen yimezwura-nwen. Tura, tamussni tuɣal s idlisen. Degmi i uriɣ adlis-a i kečč, ay Azwaw, d tezyiwin-ik, ad ak-d-yeqqim d tagejdit i usenned, d tagejdit i lebni», seg Tabrat i Muḥend Azwaw i yura Mulud Mɛemmeri. Ilul Mɛemmri ass, 28 deg duǧember 1917, di Tewrirt Mimun deg Wat Yanni. Yemmut ass 25 deg furar 1989, deg Ɛin Deffla, deg ubrid n tuɣalin-is si Lmerruk.Dahlal Chanez
Wwḍen tura 28 n yiseggasen n unaḍeḥ, n timmeɣnest, snat n tmerwin d ṭam n uselmed, aseḥbiber d usekfel n tutlayt tayemmat, tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Deg tlemmast n tmetti timseɛrebt, deg yiwet n tallit ideg yettwagdel umeslay, yettwaṭṭaf kra n win ara d-yinin awal s teqbaylit, deg tlemmast n tewtilin-a i iweɛren, i d-tennulfa yiwet n tddukkla tamaziɣt, di temdint n Wehran. Tlul-d tddukkla-a i yewwin isem n Numidya. Tiddukkla Numidya, tella yakan uqbel ad d-tlal s wudem unṣib, d tin ara yuɣalen yis-neɣ ar tazwara n yiseggasen n 1980, anida i tebda leqdic s tuffra, sɣur kra n urbaɛ inebɣasen. Armi i d-tella tullya tasertant i d-yeglan s tikci n ttesriḥ i usnulfu n tddukkliwin, dɣa tella-d tddukkla Numidya seg tmezwura i yessutren akken ad tili, ɣas akken yella-d maḥyaf mgal-is, imi ur as-yettunefk ara ttesriḥ armi i iɛedda useggas segmi tessers akaram-is deg uxxam n twilayt, ɣef lǧal n wawal Tamazight i d-yeddan deg yisuḍaf-is n daxel. Seg wass-nni ar ass-a, seg wass n umenzu n tuber 1991, urǧin teḥbis anaḍeḥ, urǧin teḥbis leqdic adelsan amatu, urǧin teḥbis asuter d uselmed n tmaziɣt. Ddeqs n leqdicat i d-tettheggi ɣef teɣzi n useggas, maca ɣur-s kraḍ n ttiɛadat igejdanen deg useggas ur ten-tzeggel ara, dima llan gar yimuhal-is. Leqdicat-a, rzan Tafaska n yennayer, Tafsut n Yimaziɣen, Ass n tmenɣiwt n Lwennas Meɛtub. Tezger-d lesnin-agi tddukkla Numidya s tebɣest n yiɛeggalen-is : gar-asen aselway Mass S. Zeɛmuc i yellan i lmendad-is segmi d-tlul ar ass-a. Am wakken daɣen i llan ddeqs n wid yemmuten, seg wid i iqedcen deg-s, nessawaḍ-asen talwit. Qlilit tddukkliwin i yeddren ugar n 20 n yiseggasen akken ad ṭṭfent tinnuzbit, maca Tiddukkla Tadelsant Numidya, s lebɣi d tebɣest, tessaweḍ ass-a ɣer 28 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is. Nessaram-as ugar n tudert, ugar n leqdic d wugar n umhaz.
Khaled Achoui
Ǧǧan-t-id yimuzwura d awal, ttejṛa yiwet, iẓuṛan-is ṭṭuqten. Ihi akken ula d timetti taqbaylit, imi mgaraden wansayen deg-s, seg temnaḍt ɣer tayeḍ. Lameεna d amgarad-a, i as-yefkan i tmurt n yiqbayliyen ccbaḥa, sser d lhiba. Amenzu n ṛṛbiε, neɣ amager n tefsut, d yiwen n unsay i yesεan azal meqqṛen di tmetti taqbaylit s umata. Ayagi, imi lejdud sfilliten i lxiṛ s leεwayed i d-refden ula d nutni sɣuṛ lejdud-nsen. Meḥsub imi tafsut d tasemhuyt n yijeǧǧigen, ccbaḥa n ugama d ubeḥri zeddigen. Ula d nutni seg tama-nsen, ssulin di ccan-is, ttmagaren-tt s tẓiḍanin, ccna d ucmummeḥ. Seg temnaḍin i mazal ṭṭfent deg wansayen-nsent, ad naf tin n At Ɛebbas. Ladɣa deg wayen icudden ɣer tjaddit.
Γur tuddar n At Ɛebbas, amenzu n tefsut, d ass i yesεa lbenna weḥd-s.Neɣ d ass uzzig n tuffɣa n tlawin d warrac. Tafejrit n wass, ad d-kkrent tyemmatin, ad heggint yal ṣṣenf n tuččit, am umeqful, ibawen iquranen, berkukes, timellalin d tuftiyin. Rnu ɣer waya, ad d-heggint tiqecwalin i warraw-nsent imecṭaḥ, deg-sent ggarent buhan n tẓiḍanin. Ula d tislatin timaynutin, neɣ tid mazal ur ddint, s umur-nsent. Mi kfant aheggi-nsent, ad cebbḥent iman-nsent, ad lsent tiqendyar ifazzen ɣur-sent, syin ad ffɣent ɣer teẓgi. Deg ubrid n tirza, teddunt, ttcewwiqent, cennunt. Mi ara leḥqent ɣer teẓgi, ttnejmaεent xeddment urar n lxalat. Deg teswiεt-nni, yettifsus uqerru gar tizzegzuyt n yimɣan, d ubeḥri yeṣfan.
Ayen i d-irennun i unnar ccbaḥa, d taḍṣa n warrac imecṭaḥ, i d-yeskanayen belli umren nezzeh. Gar n 5 d 6 n yisragen i sdεeddayent tullas dinna. Ula d lmakla-nni i reffdent, teddmen-tt-id mi ara llaẓent, ferrqent gar-asent. D tugniwin-a i nwala deg temnaḍin n At Ɛebbas s umata, gar-sent timlilit i d-thegga tddukkla Tiɣṛa n Tqurrabt. Taneggarut-a dɣa, tgerr-d tiɣri i tlawin n temnaḍt-nsen bac ad ḥeḍṛent i ttiεad-a. Meεna ayen yeṣṣefṛaḥen ugar, d tiɣri-s i tlawin i wakken ad d-llsent tiqendyar n Leqbayel, ad εellqent lfeṭṭa-nsent. D ayeb i yeǧǧan ttiεad-nsen yessmurres akken ilaq. I yissali, yeḥḍer ttiεad-a ula d anaẓuṛ Uleḥlu akked Massa Suεad.B, i yesseḥman taqeεet s ubendir. Di taggara, ad d-nekfu s wawal n yiwet n tmeṭṭut i aɣ-d-yennan: «Nefṛeḥ buhan ass-a, nessaram ad lhun wussan-nneɣ i d-iteddun. Bɣiɣ kan ad weṣṣiɣ arrac-nneɣ, d akken ilaq ad ḥerzen leεwayed-nsen, imi d wagi i d agerruj-nneɣ.K.K.
Ass n 2 yennayer iɛeddan, mettwal 20:00 n tmeddit, raɛen (ḍaɛen) ttlata n yilemẓiyen deg teẓgi n Udrar n Fad, ɣer tama n taddart n Yiɣil Wulli. Akken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, i icudden i Uḥuddu aɣarim n waɣir n Bgayet, tecqa-ten yilemẓiyen-a s adrar tirza n uḥewwes i gan ass-nni, rnu usan-d seg tɣiwant tanaragt n Tsexriwt. Seld mi yettwaberreḥ uriɛ-nsen, iceggeɛ Uḥuddu aɣarim akk irgazen d wallalen ilaqen i beddu n unadi di tmiṭ n teẓgi-nni ɣef yilemẓiyen-a i yesɛan gar 18 d 19 n yiseggasen. Yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti d akken ula inesdabuyen idiganen (autorités locales), ijadarmiyen akked yiɣermanen, kkin daɣen deg temhelt-a n unadi, i yebdan akken-nni mi d-yeɣli yiḍ s ddeqs n wakud, armi teḥbes ɣer leǧwahi n 22:30. Seld mi asen-sutren yirgazen n usellek, saɣen yilemẓiyen-a times deg usɣar anda akken llan, syinna d abbu i asen-yerran tifin sehlent i wid yettnadin. Ɣer taggara, ttwawfen ihi warrac-a war ma yuɣ-iten kra di tfekka neɣ di tnefsit-nsen. D acu, yessufeɣ-d awellih Uḥuddu aɣarim i yilemẓiyen s umata, ad sneqsen tuffɣiwin s idurar di tallit-a n usemmiḍ d yigeffuren, ideg ttiwɛiren yiberdan i tikli, yetteɣlay-d yiḍ zik, atg.
Mack Nat Frawsen, d yiwen i ixeddmen deg tsenselkimt , akken daɣen d amaru i ikeccmen deg ubrid n tira , yessaweḍ ad yaru 07 n wammuden n yisefra, ad nebder Le bleu du littoral , Le vers de la mélodie , La rivière espérance , Les beaux rêves demain , Vers au vent , Le souffle du zéphyr Akked wammud s tmaziɣt i iwumi isemma : “Agris n unebdu”. Am wakken i yura, diɣ, ungal “Le voyage avec Elise”. Nesteqsa-t ɣef waya. Ha-t-an wacu i –yerra.
Aɣmis n yimaiɣen: Awal ɣef wammud-agi n yisefra Agris n unebdu…Mack Nat Frawsen: Wagi d ammud n yisefra amezwaru i d-uriɣ s teqbaylit. Uriɣ-t s teqbaylit, syin akkin xedmeɣ-as tasuqilt ɣer trumit. Tasuqilt-agi ɣer trumit, tusa-d tewɛer cit acku ttaɛraḍeɣ akken ad ḥedreɣ ɣef tira-nni-ines tamezwarut. Ad ɛerḍeɣ akken ur tteffɣeɣ ara seg unnar-nni n teqbaylit . Azwel-agi i d-as ffkiɣ akken twalam, deg-s anemgal imi deg unebnu ulac agris. Nekk ḥemmleɣ ad urareɣ s yimeslayen. Deg uzwel-agi, bɣiɣ ad cuddeɣ gar sin yinemgalen .
Melmi i tebdid tira ?Bdiɣ tira asmi i sɛiɣ 20 n yiseggasen, maca ur ttajmaɛeɣ ara ayen i ttaruɣ. Syin akkin, nniɣ-as ayen ur ttaruɣ ara akken ad d-ssufɣeɣ idlisen. Dɣa, syagi i tebda tikti deg ubrid n tira .
D acu n yiseltal anda i tettafeḍ iman-ik deg tira ?Di tira, yal yiwen anda i d yesuzur imeslayen. Nekk ahat ma zemreɣ ad iniɣ, d akken smenyifeɣ tira ɣef tayri akked tira xfifen, tira tilellit .
Anda tettafeḍ iman-ik, deg tira s trumit neɣ s teqbaylit ? Tarumit d tutlayt s wayes i d uriɣ tuget n yidlisen-iw, maca isental i yi-itteqraḥen s waṭas, ttruḥun-d s teqbaylit imi d nettat i d tutlayt tayemmat-iw. Am umedya, tuget n yisefra i d-uriɣ, ttmeslayen-d ɣef leḥzen, anuɣni, timmetti « Allaɣ yetthubu waḍu »,  » Ay allaɣ i iwumi xerben lexyuḍ  »
Awal ɣef wungal-ik Le voyage avec Elyse…D yiwen wungal i d-yeffɣen deg ɣuct 2017. Yettmeslay-d ɣef 02 n wudmawen igejdanen i d-yettemlilin yal tikkelt, syin akkin, ad d-tlal tayri gar-asen, xas ulamma Elyse tezweǧ , syin akkin ad mbaɛaden…
Ad tili tsuqilt ɣer teqbaylit ?tidet kan, ɣer teqbaylit, mazal urɛad i d-swejdeɣ i usenfar-agi , acku bɣiɣ ad t-xedmeɣ nekk s timmad-iw, ladɣa i yisefra. Ma yella d ungal, ssarmeɣ limer ad d-affeɣ win ara t-id-yessuqqlen ɣer teqbaylit.
Yella kra n umaynut ? Ih , ad yili wammud n yisefra deg kra n wayyuren-agi i d-iteddun. Aql-i-n ssewjadeɣ-as , imi akken ad txedmeḍ kra, ilaq ad-as-tefkeḍ aṭas n wakud akken ad yili yemmed . Testeqsa-t Yamani Souhila
Gar-aneɣ d kra n yimalasen, ad d-tettwaheyyi yiwet n temlilit ur ncuba tiyaḍ, gar ddeqs n yimedyazen, iqburen abeɛda akked kra n yilemẓiyen i d-yetteflalin. Tella deffir uslal n tekti-a tmedyazt tuḥrict Massa Nadya Benɛmer, i yettidiren di Wehran, i yenwan ad d-tessemlil ddeqs n yimedyazen ɣef teɣzi n yiwen n wass, akken ad mbaddalen amciwer d tikta ɣef kra n tlufa n usefru, n tmagit d umennuɣ. Ad d-teḍru temlilit-a ass n, 04 deg wayyur n yebrir-a ara d-yasen, deg Lberj Ageldan n tɣiwant n Larbɛa Nayt Iraten, seg 09:00 n tsebḥit d asawen. Ɣef wawal n temheyyit, gar yiswan igejdanen n umlaqi-a, d aseḥbiber ɣef tgemmi iɣef qedcen waṭas di talliyin yezrin.
«Ayen i aɣ-d-sawḍen yimezwura seg zzman aqbur, yesnagay-d acḥal i meqqrit umezruy-nneɣ ideg tettwabna tɣerma-nneɣ. Ma yella ur d-nelhi yis-s, ur as-nefki akk allalen iwulmen iwumi nezmer, yezmer ad aɣ-yerwel seg kra n yiceqqiqen. D ayen i yeǧǧan tusa-iyi-d tekti-a n uheyyi n temlilit gar yimedyazen at wawal iǧehden. Deg-s daɣen d tajmilt i tmedyazt taqbaylit », akka i aɣ-d-tenna Massa Nadya Benɛmer. Dima ɣef wawal n Massa Nadya, « ɣas ulamma llant tddukkliwin i d-yesnulfan kra n temliliyin i yimedyazen akken ad d-ssenfalayen ayen bɣan, ɣef yal taluft, maca drus i yellan mi ara iwali yiwen uguren akk i yellan i usiweḍ, d wayen akk i d-yekkaten deg tutlayt-nneɣ seg waṭas n tamiwin ». Dɣa, tebda si tura ancad n yimedyazen i lmend n temlilit-a ara d-yettwasuddsen s uzwel n « Tafsut n wawal ».
